30b6(dkon brtsegs): pa de na/ khyim bdag rnams mi ba nas yid kyi bar la mi gnas par 'gyur ro// khyim bdag khyed rnams nam bzugs mi len cing / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnam
30b7(dkon brtsegs): mi len pa de na/ khyim bang ba rnams chos thams cad la mi gnas par 'gyur ro// khyim bdab khyed rnams nam gzugs kyi phung po mo len cing / tshor ba'i phung po dang / 'du
31a1(dkon brtsegs): shes kyi phung po dang / 'du byed kyi phung po mi len pa de na/ khyed rnams phung po rnams la mi gnas par 'gyur ro// khyim bdag khyed rnams nam rnam par shes pa'i byang
31a2(dkon brtsegs): po mi len pa den khyed rnams rnam par shes pa'i phung po la mi gnas par 'gyur ro// khyim 'dag khyed rnams rnam sa'i khams mi len cing / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang /
31a3(dkon brtsegs): rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams mi len pa de na/ khyed rnams khams la mi gnas par 'gyur ro// khyim bdab khyed rnams nam rnam par shes pa'i khams mi len pa de na/ khyed
31a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi gnas par 'gyur ro// khyim bdag khyed rnams ram 'jig rten 'di mi len cing / 'jig rten pha rol mi len pa de ra khyed rnams 'jig rten thams
31a5(dkon brtsegs): cad la mi gnas par 'gyur ro// khyim bad ba khyed rnams nam chos thams cad mi len pa de na/ khyed rnams chos thams cad la mi gnas par 'gyur ro// khyim bdag khyed rnams
31a6(dkon brtsegs): nam chos thams cad la mi gnas pa de na/ khyed rnams mi byung mi 'jig go/ khyed rnams nam mi 'byung mi 'jig pa de na/ khyed rnams skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang /
31a7(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdub bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde dang / 'khrub pa rnams las yongs su thar par 'gyur te/ sdug bsngal las yongs su thar par 'gyur/
31b1(dkon brtsegs): ro zhes bshad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// skye ba dang mi 'chi ba yis/
31b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten 'di kun kun nas 'bar// byis pa skyabs med btse ba ste// de dga' babs pa'i lam las nyams// brgyalam 'jig rten snang mdzad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar 'gyur/
31b3(dkon brtsegs): ngal ba chung pos ma byed par// brtson 'grus brtan par rtsom byos shig/ gang la gnas te rnam sdom pa// shes rab kyi ni de yang ltos// shes rab kyi ni de mthong ste// rnam pa bzhan du mi 'gyur ro
31b4(dkon brtsegs): gang la gnas te sems sgom pa// thams cad spyod par shes par bya// chos rnams stong par rig nas ni// byang chub nyid kyang stong pa yin// 'dod chags zhe sdang de bzhin gti mu ba dang // ma
31b5(dkon brtsegs): gsum de dag shin tu mi bzad pa// des ni 'jig rten 'di kun raba' bar yang // byis pa ring nas gnyid log khong mi chung // skye dang rga dang na dang 'chi ba dang // smre sngabs 'don dang sdug bsngal
31b6(dkon brtsegs): yid mi 'des// 'jib rten 'di dag gtses par rib nas ni// chos rnams kun la gnas par ma byed cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam po de dag
31b7(dkon brtsegs): gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das las rab tu byung ba rnyed par gyur cig/ bdag cag rnams kyis bde bar gshegs pa las bsnyen
32a1(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po rnyed par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag tshur shog ces gsungs pa dang / de nyid kyis tshe dang ldan pa de dag rab tu byung bar gyur/
32a2(dkon brtsegs): tede nyid kyis bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang / de nyid kyis dge slong gi dngos por gyur to// 'di la chos nyid ni 'di yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// de dag gis ni ngur smrig pa'o//
32a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag gis ni sgra yang bregs// kun kyang lhung bzed thogs gyur nas// de nyid du ni dgra bcom gyur// ston pas dgra bcom rab mkhyen nas// dge slong gi ni dge 'dun dang // lha rnams
32a4(dkon brtsegs): mdun du mngon sum du// ched du brjod pa tshang du brjod// 'jig rten gyi ni mgon po la// sngan chad sbyin pa byin pas na// gang na bde ba mang ba der// shin tu dga' zhing 'ongs par gyur//
32a5(dkon brtsegs): de dag gis ni nga mthong nas// dad pa rab tu bskyed par gyur// de dag sems ni dang ba la// chos rnams kyi ni mchog bstan to// dgra bcom gyi ni gsung thos nas// bdag tu lta ba rnam par
32a6(dkon brtsegs): ba shig/ stong nyid mngon du byas nas ni// de dag skye ba kun nas grol// khyim bdag gi le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lam gyi bar du khyim
32a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag lnga brgya tsam po mi g.yo ba'i gnas la bkod nas kun nas mdzes pas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs so// de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer gyi lha rnams dang /
32b1(dkon brtsegs): gnod sbyin gyi 'jigs 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag gis 'di lta bu'i sbyin gnas 'jig rten na shin tu dkon pa'i bcom ldan 'das la 'asod snyoms dngul lo snyam mo// nga nam
32b2(dkon brtsegs): gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyis bsod snyoms kha dog phun sum tshogs pa dri phun sum tshogs pa/ ro phun sum tshogs pa/ rig pa phun sum tshogs pa/ bcom ldan 'das la
32b3(dkon brtsegs): phul nas/ gnod sbyin ci 'jigs la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bsod snyoms de bzhes so// bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyis bsod snyoms
32b4(dkon brtsegs): phul ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe/ steng gi bar snang las ci 'jigs kyi 'khor mang po gnod sbyin drug khri brgyad stong gis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rjes su yi rang ba'i sgra phyung ngo // de
32b5(dkon brtsegs): nas de'i phyir ga nod sbyin ci 'jigs kyis rang gi 'khor rnams la bos te/ bdag gis ni nga bzod de bzhin gshegs pa la bsod snyoms phul gyis/ khyed kyis ni dge slong gi dge 'dun
32b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams la phul cig/ de ni khyed rnams kyi yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin rnams kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsod snyoms phul nas/
32b7(dkon brtsegs): gnod sbyin de dag la snying brtse ba'i phyir/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis kyang bsod snyoms blangs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por
33a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa las/ nges bsod snyoms blangs par mkhyen nas sa phyogs de nas slar log go// de ltar de'i tshe lha stong phrag du ma dang / klu stong phrag du ma dang /
33a2(dkon brtsegs): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po stong phrag du ma dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa stong phrag du ma dang / srog chags bye
33a3(dkon brtsegs): ba khrag khro ba brgya stong du ma rnams bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa'i zham ring du dong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das sa phyogs yangs shing rgya che ba zhig tu gshebs te/ byon nas gdan
33a4(dkon brtsegs): ba shams pa la bzhugs so// de nas gnod sbyin ci 'jigs 'khor dang bcas pas/ lha'i me tog man nga ra ba dang / u tA la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar
33a5(dkon brtsegs): po dang / lha'i tsan ngan gyi phye ma blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to// gtor/ mngon par gtor/
33a6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rab tu gtor nas thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug po de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyi bsam pa'ang
33a7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen de'i 'khor ba nod sbyin mang po'i bsam pa'ang mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// chos nyid ni 'di yin te/ nam sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams nam 'dzum pa mdzad pa de
33b1(dkon brtsegs): nA zhal gyi sgo nas 'od per 'dog du ma kha dog sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / le brdan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi khadog lta bu d+hA /
33b2(dkon brtsegs): ste nges 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa snang bas khyab par byas nas/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i bzi brjid med par byas te/ sems can dmyal ba'i sems can ras/ tshangs po
33b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te slar log nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo// kha cig ni drag par
33b4(dkon brtsegs): nub bo// kha cig ni pus mor nub bo// chos nyid ni 'di yin te/ nam sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams la lung ston pa de na/ 'od zer zhabs
33b5(dkon brtsegs): gnyis kyi 'og tu nub par 'gyur ro// nam dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams la lung ston pa de na/ 'od zer snam logs su nub par 'gyur ro// nam pa shin rje'i 'jig rten
33b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems can rnams la lung ston pa de na/ 'od zer mdun du nub par 'gyur ro// nam mi rnams la lung ston pa de na/ 'od zer g.yon du nub par 'gyur ro// nam lha rnams la lung ston pa/
33b7(dkon brtsegs): de na 'od zer g.yas su nub par 'gyur ro// namanyan thos rnams la lung ston pa de na/ 'od zer pus mor nub par 'gyur ro// na ma rang sangs rgyas rnams la lung ston pa de na/ 'od bar
34a1(dkon brtsegs): phrag par nu sa chu po ram sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston pa denapa 'od zer/
34a2(dkon brtsegs): steng gi dbu'i gtsug gi mtshams su nub par 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldam rangs 'dzum pa mdzad pa mthong ste/ mthong nas chos gos phrag pa
34a3(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu bgos te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'angadi dag
34a4(dkon brtsegs): gsol to// ci rgyus 'jig rten snang mdzad pa/ 'jig rten kun la sman pa'i slang// 'jig rton mgon po 'od mdzad pa// ci zhig slad du 'dzum pa bstan// sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub
34a5(dkon brtsegs): phyir rang ring su yis sa bon btab// de ring su la lung yang ston// gang zhig thal phyir rab tu zhugs// dpa' bo rnam par 'dren pa rnams// rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum mi mdzad// thub pa ci
34a6(dkon brtsegs): yi slad du bstan// 'od zer don ni bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis slar gsungs pa/
34a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten mgon po skyob pa la// ci 'jigs rab tu dang sems kyis// bsod snyoms dag ni phul bas na// de ltar de phyir 'dzum pa mdzad// gnod sbyin 'di las shi 'phos nas/ sum
34b1(dkon brtsegs): cu rtsa gsum 'gro bar 'gyur// sum cu bsum nas shi 'phos nas// 'tha rdal du yang 'gro bar 'gyur// 'thab bral nas ni dpa' ldan 'gro// 'dod la 'dod pasang par byas nas// mi mi
34b2(dkon brtsegs): nang du skye 'gyur te// rgyal po rdzu 'phrul ldan par 'gyur// 'khor los sgyur ba mi yi dadang // gling bzhi ngag 'ing dbang po ste/ mi yi 'jig rten shi 'phos nas// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten 'grob
34b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// bskal pa bye ba nyi shur ni// rtag tu bsti stang byas par 'gyur// lha yi nang dang mi nang du// yang dang yang ni kun tu 'gro// phyis de rgyal sring bor nas ni// khyim med par yang rab tu
34b4(dkon brtsegs): 'byung // rkyen gyi byang chub thob 'gyur te// der ni mthar yang thug par 'gyur// gnod sbyin dag ni sum khri rnams// gnod sbyin skye gnas 'phos gyur nas// sum cu rtsa gsum skye bar 'gyur
34b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas la ni bus byas nas// sangs rgyas byams pa mthong gyur cing // de na mthar ni thug 'gyur te// dgra bcom pa yang thob 'gyur na// ston pa la ni su mi mchod// gnod
34b6(dkon brtsegs): sbyin stong du tshang ba rnams// byang chub mchog la rab zhugs pas// de dang dge ba'i rtsa ba des// nam du rang ngan 'gror 'gro mi 'gyur// kha cig srog chags kun phan phyir// byang
34b7(dkon brtsegs): chub dam pa rab tshol zhing // sangs rgyas 'dren pa stong rnams la// bkur sting ba ni byed par 'gyur/ kha cig sangs rgyas byang chub phyir// stong phrag gnyis sam gsum dag kyang // me tog
35a1(dkon brtsegs): 'phreng ba dri rnams kyis// mchod pa dag ni byed par 'gyur// dag pa bsgoms pa'i bdag nyid tsam/ 'dren pa bye ba phrag stong la// kha cig bkur sti byed 'gyur te/
35a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag phyis ni byang chub reg/ de nas ci 'jigs de yi bu// ri bo zhes bya rdzu 'phrul che// 'jig rten sangs rgyas bdag gyur ces// des kyang sems ni bskyed par gyur/
35a3(dkon brtsegs): des ni sangs rgyas bsti stang byas// thams cad du yang smon lam btab// nga mthong nas ni mchod byas te// byang chub phyir ni sems 'dud ngo // de ni dpe ba'i rtsa ba des// ngan 'gro thams cad
35a4(dkon brtsegs): spangs gyur nas// sangs rgyas byams pa mthong nas ni// gdugs rnams bye ba 'bul bar 'gyur// gdugs rnams bye ba phul nas ni// na bza' bye ba 'bul bar 'gyur// na bza' bye ba phul nas mi
35a5(dkon brtsegs): de nyid du yang rab tu 'byung // srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir// byang chub dam pa rab tshol zhing // lo yang lnga brgya tshang bar ni// tshangs par spyad pa spyod par 'gyur// 'di lta bu yi rnam grangs kyis// sbyin dang
35a6(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims yang dag spyod// gang+gA'i bye ma ji snyed pa// de snyed bskal par spyod par 'gyur// dper gsungs pa ni de snyed du// de dag khyed kyis shes par gyis// de dag dper yang shes nas mi// de bas lhag
35a7(dkon brtsegs): par spyod par gyis// sngar ni dpe rnams gang brjod pa// kang+gA yi ni bye snyed kyi// de snyed sangs rgyas mthong gyur nas// de dag kun la bsti stang byed// e ma'o ye shes e ma'o shes// e ma'o bla na med
35b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems// sems par ban gyi 'dren pa sa de sa mas par mi 'gyur ro// phyis sems can sna gyi mchog langs rgyasmras yang gyur pa/ dang mim ca gags pa
35b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal por rnam par grangs// lon bye ba bdun cur yang // mog chags rnams la chos bstan te// phyis gdong dang gnyis gzu bam// de nas mya ngan 'das par 'gyur/ rab tu rdul bu'i sems
35b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi// 'dus pa dag ni ni shur gyur// de la tham gcig pu ni// dge slong bye ba nyi shur 'gyur// 'dres pa rnams ni gang brjod pa/ nyan thos dpag tu med pa ste// de yi nyan thos ji sted ga
35b4(dkon brtsegs): chu bzhugs pa'ang de snyed do// sems can rnams kyi ngon mdzad nas// de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan 'das// lo ni brgya phrag stong dag tu// de yi mchos gnas par 'gyur// bapral bam
35b5(dkon brtsegs): brgya tshang bar ni// sangs rgyas mang po 'byung bar 'gyur// bskal pa gcig la'ang 'byung ba ni// de na stong rnams 'byung bar 'gyur// mi rnams mangs pa gang dag mi// sangs rgyas chos rnams brnyi
35b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa// tshul bzhin mang du thos pa dang // rab tu 'dun pa nyid du bya// tshul bzhin ma yin rnam par spongs// tshul bzhin la ni rtag tu sgoms// mang du thos par rab tu bya// des ni shes rab
35b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'phel// byang chub sems dpa' slob pa yi// rtsa ba'i don ni chos bzhi ste// sbyin dang tshul khrims thos dang gtong // byang chub kyi ni lam la bzang // bla na med pa'i theg pa mchod/
36a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi rmi lam yang bskam// the tsom gcod pa bzang po yi// nyan thos kyi ni lam bstan to// sems can gang dga'adi 'dod pa// de langs ni skabs dbye'o// chos rnams kyi
36a2(dkon brtsegs): mchog ston pa// 'jig rten snang mdzad rnyed par dka'/ de nas gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyi bu ri bo 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di nas ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung
36a3(dkon brtsegs): po'i ri la gshegs zhes grag gis// bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po zhig bskyed do snyam mo// de nas gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyi bu ri bos rang gi 'khor la smras pa/ grogs
36a4(dkon brtsegs): po dang shes par gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas// ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po'i ril gshegs kyis de la grogs po dag mthu ci yod pa dang ci nus
36a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las la spro ba skyed cig/ de nas gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyi bu ri bo g.yog dang bcas pas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas gzung ste/ ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung
36a6(dkon brtsegs): po'i bar gyi lam de thams cad gseg ma dang / gyo mo dang / sdong du ma dang / tsher ma rnams med par byas so// me long gi dkyil 'khor ltar dag par byas so// lam de dag thams cad bsal nas/
36a7(dkon brtsegs): spos kyi chus kun tu chag chag btab bo// lam der gos mtshams med par bting ngo // lam der mi gang tsam du me tog gis chal par bkang ngo // lam de dag gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
36b1(dkon brtsegs): ngan gyis shin tu brtsan to// lam de bdub smos ngam pa'i snying po rab kyi snod nas 'dugs so// steng gi bar snang las dar gyi lnga lnga spangs te shin tu brtan to// lam der sil gar sna tshogs kyi sgra sngon
36b2(dkon brtsegs): bar byas so// lam de nas mnga' rgyang gang tshun chad tsam me tog ut+pa la dang / ku mu ra dang / pad+ma dkar pos khebs shing ngur pa sgra 'byin par byas so// lam de gser slebs pas rab tu g.yogs
36b3(dkon brtsegs): so lam de gser gying dra ba dang / rin po che sna bdud gyi drabs rab tu g.yogs so// de nas gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyi bu ri bos lam du de lta bu'i bkod pa byas nas lus chen
36b4(dkon brtsegs): po mngon par sprul te/ 'khor dang bcas pa dga' mgu rangs rab tu dga' ste/ mos shing yid bde ba skyes nas/ dga' ba'i sems dang / bde ba'i sems dang / mnyen pa'i sems dang / rnam
36b5(dkon brtsegs): par dang ba'i sems dang / sgrib pa med pa'i sems dang / rab tu tshim pa'i sems dang / sangs rgyas la gzhol ba'i sems dang / chos la gzhol ba'i sems dang / dge 'dun la gzhol ba'i
36b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dang / byang chub las mi g.yo ba'i sems dang / mi bskyod pa'i sems dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems dang / 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du 'phags
36b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems dang / sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / dga' ba'i sems dang / btang snyoms kyi sems dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi snod du
37a1(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa'i sems dang / snying po'i sems dang / brtan pa'i sems dang / mi phyed pa'i sems dang / ma zhigs pa'i sems dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi
37a2(dkon brtsegs): ltung ba'i sems dang / byang chub sems pa'i sa thams cad sgrub pa'i sems kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom
37a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyi bu ri bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad
37a4(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di dag gsol to// sangs rgyas 'jig rten rnams kyi mchog/ chos rnams kyi ni dam pa ston// 'jig rten mgon la bdag gis ni// bla na ma mchis mchod pa 'gyis// 'dren pa ji ltar
37a5(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pa bzhin// stobs bcu dang ni rab ldan te/ mi 'jigs pa la rab gnas nas// sems can don rnams bgyid par shog/ sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rnams dang // dpe byang bzang po brgyad
37a6(dkon brtsegs): su ldan// 'jig rten mgon po 'od byed pa// 'jig rten snang bar byed par shog/ srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir// snyan pa'i tshod ni rab ston cing // rnam pa bcu gnyis dam pa yi// chos kyi 'dzir
37a7(dkon brtsegs): le sor bar shog / rgyal baji lta de bzhin du/ cho 'phrul rnams ni rab ston cing // srog chags bye ba du ma yi// sems cam rnams kyi don 'gying shog / dpa' chen gang rnams ma byon pa/ 'jig
37b1(dkon brtsegs): rten mgon po 'ong mdzad ltar// byang chub dam par brtogs nas// lam de rab tu ston par shog/ sems can ldongs pa kun gyi phyir// mi gdang ldan pa nyid myur te// gnas dang tan dang skabs dag ga /
37b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin dpung gnyem 'gyur bar shog/ ji ltar 'dren pa zol mdzad bzhin// 'gro ba lngar ni skyes pa yi// srog chags rnams kyi mgon du shog/ bangag gi sdug bsngal kun las zlo la/ 'jig
37b3(dkon brtsegs): rten na ni mtshungs pa yong min pa// lha dbang lha ma yin dang klus mchod pa// ga'i brjing dag ni mtha' yas 'od mdzad pa// rkang gnyis mchog la bdag gis mchod pa bgyis// bdag mi pas mchod
37b4(dkon brtsegs): dam pa 'di dag gis// mi dbangs steng mchog tu gyur pa bzhin// bsod nams rab mchog sum cu gnyis mtshan ldam/ chos kyi bdag po de dang 'dra bar shog de nas bcom
37b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis/ gnod sbyin ci jigs kyi bu bol tshogs su bcad pa dag gis gsungs pa/ chos kyi dam pa rnams kyi phyir// ston pa'i rim tho gang byed pa// sems can rnams kyi mchog
37b6(dkon brtsegs): yin te// de dag byang chub rnying mi dka'// 'jig rten mngon po'i nga mdzad pa// 'jig rten snang mdzad mchog la ni// lnga dang klu dang mi rnams kyis// mchod par bya bar 'os par 'gyur// byang chub mtsho/
37b7(dkon brtsegs): tu sangs rgyas nas// shing mchog drung ngu rab 'dug ste// sdib can bdud las rgyal nas su// srog chags rnams la chos ston to// de nas bcom ldan 'das lha stong dreg
38a1(dkon brtsegs): ma dang / mnod sbyin dang min po grong drag dram dang / dri ba dang / mi 'amatsho dang / lto'i byi chen po stong phram drab dang / mi dang mi ma yid pa stong brag dum dang / chog chags kyi
38a2(dkon brtsegs): khra ga khrig brgya stong phrag du mas bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdul 'phrul chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul chen po dang / sangs rgyas
38a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi ga'i brjing chen pos 'od zer ni rab tu 'gyer/ zhing ni rab tu g.yo bar byas / me tog gi char ni rab tu 'bebs/ sil swAn bye ba khrag khrig ni rab tu 'khrol
38a4(dkon brtsegs): bar byas te/ gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyi bu ri bos lam du bkod pa ji ltar mngon par byas pa bzhin du shing rta'i phar lo tsam gyi pad+ma la zhabs gzhag ste/ ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po ga la ba der
38a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs te byon nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la kun dga' bo khyod kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan mchog chos kyi gdan/ gdan dam pa/ gdan bzang po 'jig rten gsum po kun
38a6(dkon brtsegs): las khyad par du phags pa'i gdan/ sangs rgyas kyi bdan shoms shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa gdan de la bzhugs te/ skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig
38a7(dkon brtsegs): rten rnams la snying brtse ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang phan pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya ba'i mdo sde/ sems can thams cad la phan par rab tu bsngags pa
38b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyu mthun pa 'chang par 'gyur te/ de'ang sems can thams cad the tsom du gyur pa la rab tu ston pa/ sems can thams cad kyi the tsom gcong ba/ sems
38b2(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi the tsom skye ba gcod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdo sde 'dri 'chad par 'gyur ro zhes bka' sprul pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gangan
38b3(dkon brtsegs): bshams te/ de na lnga bye ba drug cu rtsa brgyad kyis ras bcos ma re re de bzhin gshegs pa la phul te/ de dag kyang der gangan du bting bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das gangan bshams pa
38b4(dkon brtsegs): de la bzhugs so// bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i bu de rnams la tshogs su bcad pa dag gis gsungs pa 'jig rten mgon gyi gdan du ni/ lha min
38b5(dkon brtsegs): rang dam pa mchog lnga yis rab tu bting ba la/ de la rnam par 'dren pa bzhugs// thams cad chos kyi pha rol phyin// sangs rgyas bzhugs par gyur ma thag/ 'jig rten rnam par drug g.yos shing /
38b6(dkon brtsegs): skye bo rab tu dga' bar gyur// sangs rgyas zhing ni ri dang bcas// de na rab tu snang bar gyur// de na chos 'dod rnams la ni// skyob pas sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul snyom lha dang klu dang mi rnams dang //
38b7(dkon brtsegs): rdul bum yi dgas srul po rnams// de dag gcig gis gci ba mthong ste// sgrib pa dag ni med par gyur/ lha rnams bye phrag stong dang // khrag khrib brag ni brgya rnams ngag / rnyed dka' yi ni/
39a1(dkon brtsegs): tshig gsungs pa// sangs rgyas la ni dga' bas lha// rgyal po gzugs can snying po yang // de tshe blon pos yongs bskor cing // 'jig rten gyi ni mgon po mchod/
39a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas drung du 'ongs par gyur// ston pa lnga dang klu rnams dang // mi rnams 'dus par mkhyen pa dang // srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir// phyogs bzhi dag tu rab gzigs nas/ 'jig
39a3(dkon brtsegs): rten the tshom gang yod pa// rkang gnyis mchog la dris shig dang // the tshom dag ni dris pa rnams// rnam par 'dren pa ngas gcad do// de ltar de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi lam
39a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi sems can ji snyed 'dus nas chos nyan pa de dag thams cad kyis ngal bar shes nas/ sems can thams cad kyis bsams te/ phyag 'tshal nas chos nyan pa'i phyir rna ba blags te 'dug par
39a5(dkon brtsegs): gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'bal gyi bu chen po dge slong ma 'dus pa rnams la soms la//
39a6(dkon brtsegs): ma lpags pa rnams kyang tshol te/ rgyang ring po na gnas pa rnams kyang sdus shig de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po ri'i rgyal po kha ba can gyi lho phyogs kyi ngos la gan so//
39a7(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos bsams te/ bsams nas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po gal ba der song ste phyin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs
39b1(dkon brtsegs): chen po la 'ang ma ces smras so// btsun pa'od grangs chen po longs shig bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar lhur bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / bdud du bcas pa dang / tshangs par bas
39b2(dkon brtsegs): dang dge sbyong dang zlum zer bcas pa'i sna bu rnams dang / lnga dang / mi dang / lAm yi du bcas pa'i 'khor gyi mdur du chos nyon tu/ ston pas pa 'a bral gyi/ brlan pa 'ong srungs dang /
39b3(dkon brtsegs): cag gnyis kyi chos kyi bar chang ngur gyur du 'ong gis 'dong ngo // de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos/ tshe dang ldan pa mo ru 'bral gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smran
39b4(dkon brtsegs): song tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po khyod song zhig dang / kho bo'ang khyod song ba'i rjes bzhin du 'ong ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos stan de la 'phrul pa sprul te/
39b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por zhugs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po 'khor bzhis bskur cing mdun du bdar nas/ ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po ga
39b6(dkon brtsegs): la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor gyi nang du ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu phyogs gcig tu 'dug go//
39b7(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo ru 'gal gyi bu chen pos sprul pa de mthong nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo // tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos tshe dang ldan pa
40a1(dkon brtsegs): 'od srungs chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bcang yang mi ring ba zhig tu 'khor gyi nang na phyogs gcig tu 'jug pa mthong ste/ mthong nas 'di skad ces smras
40a2(dkon brtsegs): so btsun pa 'od srungs khyod stan ga la ba de nas sprul te/ sprul nas mgyogs par bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du phyiran te/ spyan sngar ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu 'khor gyi nang na phyogs gcig tu
40a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dug pa ni myur ba la brten pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang ldan no// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'bal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so//
40a4(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i mchog tu gsungs na/ 'di la 'kho bo'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul pa ltas ci zhig tu 'gyur/ gnod
40a5(dkon brtsegs): sbyin ci 'jigs kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / bam po gsum pa// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu/
40a6(dkon brtsegs): gabar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das pal ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// ral te zhus
40a7(dkon brtsegs): nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdas
40b1(dkon brtsegs): phyogs 'gal zhib zla'o// ngamang ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis chong bldan pa shA ra'i bul 'di nangs ba ku phul to// bstong ba
40b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ci dang tsa 'dod pa rlos shig dang / dris pa de nga de lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// dri dang ce
40b3(dkon brtsegs): bral nas pa bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ni zas 'di skang ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos du dang ldanan/ byang chub sems dpa' jams lus thi las padam
40b4(dkon brtsegs): ngam mchis pa dag lags/ ngag gi las ldan ma thob ma mchis pa dang / yid kyi las kha na ma thob ma mchis pa dang / lus kyi las yongs su dab pa dang / ngag gi las yongs su dag pag
40b5(dkon brtsegs): yid kyi las yongs su dag pa dang / lus kyi las ma g.yos pa dang / ngag gi las ma g.yos pa dang / yid kyi las ma g.yos pa rnams lags/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed/
40b6(dkon brtsegs): pa de las bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis skyong mi nus pa rnams la bas/ sa nas sar 'phar bal mkhas pa rnams la bas/ sems can thams cad kyi 'dren par gyur pa dang / rnam
40b7(dkon brtsegs): par 'dren par gyur pa dang / yongs su 'dren par gyur pa dang / sgron mar gyur pa dang / stegs su gyur pa dang / dam par gyur pa dang / grur gyur pa dang / sgrol ba po dang / pha rol tu 'gro bar
41a1(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa dang / gnas dang / mgon dang / skyabs dang / dpung gnyen du gyur pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa desas zlog par mi nus pa rnams lags/
41a2(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis don 'di nyid kun zhus pa gang gis byang chub rab zhugs pa// dpa' bo de yi don ci lags// gang gi
41a3(dkon brtsegs): dam pa 'tshang rgya ba// yon tan chos rnams brjod du gsol// srog chags kun/ sman slad du// dpa' bo de dag ji ltar spyod// ji lta bu yi chos bsgoms pas// mi yi dam pa sangs rgyas 'gyur//
41a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub snying por rab gnas nas// sdig can dag ni ji ltar 'dul// bye ba dag gi zhing bskyod nas// ji ltar byang chub mchog 'tshang rgya// byang chub sems dpa' gang gi dom// 'di 'dra'i tshig
41a5(dkon brtsegs): ni ci zhig lags// sangs rgyas chos ni mchog rnams dang / byang chub dag ni 'dir brjod gsol// srog chags kun la sman slad du// pad+ma bzhin du ma chags shing // sems can bye ba grol
41a6(dkon brtsegs): mdzad par// 'jig rten 'di na ji ltar spyod// mkhas pa lha dang grung ga dang // mi dang mi ma lags rnams kyis// ji lta bur ni mchod 'gyur ba/ zhus pa de dag bshad du gsol/
41a7(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' chos gcig dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dag
41b1(dkon brtsegs): rang gzhan yang dpam tu med pa dag yongs su 'dzin to// chos gcig pu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems te/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
41b2(dkon brtsegs): tshe gcig pu de dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dab dang gzhan yang dpab tu med pa dag yongs su 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i dus 'di skad ces
41b3(dkon brtsegs): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bsam pa ji lta bu/ byang chub kyi sems ji lta bu/ de skad ces gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di zad ces bka'
41b4(dkon brtsegs): stsal to// shA ri'i bu bsam pa zhes bya ba ni mi phyed pa'i phyir snying po'o// brtan pa'i phyir mi phyed pa'o// mi g.yo ba'i phyir brtan pa'o// ma 'khrul ba'i phyir mi g.yo ba'o// shin tu gnas
41b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir ma 'khrul pa'o// mi zlogs pa'i phyir shin tu gnas pa'o// sems can la lta ba'i phyir mi zlogs pa'o// snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i phyir sems can la lta ba'o// yongs su
41b6(dkon brtsegs): mi skyo ba'i phyir snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba'o// sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i cho ga shes pa'i phyir yongs su mi skyo ba'o// bdag la bde ba ma yin pa'i phyir sems can yongs su smin par bya
41b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i cho ga shes pa'o// lan du phan 'dogs par re ba med pa'i phyir bdag bde ba ma yin pa'o// zang zing med pa'i phyir lan du phan 'dogs par re ba med pa'o// sems can gyi phyir 'brang ba/
42a1(dkon brtsegs): zang zing med pa'o// mthu chung ba'i sems can la lta ba'i phyir sem can gyi phyir 'brang ba'o// mgon du gyur pa'i phyir mthu chung ba'i sems can la lta ba'o// skyabs dang /
42a2(dkon brtsegs): dpung gnyen gyi phyir mgon du gyur pa'o// ma 'khrugs pa'i phyir skyabs dang dpung gnyen no// shin tu yang dag par brtags pa'i phyir ma 'khrugs pa'o// rtsod pa med pa'i phyir shin tu
42a3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par brtags pa'o// bsam pa dge ba'i phyir rtsod pa med pa'o// ci'ang med pa'i phyir bsam pa dge ba'o// shin tu yongs su dag pa'i phyir ci'ang med pa'o// rab tu byung bar byas pa'i
42a4(dkon brtsegs): phyir shin tu yongs su dag pa'o// nang dri ma med pa'i phyir rab tu byang bar byas pa'o// phyi shin tu yongs su dag pa'i phyir nang dri ma med pa'o// de ltar shA ri'i bu mi phyed pas snying po zhes bya ba nas/
42a5(dkon brtsegs): phyi shin tu yongs su dag pa'i phyir nang dri ma med pa'i bar du ste/ bsam pa ni de lta bu'o// byang chub kyi sems ji lta bu zhe na/ sems de ni nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi brdzi ba'o//
42a6(dkon brtsegs): sems de ni theg pa gzhan mi 'dod pa'i phyir brel ba med pa'o// sems de ni pha rol rgol ba thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa'i phyir brtan pa'o// sems de ni bdud thams cad kyis mi phyed pa'o// sems de ni dge
42a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs bsags pa'i phyir rtag pa'o// sems de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos la mos pa'i phyir mi g.yo ba'o// sems de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa la rab tu gnas pa'o// sems de ni gnyen po
42b1(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i phyir bla na med pa'o// sems de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad nges par rigs pa'i phyir rdo rje lta bu'o// sems de ni sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa la mi mnyam pa med pa'i phyir mnyam pa'o//
42b2(dkon brtsegs): sems de ni rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa'o// sems de ni shes rab kyis snang bar byed pa'i phyir dri ma med pa'o// sems de ni sems can thams cad la skabs 'byed pa'i
42b3(dkon brtsegs): phyir rgya che ba'o// sems de ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir yangs pa'o// sems de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la btang ba'i phyir sgrib pa med pa'o// sems de ni snying rje chen po ma gcad pa'i phyir
42b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'o// sems de ni mkhas phrab sngags pa'i phyir sngon du 'gro bar bya ba'o// sems de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sa bon du gyur pa'o// sems de ni bde ba'i dngos po tham
42b5(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi gnas so// sems de ni tshul khrims kyis smon lam las byung ba'o// sems de ni bzod par bsnyen par dka' ba'o// sems de ni brtson 'grus kyis thul bar dka' ba'o// sems de ni bsam
42b6(dkon brtsegs): gtan dag gis nye bar zhi ba'o// sems de ni shes rab kyi tshogs kyis gnod pa med pa'o// yang sems de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi
42b7(dkon brtsegs): phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po'i rtsa ba'o// sems de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po'i rtsa ba'o// sems de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
43a1(dkon brtsegs): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyang rnams kyi rtsa ba'o// yang shA ri'i bu sems de ni byang chub kyi rang bzhin te/ de'i phyir byang chub kyi sems zhes
43a2(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dang / byang chub kyi sems de lta bu dang ldan pa ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// sems rgya chen po sems can mchog rab ces bya'o//
43a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du gyur pa'i sems can ces bya'o// lus kyi las kha na ma tho ba med pa yin/ ngag gi las kha na ma tho ba med pa yin/ yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba med pa yin/
43a4(dkon brtsegs): lus kyi las yongs su dag pa yin/ ngag gi las yongs su dag pa yin/ yid kyi las yongs su dag pa yin/ lus kyi las ma g.yos pa yin/ ngag gi las ma g.yos pa yin/ yid kyi las
43a5(dkon brtsegs): ma g.yos pa yin te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa de las bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis skyod mi nus pa yin/ sa nas sar 'phar ba la mkhas pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi chos
43a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis ma gos pa yin/ sems can thams cad kyi 'dren par gyur pa yin/ rnam par 'dren par gyur pa dang / yongs su 'dren par gyur pa dang / sgron mar gyur pa dang / stegs su gyur pa
43a7(dkon brtsegs): dang zam par gyur pa dang / zur gyur pa dang / sgrol bar gyur pa dang / pha rol tu 'gro ba dang / gnas dang / mgon dang / skyabs dang / dpung gnyen yin mo// thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed
43b1(dkon brtsegs): ba de las bdud dang bdud gi ris kyi lha rnams kyis spong mi nus pa yin mo// de ltar na shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa thag pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu san/
43b2(dkon brtsegs): bsgreng nas dang ba yin no// ngang pa mang ba dang / 'phags pa rnams mthong bar 'dod pa dang / chos nyan par 'dod pa yin/ ser sna med cing lbu bar gtong ba dang / lag brkyang zhing rnam par gtong ba la
43b3(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang / sbyin pa bged pa la dga' ba yin/ sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i sems yin/ rnyog pa med pa'i sems dang / 'khrugs pa med pa'i sems dang / ma
43b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dres pa'i sems dang / de las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa la mngon par dad pa/ rab tu rtog cing yid ches pa dang / the tsom med cing somanyi med pa yin mo// de nag po dang dkar po'i chos rnam
43b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'bras bu mi stor bar shes pas/ srog gi phyir yang sdig pa'i las mi byed pa yin te/ de srog gcod pa spong ba yin/ ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun
43b6(dkon brtsegs): du smra ba dang / bla ma dang / ngag rtsub po dang / tshig bkyil pa dang / brnam sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba spong ba yin te/ mi dpe ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag spangs nas/ ngas
43b7(dkon brtsegs): ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yang dag par len cing spyod do// de dad pa dang ldan pas gang dge sbyong dang bram ze dag yang dag par song ba dang / yang dag par zhugs pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa/
44a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / dge ba'i chos can dang / mang du thos pa dang / thos pa la brtson pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang ldan pa dang / rdul bdang / zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba dang / rtsod pa'i
44a2(dkon brtsegs): smra ba med pa dang / mi snyan par smra ba med pa dang / bsam pa dge zhing mi dge ba'i bsam pa med pa dang / dge ba la yang dag par sbyor ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su spangs pa dang /
44a3(dkon brtsegs): rgod pa med pa dang / khengs pa ma yin pa dang / yang yang po med pa dang / mu cor mi smra ba dang / tshig ma 'dzes pa dang / dran pa nye bar gnas pa dang / sems shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa de dag dang / ji
44a4(dkon brtsegs): ltar srid par 'dren pa gcod pa dang / zug rngu phyung ba dang / khur bor ba dang / the tsom las rgal ba dang / som nyi las rgal ba dang / yang srid bzad pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub
44a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ba dang / de lta bu'i dge sbyong dang bram ze dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig nas/ de dag la bsnyen cing bsten te/ bsnyen bkur byed cing mgu bar byed kyi/ yid byung bar mi byed
44a6(dkon brtsegs): dong dga' bar byed kyi/ mi dga' bar mi byed do// des dge ba'i bshes gnyen mgu bar byas pas/ de dag de la chos kyis phan 'dogs par byed de/ chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par ston par byed/
44a7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug/ yang dag par gzengs pa stong pa dang / yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed de/ sbyin pas longs spyod chen por 'gyur ba dang / tshul khrims kyis mtho ris su skye ba dang / thos
44b1(dkon brtsegs): pas shes rab chen por 'gyur ba dang / sgom pas 'bral bar 'gyur ro zhes yang dag par rab tu ston to// 'di ni sbyin pa/ 'di ni sbyin pa'i 'bras su/ 'di ni ser sdu/ 'di ni ser sna'i 'bras bu/ 'di na chu
44b2(dkon brtsegs): khrims 'di ni tshul khrims kyi rnam par smin pa ga 'di ni 'chal pa'i tshul khrims/ 'di ni 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi rnam par smin pa/ 'dini bzod pa/ 'di ni bzod pa'i rnam par smin pa/ 'din gnod sems
44b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni gnod sems kyi rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni brtson 'grus pa 'di ni brtson 'grus ci rnam par smin pa 'di ni le lo/ 'di ni le lo'i rnam par smin par/ 'di ni bsam gtan/ 'di ning sam gtan gyi rnam
44b4(dkon brtsegs): bar smin pa / 'di ni sems g.yeng ba 'di ni sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni shes rab/ 'di ni shes rab kyi rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni 'chal pa'i shes rab/ 'di ni 'chal pa'i sherab kyi rnam
44b5(dkon brtsegs): par smin pa / 'di ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa / 'di mi lus kyis legs par spyod pa'i rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni lus kyis nyes par spyod pa/ 'di ni lus kyis nyes par spyod pa'i rnam par smin pa/
44b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni ngag gis legs par spyod pa/ 'di ni ngag gis lebs par spyod pa'i rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni ngag gis nyes par spyod pa/ 'di ni ngag gis nyes par spyod pa'i rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni yid kyis legs
44b7(dkon brtsegs): par spyod pa/ 'di ni yid kyis legs par spyod pa'i rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni yid kyis nyes par spyod pa/ 'di ni yid kyis nyes par spyod pa'i rnam par smin pa/ 'di ni dge ba/ 'di ni mi dge ba/ 'di ni/
45a1(dkon brtsegs): bya ba/ 'di ni mi bya ba/ 'di byas na yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur/ 'di byas na yun ring por gnod pa dang / mi phan pa dang / mi bde bar 'gyur rozhes
45a2(dkon brtsegs): de la dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag gis chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par ston te/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug/ yang dag par gzengs pastod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed de/ snod du gyur par
45a3(dkon brtsegs): yang shes nas/ zab mo'i gtam yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug ste/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid kyi gtam dang / mtshan ma med pa'i gtam dang / smon pa med pa'i gtam dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i
45a4(dkon brtsegs): gtam dang / ma skyes pa'i gtam dang / ma byung ba'i gtam dang / bdag med pa'i gtam dang / sems can med pa'i gtam dang / srog med pa'i gtam dang / gang zag med pa'i gtam dang / rten
45a5(dkon brtsegs): cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo ri gtam rab tu ston to// 'di lta ste/ 'di yod pas 'di 'byung / 'di skyes pa'i phyir 'di skye ba ste/ 'di ltar ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis/
45a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/ skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba tsher
45a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rkyen gyis sreng ba/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis sring ba/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'angon pa dang / sdug bcwa
45b1(dkon brtsegs): bdang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ 'di med na 'di mi 'byung / 'di 'gags pas 'di dag/
45b2(dkon brtsegs): ste nga 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa 'a phags pas 'du byed 'gag pa nas/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'bal zhig 'gab par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar nga ste/ 'dil chos gang yang 'grub pa med/
45b3(dkon brtsegs): ldog pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ste/ bdag po med pa/ byed pa po med pa/ tshor ba po med pa/ rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba ste/ 'di la chos gang yang /
45b4(dkon brtsegs): 'grub pa med/ ldog pa med/ rjes su 'jug pa med de/ yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rmongs pas khams gsum 'dogs par 'gyur ro// nyon mongs pa'i lam dang / sdug bsngal gyi lam 'dogs
45b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro// yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rmongs pa'ang / yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtags na/ chos gang yang chos gang gi byed pa po ma yin no// gang la byed pa po meng ba de la don dam par bya
45b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'ang mi dmigs te/ de la chos gang yang 'byung ba med/ 'jig pa med do zhes brjod do// des de lta bu'i chos zab mo thos ras the tsom mi za/ som nyi med cing chos thams cad la chags pa med par
45b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jug ste/ de gzugs la mi chags/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la mi chags/ mig dang / gzugs dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa la mi chags/ rna ba
46a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / chos dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mi chags te/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa'o zhes dang po/
46a2(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu de ltar dad pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sangs rgyas la lta ba las yongs su mi nyams/ chos nyan pa las yongs su mi nyams/ dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa las yongs su
46a3(dkon brtsegs): mi nyams so// de gang dang gang du skye ba de dang de dag tu sangs rgyas la lta ba dang bral bar mi 'gyur/ chos nyan pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur/ dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur/ sangs rgyas
46a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar skye bar 'gyur te/ de dang de dag tu skyes nas kyang / brtson 'grus rtsom zhing dge ba'i chos yongs su tshol ba la brtson par 'gyur ro// de brtson 'grus brtsams pas/
46a5(dkon brtsegs): khyim gyi gnas mi 'dod par 'gyur/ bu pho dang bu mo 'dod par mi 'gyur/ bran po dang / brar mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dag 'dod par 'gyur/ yongs su gzung ba thams cad kyi ngor lta ba mi/
46a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dod par 'gyur te ga de skyes nas 'dod pa la ma rtses par na tshong gzhon nur sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstan pa la dad pas khyim nas khyim med par myur du rab tu 'byung ngo // de dad pas rab tu byung na/
46a7(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i bshes gnyen mchog dang ldan zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'grogs/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rtog pas dge ba'i bsam pa rnyed par 'gyur ro// de dge ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pas dge ba'i/
46b1(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams nyan cing sgrub pa snying por byed par 'gyur te/ tshig lhur byed pa'i blo dang ldan par mi 'gyur/ mang du thos pa yongs su tshol bas ngoms par mi 'gyur/ ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams pam/
46b2(dkon brtsegs): la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston te/ zang zing med pa'i sems kyis rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshogs su bcang ba la mi re zhing rang gi tshig yongs su mi spong bar gzhan la chos ston te/
46b3(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar thos pa dang / ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin du gzhan la chos ston to// chos nyan pa rnams la byams pa chen po rnyed par 'gyur/ sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po 'jug par 'gyur ro//
46b4(dkon brtsegs): mang du thos pas lus dang srog la mi lta bar 'gyur/ 'dod pa nyung zhing chog shes par 'gyur/ rab tu dben pa dang nges par 'gyur/ gso sla ba dang / dgang slu ba dang / dgon pa la dga' badrag/
46b5(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams kyi don la nye bar rtog pa dang / don la rton gyi yi ge la mi rton pa yin/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rten du 'gyur/ bdaga' ba' zhig
46b6(dkon brtsegs): gi phyir zhugs pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi phyir 'di lta ste/ theg pa chen po bla na med pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ye shes 'jig rten gsum po tham
46b7(dkon brtsegs): cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes yongs su tshol lo// bag yod pa lhur byed par 'gyur te/ de la bag yod pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dbang po yang dag par sdom pa'o// de la dbang po yang
47a1(dkon brtsegs): dag par sdom pa gang zhe na/ gang mig gis gzugs mthong nas mtshan mar mi 'dzin/ mngon rtags su mi 'dzin/ gzugs la chags pa dang / nyes dmigs dang / 'byung
47a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'ang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// de bzhin du rnabs sgra dang / snas dri dang / lces ro dang / lus kyis reg bya dang / yid kyis chos shes nas mtshan mar mi 'dzin/ mngon rtags
47a3(dkon brtsegs): su mi 'dzin/ chos rnams la chags pa dang / nyes dmigs kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa 'di ni bag yod pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang shAri ri bu bag yod pa zhes
47a4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba ni/ gang bdag gi sems 'dul ba dang / gzhan gyi sems srung ba dang / nyon mongs pa la dga' ba spong ba dang / chos la dag pa'i rjes su 'gro ba dang / 'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa dang /
47a5(dkon brtsegs): gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa rnams mi 'byung ba dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa rnams mi 'byung ba dang / chags pa'i mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mi 'byung ba dang / zhe sdang gi mi dge
47a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba rnams mi 'byung ba dang / gti mug gi mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mi 'byung ba dang / lus kyis nyes par spyod pa dang / ngag gis nyes par spyod pa dang / yid kyis nyes par spyod pa mi 'byung ba dang / tshul
47a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa mi 'byung ba dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad mi 'byung ba de ni bag yod pa zhes bya'o// de ltar shA ro'i bu gang bag yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin mid
47b1(dkon brtsegs): la byed pa la rab tu sbyor ba ni/ gang yod pa derang yod par rab tu shes/ gang med pa derang med par rab tu shes so// de la ci yod ci med ce na/ yang dag pa la rab tu sbyor ba la ni/ 'phags pa'i rnam par
47b2(dkon brtsegs): grol ba long ngo // log pa la rab tu sbyor ba la ni/ 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba med do// las kyi rnam par smin pa ni yod do// gang gi las kyi rnam par smin pa de ni med do// gzhan
47b3(dkon brtsegs): yang mig ni yod do// gang gi mig de ni med do// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni yod do// gang gi yid de ni med do// gzhan yang gzugs mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / 'gyur ba'i
47b4(dkon brtsegs): chos can de ni yod do// gzugs rtag pa dang / brtan pa dang / mi 'gyur ba'i chos can dang / ther zug pa dang / de bzhin du gnas so zhes bya ba de ni med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnam
47b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / 'gyur ba'i chos can de ni yod do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag pa dang / brtan pa dang / zer
47b6(dkon brtsegs): zug pa dang / mi 'gyur pa'i chos can dang / yang dag par de bzhin du gnas so zhes bya ba de ni med do// gzhan yang ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams yod kyi/ ma rig pa med na 'du byed med pa nas/
47b7(dkon brtsegs): skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi'i bar du yod kyis/ skye ba med na rga shi med do// gzhan yang sbyin pas longs spyod chen por 'gyur ba ni yod do// sbyin pas dbul por 'gyur ba ni med do// tshul khrims kyis
48a1(dkon brtsegs): mtho ris su skye ba ni yod ngo do// 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyis mtho ris su skye ba med do// thos pas shes rab chen por 'gyur ba ni yong po// 'chal pa'i shes rab kyis shes /
48a2(dkon brtsegs): chen por 'gyur ba ni med // skom pas 'bral bar 'gyur ba ni yod do// sgom pas 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba ni med do// tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pas kun tu sbyor ba ni yod do// tshul bzhin ma yin/
48a3(dkon brtsegs): pa yid la byed pas 'bral ba ni med po// brtson 'grus brtsams pas byang chub sems dpa' la ni byang chub yod do// le lo can la ni byang chub med do// nga rgyal med pa la ni rab tu byung bar lung bstan pa yod ngo do//
48a4(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyal can la ni mya ngan las 'da' ba med do// gzhan yang thams cad du song ba'i stong pa nyid ni yod do// 'di ni bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag po zhes bya ba de ni meng/
48a5(dkon brtsegs): ngo/ de ltar shA ri'i bu bag yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang ldan pa ni/ gang yod par 'jig rten gyi mkhas pa rnams kyis kun shes pa de la ni yod do zhes 'dogaso//
48a6(dkon brtsegs): gang med par 'jig rtenan mkhas pa rnams kyis kun shes pa de la ni med do zhes 'dogs so// de yod ces tha snyad du 'dogs pa la'ang yang dag par shes par mi byed/ med ces tha snyad du'i dog/
48a7(dkon brtsegs): pa la'ang yang dag par shes par mi byed do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i yang dag pa'i don yang khong du chud do// chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pas bsdus te/
48b1(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi mdo bzhir 'dus par byas so// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa dang / 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba dang / chos thams cad bdag med pa dang / mya ngan
48b2(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pa zhi pa'o// 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa zhes bya ba ni rtag par 'du shes pa'i sems can rnams kyi rtag par 'du shes pa spang ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pas bshad do//
48b3(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba zhes bya ba ni bde bar 'du shes pa'i sems can rnams kyi bde bar 'du shes pa spang ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pas bshad po/ chos thams cad bdag
48b4(dkon brtsegs): med do zhes bya ba ni bdag tu 'du shes pa'i sems can rnams kyi bdag tu 'du shes pa spang ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pas bshad do// mya ngan las 'das pa zhi ba zhes bya ba ni dmigs
48b5(dkon brtsegs): pas phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyi dmigs pas phyin ci log tu gyur pa spang ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pas bshad do// de 'du byed thams cad mi rtag ge zhes thos nas/ shin/
48b6(dkon brtsegs): tu mi rtag pa nyid la 'jug go// 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba'o zhes thos nas/ smon lam dang dral bskyed do// chos thams cad bdag med pa'o zhes zos nas/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang rnam
48b7(dkon brtsegs): bzar ba'i sgo la sgom mo// mya ngan las 'das bzhi bzhis thos nas/ mtshan ma med pa yongs su 'dris par byed de/ dus ma yin par yang dag pa'i mthara' mngon sum du mi byed do// de ltar dzi/
49a1(dkon brtsegs): bu de lta bu'i chos la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dge ba'i chos las yongs su mi nyams te/ myur du sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// byang chub
49a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' la brtag pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de ltar dad pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
49a3(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos bcu la mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtogs/ the tsom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmang
49a4(dkon brtsegs): ru 'du shes skyed do// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin shegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtogs the tsom mi za/ rgya cher
49a5(dkon brtsegs): dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas/ ngo mtshar dang mang du 'du shes skyed do// 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs pasam gyis mi khyad pa la mngon par dang nas/ ngo mtshad
49a6(dkon brtsegs): dang rmang du 'du shes skyed pa'i bar du'o// 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes rasam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin
49a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i 'od bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'di lta ste/ de bzhinas //
49b1(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'di lta ste/ de ba'in gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsam gyis mi byab pa dang / 'dig ste/ de bang /
49b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa
49b3(dkon brtsegs): dang nga 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtogs the tsom mi za/ rgya cher dga'
49b4(dkon brtsegs): mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes myed pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos bcu po 'di rnams kyi phyir brtson 'grus cher rtsom zhing mi zhum/ mi 'gong mi skyo ste/
49b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos bcu po ma thob kyi bar du lus kyi pags pa dang / rgyas pa dang / pri dang / dbugs dang / rus pa dag lnga zhog la/ lus kyi sha
49b6(dkon brtsegs): dang khrag bskams kyang bla'i/ brtson 'grus nyams par mi bya'o snyam du de ltar sems skyed do// shA ri'i bu de ltar dad pas mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam
49b7(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab pa ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos bcu po 'di rnams la mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtogs/ the tsom mi nga/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed do// de nas bcom ldan/
50a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis don 'di nyid rgya cher rab tu bstan pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// sangs rgyas sku ni bsam mi khyab// chos kyi sku yis rab tu byi// mtshan ma med cing rdza
50a2(dkon brtsegs): bu med// rgyal ba'i thugs sras dad par byed// 'gro ba tha dang ji snyed kyi// sgra skad bsam gyis mi khyab pa// thams cad du ni sgra sgrog ste// sangs rgyas kyi ni spyod yul dang // ji tsam sems can thams cad /
50a3(dkon brtsegs): dus gsum dag gi dbang po kun// sangs rgyas kyis ni rab mkhyen te/ bsam mi khyab la rab tu dang // sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'od mtha' yas// 'od zer dra ba bsam mi khyab// zhing rnams rgya mtsho mthar yag
50a4(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad kyi ni phyogs su khyab// thub pa'i tshul khrims 'jig rten 'das// 'jig rten chos la mi gnas te// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bsam yas pa// byang chub sems dpa' rab tu dang // sangs rgyas
50a5(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu mnyam par gzhag/ rnam par thar pa bsam mi khyab// sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul ni// sems can kun gyis shes mi nus// chos kyi dbyings ni dbyer med la// gang gi stobs kyis shes 'gyur ba//
50a6(dkon brtsegs): drang srong chen po ye shes stobs// nam mkhar bzhin du mtha' yas pa// sems can gcig gi don phyir yang // bskal pa rgya mtsho mthar yas par// 'dul ba'i don phyir bzhugs pas na// de dag snying
50a7(dkon brtsegs): de 'dra'o// sems can thams cad gzhan dang gzhan// dri ba rgya mtsho 'dri byed kyang // dris len gcig gis tshim byed de// mi 'jigs pa ni bsam mi khyab// rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa// chos rnams
50b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad thugs su chud// sangs rgyas chos rnams ma 'dzes pa// thams cad du ni ye shes gzigs// ngang ba la ni rab gnas pas// sangs rgyas chos kun chos nyid rnams// bsam gyis mi khyad 'di dgan
50b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad dang bar byed// / shA ri'i bri ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dang // yid ches rab
50b3(dkon brtsegs): tu rtogs// be tsom mis// rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes skyed ce na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mu ni mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs pa/ dge ba'i
50b4(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad dang ldan pa'o// 'di lta ste/ mi gtsang ba dang / mchil ma dang / ngar snabs dang / rnag dang / khrag dang / bshang ba dang / gci ba dang bral ba/ rus pa dang / sha dang / khrag dang / rgyus pa
50b5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol ba'o// 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba/ yongs su dag pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi dri ma dang bral ba'o// 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
50b6(dkon brtsegs): sku ni 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/ 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis ma gos pa'o// 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ri yon tan dpag tu med pa dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pas
50b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba'o// 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni tshul khrims dpag tu med pa yongs su bsgoms pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par
51a1(dkon brtsegs): grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa dpag tu med pa yongs su bsgoms pas yon tan thams cad rab tu rgyas pa'o// 'di lta ste/ de bzhin ga shems pa'i sku ni yongs su dag pa'i me long gi dkyil 'byor/
51a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi gzugs brnyan lta bu dang tshu la zla ba snang ba lta bu'o// 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni nam mkha'i dbyings su yang dag par 'du zhing chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// 'di lta ste/
51a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni zag pa thams cad las log pas zag pa med pa'o// 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni 'dus byas thams cad dang bral bas 'dus ma byas pa'o// nam mkha' lta bu'i
51a4(dkon brtsegs): sku'o/ mnyam pa med pa'i sku'o// 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i sku'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni dpe med pa zla med pa/ mtshungs pa med pa'i sku ste/ rab
51a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dri ma med pa kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa/ rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o// de ni sngon gyi mthas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ phyi ma'i mthas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ da ltar byung bas rab tu phye ba ma
51a6(dkon brtsegs): yin/ skye ba dang / rus dang / rigs kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ gzugs kyis rab tu byephye ba ma yin/ mtshan gyis rab tu bye ba ma yin/ dpe byang bzang pos rab tu bye ba ma yin/ sems kyis ra /
51a7(dkon brtsegs): bye ba ma yin/ yid kyis rab tu bye ba ma yin/ rnam par shes pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ lta bas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ zos pas rab tu bye ba ma yin/ dran pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ rnam par rig pas rab
51b1(dkon brtsegs): tu phye ba ma yin/ phung pos rab tu phye ba ma yin/ khams kyis rab tu bye ba ma yin/ skye mched kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ skye bas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ gnas pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ 'jig pas rang /
51b2(dkon brtsegs): tu phye ba ma yin/ 'dzin pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ 'dor bas rab tu bye ba ma yin/ nges par 'byung bas rab tu bye ba ma yin spyod pas rab tu bye ba ma yin/ 'dog gis rab tu bye ba ma yin/ rtags
51b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ dbyibs kyis rab tu bye ba ma yin/ 'ong bas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ 'gro bas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ tshul khrims yid la byed pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin gyis rab tu
51b4(dkon brtsegs): phye ba ma yin/ shes rab kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ rnam par grol bas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i yid la byed pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ mtshan nyid kyis rab tu phye ba
51b5(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ mtshan nyid mi mthun pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ chos kyi mtshan nyid kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ stobs su slo btags pas rab tu bye ba ma yin/ mi 'jigs pas rab tu bye ba ma yin/ so so/
51b6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rig pas rab tu phye ba ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ snying rje chen pos rab tu phye ba ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par sgro btags pas rab tu phye ba ma yin te/ sgyu ma dang /
51b7(dkon brtsegs): smig rgyu dang / chu bla dang / rmi lam gyi rang bzhin lta bur skye ba'i sku'o// stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa las byung ba'i sku'o// mi 'gyur ba'i sku'o// mi 'khrugs pa'i sku'o//
52a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par mi rtog pa'i sgra'o// mi gnas pa'i sku'o// mi snyems pa'i sku'o// gnas pa dang / rab tu gnas pa dang / mi g.yo ba thob pa'i sku'o// gzugs med pa gzugs kyi
52a2(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin ma yin pa'i sku'o// tshor ba ma yin/ 'du shes ma yim byed ma mi rnam par shes pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i sgra'o// byung ba ma yin/ kun tu byung ba ma yi/ ma byung
52a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang ma yin pa'i sku'o// rmad du byung ba rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sku'o// mig las byung ba ma yin/ gzugs su gtogs pa ma yin/ phyi rol ma yin/ rna ba la gnas pa ma yin/ sgrar gtogs pa ma
52a4(dkon brtsegs): yin/ phyi rol ma yin/ snas rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin/ drir gtogs pa ma yin/ phyi rol ma yin/ lces bskyed pa ma yin/ ror gtogs pa ma yin/ phyi rol ma yin/ lus
52a5(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa ma yin/ reg byar gtogs pa ma yin/ phyi rol ma yin/ sems la 'jug pa ma yin/ yid la 'jug pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa la 'jug pa ma yin/ ldog nga ma yin/
52a6(dkon brtsegs): rjes su 'jug pa ma yin/ gnas pa dang mi g.yo bathob pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa/ nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sku ste/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni
52a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtogs/ the tsom mi za/ rgya cher dga'
52b1(dkon brtsegs): mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes skyed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/ ston pas
52b2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang 'di skad gsungs // bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig dpag med par// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam spyad cing // las rnam gsum ni shin tu yongs dag par// mtshungs med bde bar
52b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i sku tshol lo// phyogs bcu 'gro ba kun la byams pa dang // snying rje rgya chen bskyed nas sbyin pa byin// 'dod la log par g.yem pa rtag spong zhing // nam mkha' lta bu mchog gi sku rol lo//
52b4(dkon brtsegs): gser ltar dag cing mdzes pa'i gos rnams ni// dpag tu med pa'i gang+gA'i bye ma snyed// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin par rab spyod cing // rgyal ba'i sras kyis 'jig rten mchog la phul// galag gi rngam
52b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du tshul khrims srung // yan laganyid lag bcad kyang dgral bzod// brtson 'grus kyi ni pha rol phyin spyod cing // sangs rgyas sku la smon pa yongs mi skyo// shes rab thabs dka' rgya chen bsam gtan
52b6(dkon brtsegs): pa bsam gtan spyod yul dga' rgyal rnam par blta// chos dbyings dam pa bde bar gshegs pa'i sku// de 'drar ba dag gyur ces ni de la smon// srid par 'gro ba dag tu dge byed cing // mi mchog gis ni byang
52b7(dkon brtsegs): chub mtshungs med thog// dag paji ming gtsang zhing rdul thal ba// nam mkha' 'dra ba yangs pa'i sku thob bo// rang bzhin stong ste bdag dang sems can bral// mtshan ma med cing sgra dang bral ba thob// mig gi yul
53a1(dkon brtsegs): kun las ni rab 'das pa// de 'dra'i sku ni thub pas yang dag thob// gzod ma nas stong ma byas ma byung ba// gzugs dang sgra bral yid kyang rnams dag pa// de bzhin gshegs sku mi
53a2(dkon brtsegs): g.yo gang mthong ba// nges ni phyogs bcu'i bde bar gshegs pa mthong // ji ltar sgyu ma sprul pa sna tshogs lus// rta dang glang po bud med skyes pa'i gzugs// byis pa bsdub brdzun zhing phyin ci log//
53a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin stobs bcu rnams la lta bar byos// gang dag rangs pa'i bde gshegs dpag med dang // ma byon rgyal ba de bzhin gang snang dag chos nyid gcig 'gyur mnyam pa med pa'i sku// chos kyi dbyings
53a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis klas shing nam mkha' 'dra// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dang // yid ches rab tu rtogs/ ba tsam
53a5(dkon brtsegs): mi za/ rgya che rang ga ma sa ste rangs pa rnyed nas/ ngo mtshar dang mang du 'du shes skyed do// shA ri'i bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i
53a6(dkon brtsegs): dbyangs bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtog pa nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi bar du 'du shes skyed ce na/ 'di ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir
53a7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ji lta ba de bzhin du snga 'byung ste/ sems can thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba'i phyir/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab par byed mod kyi/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa/
53b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di snyam dungs dge slong gi 'khor la ni 'di bshad/ dge slong ma'i 'khor la mi 'di/ dge bsnyen gyi 'khor la ni 'di/ bram ze'i 'khor la ni 'di/ rgyal rigs kyi 'khor la ni 'dikhyim bdag gi
53b2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor la ni 'di/ lnga'i 'khor la ni 'di/ tshangs pa'i 'khor la nI/ 'di lta ste/ mdo'i sde dang / dbyangs kyis bskud pa'i sde dang / lung bstan pa'i sde dang / tshigs su bcang ba'i sde dang / ched
53b3(dkon brtsegs): du brjod pa'i sde dang / gleng bzhi'i sde dang / rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang / de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang / skyes pa'i rabs kyi sde dang / shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang / rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde dang / gtan
53b4(dkon brtsegs): la phab pastan pa'i sde rnams bshad bar bya'o snyam du mi dgongs mod kyi 'on kyang shA ri'i bu 'khor ji ltar 'dus par gyur pa/ tshangs pa'i 'khor gyi bar du 'dus par gyur pa de dag gi dbang po'i rim paci
53b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dra ba dang / sems can de dag la chos kyi mdo ji lta bu thos par bya ba dgongs par 'gyur pa/ de lta bu'i chos kyi mdo thos par bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'byung bar yang dag par shes
53b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang chos bstan pa de la gcig la gcig nges pa'i tshigs gnod par 'gyur ba'ang med do// thams cad kyang rang gi chos rnam par rig par kun shes so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs ni de bzhin
53b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i sngon gyi bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa las mngon par grub pa bden pa'i rjes su 'brang bar 'jug go// yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs de ni 'jam par
54a1(dkon brtsegs): 'byung yid du 'ong ba dang / yid dga' ba dang / dag pa dang / dri ma med pa dang / snyan pa dang / mnyan par 'os pa dang / shes par bya bar 'os pa dang / mi nub pa dang /
54a2(dkon brtsegs): mi brlang ba dang / lus sim par byed pa dang / sems sim par byed pa dang / snying dga' bar byed pa dang / dga' ba dang bde ba skyed pa dang / kun shes par byed pa dang / gsal zhing 'thang ba
54a3(dkon brtsegs): dang mngon par dka' bar 'gyur ba dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / seng ge'i skad kyi drag shul gyi nga ro'i sgra dang / sprin gyi sgra dbyangs dang / rgya mtsho'i sgra bsgrags pa'i dbyangs dang / mi 'am ci'i klu'i
54a4(dkon brtsegs): dbyangs dang / ka la bing ka'i nga ro'i sgra dbyangs dang / tshangs pa'i nga ro'i sgra skad dbyangs dang / rnga'i sgra dbyangs dang / dpal dang ldan pa dang / mnyen pa dang / zur phyin pa dang / bsgrags pa
54a5(dkon brtsegs): dang sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mgu bar byed pa dang / 'khor thams cad du zags pa dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa dang / de dag dang gzhan yon tan dpag tu med pa
54a6(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi dbyangs 'byung ste/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ de la byang chub
54a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtogs/ the tsom mi nga/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmang du 'du shes skyed do// 'di la chos nyid/
54b1(dkon brtsegs): ni 'di yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// tshangs pa yi ni sgra dbyangs su// 'dren pa gsung sgra rab 'byin te// tshangs pa rnams ni tshim par byed// 'di 'dra'i chos ni phun sum tshogs// de yi dbyangs
54b2(dkon brtsegs): ni byams dang ldan// snying rje las ni yang dag 'byung // btang snyoms dang ni dga' ldan pa// thub pa'i dbyangs ni rab tu 'byung // srog chags kun gyi 'dod chags med// zhe sdang dug mi ni byed cing //
54b3(dkon brtsegs): mug mun pa sel ba ste// phun sum tshogs dbyings 'di 'dra'o// 'dzum bu gling gi sna tshogs phyogs rnams na// mir gyur pa yi skang ni mtha' yas pa// kun na de yi sgra rnams sna tshogs pa//
54b4(dkon brtsegs): dbyangs 'di thos nas rjes su rtogs par 'gyur// sa bla dang ni de bzhin par snang lha// de dag ci 'dra'i skad la 'jug pa ltar// de phyir thub dbang dbyangs ni rab zhugs te// rnam par nges
54b5(dkon brtsegs): thos mya ngan 'das reg 'gyur// rkang gnyis dag dang rkang bzhi rnams dang ni// rkang mangs dag dang rkang pa med pa rnams// thams cad la ni de yi sgra dbyangs 'jug/ bskul nas rab tu chos shing tshar
54b6(dkon brtsegs): gcod byed// stong gsum 'di yi sgra rnams ji snyed pa// tha ma dang ni 'bring dang de bzhin rab// de dag rjes su 'jug dbyangs de sgrog ste// 'dul ba'i sems can thar pa reg par byed// rtog pa
54b7(dkon brtsegs): med cing rnam par mi rtog ste// gzung ba dang ni bcings las byung ma yin// mnyam par gzhag pas 'phags pa'i bden pa 'chad// sems can thos nas nyon mongs zhi bar byed// sangs
55a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas chos dang de bzhin dge 'dun sgra// sbyin thos de bzhin tshul khrims bzod pa dag/ mtha' yas sgra ni sems can thos byed de// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs ni de 'dra
55a2(dkon brtsegs): 'o// dbyangs kyang mtha' yas ye shes mtha' yas pa// de yi dbyangs kyi tshad ni yod med de// de la byang chub sems dpa' mkhas dar cing // de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs la the tsom
55a3(dkon brtsegs): med shA ri'i bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dang yid ches rab
55a4(dkon brtsegs): tu rtogs the tsom mi za/ zos nas rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs brnyed nas/ ro mtshar dang rmang du 'du shes skyed ce na 'di ltar shA ri'i bu chos thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i chags pa med
55a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' mngon par rang / yid ches rab tu rtog pa nas/ dad pas ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi bar du 'du shes skyed do// de bzhin gshegs
55a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las brtsams te/ khyod la dpe bstan par bya'o// shA ri'i bu yongs su brtag pa zung ste/ gang+ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rtsa dang /
55a7(dkon brtsegs): shing dang / yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma dang / chung ngu na sor bzhi'i tshad tsam yan chad ji snyed yod pa/ skyes bul la zhigags de dag gcig tu spungs te/ gcig tu spungs nas me
55b1(dkon brtsegs): bsregs te/ tshig par gyur nas thal bar byas so// thal bar byas nas 'jig rten gyi khams kang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi rgya mtsho chen po gang na yod pa de dag tu thugs te/ lo stong du dadu /
55b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'di lta bu yod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes de dang ldan pas rgya mtsho chen po de dang de dag nas thal bar blad
55b3(dkon brtsegs): te 'jig rten gyi khams de dang de dag tu 'di ni 'jig rten gyi khams chege mo zhig gi shing 'di 'dra ba zhig gi thal ba'o// 'di ni 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig gi shing che ge mo zhig gi sa ba dang /
55b4(dkon brtsegs): ge mo zhig gi sdong po dang / che ge mo zhig gi yal gdang / che ge mo zhig gi lo ma dang / che ge mo zhig gi 'bras bu'i thal ba'o// 'di ni phyogs che ge mo zhig gi 'dab ma 'di 'dra ba zhig gi thal pa'o
55b5(dkon brtsegs): zhes rab tu 'byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings rab tu rtogs te/ de rab tu rtogs nas de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar 'di ni 'jig
55b6(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig gi thal ba'o zhes rab tu mkhyen pa nas rgyas par byas te/ de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni de ltar rdzu 'phrul
55b7(dkon brtsegs): che'o de ltar mthu che'o// 'di ltar dbang che bar grags pa ste/ shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'di la dang / yid ches rab tu /
56a1(dkon brtsegs): cing de bzhin gshegs pa byams pas yid la byed pa de dag thams cad ni dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di'i mtha' ma thob par sdug bsngal mthar 'byin to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di
56a2(dkon brtsegs): ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings shin tu rtogs te/ de shin tu rtogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la sems bskyed pa gcig kyang chung mi ba'o// shA ri'i bu khyod la dper/
56a3(dkon brtsegs): bya ste 'dil skyes bu mkhas pa kha cig dpes bshad pa'i don rnams kun shes te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na shA ri'i bu skyes bu la la tshe lo brgya pa/ lo brgyar 'tsho ba zhig gis skra'i rtse mo bye ba
56a4(dkon brtsegs): brgyar btsal bas chu'i thigs pa blangs te/ nga gang na ba der 'ongs nas phyin pa dang / 'di skad ces kye go'u ta ma bdag gi chu'i thigs pa 'di khyod la gtams kyis nam bdag la
56a5(dkon brtsegs): dgos par gyur pa de na slar byin cig ces zer ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pas de blangs te/ rgya mtsho chen por bor nas de chu'i rgyun gyis bdas te 'dresnga na sa lhan cig tu
56a6(dkon brtsegs): mthar gyis rgya mtsho chen por zhugs so// de nas skyes bu tshe lo brgya pa de lo brgya lon pa dang / nga ga la ba der 'ongs te phyin nas 'di skad ces/ go'u ta ma bdag gi chu'i thigs pa de
56a7(dkon brtsegs): dgos kyis/ bdag la byin cig ces zer na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes yod de/ ye shes de dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
56b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis skra'i rtse mo bye ba brgyar btsal bas chu'i thigs pa de rgya mtsho chen po de nas chu gzhan dang ma 'dres par blangs te/ skyes bu de la slar bya
56b2(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu 'di ltar rngon shes par bya ba'i phyir khyod la dper bstan te/ de gang gi don du blta zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shA ri'i bu skyes bu'i chu'i thigs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i lag tu bzhag pa yun ring po
56b3(dkon brtsegs): zhig lon yang chud mi za ba de bzhin du/ shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'di lta bu la dang / yid ches rab tu rtog cing / de bzhin gshegs
56b4(dkon brtsegs): byams pas yid la byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la dmigs nas/ de'i phyir nam mkha' la me tog 'thor ba de dag thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di'i mtha' ma thob par sdug bsngal
56b5(dkon brtsegs): mthar 'byin par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings rab tu rtogs te/ de rab tu rtogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la sems
56b6(dkon brtsegs): gcig bskyed pa'ang chung mi za'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
56b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gang rnam par shes pa ma mchis par 'jug pa mchis sam/ bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de ni ma yin no// bcom ldan 'das ye shes ni gang lag
57a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa ni gang lags/ shA ri'i bu 'di bzhi ni rnam par shes pa'i gnas te/ rnam par shes pa de la gnas so// 'di lta ste/ rnam par shes pa gzugs
57a2(dkon brtsegs): la nye bar song zhing gnas/ gzugs la dmigs/ gzugs la gnas/ dga' ba la brten pas skye zhing 'phel te rgyas par 'gyur ba dang / rnam par shes pa tshor ba la nye bar song zhing gnas/
57a3(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba la dmigs tshor ba la gnas/ dga' ba la brten pas skye zhing 'phel te rgyas par 'gyur ba dang / rnam par shes pa 'du shes la nye bar song zhing gnas/ 'du shes la dmigs/ 2dra/
57a4(dkon brtsegs): shes la gnas/ dga' ba la brten pas skye zhing 'phel te rgyas par 'gyur ba dang / rnam par shes pa 'du byed la nye bar song zhing gnas/ 'du byed la dmigs/ 'du byed la gnas/ dga'
57a5(dkon brtsegs): ba la brten pas skye zhing 'phel nas rgyas par 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// gang len pa'i phung po lnga la mi gnas par rnam par shes pa'i phung po yongs su shes pa de
57a6(dkon brtsegs): ni ye shes zhes bya'o// gzhan yang rnam par shes pa ni sa'i khams rnam par shes pa dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mapa'i khams rnam par shes pa ste/
57a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// gang khams bzhi la mi gnas par rnam par shes papa chos kyi khams kun tu dbye ba shes pa 'di ni ye shes zhes bya'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu rnam pa
57b1(dkon brtsegs): shes pa zhes bya ba ni gang mig gis shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnam par rig pa dang / rna bas shes par bya ba'i sgra rnam par rig pa dang / snas shes par bya ba'i dri rnam par rig pa dang / lces shes par/
57b2(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i ro rnam par rig pa dang / lus kyis shes par bya ba'i reg bya rnam par rig pa dang / yid kyis shes par bya ba'i chos rnam par rig pa ste/ 'di ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// gang nang nye bar ni zhing
57b3(dkon brtsegs): phyi rol tu mi rgyu ste/ ye shes kyi phyir 'brang zhing chos gang la'ang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa de ni ye shes zhes bya'o// rnam par shes pa ni dmigs pa las skye'o// rnam par shes pa ni yid la byed pa/
57b4(dkon brtsegs): las skye'o// rnam par shes pa ni yongs su rtog pa las skye ste/ de ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// gang 'dzin pa med par snyems pa dang / dmigs pa med rnam par rig pa med cing rtog
57b5(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa de ni ye shes zhes bya'o// gzhan yang 'dus byas la spyod pa'i chos la rnam par shes pa gnas shing // gang 'dus byas la spyod pa'i chos rnam par shes pa de ni rnam par shes pa ni
57b6(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// 'dus ma byas la ni rnam par shes pa rgyu ba med de/ gang 'dus ma byas shes pa de ni ye shes zhes bya'o// gzhan yang gang skye ba dang 'jig pa la rab tu gnas pa de ni rnam par shes
57b7(dkon brtsegs): ba zhes bya'o// gang skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa la gnas pa de ni ye shes zhes bya'o// de ltar shA ri'i bu 'di ni rnam par shes pa/ 'di ni ye shes te/ byang chub sems dpa' de
58a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa de la mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtogs/ the tsom mi ba/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste/
58a2(dkon brtsegs): rangs pa rnyed nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes skyed po de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad 'di dag gsungs so//
58a3(dkon brtsegs): ltar gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dpag med pa// de bzhin phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams kyi rtsa rnams ni// de dag skyes bu la las mer bsregs thal bar byas// lo ni brgya stong dag tu rgya mtshor dkrugs pa
58a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams// de 'dra ba yi stobs bcu'i ye shes phra ma nga' bas// thal ba blangs nas 'gro ba dag la lung ston pa// zhing rnams raba'abyam dag gi shing rigs 'di// de tshig thal ba 'di zhes rnam param/
58a5(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen// 'di ltar phyogs bcu dag gi 'jig rten khams kyi rdul// thams cad rdul du byas nas rgyal ba rnams ston te// de dag thams cad bgrang yang chags med the tsom med// de ltar bde bar gshegs kyi ye shes
58a6(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' bzhin// ji snyed phyogs bcu'i 'gro ba rnams kyi sems kyi rgyud// gang dag 'dod chags spyod dang zhe sdang gti mug ldan// spyod pa kun gyi tshul shes bsam pa rnams dang ni// gang gis blo nyams gang gis thar par
