85b4(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa thar pa'i snod du gyur mkhyen nas// spyod pa mkhyen cing mkhas pa mchog gi chos ston to// gang dag mthar phyin skye zhing nyon mongs bstan pa dang // mi gang rnams kyi dbang po yang bar gyu/
85b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang // skyes bu gang go dbang po snrel zhir gyur pa yin// spyod pa mkhyen nas de ltar mthun pa'i chos ston to// skyes bu gang gi dge ba'i dbang por gyur pa dang // ming ge'i dbang por gyur pa
85b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyang de bzhin mkhyen// mig nas bzung ste yid kyi bar gyi dbang po dang // yong mo bde dang sdug bsngal dbang mabyin chos kyang ston// dad brtson drin dang ting 'dzin de bzhin shes rab dang /
85b7(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu gang la dbang po 'di dag yod pa ni// de la dad pa'i gtam ston de bzhin brtson 'grus dang // bsam gtan shes rab dag kyang dam pa'i don du ston// mi yi dbang po rnam pa spyod pa
86a1(dkon brtsegs): zas gyu// mi gang bsam bci drug de sa dbang po yang // chos mcho gartagapas de ngagag sbyong ma mye ga sdug bsngal kun lagrus pa byung pa chos da // /
86a2(dkon brtsegs): dbang po sangs rgyas byang chub byir nges la// nyan thos shes pa'i rjes 'jug chog ma shes pa// de la byang chub reg 'gyur rgya chen ga ma pa stod// khade gshegs stobs nim tha yas rdul dka' lnga bgo nga no/
86a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs lnga pa ste// sus kyang 'jig rten 'dir chos dang mthun pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thams cad du 'gro
86a4(dkon brtsegs): lam mkhyen pa'i stobs gang zhe na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// ji ltar rab tu mkhyen ce na/ yang dag par nges pa'i sems
86a5(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams rab tu ma khyen/ yang dag par ma nges pa'i sems can gyi khams rab tu mkhyen/ log par nges pa'i sems can gyi khams rab tu mkhyen/ mnges papo sems can gyi khams kyang de bzhin rab tu mkhyen to//
86a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyu 'i stobs can sngon gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa zur tsam gyis go ba dbang po rno ba'i sems can de dag la de bzhin gshegs pas chos bstan kyang rung / ma bstan kyang rung / de rnam par grol ba'i skal ba yod pa de
86a7(dkon brtsegs): dag de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi rgyu'i stobs mkhyen nas de bzhin du mthun parnga chos ston to// ma nges pa'i sems can gyi khams rkyen gyi stobs can yongs su smin par bya ba'i mtshan nyid can/ gal te rdzun
86b1(dkon brtsegs): bar bdom gang shing rjes su ston pa dang phrad na rnam par grol bar 'gyur gyi/ rjes su ston pa dang ma grang na rnam par grol bar mi 'gyur ba de dga' bang de bzhin gshegs pa de ltar rkyen dang rtswa dang ldan pa'i gtam gang dag
86b2(dkon brtsegs): par gsung te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa las chos de thos nas/ tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor bas 'bras bu thob par 'gyur te/ de dag gi don du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jog rten du 'byung ngo // log par
86b3(dkon brtsegs): nges pa'i sems can gyi khams yongs su sbyang ba ma byas pa/ khe re chung ba blun pa/ snod du ma gyur pa'i sems can de dag la de bzhin gshegs pas chos bstan kyang rung / ma bstan kyang rung ste/ rnam par grol ba'i rgal
86b4(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas snod ma yin par rig nas btang snyoms su 'jog ste/ de dag gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams go gyon to// / gzhan yang shA rab bu de bzhin gsheg
86b5(dkon brtsegs): pas 'dod chags kyi lam rnam pa gsum rab tu mkhyen te/ 'dod chags kyi lam sdug pa'i rnam pa las skye dbang yod/ 'dod chags kyi lam rjes su chags pa'i rnam pa las skye ba'ang yod/ 'dod chags kyis/
86b6(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi rgyu las skye ba'ang yod do// zhe sdang gi lam rnam pa gsum yang rab tu mkhyen te/ zhe sdang gi la mkhong khro ba'i mtshan ma las skye babang yod/ khasam pa yongs su rdzogs pa las skye ba'ang yang/ sngon gyi bgal can
86b7(dkon brtsegs): b.las skye babang yod/ gti mug gi lam rnam pa gsum yang rab tu mkhyen te/ gang mug gi lam ma rig pa'i rgyu las skye ba'ang yod// gti mug gi lam 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu las skyi ba yod/ gti mug gi lam/
87a1(dkon brtsegs): the tsom gyi chulas skye ba'ang yod de/ de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang das brda lte ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// gzhan yang shAra'i bu dbang po rno pa'i phyir mngon par shes/
87a2(dkon brtsegs): pa myur la sla ba'i lam yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// dbang po rtul ba'i phyir mngon par shes pa dul la dka' ba'i lam yang rab tu mkhyen to// dbang po rno ba'i phyir mngon par shes pa myur la slaba'i
87a3(dkon brtsegs): lam yang rab tu mkhyen to// dbang po rtul ba'i phyir mngon par shes pa myur la dka' ba'i lam yang rab tu mkhyen to// dmigs pa bor ba'i phyir mngon par shes pa bul la bul ba'i lam yang rab tu mkhyen to// lam gyi
87a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyun ma gcad pa'i phyir mngon par shes pa myur la bul ba'i lam yang rab tu mkhyen to// yongs su thug pa med par dbugs 'byin pa'i phyir mngon par shes pa bul la myur ba'i lam yang rab tu mkhyen to// de la ma chags
87a5(dkon brtsegs): ba phyir mngon par shes pa myur la bul ba'i lam yang rab tu ma khyen to// so sor rtog pa'i stobs yongs su rdzogs par byed la/ sgom pa'i stobs lam yin pa'i lam yang yod// sgom pa'i stobs yongs su
87a6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par byed la/ so sor rtog pa'i stobs la ma yin pa'i lam yang yod/ sgom pa'i stobs dang so sor rtog pa'i stobs yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i lam yang yod/ so sor rtog pa'i stobs dang sgom
87a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i stobs yongs su rdzogs par mi byed pa'i lam yang yod de/ de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag brda lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// bsam pa dun sum tshogs la sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa ma
87b1(dkon brtsegs): yin pa'i lam yang yod/ sbyor ba dun sum tshogs la bsam pa dun sum tshogs pa ma yin pa'i lam yang yod/ bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa ma yin la sbyor ba'ang phun sum tshogs pa ma yin pa'i
87b2(dkon brtsegs): lam yang yod/ bsam pa'ang phun sum tshogs la sbyor babang phun sum tshogs pa'i lam yang yod de/ de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu ma byedan to// lus spyong la dag
87b3(dkon brtsegs): la ma yin/ sems la ma yin pa'o lam yang yod/ ngag sbyong la lus la ma yin/ sems la ma yin pa'i lam yang yod/ sems spyong la lus la ma yin/ ngag la ma yin pa'i lam yang yod/
87b4(dkon brtsegs): lus la ma yin/ ngag la ma yin la sems kyang mi sbyong ba'i lam yang yod/ lus dang / ngag dang / sems sbyong ba'i lam yang yod de/ de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba
87b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// de ltar shA ri'i bu sems can thams cad kyi 'jug pa'i rgyu dang / ldog pa'i rgyu'i lam ji snyed pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes thogs pa med pa 'jug go//
87b6(dkon brtsegs): ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas kun tu 'gro ba'o lam mkhyen pa'i stobs de ni mtha' yas mu med/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs shing mnyam mo// byang chub sems dpas de thos nas mngon
87b7(dkon brtsegs): bar dang / yid ches rab tu rtogs/ som nyi med/ the tsom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste rengs pa rnyed nas/ nam mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du she/
88a1(dkon brtsegs): bskyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// thams cad lam ni bde gshegs/
88a2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu mkhyen// sems can khams ni nges rgyu bcas pa mkhyen// yongs su smin pa'i mtshan nyid ma nges dang // de bzhin dbang po rgyu dang ldan pa mkhyen// 'dod chags lam ni rnam pa gsung ldan dang // zhe
88a3(dkon brtsegs): lam gsum de bzhin gti mug ldan// rnam sasum rgya ma mtha' yas nyon mongs ldan// lam la rkyen dang rgyu ni ston pas mkhyen// dka' ba'o lam la rno bar 'gyur ba dang // de bzhin dbang po rtul zhing dul ba dang /
88a4(dkon brtsegs): sla ba'i lam la rno bar 'gyur ba dang // de bzhin bul ba'ang 'jig rten mgon pos mkhyen// bul ba'i lam la sbyor ba bul ba yod// de bzhin bul ba yin la sbyor ba rno// myur ba'i lam la bul bar 'gyur ba/
88a5(dkon brtsegs): drangang de bzhin de la ma chags myur ba'ang yod// lam ni so sor rtog pa skyed byed la// yang dag sgom pa skyed pa ma yin dang // sgom pa dag ni skyed par byed pa dang // gnyis ka khyad par sbyor ldan
88a6(dkon brtsegs): skyed pa yod// lam ni bsam pa yongs su sbyong byed la// sbyor ba dag no sbyong bar mi byed yod// re so 'ga' gnyis ka skyong bar byed pa'ang yod// de dag sangs rgyas thams cad gzig sengs
88a7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen// lus ni rnam par spyong la ngag mi sbyong // sems kyang rnam par sbyong ba ma yin dang // ngag rnams dang ni lus kyang rab spyod la// sems ni res 'ga' mi sbyong ba yang yod// sems ni rab
88b1(dkon brtsegs): sbyong dag la ma yin te// lus kyang rnam par sbyong ba ma yin dang // ngag dang de bzhin sems kyang rab sbyong la// res 'ga' lus ni sbyong bar mi 'gyur yod/ lus dang de bzhin dag sems sbyong
88b2(dkon brtsegs): lam dang // ji ltar ldob dang 'jug par 'gyur ba rnams// sangs rgyas thams cad gzigs pas rab ma khyen te// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs kyi stobs drug pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs
88b3(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyi stobs drug pa ste// stobs de dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyis 'che ba nas/ sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//
88b4(dkon brtsegs): de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang ldan pa
88b5(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa'i stobs gang zhe na/ 'di la shA ri'i bring de bzhin gshegs pa bdag dang / pha rol gyis bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug paN+DI sun
88b6(dkon brtsegs): nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang ldang ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// ji ltar rab tu mkhyen ce na/ sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rgyu gang yin pa
88b7(dkon brtsegs): dang rkyen gang yin pa de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// sems can rnams kyi rnam par dag pa'i rgyu gang yin pa dang / rkyen gang yin pa debang de
89a1(dkon brtsegs): / bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// de la rgyu gang / rkyen gang de na/ sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rgyu ni tshul bzhin
89a2(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa yid la byed pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rkyen ni ma rig pa'o// ma rig pa ni rgyu'o// 'du byed ni rkyen to// 'du byed ni rgyu'o// rnam par shes pa na
89a3(dkon brtsegs): rkyen to// rnam par shes pa ni rgyu'o// ming dang gzugs ni rkyen to// ming dang gzugs ni rgyu'o// skye mched drug ni rkyen to// skye mched drug ni rgyu'o// reg pa ni rkyen to// reg pa ni rgyu'o/
89a4(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba ni rkyen to// tshor ba ni rgyu'o// sreng pa ni rkyen to// sred pa ni rgyu'o// len pa ni rkyen to// len pa ni rgyu'o// srid pa ni rkyen to// srid pa ni rgyu'o// skye ba ni rkyen to// skye ba ni rgyu'o// rga shi na
89a5(dkon brtsegs): rkyen to// nyon mongs pa ni rgyu'o// las na rkyen to// lta ba ni rgyu'o// sred pa ni rkyen to// bag la nyal ni rgyu'o// kun nas ldang ba'i rkyen to// sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'i rgyu
89a6(dkon brtsegs): ni 'di/ rkyen ni 'di yin te/ de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// de la sems can rnams kyi rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu gang rkyen gang zhe na/ sems
89a7(dkon brtsegs): can rnams kyi rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu gnyis dang rkyen gnyis te/ gzhan las rjes su mthun pa'i sgra dang / so so bdag nyid tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'o// 'di lta ste/ zhi gnas la ce
89b1(dkon brtsegs): gcig pa dang / lhag mthong la mkhas pa'o// gzhan yang rgyu gnyis dang rkyen gnyis te/ 'gro ba med par shes pa dang / 'ong ba med par shes pa'o// gzhan yang rgyu gnas dang rkyen gnas te
89b2(dkon brtsegs): skye ba med pa rab tu rtogs pa dang / nges par gyur pa la mi rig pa'i// gzhan yang rgyu gnyis dang rkyen gnyis te/ rkang par ldan pa dang / rig pas rnam par grol ba mngon sum du byed pa'o// gan
89b3(dkon brtsegs): yang rgyu gnyis dang rkyen gnyis te/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo la sgom pa dang / rang bzhin gyis rnam par grol bar shes pa'o// gzhan yang rgyu gnyis dang rkyen gnyis te/ zad pa shes pa dang / mi
89b4(dkon brtsegs): skye ba shes pa'o// gzhan yang rgyu gnyis dang rkyen gnyis te/ bden pa rjes su rtogs pa dang / bden pa rjes su thob pa'o// rgyu de dang rkyen de dag ni sems can rnams rnam par dag par 'gyur
89b5(dkon brtsegs): bste/ de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa la dmigs dbang tshad medapa rnam
89b6(dkon brtsegs): bar dag par dmigs pa'ang tshad med de/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog pas kun nas nyon mongs pa la dmigs pa rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa la 'jog pa'ang yod do// yang dag
89b7(dkon brtsegs): ba ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog pas rnam par dag pas dmigs pa'ang kun nas nyon mongs par dmigs pa la 'jog pa'ang yod/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyi 'dzin pas kun nas nyon mongs par
90a1(dkon brtsegs): / dmigs pa la 'jog pa dang / rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa la 'jog pa la'ang yod de/ de la snrel zhi'i rnam grangs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'jug go// shA ri'i bu
90a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa ni ye shes 'di lta bu dang ldan pas 'dod pa dag las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams la dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las
90a3(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can/ bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas te gnas so// bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas te gnas nas/ 'gog pa las ldang ba dang / 'gog pa la snyoms
90a4(dkon brtsegs): par zhugs nas/ bsam gtan dang po las ldang ba'i bar du'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad la rjes su mthun par snyoms par 'jug go// mo mthun par yang snyoms par 'jug go// rjes su mthun
90a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang mo mthun par snyoms par 'jug ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o// nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol
90a6(dkon brtsegs): gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o// sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa la sdug pa nyid du mos par 'gyur ba de ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o// nam mkha' mtha' yas
90a7(dkon brtsegs): skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o// cibang med pa'i skye mched la snyoms
90b1(dkon brtsegs): bar 'jug pa de ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa don rnam par bar pa bdun du'o// 'du shes dang stong du
90b2(dkon brtsegs): bgog pa de ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa ste/ rnam par thar pa brgyad po 'di dag la rjes su mthun pa dang mi mthun par yang snyoms par 'jug/ snrel zhing yang snyoms par bajug go// ting nge dz+ra
90b3(dkon brtsegs): 'bang ting nge 'dzin ston la snyoms par 'jug pas rtogs par sngon kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la tha dad par 'gyur ba gang yang med/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni ting nge 'dzin la dmig pa/
90b4(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag par bya ba med/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni ting nge 'dzin gcig gis ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'grub bo// de bzhin gshegs pa ni ting nge 'dzin las ma bzhengs par ting nge
90b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin thams cad la snyoms par 'jug kyang de bzhini gshegs pa ni sems gcig nas gcig tu 'jug pa med do// de bzhin gshegs pa la sems mnyam par ma gzhag pa mi dmigs so// de bzhi dag shes/
90b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ting nge 'dzin de sus kyang lha mi nus te/ nyan thos kyi ting nge 'dzin ni rang sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis rol gyis non to// rang sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin ni byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sa zil
90b7(dkon brtsegs): gyis nor to// byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis bil gyis non to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni ril gyis ma non pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes ni zil
91a1(dkon brtsegs): gyis ma non par 'jug go// gdams pa gang dang / rjes su bstan pa gang gis nyan thos rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin bskyed pa de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu ma byed to// de bzhin
91a2(dkon brtsegs): du rang sangs rgyas kyi dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// mkhyen nas kyang de bzhin du 'doms shing de bzhin du rjes su ston to//
91a3(dkon brtsegs): de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byung ba dang ldang ba mkhyen
91a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i stobs de ni mtha' yas mu med/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs shing mnyam mo// byang chub sems dbas de thos nas mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtogs/ so ma'i med/ the tsom mi za//
91a5(dkon brtsegs): rgya ches dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed cing / nam mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ngo mtshar dang rmad du du shes skyed do// 'di la chos nyid ni 'di yin te/ de la 'di skad ces
91a6(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// gang gis sems can nyon mongs shing // gang gis sems can rnam dag 'gyur// de yang dpa' bo chen pos mkhyen// mkhyen nas gtam rnams ston par mdzad// gang du ma rig skye
91a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba// nyon mongs rgyu ni tshul bzhin min// de yi rkyen ni 'du byed de// sdug bsngal rab tu skye bar 'gyur// srid pa'i yan lag skyed pa yi// thams cad rtsa ba tshul bzhin min// denyid
91b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rab mkhyen nas// de bzhin du yang ston par mdzad// las kyi rtsa ba nyon mongs pa// mi mkhas mngon par 'du byed de// sdug bsngal 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i bar// de yi rkyen ni rnam
91b2(dkon brtsegs): par shes// gang gis sems can dag 'gyur ba/ rgyu gnyis dang ni rkyen gnyis te// gzhan las rjes su mthun smra dang // nang du tshul ba ni ni lta ba'i// tshul ba ni ni rgyuni ni gnas te// ldag
91b3(dkon brtsegs): mthong yang ni rkyen yin no// sems can gang gis grol 'gyur ba// de yang 'dren pas rab tu mkhyen// tshul khrims la ni rnal 'byor gnas// chos rnams stong par rab tu rtogs/ zar pa'i
91b4(dkon brtsegs): sgo ni bsgoms pas na// srid pa dog pas thar par 'gyur// de dag sangs rgyas ba pa mkhyen nas// rnam skyong skyes pa bud med la// stong pa nyid dang mtshan med dang // rnam par thar pa rab tu sto//
91b5(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan la ni snyoms zhugs pa// rang rgyal dang ni nyin thos rnams// de dag rnams kyang dog par bshad// de ni 'gran zla yod par gsungs// sangs rgyas bsam gtan na mthar
91b6(dkon brtsegs): la ngagra dang bcas med dog pa med// sangs rgyas kyi ni stobs bdun pa// pha rol rgol bas thul bar dka'/ shwa ra bo bu 'ang na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs/
91b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i stobs bdud pa ste/ stobs de dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyis 'che ba nas/ sus kyang 'jig rten 'di'i chos dang mthun par zhes bya ba'i bar
92a1(dkon brtsegs): dad de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon sum du byed pa mkhyen pa'i stobs gang zhe na/ 'di la ga 'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas
92a2(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa'i ye shes kyis bdag dang / sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gnan dag gi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran no// bdi lta ste/ skye ba gcig gas/ gnyis sas/ gsum mam/ @
92a3(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ lnga 'am/ bcu 'am/ nyi shu 'am/ sumathu' ma/ bzhi bcu 'am/ lnga bcu'am/ skye ba brgya'am/ skye ba stong ngam/ skye ba brgya stong nas/ skye ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bar du rjes su dran
92a4(dkon brtsegs): no/ 'jog pa'i bskal pa 'am/ 'chags pa'i bskal pa 'am/ 'dzag pa dang 'chags pa'i bskal pa'am/ 'dzag pa'i bskal pa du ma 'am/ 'chags pa'i bskal pa du ma 'am/ 'jog pa dang
92a5(dkon brtsegs): 'chags pa'i bskal pa du ma zhig na/ nga sngon che ge mo zhig tu byung te/ ming ni 'di zhes bya// rus ni 'di zhes bya// rigs ni 'di zhes bya/ zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za za/ kha dog ni 'di lta bu
92a6(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma ni 'di lta bu/ dbyibs ni 'di lta bu/ tshe ni 'di tsam zhig thub/ yun ni 'di sring cig gnas gnas/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal ni 'di lta bu zhig myong ste/ bdag de nas shing bos nas
92a7(dkon brtsegs): ge mo zhog tu skyes so// bdag de nas shi bos nas 'dir skyes so zhes 'di lta bu'i rnam pa dang bcas/ yul phyogs dang bcas/ gzhi ci las gyur pa dang bcas par bdag dang gzhan gyi sngon
92b1(dkon brtsegs): gyi gnas du ma rjes su dran no// sems can gang gi sngon gyi rgyu ji lta bu dang / klu gang gis sems can du gyur pa'i rgyu de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen te/ mkhyen nas kyang de bzhin du chos
92b2(dkon brtsegs): ston to// 'das pa'o sems can thams cad kyi 'das pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyang rab tu mkhyen to// sems gang gi 'og tu gang la dmigs pa'i sems skyes pa dang / dmigs pa gang ma tshang bas
92b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gag pa de thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// de ltar shA ri Ta gang sems can gcig gi sems gcig nas gcig tu sems 'di lta bu zhig 'og tu sems 'do lta bu zhig byung
92b4(dkon brtsegs): ngo zhes bya ba de ni bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dbang tshogs bshad pas ston par mi nus te/ de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi yang thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen
92b5(dkon brtsegs): to da tha ma'i mtha' rab kyi bskal par de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag gi sems rnams bshad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro// de ltar
92b6(dkon brtsegs): ri'o bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon sum du byed pa mkhyen pa'i stobs ni bsam gyis mi khyab mtshungs pa med/ tshad med/ grangs med/ brjod du med de/
92b7(dkon brtsegs): de'i mtha'i gnas ni bde bar bstan mi nus so// sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog tu gyur pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can de dag la gyi sems can rnams dge ba'i rtse ba de dang de sangs rgyas labaskyed
93a1(dkon brtsegs): pa 'am/ nyan thos la bskyed pa 'am/ rang sangs la skyed pa 'am/ chos la bskyed pa de dag dran par gyis shig ces dran par mdzad do// 'di lta ste/ de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi
93a2(dkon brtsegs): mthus dran par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pas de dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba la dmigs pa de las chos 'di lta 'di lta bur ston te/ ci nus sems can de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
93a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ la la ni nyan thos kyi theg pas/ la la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas 'byung bar 'gyur ro// la la ni bla na med pa yang dag
93a4(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon sum du byed pa shes pa'i stobs ni mtha' yas mu med de/ nam
93a5(dkon brtsegs): mkha' dang mtshungs shing mnyam mo// byang chub sems dpes de thos nas mngon par dang / yid ches/ rab tu rtogs/ som nyi med/ the tsom mi za ba nas/ nam mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bar
93a6(dkon brtsegs): du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad bka' stsal nas/ ston pa yang 'di skad gsungs // bdag gi dang ni de bzhin gzhan dag gi/
93a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten sgron mas sngon gyi dran pa no// bskal pa byeb khrag khrog mtha' yas pa// skyu rur lnga lag mthil banag pa bzhin// ming rus de bzhin kha dog rnam par rtog/ tshe dang gnas dang 'chi ro la/
93b1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang // gang gi rgyal sems can brtson ldan pa// dus mkhyen pa ni de la chos kyang 'chad// 'gro ba rnams kyi sems dang sems byung chos// gang dag 'das pa mtha' yas mu med pa// gang /
93b2(dkon brtsegs): go 'og tu sems gang byung ba kun// rgyal ba ye shes chen po mnga' bas mkhyen// sems can gcig gi sems rgyud sngon 'das pa// bde bar gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen pa ni// skal pa
93b3(dkon brtsegs): gang+gA'i klung gi byed snyed du// bshud kyang de yi mtha' mar phyin mi 'gyur// sngon gyi spyod pa ji snyed de dag ni// phyi mo'i mtha' yi bar du ngas bshad kyang // mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shes mi barbad
93b4(dkon brtsegs): de/ bcom ldan ye shes rgya mtsho 'di'ang po// sngon gyi rgyal la bsti stang gang byas shing // sems can gang dag dge ba'i bsam gyur pa// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul stobs kyi shugs la gnas/
93b5(dkon brtsegs): sngon dag dge ba byas pa rnams kyang dran// sngon ni bsod nams ci 'dra byas pa rnams// de dag rnams kyang ston pa'i mthus dran te// de dag dran na gnas ni gsum la 'khod// thar pa'i gnas
93b6(dkon brtsegs): las phyir yang mi ldog 'gyur// bde gshegs sngon gyi sbyor ba mtha' yas te// sems can thams cad kyis ni bsam mi nus// mtha' yas grags pa'i stobs ni brgyad pa la// rgyal
93b7(dkon brtsegs): sras bdag nyid chen po dang par 'gyur// shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs brgyad pa ste// stobs de dang ldan pas zhes bya ba nas/ chos dang
94a1(dkon brtsegs): mthun par zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i mag rjes su dran pa mngon sum du byed pa mkhyen pa'i stobs gang zhe na/ 'di
94a2(dkon brtsegs): la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa'i ye shes dang / mi'o las shin tu 'das pa'i lha'i mig rnam par dag pas sems can rnams 'tsho'i pho ba dang / skye ba dang / bzang po dang /
94a3(dkon brtsegs): ngan pa dang / kha dog mdzes pa dang / kha dog mo sdug pa dang / bde 'gro bgro ba dag ngan 'gror 'gro ba rnams gzigs so// sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan/
94a4(dkon brtsegs): ngag gis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan/ yid kyis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ log par lta ba dag ste/ de dag log par lta ba'i las yang dag par blangs
94a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rgyus lus zhig ste/ sho ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal bar skye'o// dud 'gro skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du'ang de bzhin no// yang sem
94a6(dkon brtsegs): can pa de dag ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang ldan/ yid kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan te/ 'phags pa rnams la skur pa mi 'debs pa
94a7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par lta ba ste/ de dag yang dog par lta ba yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus lus ni gnas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lhar skye'o zhes/ sems can rnams kyi las ji ltar bsags pa
94b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams rab tu mkhyen to// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i mig de ni phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nam mkha' mtha' chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa/ brjod du med pa/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma las
94b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang shin tu 'das pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ji snyed snang bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ni 'tshog pa dang / 'jig pa dang / 'chags par gzigs so// sems can gang dag
94b3(dkon brtsegs): kha cig snang bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ni 'chi pho ba dang skye bar gzigs so// byang chub sems dpa' gang dag kha cig snang bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ni dgab ldan gnas nas 'chi 'pho ba dang /
94b4(dkon brtsegs): ma'i rum du 'jug pa dang / btsa' ba dang / gom pa bdun 'dor ba dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du 'jug pa dang / mngon par 'byung bar gzigs so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag kha cig
94b5(dkon brtsegs): snang bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ni byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gzigs so// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor ba dang / tshe'i 'du byed 'dor ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar
94b6(dkon brtsegs): yang gzigs so// nyan thos gang dag kha cig snang bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ni shin tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gzigs so// rang sangs rgyas gang
94b7(dkon brtsegs): dag kha cig snang bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ni rdzu 'phrul ston cing yon sbyong bar gzigs so// sems can gang dag snang bar ma gyur pa/ phyi rol gyi drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa rnam
95a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi mig gi lam du mi 'gro ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang mthong bar mi 'gyur ba de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i ldan
95a2(dkon brtsegs): mig gis gzigs so// yang de bzhin gshegs pas shing rta'i pang lo'i tshad tsam la snang bar ma gyur pa'i sems can rnams gzigs pa de dag ni shin tu mang gi/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po
95a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi lha dang mi rnams ni de lta ma yin te/ de ltar mi snang bar gyur pa'i sems can gyi khams kyang tshad med do// 'di ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs coM lha'i mig gis
95a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing na/ sems can gang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul bar 'gyur zhes sems can gyi khams la gzigs te/ sems can ji tsam sangs rgyas kyis 'dul bar 'gyur ba de dag gi
95a5(dkon brtsegs): mdun na de bzhin gsheg pa bzhugs shing sems can de dag 'dul yang sems can gzhan gyis mi shes so// de ltar na shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i mig rjes su dran pa mngon
95a6(dkon brtsegs): sum du byed pa mkhyen pa'o stobs ni mtha' yas mu med de/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs shing mnyam mo// byang chub sems dpas de thos nas mngon par dad pa nas/ nam mkha' lta bur bsam
95a7(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// bde bar
95b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i lha'i mig dri med de/ bskal pa du mar dge ba'i las kyis sbyangs// nges ni rgyal bas phyogs bcu sangs rgyas zhing // rgya chen bsam gyis mi khyab rnams kyang gzigs
95b2(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba dang ni 'dzag pa ji snyed pa// kha cig me yis 'khor cacing sems can gnas// kha cig sangs rgyas ldan zhing kha cig stong // thams cad rang byung gi ni spun gyis gzigs// sems
95b3(dkon brtsegs): can khams ni rgya chen bsam ma khyab// gzugs can gzugs med gang dag ji snyed dang // gang dag ngan 'gror ltung dang bder 'gro ba// thams cad rang byung gi ni spyan gyis gzigs//
95b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bye ba mang po gang bzhugs dang // rang byung badren pa mya ngan gang 'das dang // rang rgyal gang dang nyan thos gang yod pa// thams cad rang byung gi ni smyen gyis gzigs// byang chub
95b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' srog chags pan 'dod pa// gang dag byang chub spyod pa mchog spyod cing // la la gzhi med gnas ni rtogs gyur pa// thams cad rang byung ba dran pa dag gis gzigs// ga
95b6(dkon brtsegs): gis srog chags shin tu phra mthong ba// bde gshegs mig ni 'di'i dra dri ma med// mig stobs bsam gyis mi khyab dgu pa ste// rgyal sras nges pa rnams ni mngon par dad// shA ri'i ni
95b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dgu pa ste/ stobs de dang ldan pas khyu mchog go gnas su zhal gyis 'che zhing 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag
96a1(dkon brtsegs): par sgrog pa nas/ sus kyang 'jig rten 'dir chos dang mthun par zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i zag pa zad pa mngon sum du
96a2(dkon brtsegs): byed pa mkhyen pa'i stobs gang zhe na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi stobs kyis zag pa thams cad zad pas// bdag skyeb na
96a3(dkon brtsegs): dad tshangs par spyod pa la ni brjed/ bya ba ni byas te/ 'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so zhes zag pa med pa/ sems rnam par grol ma/ rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas
96a4(dkon brtsegs): nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i phag bzang ba mkhyen pa'i stob de ni/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'o// nyan thos kyi sa
96a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i zag bzang ba ni tshed du byas pa'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'o// rang sangs rgyas kyi zag pa zad pa ni tshad yod pa ste/ snying rje chen po dang bral ba/
96a6(dkon brtsegs): spobs pa dang bral ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg bzad pa ni rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par bcom pa/ snying rje
96a7(dkon brtsegs): chen pos kun bzung ba/ mi 'jigs pa dang spobs pa la lta ba/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa ste/ skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin
96b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa la las kyi bag chags med/ nyon mongs pa'i bag chags med/ spyod lam 'khrul pa'i bag chags med do// 'di lta ste/ shA ri'i bu nam mkha' yongs su dag pas rdul dang du'i
96b2(dkon brtsegs): 'khrug pa dang lhan cig tu mi gnas pa de bzhin du/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i zag pa zang ba mkhyen pa'i stobs kyang nyon mongs pa'i bag chags thams cad dang lhan cig tu mi gnas so//
96b3(dkon brtsegs): de zag bzang pa mkhyen pa de lta bu la rab tu gnas nas zag pa dang bcas pa/ len pa dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams la bag pa badra par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to// len pa spang ba'i phyir chos
96b4(dkon brtsegs): ston te/ kye ma sems can rnams ni yang dag pa ma yin pa kun rtog pa las byung ste/ zag pa dang len pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i phyir/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du khyed kyis rab tu rtogs
96b5(dkon brtsegs): shig ces de dag la/ de bzhin gshegs pas dpe dang tshul gyis ci nas kyang zag pa rnams yang dag pa ma yin pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhini rab tu shes par 'gyur zhing / shes
96b6(dkon brtsegs): nas kyang chos gang yang mi len te/ len pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba de lta de lta bur chos ston to// de ltar dashA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas sems can thams cad
96b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi zag pa rnams rab tu mkhyen to// zag pa kun 'byung ba dang / zag pa 'gag pa dang / zag pa 'gag par 'gyur ba yim ya yang dge ba ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te/ mkhyen nas kyang
97a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du chos ston to// byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'i zag pa zad pa mngon sum du byed pa mkhyen pa'i stobs de thos nas mngon par dang / ming
97a2(dkon brtsegs): ches rab tu rtogs/ som nyi med cing the tsom mi bab nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi rab du du shes skyed do// 'di la chos nyid ni 'di yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o/
97a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa'i zag pa med pa'i ye shes ni// rgya chen sgrib med pa dag tshad med de// stobs bcu'i stobs ni de dang ldan pas na// zhi ba'i byang chub mchog 'di rab tu gsung // nyan thos rnam kyi
97a4(dkon brtsegs): zag zad ye shes ni// bag chags ma bcom tshad dang ldan pa yin// mi yi dam pa 'dren pa mchog rab kyi// bag chags bcom zhing tshad dang ldan ma yin// de bzhin rab rgyal byang chub
97a5(dkon brtsegs): gang reg pa// de la snying rje che dang spobs pa med// bcom ldan 'das ni zag pa yongs zad pa// snying rje che dang spobs pa tshad med do// sangs rgyas zag zad mkhyen la gnas nas ni// 'gro
97a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i zag pa yang dag ma yin zhing // rigs pa'i gnas kyi tshul 'di ma shes pas// chos 'di thams cad log par zhugs mkhyen te// de la rgyal ba snying rje cher bskyod nas// chos 'di ma
97a7(dkon brtsegs): stong pa bdag med chos// dngos med gsog ste mchog tu zhi ba yi// sa la rtogs shing ltos shes rab tu ston// 'di la skyes bu srog dang gang zag dang // shed skyes shed bu byed pa po yang med//
97b1(dkon brtsegs): chos 'di thams cad log par chags pas na// stong pa snying rje bskyed nas thar ston kyang // bde bar gshegs la skyob yod med de// yang dag ye shes rnams kyang rnams pa med// de phyir rgyal/
97b2(dkon brtsegs): brtag tu rnal 'byor sbyor// 'grol phan phyir chos rnams rab tu ston// 'din pha rol spu ba 'joms pa'i stobs// mtha' yas nam mkha' 'dra ba bcu pa ste// mgon po stobs bcu ro lagan
97b3(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas// mtshungs med 'khor lo dam pa rab tu bskor// shA ra 'o bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu pa ste// stobs de dang ldan pas de bzhin
97b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyis 'che zhing // 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrogs te/ 'jig rten 'dira'i dge slong ngam/ bram ze'i bar du sus kyang chos dang mthun par ra
97b5(dkon brtsegs): tu ma bskor ba tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro// de ltar shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
97b6(dkon brtsegs): stobs rnams la mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtog pa nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi bar du 'du shes skyed do// / bam po drug pa// yang shA ri'i bu ji ltar na
97b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpab de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs bab mo 'dzegs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon rab dang / yid ches rab tu rtogs/ som nyi mi byed/ the tsom ma ma
98a1(dkon brtsegs): pa nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi bar du 'du shes skyed ce na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa ni bzhi po'ang dag ste/ mi 'jigs pa de dag dang ldan
98a2(dkon brtsegs): pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog cing khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyis 'che ste/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ sus kyang 'jig rten du chos
98a3(dkon brtsegs): dang mthun par ma bskor ba tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di la shwa ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas 'khor gyi nang du nga yang dag par
98a4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes zhal gyis 'che ba de la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa la khyod kyis chos 'di mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas so zhes chos dang mthun pas/
98a5(dkon brtsegs): rgol bar byed mi nus so// ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mi mnyam pa med par yang dag par mngon par
98a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas te/ so so'i skye bo chos rnams gang yin pa dang 'phags pa'i chos rnams gang yin pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams gang yin pa dang / slob pa'i chos rnams gang yin pa
98a7(dkon brtsegs): dang mi slob pa'i chos rnams gang yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos rnams mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa gang yin pa dang
98b1(dkon brtsegs): bajig rten gyi chos rnams gang yin pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams gang yin pa dang / khan ma tho bar bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / zag pa dang bcas padang /
98b2(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas de dag thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs
98b3(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas zhes bya'o// de la mnyam pa nyid gang zhe na/ lta ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid du mnyam mo// mtshan ma'i ngo bo nyid kyis mtshan ma med par mnyam mo//
98b4(dkon brtsegs): khams gsum pa'i ngo ba nyid kyis smon pa med par mnyam mo// skye ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis mi skye bar mnyam mo// mngon par 'du byed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis mngon par 'du mi byed par mnyam mo//
98b5(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis ma 'byung bar mnyam mo// kun gzhi bo ngo bo nyid kyis kun gzhi med par mnyam mo// dus gsum gyi ngo ba nyid kyis ji lta ba bzhin du mnyam mo// ma rig pa dang
98b6(dkon brtsegs): srid pa dang / seng pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis rig pa dang rnam par grol bar mnyam mo// 'khor ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis mya ngan las 'das par mnyam mo// de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas
98b7(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad mnyam par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa/
99a1(dkon brtsegs): de'ang 'khor thams cad shes par byed pa/ 'khor thams cad mgu bar byed pa/ 'khor thams cad kyi lus sim par byed pa/ 'khor thams cad kyi sems tshim pa skyed/
99a2(dkon brtsegs): pa 'khor thams cad dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dad pa skyed pa/ snying rje chen pos sbyor ba/ de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam pa/ de kho na nyid/ de bzhin nyid/ gzhan ma yin pa nyid//
99a3(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur ba nyid mi 'khrugs pa nyid/ 'byung ba med pa nyid/ 'jig pa med pa nyid/ rtsod pa med pa nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa la rtsod pa gang yang med do// de bzhin
99a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i mo 'jigs pa ni rtsod pa med pa 'thab pa med pa'o// de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam zhing chos kyi dbyings ngos mnyam pa/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam ma lus pa
99a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la thogs pa med pa'o// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas 'ji lta bu'i chos zab mo phra ba shes par dka' ba/ de dag mngon par rdzogs ltar sangs rgyas pa de bzhin du snying rje chen po
99a6(dkon brtsegs): la gnas nas/ bstan pa sna tshogs dang / rnam grangs sna tshogs kyis sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag la chos thams cad yang dag par rab tu ston te/ deb chos de'ang
99a7(dkon brtsegs): de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad pa'i phyir 'byung ngo // gang ston pa ma yin la ston pa'o zhes khas 'che ba/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
99b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas so zhes khas 'che ba de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pas zil gyis non nas/ de dag rgyags pa chad de phan tshun du 'bros so// 'di ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs
99b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mo 'jigs pa mtha' yas mu med de/ 'di lta ste/ ram mkha' mtha' yas mu med ba de bzhin du/ 'i bung bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa'ang mtha' yas mu med do// shA ri'i bu
99b3(dkon brtsegs): gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mo 'jigs pa'i mtha' 'dod pa ni nam mkha'i mtha' ba dong ngo // byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de thos nas
99b4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtogs pa nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi rab du 'du shes skyeng de/ 'di ni mi 'jigs pa dang po'o// gzhan yang shA 'i bu de bzhin
99b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa bla na med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas 'khor gyi nang du gshegs nas zag bzad do zhes zhal gyis 'che ste/ de la khyod kyis zag pa 'di dag
99b6(dkon brtsegs): ma zad do zhes de bzhin gshegs pa la lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyos chos dang mthur pas rtsod par byed pa med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i zag pa zad pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin
99b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa 'dod pa'i zag pa las sems rnam par grol bas 'dod chags la spyod pa'i bag chags thams cad bcom mo// srid pa'i theg pa las sems rnam par grol bas zhe sdang la spyod
100a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bag chags thams cang bco mo// ma rig pa'i dag pa las sems rnas par grol bas gti mug la spyod pa'i bag chags thams cad bcom so// kha'i zagapa
100a2(dkon brtsegs): sems rnam par grol bas nyon mongs pa la spyod pa'i bag chags thams cad bcom sde/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob bzung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa zag pa bang ba zhes bya'o// don dam par
100a3(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa'i shes rab dang / ye shes kyi mdun na chos gang yongs su shes pa'am/ spang ba'am/ bsgoms pa'am/ mngon du bya bar 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang mi bdug go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang zad
100a4(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya ba de ni ram du'ang mi zad pa ma yin no// de ni shin tu zad pa nyid yin gyi/ gnyen pos zad pa zhes mi bya ste/ de ni ji lta ba bzhin du zang ba'o// gang ji lta ba bzhin du zad pa de la zad pa gang yang /
100a5(dkon brtsegs): med do// gang la zang pa gang yang med pa de ni 'dus ma byas pa'o// de la skye ba med pa/ 'jig pa med pa/ gnas med de/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa byung yang rung / ma byung yang rung ste/ chos
100a6(dkon brtsegs): nyid chos kyi dbyings ni gnas pa nyid de/ de bzhin du de la ye shes zhugs so// gang la 'jug pa med cing mo 'jug pa'ang med pa yang de ltar zhugs te/ de lta bu'i chos kyi tshul gyis zag pa dang zag
100a7(dkon brtsegs): pa spong ba mi dmigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni snying rje chen po la gnas nas zag pa spong ba'i phyir chos ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa de ni 'khor thams cad shes par byed
100b1(dkon brtsegs): ba 'khor thams cad mgu bar byed pa/ 'khor thams cad kyi lus sim par byed pa/ 'khor thams cad kyi sems tshim pa steng ba/ 'khor thams cad dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / rang ba skyed
100b2(dkon brtsegs): pa snying rje chen pos sbyor ba/ de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam pa/ de kho na nyid/ de bzhin nyid/ gzhan pa yin pa nyid/ mi 'gyur ba nyid/ mi 'khrugs pa nyid / 'byung ba med pa nyid 'jog pa med pa
100b3(dkon brtsegs): nyid / rtsod pa med pa nyid de// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mo 'jigs pa la rtsod pa gang yang med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jigs pa ni rtsod pa med pa 'thab pa med pa'o// de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam
100b4(dkon brtsegs): zhing chos kyi dbyings ngos mnyam pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam ma lus pa thams cad la thogs pa med do// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med/ bsam gyis mi khyab// grangs med/
100b5(dkon brtsegs): dpag tu med pa'i chos dang ldan zhing snying rje chen pos yang dag par zin pa'i sems kyis zag pa spang ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston to// de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
100b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi ngo bzhin gsheg pa'i mi 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa nas/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jigs pa'i mtha' 'dong pa de nam mkha'i mtha' 'dod do zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ byang chub sems
100b7(dkon brtsegs): dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de tho se nas mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtogs pa nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi bar du 'du shes skyed do// shA ri'i bri 'di
101a1(dkon brtsegs): ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa gnyis pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs pa de dang ldan zhes bya ba nas/ 'jig rten 'dir chos dang mthun par zhes bya
101a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bar du'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas/ 'khor gyi nang du gshegs nas bar du gcod pa'i chos
101a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams la bar du gcod ngo zhes zhal gyis 'che ba de la grong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis 'di ni bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos ma yin no zhes rgol
101a4(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pa med pa'i bar du'o// de la bar du gcod pa'i chos gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos gcig ste/ gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bag med pa'i sems
101a5(dkon brtsegs): so/ dbar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos gnyis te/ de tsha mi shes pa dang / khrel med pa'o// bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos gsum ste/ lus kyis nyes par spyang ba dang / ngag gis nyes par
101a6(dkon brtsegs): spyad pa dang / yid kyis nyes par spyad pa'o// bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'gro ba ma yin par 'gro ba bzhi la 'dun pas 'gro ba ma yin par 'gro ba dang /
101a7(dkon brtsegs): zho sdang dang / gti mug dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba ma yin par 'gro ba'o// bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos lnga ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ srog gcod pa dang / ma byin pa
101b1(dkon brtsegs): len pa dang / 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa dang / badz+ram du smra ba dang / chang 'thung ba'o// bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos drug ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgya
101b2(dkon brtsegs): la mgus pa dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / bslab pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gdong ba lam bus pa'o// bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos bdun te/ bdun gang zhen
101b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ nga rgyal dang / che ba'i nga rgyal dang / nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal dang / nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang / log pa'i nga rgyal dang / mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang / cung zad snyam pa'i
101b4(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyal lo// bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos brgyad do// brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ log pa'i lta ba dang / log pa'i rtog pa dang / log pa'i ngag dang / log pa'i la
101b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi mtha' dang / log pa'i 'tsho ba dang / log pa'i rtsol ba dang / log pa'i dran pa dang / log pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos dgu ste/ dgu gang zhe na/
101b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ bdag la gnod pa byas so zhes kun nas mnar sems skyed pa dang / gnod pa byed do zhes kun nas mnar sems skyed pa dang / gnod pa byed par 'gyur ro zhes kun
101b7(dkon brtsegs): nas mnar sems skyed pa dang / bdag gi mdza' bo la gnod pa byas so// byed do// byed par 'gyur ro zhes sems la kun nas mnor sems skyed pa dang / bdag dang mi mdza' pa'i
102a1(dkon brtsegs): don byas so// byed do// byed par 'gyur ro zhes kun nas mnar sems skyed pa'o// bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi dge ba bcu'i
102a2(dkon brtsegs): las kyi lam rnams yin te/ 'di lta ste/ srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / bram dang / ngag rtsub po dang / tshig
102a3(dkon brtsegs): bkyil ba dang / brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba'o// de ltar shA ri'i bu tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang ldan pa'i kun tu sbyor ba ji snyed pa'i chos de dag gis
102a4(dkon brtsegs): ro myang ba la rjes su lta zhing gnas pa dang / phyin ci log dang ldan pa dang / 'byung ba la kun nas ldang ba dang / sred pa dang lta ba la mngon par zhen pa'i zang zir dang bcasaphung po dang
102a5(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa'i lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las de dag de thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas bar du gcod par mkhyen to// bar du gcod par mkhyen nas kyang yang dag
102a6(dkon brtsegs): pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston to// chos bcu po de dag ni bar du gcod par 'gyur ba ste/ de dag zhi bar bya ba dang / nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang / spang ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas chos ston to// de bzhin gshegs
102a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mi 'jigs pa de'ang 'khor thams cad shes par byed pa/ 'khor thams cad mgu bar byed pa/ 'khor thams cad kyi lus sim par byed pa/ 'khor thams cad kyi sems tshim pa skyed pa/ 'khor thams
102b1(dkon brtsegs): cad dpa' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dad pa skyed pa dang / snying rje chen pos sbyor ba/ de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam pa/ de bzhin nyid/ gzhan ma yin pa nyid mi 'gyur ba nyid
102b2(dkon brtsegs): mi 'khrugs pa nyid 'byung ba med pa nyid/ 'jig pa med pa nyid/ rtsod pa med pa nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa la rtsod pa gang yang med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i cha
102b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa ni rtsod pa med pa 'thab pa med pa'o// de bzhin nyid dang mnyam zhing chos kyi dbyings ngos mnyam pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam ma lus pa thams cad la thogs pa med do// de ltar de bzhin
102b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa tshad med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du med/ brjod du med pa'i chos dang ldan zhing / snying rje chen pos yang dag par zin pa'i sems kyi bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams zhi bar bya ba dang /
102b5(dkon brtsegs): spang bar bya ba'i chos ston to// de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa mtha' yas mu med pa nas/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa'i mtha' 'dod pa de nam mkha'i mtha' 'dod pa
102b6(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de thos nas mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtogs/ som nyi med/ the tsom mi za ba nas/
102b7(dkon brtsegs): ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi bar du 'du shes skyed do// shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa gsum pa ste/ mi 'jigs pa de dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi nang du gshegs nas
103a1(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba nas/ sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i de bzhin gsheg
103a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas sems can rnams gang la brten pas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba/ 'phags pa'i nges par 'byung ba de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par rang bar 'gyur ba'i lam rab tu/
103a3(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen te/ de la 'di ni nges par 'byung ba'i lam ma yin no zhes de bzhin gshegs pa la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis chos dang mthun par rgol bar byed mi nus so// nges par 'byung ba'i
103a4(dkon brtsegs): lam gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam ste/ gang sems can rnams rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'o// nges par 'byung ba'i chos gnyis te/ 'di lta ste/ zhig nas
103a5(dkon brtsegs): dang lhag mthong ngo // nges par 'byung ba'i chos gsum ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o// nges par 'byung ba'i
103a6(dkon brtsegs): chos pani ste bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus su gtogs pa'i dran pa dang / tshor bar gtogs pa'i dran pa dang / sems su gtogs pa'i dran pa dang / chos su gtogs pa'i dran pa ste/
103a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni nges par 'byung ba bzhi'o// nges par byung ba'i chos lnga ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang ting nge
103b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po ste/ 'di ni nges par 'byung ba'i chos lnga'o// nges par 'byung bapo chos drug ste/ drug gang nan/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /
103b2(dkon brtsegs): chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa ste/ 'di ni nges par 'byung ba'i chos drug go//
103b3(dkon brtsegs): nges par 'byung ba'i chos bdun te/ bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus
103b4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang
103b5(dkon brtsegs): snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste/ 'di bdun yang gong ma bzhin no// nges par 'byung ba'i chos brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o//
103b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag
103b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/ 'di brgyad kyang gong ma bzhin no// mchog tu dga' ba'i rtsa ba las skyes pa'i chos dgu ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mchog tu dga' ba dang /
104a1(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang / shin tu sbyangs pa dang / bded dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ye shes mthong ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa dang / 'dod chags
104a2(dkon brtsegs): dang bral ba dang / rnam par grol ba ste/ 'di dgu'ang gong ma bzhin no// nges par 'byung ba'i chos bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam mo// 'di lta ste/ srog gcod
104a3(dkon brtsegs): pa spangs pa dang / ma byin par len pa spangs pa dang / 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spangs pa dang / rdzun du smra ba spangs pa dang / phra ma spangs pa dang / ngag rtsub po spangs pa dang / tshig bkyal
104a4(dkon brtsegs): pa spungs pa dang / brnab sems spangs pa dang / gnod sems med pa dang / yang dag par lta ba ste/ 'di'i nga gong ma bzhin no// lam de ni nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'di ltar
104a5(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dge ba ji snyed pa tshul khrims kyi phung po dang ldan pa 'am/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang ldan pa 'am/ shes rab kyi phung pong ldan pa 'am/ rnam par grol ba'i phung po
104a6(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa 'am/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dang ldan pa 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang ldan pa de dag kyang nges par 'byung ba'i lam zhes bya'o// gzhan yang nges par 'byung ba
104a7(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba ni yang dag par sgrub pa gang yin pa ste/ gang yang dag par sgrub pa de la ni/ chos gang yang sogs pa 'am/ 'bri ba 'am/ blang ba'am/ dor ba'am/ gzung ba'am/ spang po ma
104b1(dkon brtsegs): ro// de ci'i phyir na na/ yang dag par sgrub pa la zhugs pa ni gnyis la khro mi 'jug ste/ chos thams cad gnyis su med par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ye shes mthong ba ni ngas par 'byung ba'i lang /
104b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams lo nges par 'byung ba'i lam yang dag par rab tu ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pade'ang 'khor thams cad shes par byed pa 'khor
104b3(dkon brtsegs): cad mgu bar byed pa/ 'khor thams cad kyi lus som par byed pa/ 'khor thams cad kyi sems tshim pa skyed pa/ 'khor thams cad dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang dad pa
104b4(dkon brtsegs): skyed pa/ snying rje chen pos sbyor ba/ de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam pa/ de kho na nyid de bzhin nyid/ gzhan ma yin pa nyid/ mi 'gyur ba nyid/ mi khrugs pa nyid/ 'byung ba med pa nyid/
104b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig pa med pa nyid/ rtsod pa med pa nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa la rtsod pa gang yang med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa ni rtsod pa med pa 'thab pa med pa'o// de bzhin nyid
104b6(dkon brtsegs): dang mnyam zhing chos kyi dbyings ngos mnyam pa 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam ma lus pa thams cad la thogs pa med pa'o// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis
104b7(dkon brtsegs): mi khyab/ gzhal du med/ dpag tu med/ brjod du med pa'i chos dang ldan zhing snying rje chen pos zin pa'i sems kyis sems can rnams la nges par 'byung ba'i lam yang dag par rab tu ston te/ des/
105a1(dkon brtsegs): sor rtogs pas sems can der 'jug pa rnams de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad cing nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin
105a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi pa ste/ mi 'jigs pa de dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog cing khyug chog gi gnas su zhal gyis 'che ste
105a3(dkon brtsegs): dge slong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha dang / bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ sus kyang bajig rten 'dir chos dang mthun pa sa skor ba/ tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro// de ltar
105a4(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi mtha' yas mu med do// 'di lta ste/ dpar na shA ri'i bu nam mkha' mtha' yas mu med pa de bzhin du ka/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi'ang
105a5(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas mu med do// sems can thams cad kyis bad par mi 'gyur ro// shA ri'i dra gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa'i mtha' 'dong pa de ni nam ma pa'i mtha' 'dod do// byang chub semamasas
105a6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de thos nas mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtogs som nyi med/ the tsom mi ba/ rgya cher dba' mthus/
105a7(dkon brtsegs): rangs pa rlangs/ rnam mngang la bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi par du 'dugs byed do// danas bcom ldam das kyis dam ma tshigs su bcang pa 'di dgang zungs so/
105b1(dkon brtsegs): chos kun mnyam pa nyid mnyam par/ rang byung bas ni rjes su rtogs// de phyi yang ga mngon sangs rgyas// de ba'i na gshegs pa mnyam pa gzigs/ sam 'gyu ba'i chos gang lam
105b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas chos dang mnyam// slob dang mi slob chos rnams dang / rang rgyal gyi mo chos nyid dang / gang dag 'jig rten chos rnams dang / gang dag 'jig rten 'das chos dang // das dang migs
105b3(dkon brtsegs): g.yo rnams// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam dang 'dra// slong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med// smon lam dag ni rnam par spangs// ma skyes mngon par 'du mi byed// 'di ni mnyam pa nyid du bstan// 'di
105b4(dkon brtsegs): ngag mnyam pa nyid rtogs nas// thub pa chen po mi 'jigs pa// gang gis sems can grol 'gyur ba// de bzhin du yab tu ston// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par grol// rnam par thar pa rab
105b5(dkon brtsegs): tu ston// mi dbang gi ni mi 'jigs pa// gnyis pa yang dag rab tu bstan// rgyal bas gang chos rjes su sangs rgyas pa// ma bsten par ni rnam par grol mi 'jog/ bag med pa dang khrel ba med
105b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur dang // gang la ngo tsha ci yang med pa dang // lus dang ngag rnams dang ni yid kyis su// gang dag sdom pa rnam yang yod min dang // 'dun dang zhe sdang gti mug 'jigs pa dang // srog gcod pa dang /
105b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan la 'tshe ba dang // gzhan gyi chung ma de bzhin brdzun dang chang / nga rgyal mi gus de bzhin bdun pa'o// gang dag log par smra ba brgyad pa ste// thams cad rnam par grol ba'i lam rgyun gcod/
106a1(dkon brtsegs): gang dag mnar sems dgu dang nyes mang dang // mi dge bcu yi las kyi lam rnams dang // gang dag tshul min zhi ba mi shes pa// de dag la ni nam yang thar pa med/ byin ci
106a2(dkon brtsegs): log la zhugs par rig gyur nas// bag med yang dag ma yin smra la chags// rgyal ba rnams kyi mi 'jigs gsum pa ste// chos nyid 'di dag la ni bsnyen par bya// gang dag rnam sbyor sgo ni tshad med
106a3(dkon brtsegs): la mi gang ston pa byang chub reg par 'gyur// rgyal ba nyid kyis ma thos thams cad rig/ shes nas mi 'chir 'gro ba'i chos 'chad do// ji tsam dge ba'i chos ni mar yod pa// byang chub phyogs dge rgyal
106a4(dkon brtsegs): bas bsngags pa la// brten pa rnam par thar pa mi 'thob pa// gnas med par ni stobs cu rnams kyis bshad// tshul bzhin gyis ni nyon mongs mang po zhi// yang dag chos dge mnyam pa med ldan zhing //
106a5(dkon brtsegs): chos dang chos ma yin la re mi chags// zhi ba mya ngan med pa rnam grol reg/ gsogs gsob nam mkha' 'dra zhing ya ma daR+Ya/ sgyu ma'i gzugs 'dra nam mkha' lta bu dang // dge chos rnam pa gang gis rab
106a6(dkon brtsegs): shes pa// de ni srid pa'i mtsho las thar par 'gyur// thub pa stobs bcu rnams kyi chos 'di ni// 'gro ba gang mos sring par 'gro ba la/ snying rje snying brtse byas nas thar byed de/ mi baji gas bzhi pa
106a7(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' 'dra ba'o// de ltar shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dad// yid ches rab tu rtogs som nyi mi byed
106b1(dkon brtsegs): com mi za ba nas/ nam mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi rab du 'du shes skyed do// shAs su ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'ade bzhin gshegs pa ma
106b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtogs/ som nyi mi byed/ the tsom mi zab nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmad kyibar du 'du shes skyed ce na/ 'a
106b3(dkon brtsegs): la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi snying rje chen po ni sems can thams cad rjes su mi gtong zhing rtag tu 'jug pa/ sems can yongs su smin par 'gyur ba ste/ mi ldog par rig par bya'o//
106b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po de'ang ji ltar ngag gi las kyis kyang khong du chud par bya ba sla ba ma yin pa de ltar tshad med/ de ltar bsam gyis mi khyab/ de ltar mtshungs pa med
106b5(dkon brtsegs): de lta dpag tu med/ de ltar brjod du med/ de ltar mi zad cing khong du chud par dka' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub thob pa de ltar sems can la de bzhin
106b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug ste/ byang chub ci 'dra ba snying rje chen po'ang de 'dra'o// de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub ji ltar thob ce na/ de bzhin gshegs pas rtsa ba med pa/ gnas med pa'i/
106b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub thob bo// de la rtsa ba gang gnas gang zhe na/ 'jig tshogs ni rtsa ba'o// yang dag pa ma yin pa kun rtog pa ni gnas so// de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir /
107a1(dkon brtsegs): dag mnyam par mkhyen te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas rtsa ba med pa/ gnas med pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas zhes bya ste/ sems can 'di dag ni rtsa
107a2(dkon brtsegs): med pa gnas med par mi shes pas/ de dag shes par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pas snying rje chen po 'jug go/ gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub ni zhi ba dang nye bar
107a3(dkon brtsegs): zhi 'o// de ji ltar ni/ ji ltar nye bar ni zhe na/ nang ni ba'o// phyi rol nye bar zhi ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ste/ de'i rang bzhin 'di yin pas nade'i
107a4(dkon brtsegs): phyir ni ba zhes bya'o// de bzhin du rdza ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ste/ ra'i rang bzhin pade yin pas na/ ro'i phyir zhib zhes bya'o// de mig sto
107a5(dkon brtsegs): bar yongs su shes nas/ gzugs la mi rgyug suM/ ra'i byir nye bar ni banas bya'o// yid kyi bar du'ang song bar yongs su shes nas/ chos la mi rgyug ste/ ra'i byer nye bar ni gzhes bya'o//
107a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs su na napa na pa tshunas/ dag zhes par bya bas sams carna rnams pa badzin gsags pa'i byang rjechen po 'phru gzhan pa cas
107a7(dkon brtsegs): ni rang b.rin chos 'ong rnas pa par byang chub mngon par rdzogs pangasangs rgyas so// ji ltar dgas pananas rang ba na gang rin par ni ku nas tsha mongs pa med pasnyen mam par marlo'o/ nam
107b1(dkon brtsegs): mkha' ni rang bzhin no// nam mnga' ni rjes su 'byung ba'o// nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa ste/ de ni rang bzhin gyis shin tu 'od gsal bas na/ rang bzhin gyis 'od gsapa
107b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di khong du chud pas/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams glo bur gyi nyon mongs pas kun nas nyon mongs te/ sems can rnams rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba 'di mi shes pas/ de dag rang bzhin gyis 'od
107b3(dkon brtsegs): gsal ba khong du chud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ gzhan yang shA rI'i bu ngas ni blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med par byang chub mngon par
107b4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// de la blang ba med pa gang dor ba med pa gang zhe na/ blang ba med pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad mi 'dzin pa'o// dor ba med pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad rab tu 'dzin pa
107b5(dkon brtsegs): med pa'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pas blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa'i chu bo mnyam pa nyid du gzigs te/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas tshu rol med pa dang / pha rol med par gzigs pa de ltar/
107b6(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad tshu rol dang 'ong nga bra sa de zhing gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o// blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa 'di sems can rnams kyis
107b7(dkon brtsegs): khong du ma chud pas/ de khong du chud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ gzhan yang shA ri'i bu ngas mtshan ma med pa dang / dmigs
108a1(dkon brtsegs): pa med par byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// de la mtshan ma med pa kang dmigs pa med pa gang nen/ tshig gi rnam par shes pa mi migs pa ni mtshan pa ched
108a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'o// gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ni dmigs pa med pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du mi dmigs pa ni mtshan ma med pa'o// chos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ni darigs pa med
108a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// de ltar shA ri'i bu mtshan ma med pa dang / dmigs pa med pa 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod phul lo// 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul gang zhe na/ khams gsum pa ni 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul te/
108a4(dkon brtsegs): gang 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul de ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi spyod yul ma yin pas/ de khong du chud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/
108a5(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu byang chub ni 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin te/ dus gsum mnyam pa/ 'khor gsum yongs su chad pa'o// de la 'khor gsum yongs su chad pa
108a6(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ gang 'das pa la sems mi 'jug pa dang / ma 'ongs pa la rnam par shes pa rjes su mi rgyug pa dang / da ltar byung ba la yid la byed pa mi 'jug pa ste/ de sems dang / yid dang / rnam
108a7(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa la mi gnas pas 'das pa la mi rtog/ ma 'ongs pa la rlom sems su mi byed/ da ltar byung ba la spros par mi byed pa 'di ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa yin na
108b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams kyis khor du ma chung bas/ ra khong du chud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ b+hU ri'i bungs byang chub ni lus med pa
108b2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'dus ma byas par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ de ni mig gi rnam par shes pas rnam par shes pa byab ma 'ani nag / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar gyis rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin
108b3(dkon brtsegs): no// 'dus ma byas zhes bya ba ni gang ma skyes pa/ mi 'jig pa/ mi gnas pa de ni 'khor gsum dang bral ba 'dus ma byas zhes bya'o// 'dus ma byas ji lta bar 'dus byas kyang de ltar khong du chud
108b4(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o// ra ci'i phyir zhe na/ gango chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nga ni dngos po med pa'o// gang dngos po med la gnyis med de/ lus med pa/ mngon par 'dus ma byas pa de sems ca
108b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi khong du mchud bas/ de khong du chud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams lang bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'byu go shA ri'i bungs byang nub ni byer med pa'i gnas su mngon sa
108b6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// de la dbyer ming bgung / gnas gang zhe na/ de la de bzhin nyid ni gnas so// gnas med pa mi dbyer med pa'o// chos kyi dbyings ni gnas so// tha dad pa med pa na
108b7(dkon brtsegs): bur med pa'o/ yang dag pa'i mtha' de gnas so// g.yo ba med pa ni dbyer 'o// stong pa nyid ni gnas so// dmigs su ma pa'i dbyer med pa'o// mtshan ma med pa ni gnas so//
109a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par mi rtog pa ni dbyer med pa'o// smon pa med pa ni gnas so// 'jug pa med pa ni dbyer med pa'o// sems can med pa ni gnas so// sems can med pa'i rang
109a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin ni dbyer med pa'o// nam mkha' ni gnas so// mi dmigs pa ni dbyer med pa'o// mi skye ba ni gnas so// mi 'gag pa ni dbyer med pa'o// 'dus ma byas ni gnas so// rgyu ba med pa
109a3(dkon brtsegs): ni dbyer med pa'o// byang chub ni gnas so// nye bar zhi ba ni dbyer med pa'o// mya ngan las 'das pa ni gnas so// mngon par mi 'grub pa ni dbyer med pa'o// de ltar shA ri'i bu dbyer med pa'o//
109a4(dkon brtsegs): gnas 'di sems can rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas/ de khong du chud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ shA ri'i bu byang chub ni
109a5(dkon brtsegs): khrus kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas te/ sems kyis kyang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus ni bems po g.yo ba med pa/ byed pa med pa/ dang / rtsig pa dang / shing dang /
109a6(dkon brtsegs): rdo dang / mig yor lnga du'o// sems ni sbrum dang / rlig r+b+ha dang / rgyun A rba ste/ gang gis lus dang sems de ltar khong du chud pa doni byang chub ces bya'o// byang chub ni tha skad nam du bzung ba/
109a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chung rna chis sa ma/ sems sa 'i chos sam/ chos ma yin pa ma yang dag pa / yang dag pa mayin pa'im/ yin pa'am/ brdzun pa dang gis kyang rdzang ba bya
109b1(dkon brtsegs): yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub ni chos thams cad kyis brjod par bya ba ma yin te/ byang chub la gang gis kyang tshig gi tha snyad du 'gyur ba'i gnas cung zad kyang med do// ji ltar rnam par gnas
109b2(dkon brtsegs): ning tshig med pa de bzhin du/ byang chub kyang gnas med pa brjod par bya ba ma yin pa'o// de ltar shA ri'i bu yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshol ba na/ chos tham tshig med pa ste/ chos la chog med/
109b3(dkon brtsegs): tshig la'ang chos med do// de lta bu'i chos kyi tshul mi shes shing khong du ma chud pas/ de khong du chud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ shA
109b4(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu byang chub ni gzung ba med pa/ kun gzhi med pa'o// de la gzung ba med pa gang / kun gzhi med pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mig yongs su shes pa ni gzung ba med pa'o// gzugs yang
109b5(dkon brtsegs): dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ni kun gzhi med pa'o// yid kyi bar du yongs su shes pa ni gzung ba med pa'o// chos mi dmigs pa ni kun gzhi med pa ste/ de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs
109b6(dkon brtsegs): pas gzung ba med pa/ kun gzhi med par byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ mig mi 'dzin pa dang / gzugs kun gzhi med pas rnam
109b7(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa mi gnas so// yid kyi bar du mi 'dzin cing chos kun gzhi med pas rnam par shes pa mi gnas so// de rnam par shes pa mi gnas pas sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi gnas shes so//
110a1(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar shes she na/ sems can rnams kyi sems kyi gnas ni bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs ni sems kyi gnas so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed na
110a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams kyi sems kyi gnas te/ 'di bzhi ni sems can rnams kyi sems kyi gnas so// gnas de'ang gnas pa med par de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen te/ gnas med pa'i mtha' 'di sems can rnam
110a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis khong du mchud pas/ de khong du chud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ shA ri'i bri byang chub ces bya ba ni stong pa nyid kyi tshigs dgas //
110a4(dkon brtsegs): stong pa nyid nang gis byang chub stong pa/ stong pa nyid des chos thams cad stong ste/ de dag stong pa ji lta ba bzhin du de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas mod kyi/
110a5(dkon brtsegs): stong banyid kyis stong pa nyid ma 'ad par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ni ma yin pas/ stong pa nyid dam/ byang rgya ces bya ba badzin tshul ba cig pa'i lags so// da la gnyis dgang gis stong pazhid dang
110a6(dkon brtsegs): rlung chum mam pas nga gnyis gang yang med do// chos riganyis sa su tsa gnyis su cu med/ ming med pa/ mtshan na med pa/ 'jug pa ga rag rgyu ba meng pa// snyi med pa'o/
110a7(dkon brtsegs): nod cing nganas kya mngon pa chags pa dang badzin pa dang tham pa'o// don dmapar chos gang yar ming chags te/ gang bgang zin pa stong pa zhes phyag 'jog dmam ma 'dam ma pa'ims sa
110b1(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' ni brjod par bya ba'ang ma yin no// de bzhin du stong pa stong pa zhes kyang byal/ stong pa nyid brjod par byab ma yin no// 'di lta ste/ ming tsam du tha snyad 'dogs pa 'di ni chos thams su 'jug bsdu/
110b2(dkon brtsegs): ming de'ang yul na mi gnas/ phyogs na mi gnas so// ji ltar ming phul na mi gnas/ phyogs na mi gnas pa de bzhin du/ chos gang ming gis tha snyad du 'dogs pa'i chos dbang yul na mi gnas
110b3(dkon brtsegs): phyogs na mi gnas te/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mkhyen to// thog ma nas ma skyes ma byung bar de ltar mkhyen pas de ltar rnam par grol to// bcings pa'ang med
110b4(dkon brtsegs): grol ba'ang med na de byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis khong du ma chung pas/ de khong du chud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go shA ri'i bu
110b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub ni nam mkha' dang mnyam ste/ namo mkha' ni mnyam pa'ang ma yin/ mi mnyam pa'ang ma yin no// byang chub kyang mnyam pa'ang ma yin/ mi mnyam pa'ang ma yin te/ de ji ltar chos rnams yang dag
110b6(dkon brtsegs): bar yongs su grub pa med pa de mnyam pa 'am/ mi mnyam pa zhes brjod pa ma yin no// de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mnyam pa'ang ma yin/ mi mnyam pa'ang ma yin par
110b7(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// ji ltar chos rdul tsam yang mnyam par byas pa'ang ma yin/ mi mnyam par byas pa'ang ma yin pa de ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// chos
111a1(dkon brtsegs): ji snyed pa de dag kyang yang dag pa'i ye shes kyis shes so// yang dag pa'i ye shes gang zhe na/ chos ma byung ba rnams 'byung ba dang / byung nas 'jig par 'gyur ba de dag ni bdag po
111a2(dkon brtsegs): med par 'byung bdag po med par 'jig ste/ rkyen gyis 'byung ba dang 'jig par 'gyur zhing / 'di la 'jug pa 'am/ ldog pa gang yang med de/ lam bcad pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs bac+doMs
111a3(dkon brtsegs): ston to// lam bcad pa 'di sems can rnams kyis khong du ma chung bas/ de khong du chud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go shA ri'i bu
111a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub de ni ji lta ba bzhin gyi gnas so// byang chub ji lta bar gzugs kyang de bzhin te/ de bzhin nyid kyis mi 'byung ngo // byang chub ji lta ba bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang /
111a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa'ang de bzhin te/ de bzhin nyid kyis mi 'byung ngo // byang chub ji lta ba bzhin du sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams kyang de bzhin/
111a6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin nyid kyis mi 'byung ngo // byang chub ji lta ba bzhin du mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams nas/ yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi kham
111a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du'o// chos rnams kyi btags pa ni 'di tsam du zad de/ de ni phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams su btags pa ste/ de dag kyang de bzhin
111b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas ji lta ba bzhin du mngon dur rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// byon tsa ma log par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas na/ sngon ji lta bar gyis kyang de bzhin/ bar du'ang de bzhin
111b2(dkon brtsegs): mtha' nas ma skyes/ bye ma'i mthar mi 'pho'o// bar du'ang dben pa ste/ de ltar de dag ni ji lta ba bzhin gyi gnas yin no// gcig ji lta bar thams cad kyang de bzhin no// thams cad ji lta bar gcig kyang /
111b3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin te/ ji lta ba bzhin ni gcig gam/ mang por mi 'gyur ro// ji lta ba bzhin gyi gnas te/ sems can rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas/ de khong du chud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la
111b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go shA ri'i bu byang chub ni rnam pa la 'jug pa/ rnam pa med pa la zhugs so// de la rnam pa gang / rnam pa med pa gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu rnam pa
111b5(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba ni dge ba'i chos rnams rtsom pa'o// rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'o// rnam pa zhes bya ba ni mi gnas pa'i sems kyi gnas so// rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba ni rnam
111b6(dkon brtsegs): par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// rnam pa zhes bya ba ni sems gzhal ba dang / bgrang ba dang / so sor rtog pa'o// rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba ni gzhal ba las yang dag par 'das
111b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// gzhal ba las yang dag par 'das pa gang zhe na/ gang na rnam par shes pa'i las med pa'o// rnam pa zhes bya ba ni gang na 'dus byas la so sor rtog pa'o// rnam pa med pa ni 'dus ma
112a1(dkon brtsegs): byas mngon sum du byed pa ste/ rnam pa dang rnam pa med pa la 'jug pa 'di byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas/ de khong du chud par bya'o zhes sems can
112a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go shA ri'i bu byang chub ni zag pa med pa/ len pa med pa'o// de la zag pa med pa gang / len pa med pa gang zhe na/ zag pa med
112a3(dkon brtsegs): ba zhes bya ba ni/ zag pa bzhi dang bral ba ste/ 'dod pa'i zag pa dang bral ba dang / srid pa'i zag pa dang bral ba dang / ma rig pa'i zag pa dang bral ba dang / lta ba'i zag pa dang bral ba'o// nye bar len/
112a4(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa zhes bya ba ni/ len pa bzhi dang bral ba ste/ 'dod pa'i len pa dang bral ba dang / srid pa'i len pa dang bral ba dang / lta ba'i len pa dang bral ba dang / tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs kyi len pa dang bral
112a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'o// de la nye bar len pa bzhi po de dag thams cad ni ma rig pas ldongs par byas pa dang / sred pa'i chus g.yogs pa dang / bdag tu mngon par chags pas phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched
112a6(dkon brtsegs): len to// de la de bzhin gshegs pas bdag nye bar len pa'i rtsab yongs su mkhyen pa'i phyir/ bdag rnam par dag pas sems can rnam par dag par mkhyen to// bdag rnam par dag pa gang yin pa la yongs su
112a7(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa gang gis tshul bzhin ma yin pa 'di 'byed bar 'gyur ba'i yongs su rtog pa gang yang med de/ de ni tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang ldan pas ma rig pa kun nas mi slong ngo // ma rig pa kun nas mi slong bas khrid pa'i yan
112b1(dkon brtsegs): lag bcu gnyis kun nas mi ldang ba de ni skye ba med pa'o// gang skye ba med pa de nges par gyur pa'o// gapa nges par gyur pa de ni nges pa'i don to// gang nges pa'i don de ni don dam pa'o// gang don dam pa
112b2(dkon brtsegs): de gang zag med pa'i don to// gang zag med pa'i don de brjod du med pa'i don to// gang brjod du med pa'i don de rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i don to// gang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i don de chos
112b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi non to// gang chos kyi don de de bzhin gshegs pa'i don to// gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i don de chos kyi don te/ de'i phyir sus rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mthong ba des chos mthong ngo //
112b4(dkon brtsegs): sus chos mthong ba des de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ste/ 'di ltar de bzhin nyid du btsal na ci'ang mi mthong ba de ltar mthong ngo // de la ci'ang zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mtshan ma med pa dang /
112b5(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa med pa'o// gang gis mtshan ma med pa dang / dmigs pa med pa mthong ba des yang dag pa mthong ste/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mnyam par
112b6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par sangs rgyas so// zag pa med pa dang / len pa med pa 'di byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas/ de khong du chud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin
112b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go shA ri'i bu byang chub ni dag pa/ dri ma med pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa'o// de la dag pa gang / dri ma med pa gang / nyon mongs pa med pasha/
113a1(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ stong pa nyid ni dag pa'o// mtshan ma med pa ni dri ma med pa'o// smon pa mer ba ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o// skye ba medang ni dag pa'o// mngon par 'du mi byed pa ni drim
113a2(dkon brtsegs): med pa'o// nye bar len pa med pa ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o// rang bzhin ni dag pa'o// yongs su dag pa ni dri ma med pa'o// 'od gsal ba ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o// spros pa med pa ni dag pa'o//
113a3(dkon brtsegs): ma smos pa ni dri ma med pa'o// spros pa nye bar zhi ba ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o// de bzhin nyid ni dag pa'o// chos kyi dbyings ni dri ma med pa'o// yang dag pa'i mtha' ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o//
113a4(dkon brtsegs): go 'byed pa ni dag pa'o// nam mkha' ni dri ma med pa'o// nam mkha' ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o// nang yongs su shes pa ni dag pa'o// phyi rol tu mi rgyu ba ni dri ma med pa'o// phyi dang nang mi dmig/
