113a5(dkon brtsegs): pa ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o// phung po yongs su shes pa ni dag pa'o// khams kyi rang bzhin ni dri ma med pa'o// skye mched spong ba ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o// 'das pa la zad pa shes pa ni dag pa'i
113a6(dkon brtsegs): ma 'ongs pa la mi skye ba shes pa ni dri ma med pa'o// da ltar byung ba la chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa'i ye shes ni nyon mongs pa med pa ste/ de ltar dag pa dang / dri ma med pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa
113a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas gcig tu 'jug par 'gyur ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ zhi ba'i gnas so// gang zhi bde ni rab tu zhi ba/ de ni nye bar zhi ba ste/ thub pa zhes bya'o// de lta bas na ji ltar na nam mkha' ji lta bar
113b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyang de bzhin no// byang chub ji lta bar chos kyang de bzhin no// chos ji lta bar sems cad la de bzhin no// sems can ji lta bar zhing yang de bzhin no// zhing ji lta bar mya ngan las 'das pa'ang
113b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin no// de bas na chos thams cad ni mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam ma zhes bya ste/ mthar thug pa'i rnam pas gnyen po med do// gnyen po med pa'i rnam pas thog ma nas rnam par dag pa'o//
113b3(dkon brtsegs): thog ma nas dri ma med pa'o// thog ma nas nyon mongs pa med pa'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar gzugs can dang / gzugs med pa'i chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas
113b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can gyi khams la rnam par gzigs shing / sems can rnams la dag pa dang / dri ma med pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pas rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// de ltar
113b5(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po dag pa dang / dri ma med pa dang / nyon mongs pa med par lhun gyis grub pas rtag tu 'jug ste/ phyis gtang bar bya ba med cing / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
113b6(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams rab 'bya ma ma lus par thogs pa med do// de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po ni mtha' yas mu med de/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po'i mtha' 'dod pa/
113b7(dkon brtsegs): ni nam mkha'i mtha' 'dod do// byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pade thos nas mngon par dad/ yid ches rab tu rtogs/ som nyi med/ the tsom mi
114a1(dkon brtsegs): ba nas/ nam mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi bar du 'du shes skyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher bstan
114a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// rtsa ba med cing gnas med par// sangs rgyas kyis ni byang chub reg/ ji ltar rtogs pa de bzhin du// srog chags rnams ni kun/
114a3(dkon brtsegs): la ston// nang gi mig ni stong pa ste// phyi rol gzugs kyang stong pa'o// zhi dang nye bar zhi ba yi// sangs rgyas kyis ni byang chub reg/ zhi dang nye bar zhi ba de// sems can khong du ma chud pas/
114a4(dkon brtsegs): tshig don rtogs nas sems can la// de dag la ni snying rje 'jug/ byang chub rang bzhin 'od gsal zhing // rnam dag nam mkha' 'dra ba de// sems can rnams kyis mi shes pas// de dag la
114a5(dkon brtsegs): yang snying rje 'jug/ chos rnams kun la 'dzin pa dang / rab tu 'dzin pa yod ma yin// zlab med dor ba med pa yi// sangs rgyas kyis ni byang chub reg/ sems can 'di dag mi shes pas// de dag la/
114a6(dkon brtsegs): ni snying rje 'jug/ mtshan ma med cing dmigs pa med// 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul 'di// byis pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa// sangs rgyas kyis ni byang chub reg/ gang dag mi mkhas bcings/
114a7(dkon brtsegs): ba yi so so'i skye bos mi shes pas// de bzhin gshegs pa sems can la// snying rje chen po rab tu 'jug/ rang bzhin gyis ni 'dus ma byas// skye ba med cing 'jig pa med// de la gnas pa
114b1(dkon brtsegs): yod min te// mtshan nyid gsum las rnam par grol// 'dus byas rnams kyi rang bzhin ni// byis pas khong du mi chud pas// de dag la yang snying rje 'jug tshul 'di gang gis sangs rgyas
114b2(dkon brtsegs): pa byang chub lus kyis me rtogs te// sems kyis kyang ni 'tshang mi rmya// lus ni bems po'i rang bzhin te// sems kyang sgyu ma lta bu'o// lus dang sems kyi rang bzhin de/ byas pa
114b3(dkon brtsegs): khong du ma chud pas// tshul 'di khong du chud gyur nas// de dag la ni snying rje 'jug/ rang byung bas ni byang chub dam pa rgya chen mchog reg ste// shing mchog drung du bzhugs nas sems can khams la
114b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par gzigs// 'khor ba'i 'khor lor zhugs shing 'gro rgyud sna tshogs 'khyam gyur pa// de dag gzigs nas sangs rgyas kyi ni snying rje mi zad 'jug/ nga dang rgyags pa dag la chags shing lta ba'i dra
114b5(dkon brtsegs): bas gzigs// sdug bsngal ba de dang me rtag rtag dang sdug par 'du shes shing // bdag dang sems can dang ni srog tu lta bar chags pa rnams// gzigs nas de dag la ni sangs rgyas snying rje mi zad 'jug
114b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can khams ni gti mug ling tog khebs shing bsgribs pa kun// nyi ma smin khebs bzhin du snang med lam mer mi 'gyur ba/ de dag gzigs nas ye shes snang ba dri med 'od bya zhes// de dag la yang sangs rgyas kyi ni
114b7(dkon brtsegs): snying rje mi zangad 'jug/ ran tshogs 'gro bar zhugs shing lam stong rab tu 'khyams pa rnams// sems can sems can dmyal dang dud 'gro yi dgra rgyud lhung ba// de dag gzigs nas sngon gyi rgyal bas
115a1(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen pa'i lam bstan ces// de dag la yang sangs rgyas kyi ni snying rje mi zad 'jug/ de bzhin nyid ltar de bzhin nyid du chos rnams thams cad ni// nam mkha' mtshungs 'dra de dag
115a2(dkon brtsegs): ma bcings ma grol rab mkhyen te// 'gro ba dag cing bzang ba'i chos rnams mi shes gzigs nas su// de dag la yang sangs rgyas kyi ni snying rje mi zad 'jug/ de ltar shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de
115a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dang // yid ches rab tu rtogs/ som nyi med/ the tsom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas// nam mkha' lta bur bsam gyis
115a4(dkon brtsegs): mi khyab pa'i phyir ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes skyed do// / bam po bdur ba// yang shA ri'i bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs
115a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtogs pa nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi bar du 'du shes skyer ce na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
115a6(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ 'di dag ste/ chos de dag dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog cing khyu mchog gi gan su zhal gyis 'chi ste/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am
115a7(dkon brtsegs): lha'am bdud dam/ sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par ma bskor ba'i tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di la tsA bri gang gi
115b1(dkon brtsegs): phyir lus kyi 'khrul ba gang las byis pa 'am/ mkhas pa chos dang mthun par rgol bar byed pa'i lus kyi 'khrul ba de bzhin gshegs pa la med do// nga ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
115b2(dkon brtsegs): ni lus kyi las 'khrul pa med pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam mdzes pas kun tu gzigs pa dang / rnam par gzigs pa dang / bskum pa dang / spyang ba dang / ros gos snam sbyar dang
115b3(dkon brtsegs): chos gos dang / lhung bzed bsnams pa dang / mngon du gshegs pa dang / slar gshegs pa dang / byon pa dang / bzhud pa dang / bzhengs pa dang / bzhugs pa dang mamal ba
115b4(dkon brtsegs): dang grong dang grong khyer du 'jug pa dang 'byung ba na zhabs kyi mthil sa la mi reg ste/ 'khor lo rtsibs stong pa las 'byung zhing / dri yid du 'ong ba'i pad+ma mngon par 'byung ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i
115b5(dkon brtsegs): zhabs 'jog go// de la gang dud 'gro'o skye gnas su song ba'i sems can dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la reg na/ de dag zhag bdun du rab tu bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ shi 'phos nas kyang
115b6(dkon brtsegs): bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i skul chos gos sor bzhi tsam gyis mi rig modarnam par 'thor chung gis kyang bzlog par mi nus so//
115b7(dkon brtsegs): sku'i 'od kyis mnar med pa'i bar gyi sems can bde ba'i tshor ba myong bar 'gyur te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la 'khrul pa med ces bya'o// yang shA ri'i bu gang gi phyir ngag 'khrul pa/
116a1(dkon brtsegs): gang las byis pa 'am/ mkhas pa chos dang mthun pas rgol bar byed pa'i ngag gi 'khrul pa de bzhin gshegs pa la med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa
116a2(dkon brtsegs): ni dus su smra ba/ yang dag par smra ba/ bden par smra ba/ tshigs su smra ba/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa'o// shin tu nges pa'i tshig go// sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa'i
116a3(dkon brtsegs): tshig go/ mi zlos pa'i tshig go// don dang yo gas shin tu brgyan pa'i tshig go// skar cog brjod pas sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa tshim par byed pa ste/ de'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan
116a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das rnams kyi ngag gi las 'khrul pa med ces bya'o// ya shA ri'i bu sems 'khrul pa gang las byis pa 'am/ mkhas pa chos dang mthun pas rgol bar byed pa'i sems kyi 'khrul pa
116a5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa la med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni mnyam par gzhag pa'i dngos po mi'i 'dor zhing sangs rgyas kyi bya ba thams cad byed kyang sems der mi
116a6(dkon brtsegs): gtong zhing chos thams cad la de'i chags pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la sems 'khrul pa med ces bya'o// ji ltar de'i sems 'khrul pa med par de ltar sem
116a7(dkon brtsegs): can rnams kyi sems 'khrul pa spang ba'i phyir chos ston te/ de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang po'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu ca cog nga las bdud dam/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu'am/
116b1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan mu stegs can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ba'i na co de bzhin gshegs pa la med do// yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa la tsa co 'am/ rjes su ca co 'byin pa med de/ ra bzhin gshegs pa ni
116b2(dkon brtsegs): rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba dang bral ba ste/ de sems can thams cad kyis bkur sti byas kyang mthos par mi sems/ sems can thams cad kyis bkur sti ma byas kyang 'khrug pa med do//
116b3(dkon brtsegs): gang las 'gyod pa 'am/ rjes su ca co 'byin par 'gyur ba'i bya ba mchog gam/ mthar phyin pa ci'ang de gzhin gshegs pa la med de/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'jig rten dang mi rtsod pas/ de'i phyir
116b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa la ca co med de/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa ste/ nga'i ba med/ 'dzin pa med/ len pa med/ mdud pa thams cad dang bral ba ste/ de phyir de bzhin
116b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa la ca co med do// ji ltar de la tsaco med pa de ltar sems can thams cad kyi ca co thams cad spang ba'i phyir chos ston te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa gnyis pa'o//
116b6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang shA ri'i bu bsnyel ba gang las chos gang la'ang rmongs par 'gyur ba'i bsnyel ba de bzhin gshegs pa la med do// bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang
116b7(dkon brtsegs): snyoms par 'jug pa la thogs pa med cing / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dang / g.yo ba la rnam par lta ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la rmongs pa med do// so sor ci rigs par chos
117a1(dkon brtsegs): smyon pa'i bying kun tu nyams pa med do// 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar la thogs pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i phyir don dang / chos dang / nges pa'i tshigs
117a2(dkon brtsegs): dang spobs pa so so yang dag dag par rig pa la kun tu nyams pa med do// ji ltar bdag kun tu nyams pa med cing 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang // nga ltar thogs pa med pa'i ye shes mthong
117a3(dkon brtsegs): ltar/ sems can thams cad brjed ngas par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa gsum pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa
117a4(dkon brtsegs): la mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i sems mi dmigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'chag gam/ bzhengs sam/ bzhugs sam/ mnal tam/ bshos gsol lam/ gsung ngam/ cang mi nasu
117a5(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur kyang rung ste/ rtag tu mnyam par bzhag cing ting nge 'dzin zab mo dam pa'i mthar phyin pa/ sgrib pa med pa'i bsam gtan la bsam gtan byed pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs
117a6(dkon brtsegs): ma gtogs par sems can gyi ris na/ sems can gang mnyam par bzhag kyang rung / mnyam par mi gzhag kyang rung ste/ su'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems la lta bar nus pa med do//
117a7(dkon brtsegs): ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa de ltar/ ting nge 'dzin la lta bas sems can rnams la chos ston te/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par
117b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhi pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de tha dad pa'i 'du shes gang las sems mi mnyam par gnas par 'gyur ba'i tha dad pa'i 'du shes de bzhin gshegs pa la med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha' bzhin
117b2(dkon brtsegs): zhing mi zad pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la zhing tha dad pa'i 'du shes med do// rang bzhin gyis tha dad pa med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la sems can tha dad pa'i 'du shes med do// chos kyi dbyings dbyer med
117b3(dkon brtsegs): cing mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa'i 'du shes med do// 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos nyid kyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la chos tha dad pa'i 'du shes
117b4(dkon brtsegs): med do// de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i sems can la'ang rjes su chags pa med/ tshul khrims 'chal pa la'ang khong khro ba med/ phan par gyur pa la rang lan du phan 'dogs pa med/
117b5(dkon brtsegs): gnod par gyur pa la'ang gnod par byed pa med/ 'dul bar 'os pa la'ang mnyam pa nyid du ma yin/ log par nges pa'i sems can la'ang smod pa ma yin gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos thams cad
117b6(dkon brtsegs): la mnyam par gnas te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa tha dad pa'i 'du shes med ces bya'o// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la tha dad pa'i 'du shes med pa de ltar/ sems can thams cad kyi tha dad
117b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'du shes spang ba'i phyir chos ston te/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa lnga pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa la so sor ma brtags
118a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i btang snyoms med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms ni lam bsgoms pa yin te/ lam ma bsgoms pa ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang
118a2(dkon brtsegs): snyoms ni sems bsgoms pa dang / tshul khrims bsgoms pa dang / shes rab bsgoms pa'i yin te/ shes rab ma bsgoms pa'i ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms ni ye shes dang
118a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'i yin te/ gti mug dang ldan pa'i ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yin gyi 'jig rten pa'i rnam par ltung ba ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs/
118a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i btang snyoms ni 'phags pa'i nges par 'byung ba yin la/ 'phags pa ma yin pa'i nges par 'byung ba ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms ni tshangs pa'i 'khor lo skor ba ste/ sems can la snying rje//
118a5(dkon brtsegs): dang bral ba ni ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms ni rang gi rang gis grub pa ste/ gnyen po'i rjes su song ba ni ma yin no// yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms de ni mtho ba'ang ma
118a6(dkon brtsegs): yin/ dma' ba'ang ma yin te/ mtho dman med par gnas pa/ mig yo bar gyur pa/ gnyis dang bral ba/ rtog pa dang sel ba las shin tu 'das pa/ rus la lta ba/ dus las ma pho la ga mig yor/
118a7(dkon brtsegs): rlom sems med pa/ ma brtags pa/ rnam par ma brtags pa/ ma bsgoms pa/ bstan du med pa/ yang dag pa/ de kho na/ de bzhin nyid ma nor ba de bzhin nyid/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin/
118b1(dkon brtsegs): de shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni de lta bu'i btang snyoms phun sum tshogs pas/ sems can thams cad btang snyoms yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos ston te/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi
118b2(dkon brtsegs): chos ma 'dres pa drug pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de ba ni na gshegs pa la 'dun pa nyams pa med pa'o// de la 'dun pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa'o//
118b3(dkon brtsegs): de'ang gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa la 'dun pa nyams pa med do// snying rje chen po la 'dun pa nyams pa med do// chos ston pa la 'dun pa nyams pa med do// sems can 'dul ba la
118b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dun pa nyams pa med do// rab tu dben pa la 'dun pa nyams pa med do// byang chub sems dpar yang dag par 'dzud pa la 'dun pa nyams pa med do// dkon mchog gsum rgyun mi gcod pa la kun
118b5(dkon brtsegs): pa nyams pa med do// de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dun pas 'gro ba ma yin gyi/ ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'du pa'o// sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i thams cad makyi/
118b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'dun pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos ston te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bdun pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i brtson 'grus nyams pa med do//
118b7(dkon brtsegs): de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i brtson 'grus ni/ 'di lta ste/ 'dul ba'i sems can yal bar mi 'dor ba'i brtson 'grus dang / chos nyan pa la brnyas pa med pa'i brtson 'grus so//
119a1(dkon brtsegs): gal te de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi sde snod nyan pa/ gang bskal par nyan kyang skyo bar mi 'gyur ba de lta bu bskyes na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'ang chos ston cing zhal zas dang
119a2(dkon brtsegs): bral ba'i rgyud kyis bsgral par yang mi bzhengs so// de bzhin gshegs pa sems can la lta bas tha na gang na sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can gcig gi phyir yang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i
119a3(dkon brtsegs): klung gi bye ma snyed 'da' zhing bzhud de/ de bzhin gshegs pa la lus ngal ba 'am/ ngag ngal ba 'am/ sems ngal ba med do// de bzhin gshegs pa ni lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pa'o//
119a4(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus brtsams pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi bsngags pa gsung ba ste/ brtson 'grus kyis yang dag par rab tu sbyor ba gang gis sems can 'bagos pa'i rnam par
119a5(dkon brtsegs): grol ba thob par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus de sems can rnams la bsngags par mdzad de/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad pa'o//
119a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang shA ri'i gyi bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad kyi thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi tham cad du dran pa nyams pa med cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i dran nga ni bsnyel ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang
119a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas ma thag tu 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi sems can gyi sems kyi rgyud la rnam
119b1(dkon brtsegs): par bltas kyang / de la de bzhin gshegs pa la phyis shin tu dran pa bsnyel ba med do// sems can gyi spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes kyang / de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gyis gtang
119b2(dkon brtsegs): bya ba med do// phung po gsum du rnam par gzhag pa dang / sems can gyi dbang po la 'jug pa dang / sems can gyi bsam par 'jug pa la sems can gyi spyod pa rnam par lta bas de bzhin gshes
119b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dran pa yongs su nyams pa med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dran pa ni dran par bya ba dang / bsam par bya ba dang / brtag par bya ba med kyang / sems can rnams la chos ston pa
119b4(dkon brtsegs): 'bri bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de'i dran pa nyams pa med do// de ji ltar dran pas bdag dran zhing mi brjed pa de bzhin du sems can rnams la chos ston te/ 'dun
119b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i sas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dgu pa'o// gzhan yang shAri'i byung bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med pa'o// kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dan
119b6(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid de/ chos thams cad mi mnyam pa ma yin no// chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin pa'o// ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin las mi nyams she na/ de banan
119b7(dkon brtsegs): nyir gang dang mnyam pa ting nge 'dzin kyang de dang mnyam mo// ting nge 'dzin garang dang mnyam pa de bzhin nyid kyang nga dang mnyam ste/ mnyam pa nyid de la zhugs pas de'i phyir mnyam pa zhes
120a1(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// 'dod chags kyi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa 'dod chags med pa'i mtha' de dang mnyam mo// zhe sdang gi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa zhe sdang med pa'i mtha' yang de dang mnyam mo//
120a2(dkon brtsegs): gti mug gi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa gti mug med pa'i mtha' yang de dang mnyam mo// 'dus byas kyi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa 'dus ma byas kyi mtha' yang de dang mnyam mo// 'dor ba'i mtha'
120a3(dkon brtsegs): gang dang mnyam pa mya ngan lnga 'das pa'i mtha' yang de dang mnyam mo// mnyam pa nyid de la snyoms par zhugs pas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med ces bya'o// de ni'i phyi
120a4(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ mnyam pa nyid mi nyams/ yongs su mi nyams so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin de'ang mig dang ldan pa ma yin/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang ldan pa ma yin
120a5(dkon brtsegs): mod kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po ma tshang ba ma yin no// ting nge 'dzin ni sa'i khams la mi gnas/ chu dang / me dang / rlung gyi khams la mi gnas/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzug
120a6(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i khams la mi gnas/ 'jig rten pha rol la mi gnas te/ mi gnas pas na nyams pa med do// de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med do// sems can thams cad kyis
120a7(dkon brtsegs): kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnyed par bya ba'i phyir chos ston te/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu pa'o// gzhan ya shA ri'i bu de bzhin
120b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i shes rab nyams pa med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab gang zhe na/ gang chos thams cad rab tu shes pa ste/ gzhan gyi cing mi 'jog pa'i shes pa'o// sems can gzhan
120b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag la chos go bar byed pa'i shes pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa mi zad pa la mkhas pa'i shes pa'o// tshig thams cad rab tu byang shes pa'o// tshig gcig la
120b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pas bskal pa brgya stong du mi 'chad par ston pa shes pa'o// ji lta bu ci 'dra zhes dris pa ji lta ba bzhin the tsom gcod pa'i shes pa'o// thams cad ngu thobs pa med pa'i shes pa'o// theg pa
120b4(dkon brtsegs): gsum rnam par dgod pa bstan pa shes pa'o// sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa brgyad khro ba ni stong yongs su shes pa'i shes pa'o// chos kyi phung po brgyad zhi ba'i spyod ci rigs par 'a dag pa
120b5(dkon brtsegs): ston pa shes pa'o// 'di ni shes rab mi zad pa bstan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rangab mtha' yas mu med zad mi shes pa'o// gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab nyams pa med pa de
120b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du sems can rnams kyi shes rab kyang mi zad par bya ba'i phyir chos ston te/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu gcig pa'o// gzhan yang
120b7(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba nyams pa med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba gang zhe na/ nyan thos rnams kyi rnam par grol ba ni sgra'i rjes su 'gro ba'o// rang sangs rgyas
121a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi rnam par grol ba ni rgyan khong du chud pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam par grol ba ni chags pa dang / gnyis su 'dzin pa thams cad dang bral ngas
121a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol ba zhes bya ste/ sngon gyi mtha' yang ma bcings phyi ma'i mtha' yang mi 'pho/ nga lngar byung ba lnga'ang mi gnas so// mig dang gzugs la gnyis su 'dzin pa las rnam par grol ba'o//
121a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du rna ba dang / sma dang / sna dang / dri dang / lce dang / ro dang / lus dang / reg bya la gnyis su 'dzin pa las rnam par grol te/ mi 'dzin / mngon par mi chags par gnas pa'i/
121a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol ba'o// sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba de bzhin du shes pas/ de'i phyir sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
121a5(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas zhes bya'o// ji ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams la chos ston te/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs
121a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu gnyis pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // lus kyi las de
121a7(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa gzigs pas kyang sems can 'dul/ gsung bas kyang sems can 'dul/ cang mi gsung bas kyang sems can 'dul/ bshos gsol bas kyang sems can
121b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dul/ spyod lam gyis kyang sems can 'dul/ mtshan gyis kyang sems can 'dul/ dpe byad bzang pos kyang sems can 'dul/ gtsug tor bltar mi snang ba dang / bltas pa tsam dang /
121b2(dkon brtsegs): 'od gtong ba dang / gom pa 'dor ba dang / 'jog pa dang / grong khyer du 'jug pa dang / 'byung bas kyang sems can 'dul te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyod lam gang gis kyang /
121b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can 'dul bar mi 'gyur ba med do// de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ste/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin
121b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos pa 'dres pa bcu gsum pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bya de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngag gi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su
121b5(dkon brtsegs): 'brang ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni 'bras bu yod pa'i chos ston pa'o// khyad par lung ston pa'o// shin tu nges pa'i tshig smra ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngag
121b6(dkon brtsegs): de'ang kun shes par byed pa/ rnam par shes par byed pa/ mi mtho ba/ mi dma' ba/ ma yo ba/ 'dar 'dar po ma yin pa/ bya gyu med pa/ mi brlang ba/ mi rtsun pa/ gzing
121b7(dkon brtsegs): gzing ba ma yin pa/ mnyen pa/ yid du 'ong ba ma 'chal ba lag log med pa mi 'tshe ba/ mi myur ba/ rab tu myur ba ma yin pa/ shin tu rnam par phye ba shin tu nges
122a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshig/ rab tu mnyen pa/ shin tu snyan pa/ dbyangs snyan pa/ rab tu gsal ba bsngags pa/ nges pa/ 'jam pa/ phan pa dang bcas pa/ dga' bar 'gyur ba/
122a2(dkon brtsegs): mchod par 'gyur ba/ mdzes pa/ rdul med pa/ rdul dang bral ba/ tha ba med pa/ dri ma med pa/ ma rmongs pa/ gsal ba/ thogs pa med pa/ yang dag par sbyor ba/ 'od gsal ba/
122a3(dkon brtsegs): drang ba/ 'jungs pa ma yin pa/ dum bu ma yin/ dag dag po ma yin pa/ bde ba skyed pa/ lus sim par byed pa/ sems tshim par byed pa/ 'dod chags zhi bar byed pa
122a4(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang zhi bar byed pa/ gti mug sel ba/ bdud 'jom pa/ sdig pa sel ba/ rgol ba 'dul ba/ go bar byed pa/ rnga'i sgra la mkhas pa/ dga' bar byed pa/ ka la bing ka'i
122a5(dkon brtsegs): sgra dbyangs/ dbang po'i sgra/ tshangs pa'i sgra/ rgya mtsho'i rlabs kyi sgra/ sprin gyi sgra/ sa'i sgra dbyangs/ khrung khrung gi sgra rma bya'i sgra/ khu byug gi sgra/ shang shang te'u sgra
122a6(dkon brtsegs): rang pa'i sgra skad/ ri dgas kyi rgyal po'i sgra/ khong tu dang / bi wang dang / 'khrur rA dang / dung dang / sil snyan rab tu bsgrags pa'i sgra kun shes par 'gyur ba/ rnam par shes pa
122a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba/ zur phyin pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ mnyan par 'os pa/ zab pa/ lkugs shing rig pa ma yin pa/ bde ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ tshig dang yi ge ma nyams gshin tu nges par
122b1(dkon brtsegs): smra ba/ tshig 'bru dang don gyi tshig dang ldan pa/ chos kyi tshig dang ldan pa/ dus dang ldan pa/ tshod dang ldan pa/ dus las mi 'da' ba/ dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin par shes pas
122b2(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa/ skyon pas brgyan pa/ tshul khrims kyis sbyangs pa/ bzod pas bsgrubs pa/ brtson 'grus kyis 'bar bar byas pa/ bsam gtan gyis yid du 'ong bar byas pa/ shes
122b3(dkon brtsegs): rab kyis nges par brtags pa/ byams pas shin tu bsags pa/ snying rjes mi skyo ba/ dga' bas 'od gsal ba/ btang snyoms nges par brtags pa/ theg pa gsum rnam par
122b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jog pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi gcod pa/ phung po gsum 'jog pa/ rnam par thar pa gsum sbyong ba/ bden pa yongs su bsgoms pa/ ye shes yongs su bsgoms pa/
122b5(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pas ma smad pa/ 'phags pas bstod pa/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i rjes su song pa/ rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'o// shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngag ni de
122b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dra ste/ de lta bur de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngag gi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ste/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos
122b7(dkon brtsegs): ma 'dres pa bcu bzhi pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rdzas su 'brang ba'o// de ci'i phyir
123a1(dkon brtsegs): zhe na de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems kyis brjod pa ma yid/ yid kyis ma yin/ rnam par shes pas ma yin gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni ye shes kyis rab
123a2(dkon brtsegs): phye ba ste/ ye shes kyi dbang du gyur pa'o// gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes de'ang sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rjes su song ba'o// sems can thams cad kyi yid kyi rjes su zhugs/
123a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi rnam par shes pa la las rab tu dben pa'o// chos thams cad la nges par sems pa'o// ting nge 'dzin thams cad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'o//
123a4(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa las shin tu 'das pa'o// rkyen las skye ba dang bral ba'o// srid pa gsum gyi 'gro ba sel ba'o// nga rgyal gyi rnam pa thams cad las shin tu 'das pa'o// bdud kyi las thams
123a5(dkon brtsegs): cad las nges par grol ba'o// sgyu dang g.yo thams cad dang bral ba'o// ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yor 'dzin pa spangs pa'o// ma rig pa dang / gti mug gi mun pa dang / ling tog med pa'o//
123a6(dkon brtsegs): lam gyi yan lag shin tu yongs su bsgoms pa'o// nam mkha' dang mtshungs shing rnam par mi rtog pa'o// chos kyi dbyings dang dbyer med pa ste/ shA ri'i bu de lta bu ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes
123a7(dkon brtsegs): sngon du 'gro ba'i yid kyi 'as so// shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhir gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco lnga pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu 'das pa'i dus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i/
123b1(dkon brtsegs): ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa'o// ji ltar 'jug ce na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing byung ba dang / ma byung ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bgrang ba'i tshul
123b2(dkon brtsegs): gyis de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par mkhyen to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed pa de'i rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal byung ba de dag thams cad rab tu mkhyen to//
123b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed pa de'i sems can gyi tshogs sems can du btags pa byung ba de dag thams cad rab tu mkhyen to// de dag na sems can sna tshogs byung ba ji snyed pa bzug tha dad
123b4(dkon brtsegs): pa la sogs pa rgyas par bya ste/ sangs rgyas byung ba ji snyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa re res chos bstan cir brjod pa ji snyed pa'ang gong ma bzhin du sbyar ro// sems can ji snyed nyan thos kyi theg pas
123b5(dkon brtsegs): btul ba dang / ji snyed cig rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas btul ba'ang gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par phye ba'ang rab tu mkhyen to// dge slong gi dge 'dun rnam par phye ba dang / tshe'i tshad rnam
123b6(dkon brtsegs): bar phye ba'ang rab tu mkhyen to// ches gnas pa rnam par phye ba'ang rab tu mkhyen to// dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba'ang rab tu mkhyen to// zas kyi mchog gi longs spyod kyang rab tu mkhyen to// sems can
123b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi 'das pa'i rnam pa dang / shi 'bo dang / skye ba'ang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// dbang po tha dad pa dang / spyod pa tha dad pa dang / bsam pa tha dad pa'ang rab tu mkhyen
124a1(dkon brtsegs): to// sems kyi rgyud kyang rab tu mkhyen to// sems gang gi 'og tu sems gang 'byung ba de dag thams cad kyang bgrang ba'i tshul gyis mngon sum gyi ye shes dang / rjes su
124a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba'i ye shes kyis rab tu mkhyen to// de bzhin gshegs pa la 'das par gtong ba'i sems kyi rgyud kyang mi dmigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pas sems
124a3(dkon brtsegs): can gyi bsam pa la nyams pa med par chos ston te/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu drug pa'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu ma 'ongs
124a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dus la de bzhin gshegs pa ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug go// ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa gang dag 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / 'byung bar 'gyur ba
124a5(dkon brtsegs): dang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba tha dad pa de dag kyang rab tu mkhyen to// bskal pa tshig par 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / chus sdud par 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / rlung gis sdud par 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang
124a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gnas par 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sa'i khams ji snyed pa dang / rdul phra rab ji snyed pa dang / rtswa dang / shing ge la ba dang / sman dang / nags
124a7(dkon brtsegs): tshal ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / skar ma'i gzugs ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'byam re ren sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /
124b1(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas ji snyed 'byung 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / zas kyi longs spyod dang / dbugs kyi nang du
124b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyu ba dang / 'chag pa dang / 'dug pa dang / spyod lam ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rab 'byam re re las sems can ji snyed nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ra
124b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi theg pas rnam par thar par 'gyur ba dang / sems can ji snyed theg pa chen pos rnam pa 'a ba 'gyung ba de dag thams cad kyang de bani na gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// sangs
124b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing rab 'byam re re na sems can skye ba'i gnas ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / sems dang sems las 'byung ba skye ba dang / skye bar 'gyur ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin
124b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'ongs po'i sems kyi rgyud bskol par 'gyur ba ma yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma'o
124b6(dkon brtsegs): pa la gzigs pas sems can rnams la chos ston te/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu bdun po'o// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu da ltar gyi
124b7(dkon brtsegs): dus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug go/ ji ltar 'jug ce na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa da ltar gyi phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
125a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad bgrang ba'i tshul rnam pa gsum gyis rab tu mkhyen to// da ltar gyi chos thams cad rab tu mkhyen to// da ltar gyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang de bzhin
125a2(dkon brtsegs): dur ltar gyi nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang rab tu mkhyen to// da ltar gyi skar ma'i gzugs thams cad kyang rab tu mkhyen to// da ltar gyi rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang /
125a3(dkon brtsegs): nags tshal thams cad kyang rab tu mkhyen to// da ltar gyi phyogs bcu'i sa'i khams rdul phra rab kyi rdul gyi char grags pa thams cad kyang bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu mkhyen to// phyogs bcu'i
125a4(dkon brtsegs): chu'i khams skra'i rtse mos blangs pa'i thigs pa thams cad kyang bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu mkhyen to// phyogs bcu'i me'i khams kyi 'ong 'phro ba skyes pa dang / 'gags pa thams cad kyang
125a5(dkon brtsegs): bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu mkhyen to// phyogs bcu'i rlung gi khams thams cad kyang gzugs kyi khams bsgrub pa bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu mkhyen to// phyogs bcu'i nam mapa'i khams thams
125a6(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyis bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu mkhyen to// da ltar gyi sems can gyi khams rnam pa gsum yang rab tu mkhyen to// da ltar gyi sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can
125a7(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams kyang rab tu mkhyen to// de'i skye ba'i rgyu'ang rab tu mkhyen to// ldang ba'i rgyu nga rab tu mkhyen to// da ltar gyi dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems can gyi khams kyang rab tu mkhyen to//
125b1(dkon brtsegs): ro'i skye ba'i rgyu' rab tu mkhyen to// ldang nga'i rgyu rab tu mkhyen to// ra ltar gyigashin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can gyi khams kyang rab tu mkhyen to// de'i skye ba'i rgyu'ang rab tu mkhyen no/
125b2(dkon brtsegs): ldang ba'i chu'ang rab tu mkhyen to// da ltar gyi mo'i sems can gyi khams kyang rab tu mkhyen to// de'i skye ba'i myur du rab tu mkhyen to// da ltar gyi lha'i sems can gyi khams kyang rab tu mkhyen
125b3(dkon brtsegs): to// de'i skye ba'i rgyu'ang rab tu mkhyen to// da ltar gyi sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud kyang rab tu mkhyen to// de dag gi nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'ang rab tu mkhyen to// nyon
125b4(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa dang bral ba'ang rab tu mkhyen to// da ltar gyi sems can thams cad kyi 'dul ba'i dbang lo'ang rab tu mkhyen to// 'dul ba ma yin pa'i dbang po'ang rab tu mkhyen to// de ltar
125b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la gnyis kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i rnam par shes pa med de/ gnyis su med pa la gzhugs pa'i phyir sems can rnams la chos
125b6(dkon brtsegs): ston te shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad pa'o// shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po de gdang ldan pas / de bzhin
125b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams ma lus pa thams cad du 'khor gyi nang du gzi brjid dang / grags pa dang / dpal dang / ngo mtshar dang / rma du byung ba'i chos
126a1(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyis 'khor rnams zil gyis min nas/ l+h+wam me/ lhun ne/ lhang nge'o// de ltar shA 'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mtha'
126a2(dkon brtsegs): las mu med do// 'di lta ste/ shA ri'i bu nam mkha' mtha' yas mu med pa de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'ang mtha' las mu med do// gang de bzhin
126a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi mtha' 'dod pa de ni nam mkha'i mtha' 'dod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
126a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dres pa de dag thos nas mngon par dad / yid ches rab tu rtogs som nyi mi byed/ the tsom mi ba/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed cing nam mkha' lta bur bsam
126a5(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs pas don 'di bka' stsal nas/ ston pa yang 'di skad gsung ngo // 'dren
126a6(dkon brtsegs): pa la ni 'khrul pa yod med de/ lus dang ngag rnams dang ni sems mig yo// de bzhin srog chags rnams la chos ston te/ de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/ khengs par mi gyur
126a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dud par mi 'gyur te/ khong lo rjes su chags las mngon par 'das// nyon mongs mer la gnas shing nyon mongs gro'o// nga ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/ 'dren pa'i dran pa bsnyel ba
126b1(dkon brtsegs): med/ rnam thar spyod yul chos ni mngon par mkhyen// so so yang dag rig pa bsnyel med de// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos mnyam par bzhag pas bzhugs shing bshos kyang gsog/
126b2(dkon brtsegs): 'chag dang mnal ba na yang mnyam par bzhag g.yeng ba med cing sems can 'du shes med// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/ rgyal ba dang mi zhing dang sems can la/ tha dad
126b3(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes bde bar gshegs la med/ bsam pa chen po mnyam pa nyid lag nas// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// de dag la ni ma brtags btang snyoms med/ shin tu nges pa'i
126b4(dkon brtsegs): lam ni rab bsgoms pas// de la tog dang rnam par rtog med de// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// dge ba la ni 'dun pa nyams pa med// ston pa rtag tu snying rje rab sbyor zhing // sems can
126b5(dkon brtsegs): rgya chen dpag tu med pa 'dul// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// nam yang brtson 'grus la ni nyams pa med// 'dul ba mtha' dang pha rol med mthong nas// lus dang ngag rnams dang ni yid kyi
126b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dul// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// byang chub snying por sangs rgyas byang chub par// de yi dran pa rnam par chud mi za// gang chos rtogs pa de ni rtogs bya min// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi
126b7(dkon brtsegs): ma 'dres chos// rtog pa med cing rnam par rtog med par// rang byung ting nge 'dzin la mnyam gnas kyang // chos rnams kun la mi gnas bsam gtan byed// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos//
127a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin papa shes rab kyis ni rab ston cing // sems can dun gyi spyong par bas khyed te// dag lan pasams padzin chos kyangs ma ngan rgyal ba rnams kyis 'dum
127a2(dkon brtsegs): chos/ nyan thos rnams kyi rnam grol sgra phyir 'gro// rang rgyal gyin rkyen gyi 'du shes te// sangs rgyas rnams kyi btang snyoms pasam mi khyab// chags las rab 'das dri med nam mkha' bzhin/
127a3(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi rgyud 'di rang bzhin rnam grol to// sems ni sngon nas bcings par gyur pa med/ ji ltar rnam grol de ltar chos ston te// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/ gshegs dang
127a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs dang grong khyer 'jug pa dang // spyod la mdag ni mthong na mig kyang 'phrog/ sangs rgyas rnams ni dpe byad bzang po dang // mtshan dang 'od rnams thams cad 'dul bar zhugs/
127a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can snying po nam zhig 'od gtong tshe// srog chags bye ba mang po bder 'gyur te/ 'od kyis reg pa dag ni 'dul bar 'gyur// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// rang byung ba ni gsung
127a6(dkon brtsegs): gcig brjod pas na// sems can bsam pa bzhin du gsung thos te// zag cha lta zar de yi gsung yang thos// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// ye shes kyis ni 'dren pa'i las byas
127a7(dkon brtsegs): te/ bde bar gshegs la sems las cung zad de// sems can bas ma la ye shes rjes su zhugs// don rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// ting 'dzin bsam gtan dang ni rab ldan te/ smom
127b1(dkon brtsegs): ba thams cad kyi yang rgyab med/ nam mkha' wA zar mnyam pa nyid du gnasade ni rgyal ba rnams kyis 'dres chos/ 'das pa dus 'an
127b2(dkon brtsegs): zhugs// 'gro ba sna tshogs rnam 'byung shes pa mo// chos rnams kun la slob pa med par 'jug/ de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// ma 'ongs dus na gang dag 'jig rten du// 'byung bar 'gyur dang 'byung bar mi 'gyung
127b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / sems can zhing dang rgyal ba bshad pa dang // de dag thams cad sangs rgyas ma lus mkhyen/ ma 'ongs de la rjes su rab lta zhing // de bzhin sems can rnams kyi chos kyang mkhyen//
127b4(dkon brtsegs): de yi sems ni g.yeng bar mi 'gyur te// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// da ltar lam gang 'jug par 'gyur ba dag/ thams cad rgyal bas chags med rab tu mkhyen// 'dren pa'i
127b5(dkon brtsegs): spyod yul nam mkha' lta bu ste// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos ni ma 'dres pa/ bco brgyad gsungs pa bsam gyis mi khyab ste// de bzhin gshegs pa
127b6(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' 'dra bar ni// dad mkhas byang chub sems dpa' dad par byed// shA ri'i bu 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad de// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag dang ldan pas/
127b7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor gyi nang du gshegs na ser ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog cing khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyis 'che ste// dge sbyong ngam
128a1(dkon brtsegs): bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par ma bskor ba'i tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro// shA ri'i bu de ltar dad pa
128a2(dkon brtsegs): la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di bcus/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par dang / yid ches rab tu rtogs/ som nyi mi byed/ the tsom mi za/ rgya cher dga'
128a3(dkon brtsegs): mgu ste rangs pa rnyed cing / ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes skyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// bam po brgyad pa
128a4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de ltar dad pa la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi snod du rig/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam
128a5(dkon brtsegs): grangs kyi snod du rig sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du rig nas/ de'i drung du gshegs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam yang dag par rab tu ston to// de lta bas na shA ri'i phyi rnam grangs
128a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dis kyang de ltar dad pa la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi snod du rig/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi snod du rig
128a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du rig nas/ de'i drung ngu gshegs te/ byang chub kyi lam yang dag par rab tu ston par de ltar rig par bya'o// shA ri'i du sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/
128b1(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa grangs med pa bas kyang ches grangs med pa/ yangs pa/ tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
128b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas phung po chen po zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams
128b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/ gang 'di ltar bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / bdud du bcas pa dang / tshangs par bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas
128b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas gnas so// de chos ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa/
128b5(dkon brtsegs): thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba/ yang dag par rab tu
128b6(dkon brtsegs): ston to// shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phung po chen po'i nyan thos khrag khrig phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi nyan thos kyi tshogs chen po byung ste/
128b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa bad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ sems thams cad kyi dbang dam pa'i pha rol du son pa sha stag go/ shA ri'i bu de'i dus na rgyal po chem
129a1(dkon brtsegs): bar rgyal ba zhes bya ba chos can chos kyi rgyal po zhig byung ngo // yang shA ri'i bu rgyal po che rnam par rgyal ba'i grong khyer rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba rgyal po'i gnas
129a2(dkon brtsegs): 'byor pa/ mod pa/ 'deb/ lo legs pa/ dga' nga/ 'gro ba mang po dang / mis gang bzhig yod de/ pad shA ri'i bu rgyal po che rnam par rgyal ba'i khye'u gzhon nu brtson
129a3(dkon brtsegs): 'grus spyod pa zhes bya ba sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya skyong la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ gzugs babang ba
129a4(dkon brtsegs): mdzes pa/ bstan sdug pa/ mdog bzang zhing rgyas pa'i mchog dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ yang shA ri'i bu re'i rus na gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod btsun mo'i 'khor dang lhan cig tu skyed mos tshag
129a5(dkon brtsegs): gyi sar byung bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phung po chen pos/ e ma'o gzhon nu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sde sngo
129a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos kyirna mtshungs kyi snod do// e mdo gnon nu brtson 'bras spyod 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod do zhes de ltar riganas/ skyed chos tshal gyis gal ba dang / bzhon nu bcom
129a7(dkon brtsegs): spyod ga la ba der song ste rkyen nas/ steng gi nam ma'a' la bzhugs te/ gzhon du brtson 'grus sngo la byang chub kyi lam yang dag pa rab tu stor to// de la byang chub kyi lam gag na/ 'di lta ma/
129b1(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad la byams pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams kyi rjes su 'jug pa ste/ da ni byang chub kyi lam zhes bya'o// del sems
129b2(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad la byams pa gang zhe na/ 'di la gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' la ni sems can gyi khams ji tsam pa de tsam du byams pas khyab par byed do// sems can gyi khams ji tsam nan/
129b3(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha'i khams ji tsam pa sems can gyi khams kyang de tsam mo// gzhon nu 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha'i khams 'dis khyab par ma gyur pa gang yang med do// gnom du de bzhin du byang chub
129b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i byams pa 'dis sems can gyi ris na gang khyab par ma gyur pa'i sems can de gang yang med do// 'di lta ste/ gzhon nu sems can gyi khams dpag tu med pa de bzhin du / gnon nu
129b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa bsgom pa'ang dpag tu med do// gzhon nu de ltar nam mkha' mtha' yas pas sems can mtha' yas/ sems can mtha' yas pas byams pa mtha' yas so// gnon
129b6(dkon brtsegs): nu yang sems can gyi khams ni ches mang gi/ sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gyi khams ni de lta ma yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang gzhon du sems can gyi khams tshad med pa/
129b7(dkon brtsegs): ji tsam pa de'i don shes par bya ba'i phyir dpe bston to// gzhon nu 'di lta ste/ dper na shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klu'i gi bye ma snyed dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / de bzhin du phyogs
130a1(dkon brtsegs): mtshams dang / phyogs bcu kun tu 'jig rten gyi khams gan+d+ha'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang mnyam par de dag thams cad chus yongs su gang ba'i rgya mtshor gyur pa'i rgya mtshochen po
130a2(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu gyur pa la yongs su brtag pa bzung ste/ de la sems cad gad+ma'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'dus nas/ brgyar brtsal ba'i skra'i rtse mos chu'i thigs pa gcig blangs/ gzhan yang sems can ga
130a3(dkon brtsegs): klung gi bye ma snyed 'dus nas brgyar brtsal ba'i skra'i rtse mos chu'i thigs pa gnyis pa blangs/ gzhan yang sems can gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'dus nas/ brgyar brtsal ba'i skra'i rtse mos chu'i
130a4(dkon brtsegs): thogs pa gsum pa blangs na/ gzhon nu yongs su brtag pa bzung ste/ de lta bu'i thabs kyis chu'i phung po chen po dazar par gyur kyang / sems can gyi khams ni tshad dang mtha' med de/ gnon nu
130a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can gyi khams de ltar dpag tu med cing de ltar mtha' yas pa de thams cad la byang chub sems dpa'i byams pas khyab par byed do// gzhon nu de ji snyam du sems/ gang de ltar dpag tu med
130a6(dkon brtsegs): par byams bsgom pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i tshad gzung bar nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de ma lags so// gnon nu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sem
130a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po rnams kyi byams pa chen po sgom pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ni dpag tu med pa yin te/ gzhon nu de'i byams pa ni bdag srung ba yin te/ gzhan la phan par gnas pa yin/ mchog tu gnod sems
130b1(dkon brtsegs): med pa/ khro ba dang gnod sems kyi tha ba dang bral ba/ nyen pa 'jom pa/ rjes su chags pa'i kun nas ldang ba dang bral ba/ dad pa kun tu ston pa/ 'khrul pa thams cad la nyes par lta ba
130b2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su gdung ba med pa/ lus dang / ngag dang / sems bde ba skyed pa/ gzhan gyis gnod par bya ba thams cad du ma lhung ba/ 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral ba/ 'phags pa'i lam dang
130b3(dkon brtsegs): mthur pa/ gshe ba dang khros pa la dang bskyed pa/ g.yul thams cad las sgrol ba/ dbyig pa dang mtshon cha mi thogs pa/ sems can rab tu thar par bya ba la dga'ar/ khong khro ba thams cad dang
130b4(dkon brtsegs): bral ba/ tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gsag dang / 'drid pa dang / gzhog slongs thams cad dang bral ba/ rang gi rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshogs su bcad pas nye bar 'tsho ba/ brgya byin
130b5(dkon brtsegs): dang tshangs pas phyag byas pa/ rang gi gzi brjid kyis brgyan pa/ mkhas pas bstod pa/ byis pa thams cad rjes su srung ba/ tshangs pa'i lam dang mthun pa/ 'dod pa'i khams dang
130b6(dkon brtsegs): ma 'dres pa/ thar pa'i lam gyi gtso bor gyur pa/ theg pa thams cad kyis yang dag par bzung ba/ zang zing med pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa/ rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya
130b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dngos po thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa/ mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang pos yang dag par brgyad pa/ dbang po nyams shing ma tshang ba thams cad spangs pa/ bde 'gro dang
131a1(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'da' ba'i lam thams cad du 'gro ba/ ngan song thams cad dang mi khom pa brgyad las bzlog pa/ chos kyi kun dga' la dga' zhing mos pa/ 'dod pa'i longs
131a2(dkon brtsegs): spyod thams cad dang / dbang po dang / rgyal srid la mngon par mi dga' ba/ sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa rab tu sbyor ba/ tha dad pa'i 'du shes dang bral ba/ tshul
131a3(dkon brtsegs): khrims dang bslab pa thams cad kyi sgo dang lam/ tshul khrims 'chal pa thams cad kyi skyabs/ bzod pa'i stobs kun tu ston pa/ nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa thams cad dang
131a4(dkon brtsegs): bral ba/ mi 'khrugs pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa/ yang dag par sbyor ba'i bya ba sgrol ba/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i rtsa ba nyon mongs
131a5(dkon brtsegs): pa las byung ba/ sems nges par rtog pa/ thos pa 'dzin pas shes rab kyi rgyu skyed pa'i byams pa/ bdag gi phyogs dang gzhan gyi phyogs 'joms pa/ bdud dang nyon mongs pa'i phyogs sel ba/
131a6(dkon brtsegs): 'grogs na bde ba/ sdang ba dang / slong ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba'i spyod lam srung bar byed pa/ rgod pa'i rang bzhin yid la byed pa thams cad sel ba/ dri zhim pos
131a7(dkon brtsegs): byugs pa/ khrel yod pa dang ngo tsha shes pas rmugs la/ mi khom pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / ngan 'gro thams cad sel ba'i byams pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad skyob pa'i byams pa chen
131b1(dkon brtsegs): po/ bdag gi bde ba btang ba/ sems can thams cad la bde ba rab tu sbyin pa ste/ gzhon nu nyan thos rnams kyi byams pa ni bdag skyob pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa
131b2(dkon brtsegs): ni sems can thams cad la skyob pa'o// yang gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa rnams kyi byams pa ni sems can la dmigs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' spyod
131b3(dkon brtsegs): pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi byams pa ni chos la dmigs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' bzong po rab tu thob pa rnams kyi byams pa ni dmigs pa med pa'o// gzhon nu 'di ni byang chubs
131b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byams pa zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa de la rab tu gnas pas sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed do//
131b5(dkon brtsegs): la gzhon du byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po gang zhe na/ gzhon nu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa'i sngon du 'gro ba ni snying rje chen
131b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ dper na gzhon nu skyes bu'i srog gi dbang po'i sngon du 'gro ba ni dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub pa'o// gzhon nu de bzhin du theg pa chen po yang dag par sgrub pa'i byang chub
131b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i sngon du 'gro ba ni snyi rdo rje chen po'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na gzhon nu 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i rin po che thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro ba ni 'khor lo rin po che yin no//
132a1(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro ba ni snying rje chen po yin te/ snying rje chen po de'ang sems can
132a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rjes su mi gtong ba'o// gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po sems can thams cad la ji ltar 'jug ce na/ gzhon nu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas 'jig tshogs
132a3(dkon brtsegs): la lta bas bcings shing lta bar gyur pa/ rnam pa mang po la chags pa'i sems can dag mthong na/ de dag gis 'jig tshogs la lta bas bcings pa spang ba'i phyir chos bstan to zhes/ sems can/
132a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// gzhan yang gzhon nu byang chub sems dpas sems can yang dag pa ma yin pa/ phyin ci log gi gnas la gnas te/ mi
132a5(dkon brtsegs): rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa dang / sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes pa dang / bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes pa mthong na/ de dag gi yang
132a6(dkon brtsegs): dag pa ma yin pa'i phyin ci log spang ba'i phyir chos bstan to zhes/ sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ gzhan yang gzhon nu byang chub sems dpas
132a7(dkon brtsegs): phyin ci log gi 'dod pa la sred pa'i sems can de dag/ ma la'ang g.yem pa dang / sring mo la'ang g.yem pa mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma'o 'jig rten gnas
132b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang da ni bags pa ma yin pa 'dus pa sa/ mthor ldabs 'angs su gang nong ba mashes pas yongs ma ga // 'di 'a ba rnamam par byen ma dun smra nyid kyimangs byin
132b2(dkon brtsegs): nas byung la/ de nyid dang lhan cig tu 'dod bsnyen par byed pa lha ga la srid/ mngal gcig na lhan cig tu 'dug 'dug pa'i sring mo dang 'dradu zhing khrig par byed pa lhag la srid de/ kye ma'o sems
132b3(dkon brtsegs): can 'di dag ni brlag go// rnam par brlag go// rab tu brlag go// 'dod chags kyis g.yen spro'o// zhe sdang gis g.yen spyo'o// gti mug gis g.yon spyo'o// mi shes pas g.yen spyo'o//
132b4(dkon brtsegs): chos las nyams shing chos ma yin pa la gnas so// mi mthun pa'i chos la rab tu spyod ngo // sems can dmyal ba spyod yul ba'o// 'dud 'gro'i skye gnas spyod phul ba'o// gshin rje'i 'jig
132b5(dkon brtsegs): rten spyod yul ba'o// log pa'i lam la spyod yul pa'o snyam mo// gzhon nu 'di lta ste/ dper ne wa dur khrod kyi mthar g.yang sa chen po dang nye ba zhig ni mtshan mo khyis gtses nas/ g.yang sa
132b6(dkon brtsegs): chen po nas lhung ba de bzhin du/ gzhon nu sems can 'di dag kyang wa dang 'dra'o// gzhon nu 'di lta ste/ dper na dmus long khyis gtses na g.yangs chen po dang nye ba 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ kye ma'o
132b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu sems can 'di dag kyang dmus long dang 'dra'o// gzhon nu 'di lta ste/ dper na phag ni mi gtsang ba za zhing mi gtsang ba la spyod phul ba ste/ gzhon nu kye ma'o de bzhin du sems can 'di
133a1(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang ngag dang 'dra ste de nyid pa yin/ de nyid sring mo yin na/ de chung mar bya ba lta ga la srid snyam ste/ sems can nyon mongs pas g.yen spro ba dang / bdud kyi phyogs kyi
133a2(dkon brtsegs): spyod yul ba dang / bdud kyi zhags pas bcings pa dang / 'dod pa'i lam du bying ba de dag gi 'dod pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir/ chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i
133a3(dkon brtsegs): snying rje chen po 'drug so gnon nu gnan yang byang chub sems rapas sgrib pa lngas bsgribs pa'i sems can 'dod pa'i chug rngus zug pa mthong na/ skye mched drug la chags shing zhen pa/
133a4(dkon brtsegs): mig gis gzugs mthong na mtshan mar 'dzin par 'gyur zhing mngon rtags su 'dzin pa dang / rna bas s+tha/ sras dri/ skyes ro// lus kyis reg pa la rag nas mtshan mar 'dzin cing mngon rtags
133a5(dkon brtsegs): su 'dzin par 'gyur te/ kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni khong khro ba mar zhing phan tshun mi mdza' ste/ de dag don rnyed pa'i phyir ni mdza' bor yang mi shes/ gnod par 'gyur ba'i phyir ni gcig la gcig gsod do/
133a6(dkon brtsegs): kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni gnyid dang rmugs pa mngang ste/ zhan cing bor la mi shes pa'i ling tog gis khengs shing mi dge ba'o// kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni 'gyod pas kun nas
133a7(dkon brtsegs): bskor ba ste/ mo bur gyi nyon mongs pas sems kun nas nyon mongs pa'o// kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni the tshom gyis yongs su dkris pa/ chos zab mo la nges par mgyur ba ste/ de dag
133b1(dkon brtsegs): gi sgrib pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// gnor nu gnan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems can
133b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal gyis non pa/ che ba'i da rgyal gyis non pa/ nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal gyis non pa/ nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal gyis nan pa/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis non pa/ cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal gyis non
133b3(dkon brtsegs): ba log pa'i nga rgyal gyis non pa/ dma' babs bdag mtho bar sems pa/ mtshungs pa bas kyang bdag ches lhag par lta ba de dag gzugs la bdag ces khas len pa nas rnam par shes
133b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bar la bdag ces khas len pa/ khong du ma chud pa khong du chud sam du shes pa/ gus par smra bar 'os pa la gus par mi smra ba/ phyag bya bar 'os pa la phyag mi 'tshal ba/ rgan pa dang gnon pa
133b5(dkon brtsegs): la mi 'dud pa/ bla ma la rim gro mi byed pa/ mkhas pa la dge ba gang / mi dge ba ga rA / bsten par bya ba gang / bsten par mi bya ba gang / bya ba gang mi bya ba ga ra kha na
133b6(dkon brtsegs): mtho ba dang bcas pa gang / kha na mtho ba med pa gang / lam gang / ting nge 'dzin gang / rnam par grol ba gang zhes mi 'dre ba dang / bdag nyid la bdag ni gtso bo/ bdag ni mchog go/
133b7(dkon brtsegs): snyam du rlom sems su byed pa mthong na/ 'di ltar nga rgyal gyi rnam pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/
134a1(dkon brtsegs): gnon nu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas sred pa'i bcings pas bcings pa/ sred pas 'khol dwa/ rgyu ma dang / rnga mo dang / bu mos zin pa/ gnod pas zin pa/
134a2(dkon brtsegs): don med pas zin pa/ 'khor ba'i gtan pas zin pa/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyis zin pa/ srid pa'i bcing bas zin pa
134a3(dkon brtsegs): rang nyam med pa/ rang dbang med pa'i sems can mthong na/ de dag rang nyam dang / rang dbang dang / gang du dga' bar 'gro ba dang mya ngan las 'das par 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir
134a4(dkon brtsegs): chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug gzhon nu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral ba/
134a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i grogs pos 'khor ba de dag sdig pa'i grogs bos non pas mi dge ba'i lam la chags pa 'di lta ste/ srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa dang /
134a6(dkon brtsegs): brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / ngag rtsub po dang / tshig bkyal pa dang / brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba'i sems can mthong na/ 'di ltar dge ba'i bshes
134a7(dkon brtsegs): gnyen bslu ba dang / mi dge ba'i las las bzlog pa dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par bzung ste/ spyod par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems
134b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' snying rjenan po 'jug go gzhon du gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas gti mug gis bslabs pa/ ma rig pa'i mun pa mu gnag gi ling tog gis kun thu bsrings b+ha
134b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / skye ba po dang / shed las skyes pa dang / shed bu dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / ngar 'dzin pa dang /
134b3(dkon brtsegs): nga yir 'dzin pa la mngon par chags pa'i sems can mthong na/ de dag 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi mig rnam par sbyang zhing / lta bar gyur pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir chos bstan to zhes sems can
134b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ gzhon nu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas 'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can mthong na de dag phung
134b5(dkon brtsegs): po lnga'i gshed ma las rab tu thar bar bya ba dang / 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa las rab tu bzla ba dang / khams gsum thams cad las gdon pa'i phyir chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la
134b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go gzhon nu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas sems can 'khrugs par gyur pa/ rtswa mun dza dang / bal ba dza lta bu mi drar ba
134b7(dkon brtsegs): drang ba ltar 'chos pa/ 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu/ 'jig rten pha rol nas 'jig rten 'dir kun tu rgyug cing 'khor ba/ 'gro ba lngar 'gro ba la phyogs pa/ mya ngan las 'das
135a1(dkon brtsegs): par 'gro ba la phyir bltas pa mthong na/ de dag gi mya ngan las 'da' ba'i sgo dbye ba'i phyir chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug
135a2(dkon brtsegs): go gzhon nu de ltar byang chub sems dpas sems can gyi khams mthong na/ rnam pa bcu po 'di dag gis snying rje chen po 'jug go// bsam pa las byung ba'i phyir de'i snying
135a3(dkon brtsegs): chen po re'ang g.yo med par 'jug go// lhag pa'i bsam pa las shin tu byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de'ang mnyam par 'jug go// lam las byung ba'i phyi ri de'i phyir de'i snying rje chen
135a4(dkon brtsegs): de'ang drang po bcos ma ma yin par 'jug go// sems gya gyu med pa'i sems la shin tu gnas pa las byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de'ang bya gyu med par 'jug go// 'di lta ste/ sems na/
135a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la 'dud pa dang / phyag 'tshal ba las shin tu byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de'ang bdag gi bde ba gtong bar 'jug go// 'di lta ste/ bdag gi sems yongs su dag pa las byung ba'i phyir
135a6(dkon brtsegs): de'i snying chen po de'ang pha rol rjes su bsrung bar 'jug go// 'di lta ste/ g.yo zhing 'gul ba'i sems dang bral ba rab tu gnas pa'i sems las byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de'ang shes rab brten par
135a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jug go// 'di lta ste/ pha rol la 'dib sbyin pa las rab byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po'i'ang bdag gi bde ba gtong bar 'jug go// brtson 'grus brtan pa las rab tu byung ba'i byer 'i ming rje
135b1(dkon brtsegs): chen po de'ang sems can thams cad kyi khur khyer bar 'jug ste/ gzhon nu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po ni rnam pa 'di dag dang gzhan yang rnam pa bcus 'jug go// gzhon nu
135b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar gang la la theg pa chen pos nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang snying rje chen pos 'byung ste/ de'i phyir snying rje chen po zhes bya'o// sbyin pa byed pa dang / tshul zin byed pa dang /
135b3(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa byed pa dang / brtson 'grus byed pa dang / bsam gtan byed pa dang / shes rab byed pa ni snying rje chen po ste/ de'i phyir snying rje chen po zhes bya'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa byed pa dang / yang
135b4(dkon brtsegs): dag par spong ba byed pas snying rje chen po'o// dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / mchog tu dga' bar bya ba'i las dang / mthar gyis snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
135b5(dkon brtsegs): dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang / tshig de dag thams cad kyis rgyas par bya'o// snying rje chen po ni rang byung gi ye shes sgrub par byed pasan/ de'i phyir snying rje chen po zhes bya'o// ra gi bya ba dang /
135b6(dkon brtsegs): legs par byed pa bya ba dang / mi 'gyur ba'i bya ba dang / sems can thams cad la bya ba ci yod snyam pa ste/ de'i snying rje chen po de'ang sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du
135b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs par byed pas/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snying rje chen po zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje de dang ldan pas sems can 'di/
136a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dra ba'i gnas thob pa mthong na de dag la snying brtse ba dang / snying rje ba'i sems skyed do// de la byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba gang zhe na/ gang dge 'a'i/
136a2(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams dran pa dang / rjes su dran pa dang / dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dge ba'i chos la mi zhum pa dang / mi 'gong pa dang / yongs su mi skyo ba dang / mi dga'
136a3(dkon brtsegs): ba thams cad spong ba dang / chos thams cad la dga' bar gnas pa dang / sems rab tu dga' ba dang / lus rab tu tshim pa dang / blo rab tu dga' ba dang / yid rab tu mgu ba dang / de bzhin
136a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i sku la mngon par dga' zhing mos pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i rgyan kun tu tshol ba la dga' ba dang / chos nyan pas yongs su mi skyo zhing dga' ba dang / chos kyi phyir 'brang ba'i
136a5(dkon brtsegs): nan tan la rab tu dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba'i chos la mgu ba dang / sems can rnams la khong khro ba med pa dang / byang chub la dga' ba dang / chos rgya chen po la mos pa dang / nyi tshe ba'i theg pa
136a6(dkon brtsegs): sel ba'i sems skyed pa dang / ser sna tshar gcod pa dang / slong ba la dga' ba dang / btong ba la rab tu dga' ba dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa dag sdung cing byams pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan
136a7(dkon brtsegs): pa la rtag tu dang pa dang / bdag gi tshul khrims yongs su dag pas ngan 'gro dang 'jigs pa thams cad las rab tu dga' bar dbugs 'byin pa la rab tu dga' ba dang / pha rol ngan du zer ba dang / dran par
136b1(dkon brtsegs): brjod pa'i tshig gi lam bzod cing rab tu dga' ba dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / mig dang / mgo ba dkyang bzod par nus te/ sems mi nyams shing rab tu dga' ba dang / rgan ra
136b2(dkon brtsegs): la 'dud cing zhes byed pa la dga' ba dang / rtag tu bzhin 'dzum pa la dga' ba dang / khro gnyer med cing gsong por smrab la dga' ba dang / tshul chos pa dang / khagasag dang / gzhogs spongs med
136b3(dkon brtsegs): pa la rab tu dga' ba dang / snying po dang ldan pa'i chos la 'jug par rab tu dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' la ston pa bzhin du 'phangs pa dang / chos la bdag bzhin du 'phangs pa dang / de bzhin
136b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa la srog bzhin du 'phangs pa dang / tha ma la pa ma bzhin du 'phangs pa dang / sems can thams cad la bu bzhin du 'phangs pa dang / slob dpon la mig bzhin du 'phangs pa dang / rnaman
136b5(dkon brtsegs): su yan lag gi dam pa mgo bzhin du 'phangs pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa la 'ag pa dang rkang pa bzhin dub sangs pa dang / ches smra ba la rin po che thams cad bzhin du 'phangs pa dang / chos yongs su
136b6(dkon brtsegs): tshol ba la sman bzhin du 'phangs pa dang / skul zhing dran par byed pa la sman pa bzhin du 'phangs par sems pa'o// gzhon nu 'do ni dga' ba zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
136b7(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba de'i rab tu gnas nas rtag tu chos tshol ba la rab tu dag bar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod ba la mi sgo'o del byed chung sems dpa rnams kyi btang snyoms
137a1(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ btang snyoms rnam pa gsum ste/ rnam pa gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyon mongs pa la btang snyoms pa dang / bdag dag dang gzhan rjes su srung ba'i
137a2(dkon brtsegs): btang snyoms pa dang / dus dang dus ma yin par btang snyoms pa'o// de la nyon mongs pa'i btang snyoms pa gang zhe na/ gang bkur sti byas kyang mthor mi sems pa dang / bkur stim
137a3(dkon brtsegs): byas kyang dma' bar mi sems pa dang / rnyed pas snyems pa med pa dang / ma rnyed pas yi mi 'char ba dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa la blo mnyam pa dang / grags
137a4(dkon brtsegs): ba la dga' ba med pa dang / ma grags pa la zhum pa med pa dang / sman pa la li mi song ba dang / bstod pa la chos nyid du shin tu gnas pa dang / sdug bsngal la so sor rtog pa'i stobs dang /
137a5(dkon brtsegs): bde ba la mi rtag par rtog pa'i stobs dang / rjes su chags pa 'dor ba dang / khong khro ba spong ba dang / mdza' ba dang mi mdza' ba la sems mnyam pa dang / legs par byas pa dang nyes par
137a6(dkon brtsegs): byas pa la gnyis su mi byed pa dang / sdug pa dang mi sdug pa mi lta ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang bsnyen bkur mi byed pa la dga' ba dang mi dga' bar bya ba med pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang mi
137a7(dkon brtsegs): snyan par smra ba la rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba med pa dang / kun myang ba'i nyes pa la mtshungs par yongs su 'jal ba dang / bdag dang sems can gzhan la bsam pa mnyam pa dang / lus
137b1(dkon brtsegs): dang srog la mi lta ba dang / sems can rab 'bring tha ma la 'od zer mnyam pa dang / bsngags pa dang mi bsngags pa la chos nyid mnyam pa dang / bden pa dang mi bden pa la bdag gi 'den pa yongs su
137b2(dkon brtsegs): dag pa ste/ gnon nu 'di ltar gang bdag la gnod par byed pa de la byang chub sems dpa' btang snyoms pa yin no// de la bdag dang gzhan rjes su srung ba'i btang spyongs pa
137b3(dkon brtsegs): se na/ gang yan lag dang nying lag gi sha bcad kyang btang snyoms pa yin no// yan lag dang nying lag gi sha bcad kyang 'dod pa med cing tshol ba med nga tang snyoms pa yin no// lus
137b4(dkon brtsegs): kyang mi 'gyur dag kyang mi 'gyur te/ gnyis ka bzod pas de'i phyir btang snyoms zhes bya'o// mig gi rnam pas ma yin/ gzugs kyi rnam pas ma yin te/ gnyis kas kyang rma mi
137b5(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa nas/ yid kyi rnam pa dang chos kyi rnam pa'i bar gyis rma mi phyin pas de'i phyir btang snyoms zhes bya'o// rma mi phyin cing snang ba med pas de'i phyir btang snyoms zhes bya'o// rma byung ba
137b6(dkon brtsegs): la rma mi 'byin pas de'i phyir btang snyoms zhes bya'o// bdag dang pha rol gnyis ka las bzod pas de'i phyir btang snyoms zhes bya'o// phan par byed pa dang phan par mi byed pa la mnyam par
137b7(dkon brtsegs): sbyor bas ngo'i phyir btang snyoms zhes bya'o// btang snyoms ni rtsod pa med pa lhur byed pa'o// btang snyoms ni rang gi sems nges par rtog pa'o// btang snyoms ni bdag la so sor rtog pa'o//
138a1(dkon brtsegs): btang snyoms ni gzhan la gnod pa med pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi btang stobs ni mnyam par bzhag pa'i dngos po ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam
138a2(dkon brtsegs): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la btang snyoms pa gnang bar mi mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu 'bang bar bya'o// rtag par rgyun mi 'chad par
138a3(dkon brtsegs): dge ba yongs su btsal ba la brtson par bya ste/ dus dus su btang snyoms bsgom par bya'o// de la dus dus su btang snyoms sgom pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ snod ma yin
138a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems can la btang snyoms pa dang / bsnyen bkur mi byed pa la btang snyoms pa dang / ma rnyed pa dang / smad pa dang / ma grags pa dang / sdug bsngal ba la btang snyoms pa dang /
138a5(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos kyi theg par nges par 'gyur ba la zhugs pa rnams la btang snyom pa dang / sbyin pa'i dus na tshul khrims nye bar sgrub pa btang snyoms pa dang / tshul khrims kyi dus na sbyin pa nye bar sgrub pa
138a6(dkon brtsegs): btang snyoms pa dang / bzod pa'i dus na sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / brtson 'grus nye bar sgrub pa btang snyoms pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi dus na tshul khrims kyi rjes su 'jug pa
138a7(dkon brtsegs): btang snyoms pa dang / bsam gtan gyi dus na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa btang snyoms pa dang / shes rab kyi rus na pha rol tu phyin pa lnga la dmigs pa nye bar sgrub pa btang snyoms pa ste/
138b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni dus dus su btang snyoms zhes bya'o// de ltar gang mi bya ba'i chos mi byed pa 'di ni btang snyoms zhes bya ste/ de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni mi dge ba'i chos thams cad la
138b2(dkon brtsegs): btang snyoms su byed do// gzhon nu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms
138b3(dkon brtsegs): shes bya'o// de ltar shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phung po chen po des/ gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod la byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / gang snyoms mdod
138b4(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa dang bcas rgyas par bstan pa dang bcas te rgya cher yang dag par bstan to// gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod do des de thos nas pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson 'grus brtsams par gyur to//
138b5(dkon brtsegs): byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de la shA ri'i bu pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson pa gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu nga rol
138b6(dkon brtsegs): tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag nyid yin te/ gang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do// drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pharol
138b7(dkon brtsegs): tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
139a1(dkon brtsegs): ste/ de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug rnams so// // de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni dge sbyong
139a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / bram ze dang / 'phongs pa rnams kyi sbyin bdag yin te/ 'di lta ste/ zas kyis 'phongs pa la zas/ skom gyis 'phongs pa la skom bzhon pa dang / gos dang / spos dang
139a3(dkon brtsegs): 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gnas dang / yo byad dang / na ba'i sman dang / mar me dang / sil snyan dang / dran po dang / bran mo dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / baiDUR+Ya dang
139a4(dkon brtsegs): dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / rin po che thams cad dang / rta dang / glang po che dang / shing rta dang / skyed mos tshal dang / dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang / bu pho dang / bu mo dang /
139a5(dkon brtsegs): chung ma dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba dang / gling bzhi'i rgyal po'i longs spyod kyi bde ba thams cad dang / rtse ba dang dga' ba thams cad dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang /
139a6(dkon brtsegs): rna ba dang / sna dang / mig dang / mgo dang / sha dang / khrag dang / rkang dang / rus po dang / 'jig rten gyi yo byad gang yang slong ba la yongs su mi gtong ba med do// sbyin pa na
139a7(dkon brtsegs): pa bcus yongs su dag pas sbyin par byed de/ bcu gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mi mthun pa'i longs spyod yongs su tshol zhing sbyin pa med pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sems
139b1(dkon brtsegs): tsam la gnod pa'i sbyi nang med// byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'jigs shing skrag nas sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yongs su ma btang ba la mgron du ser ba'i sbyin pa med byang
139b2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams la gdong du lta zhing sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sems can tha dad par sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mdza' bas sbyin pa med byang
139b3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams la sdang bas sbyin po med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam la zhing tshol zhing sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sam can tham cad la sbyin gnas ma yin zhes brnyas/
139b4(dkon brtsegs): shing sbyin pa med de/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa rnam bde bcus yongs su dag par sbyin par byed do// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa de gzhan
139b5(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa bcu yongs su dag par sbyin par byed de/ bcu gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la las kyi rnam par smin pa 'dod cing sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
139b6(dkon brtsegs): la bsam pa log par sbyin pa med byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yongs su skyo ba'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la nye bar bstan nas sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa'
139b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams la rjes su mi dga' ba'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'gyod pa'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la tshul khrims dang ldan pa la bkur te sbyin pa med/ tshu drim
140a1(dkon brtsegs): 'chal pa la brnyas te sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rnam par smin pa la re ba'i sbyin pa med de/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa de rnam pa bcus yongs
140a2(dkon brtsegs): su dag par sbyin par byed do// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa de rnam pa bcus yongs su dag par sbyin par byed de/ bcu gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
140a3(dkon brtsegs): la sngar nas sbyin pa med byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gzhan du phyogs nas sbyin pa med byang chub sems dpa' rnams la nyon mongs shing sbyin pa med/ khro ba dang / zag dog
140a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / gnod sems ston cing sbyin pa med/ ri mor mi byed par sbyin pa medarang gi lag nas ma yin par sbyin pa med/ ji tsam du lpags pa las dbri zhing sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems
140a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams skye ba 'dod cing sbyin pa med de shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin par rnam pa de bcus yongs su dag par sbyin par byed do// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems
140a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sbyin pa de gzhan rnam pa bcus yongs su dag par sbyin par byed de/ bcu gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mi brtan par sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la
140a7(dkon brtsegs): chod 'dzin cing sbyin pa med/ yongs su chad par sbyin pa med/ gzhan gyi dring 'jog ste sbyin pa med/ nyung zhes cung zad tsam sbyin pa med/ gzugs dang / longs spyod dang dbang phyug la mngon
140b1(dkon brtsegs): par dga' ba'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / lhar skye ba thams cad 'dod pa'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa'
140b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams la nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar sngo zhing sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mkhas pas smad pa'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la thams cad mkhyen par ma
140b3(dkon brtsegs): bsngos pa'i sbyin pa med de/ shA ri'i du byang chub sems dpa'i sbyim pa rnam pa de bcus yongs su dag par sbyin par byed do// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin par
140b4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan rnam pa bcus yongs su dag par sbyin par byed de/ bcu gang zhe na/ ji tsam 'dus byas las nges par 'byung ba dang / 'dus ma byas thob par bya ba'i phyir da ltar sbyin pa byin ma shA'i
140b5(dkon brtsegs): bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa'i phan yon bcu thob par 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na/ bza' ba byin pas tshe dang / spobs pa dang / bde ba dang / stobs dang / kha dog phun sum tshogs
140b6(dkon brtsegs): pa rab tu 'thob bo// datung ba byin pas nyon mongs pa dang / sred pa thams cad bsal ba phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// bzhon pa byin pas bde ba thams cad kyi dngos po phun sum
140b7(dkon brtsegs): tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// bgo dbyin pas khrel yod pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang gser ltar kha dog yongs su dag pa phum sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// spos dang 'greng ba byin
