281a3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / nang thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i 'du shes kyi rnam pa dang / dran pa'i snod kyi rnam pa dang / rtogs pa shes pa'i rnam pa dang / blo thos 'dod pa'i rnam pa dang / blo la 'jug pa'i rnam
281a4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thos pas mi mngoms pa'i rnam pa dang / gtong ba spel ba'i rnam pa dang / byin nas mi smon pa'i rnam pa dang / mang du thos pa sten pa'i rnam pa dang / gus par dga' ba
281a5(dkon brtsegs): myong bar byed pa'i rnam pa dang / lus sim pa'i rnam pa dang / sems rangs pa'i rnam pa dang / mi skyo bar nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / don nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / chos nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / nan tan nya
281a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rnam pa dang / theg pa gzhan la 'dod pa med par nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa nyan po'i rnam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po nyan pa'i
281a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa dang / thabs mkhas pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / tshangs pa'i gnas pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / mngon par shes pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / yang dag
281b1(dkon brtsegs): par spong ba nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / mi rtag pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba nyan pa'i rnam pa
281b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / bdag med pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / stong pa nyid nyan pa'i rnam pa dang mtshan ma med pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / mngon par
281b3(dkon brtsegs): 'du mi byed pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du byed pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / rang dbang du gyur pa'i rnam pa dang / chos nyan par 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang / kun tu 'dre ba mi
281b4(dkon brtsegs): mthun pa'i phyogs su 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad tshar gcod pa'i rnam pa dang / mkhas pa la mngon par dga' ba'i rnam pa dang / 'phags pa bsten pa'i rnam pa dang
281b5(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa ma yin pa yongs su spong ba'i rnam pa dang / 'phags pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / dbang po nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / rjes su dran pa sgom pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
281b6(dkon brtsegs): nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang /
281b7(dkon brtsegs): dang snyoms chen po dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams nyan pa'i rnam pa ste/ shA ri'i bu de ltar gang na thos pa de na shes pa'o// gang na shes pa re nanan
282a1(dkon brtsegs): han no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs la mos pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do//
282a2(dkon brtsegs): gang byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs la bsam pa yod pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi
282a3(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs la sbyor ba yod pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rten par byed pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// zos
282a4(dkon brtsegs): nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang nga rgyal med pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang mang du thos pa la rab tu 'dud
282a5(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// zos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang mang du thos pa de la ri mor byed pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan
282a6(dkon brtsegs): byed do// gang mthun par 'dzin pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang bka' blo bde ba de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so//
282a7(dkon brtsegs): shes nas nan tan byang // gang mang du zos pa la bsnyen bkur byed pa don thos par 'gyur ro// zos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed ro// gang rna bklags te nyan pa ni thos par gyur
282b1(dkon brtsegs): ro zos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang mang du thos pa la bkur gyi byed par ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas na tan byed do// gang 'chang
282b2(dkon brtsegs): dang gang mang du thos par yid la byed pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang mang du thos pa rin po che 'du shes pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro//
282b3(dkon brtsegs): thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas ran tan byed do// gang mang du thos pa la rtser 'du shes pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang mang du thos
282b4(dkon brtsegs): pa thos nas 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rab tu zhi bar 'du shes pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang mang du thos pa thos nas
282b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin par 'du shes pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang chos rnams rtogs par khong du chud pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes
282b6(dkon brtsegs): nas nan tan byed do// gang mang du thos par blo gros 'dod pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang mang du thos pa thos nas/ blo rnam par mi g.yo ba de ni thos
282b7(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang thos pas mi ngoms pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang sbyin
283a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gtam thos nas gtong bar rtogs pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nA nan tan byed do// gang tshul khrims kyi gtam thos nas tshul chen
283a2(dkon brtsegs): srung ba don thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang bzod pa'i gtam thos nas bzod par byed pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes
283a3(dkon brtsegs): nas nan tan byed do// gang brtson 'gru cig ta ma thos nas btson 'grus ma nyams par byed pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nus nan tan byed do// gang bsam gtan gyi
283a4(dkon brtsegs): gtam thos nas sems mi g.yeng bar byed pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang shes rab kyi gtam thos nas zag bzang ba la sems gzhal bar
283a5(dkon brtsegs): byed pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang mang du thos par dga' bskye ba de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed //
283a6(dkon brtsegs): gang chos thos nas lus sim par byed pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// zos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang chos thos nas rangs par byed pa doni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas
283a7(dkon brtsegs): tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang theg pa chen po thos nas mos par 'gyur ba de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang bsdu ba'i dngos po thos
283b1(dkon brtsegs): nas gang bsdu bar sems skyed pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i gtam thos nas/ dran pa lus la zhugs pa dang / dran pa
283b2(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba la zhugs pa dang / dran pa sems la zhugs pa dang / dran pa chos la zhugs pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang yang dag par spong ba'i
283b3(dkon brtsegs): gtam thos nas mi dge ba skyes shing byung ba dag la khrel zhing ngo tsha bar 'gyur ba de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang dge ba'i chos skyes shing byung ba la
283b4(dkon brtsegs): mi gtong bar blo 'jug pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i gtam thos nas lus yang ba dang / sems yang ba dang / 'dun
283b5(dkon brtsegs): ba las skye ba de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang bsam gtan gyi gtam thos nas nges par rtog pa la sems gtong ba de ni thos par 'gyur ro// khros na
283b6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang tshad med pa'i gtam thos nas sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / 'phongs par gyur pa rnam la snying rje ba dang / chos la dga' ba dang / mi dgeg
283b7(dkon brtsegs): la btang snyoms pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang dbang po'i gtam thos nas dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang
284a1(dkon brtsegs): po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po la sems 'jug par byed pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// zos nas rab tu gas so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang
284a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi yan lag gi gtam thos nas chos thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir sems 'jug par byed pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// zos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang
284a3(dkon brtsegs): lam gyi gtam thos nas mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro ba la sems 'jug pa de ni thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do// gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /
284a4(dkon brtsegs): mi 'jigs pa dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yang dag par bslab
284a5(dkon brtsegs): ba/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems 'jug ste/ de thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas rab tu shes so// shes nas nan tan byed do/
284a6(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu 'di ni thos pa'i rnam pa la 'jug pa rnam pa bzhi bcu rtsa gcig ces bya ste/ shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod // shA ri'i bu
284a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs shin tu mnyan/ blangasabazung bklags
284b1(dkon brtsegs): kun chub par byas/ gnan la'ang bshad cing rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan na nan tan snying por byed pa yin no// chos rnams la nan tan byed pa gang zhe na/ gang ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du gan ste/
284b2(dkon brtsegs): de ni chos la nan tan byed do// gnan yang chos la nan tan byed pa de ni gang chos thams cad mi len pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos rnams len na'ang log pa'i nan tan du 'gyur te/ gang zag gang chos
284b3(dkon brtsegs): len par gnas pa ni chos de dag las 'byung bar 'byung ba'i gnas dang skabs med de/ de ni gnas med pa'o// gang zag mi len par spyod pa rnams kyang bsal ba'i phyir/ chos 'di dag la nan tan du
284b4(dkon brtsegs): gzhag pa the tsom du 'gyur na/ chos len par spyod pa rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de bas na chos thams cad mi len pa ni namanyan no// gzhan yang gang chos rnams la mi sgrib pa de ni nan tan zhes
284b5(dkon brtsegs): bya'o/ gang chos rnams la rlom sems med pa dang / gang chos rnams mi len pa dang / mi rlom pa dang / mi skye ba dang / mi 'gog pa de ni nan tan zhes bya'o// gzhan yang chos rnams la bsnan
284b6(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa dang / bsal ba med pa de ni nan tan zhes bya'o// gzhan yang gang du cung zad kyang ma bshad/ ji ltar bshad pa bzhin du mi sdang ba de lta bu ni chos thams cad mi snang ba/ mi blang ba
284b7(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// mtshan nyid gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mtshan nyid med pa'o// mtshan nyid ces bya ba ni mtshan nyid med pa ste/ de ni gnyis ka las 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun brtags pa/
285a1(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ yang dag par brtag pa de nyid mtshan nyid med par bshad pa yin no// 'di mi mtshan nyid de/ 'di ni mtshan nyid ma yin pa'o zhes/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad la mtshan nyid/
285a2(dkon brtsegs): med pa/ mi snang ba/ blang ba med par rtogs pa de ni nan tan zhes bya'o// nan tan la brtson par gyis shig/ chos thams cad mi sgrib par snang ba thob par gyis shig/ de nas
285a3(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// gang zhig byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la/ shin tu nges par nan tan gnas byed pa// mkhas pa de ni chos la 'dzin mi byed/
285a4(dkon brtsegs): mi 'dzin pa na nan tan de 'dra'o// mis ni chos rnyed stong par mi byed de// chos la'ang de ni stong par rlom sems med// stong pa'i chos la rlom sems gang yang med// rlom sems med phyir/
285a5(dkon brtsegs): nan tan de 'dra'o// chos la len pa med cing 'dor ba med// chos ni chos la len par byed pa med// len pa med phyir 'di ni chos kyi mtshan// 'di 'dra ba ni nan tan zhes bya'o// gang phyir chos la
285a6(dkon brtsegs): nams kyang de mi chags// de la de yi ye shes blangs mi 'gyur// ye shes ma blangs de la'ang rlom sems med// de 'dra ba la nan tan zhes bya'o// mkhas pa sbyangs pa'i yon tan gnas par gyis
285a7(dkon brtsegs): chos 'di dag la shin tu brtson par gyis// cho ga spyod pa dag la gnas gyur na// de tshe de yi sgo ni dag par 'gyur// sgo dag nas ni chos 'di 'dra ba shes// de na sems la bsam pa'ang shes par gyu/
285b1(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pas de tshe bsam pa shes nas ni// 'di 'dra ba yi chos kyang 'chang bar 'gyur// zab mo'i chos la don dam mkhas gyur nas// rtag tu don la rnam par gangom za// spyong ba mtha' yas yon
285b2(dkon brtsegs): tan rnams kyis 'phags// mkhas pa mang du thos pa rgya mtsho 'dra// de yi don dang tshig 'bru dag la yang // mtha' ma rtogs par rung ba ma yin zhing / don kyang mtha' yas tshig 'bru mtha'
285b3(dkon brtsegs): yas te/ nan tan snying por byed pa mi 'khrugs 'gyur// shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems/
285b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs shin tu nyan pa nas/ gzhan la rgya cher bstan pa'i bar du byas nas ma rig pa'i mun pa mun nag mun pa
285b5(dkon brtsegs): rab ri stug po bsal ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad la snang ba thob ste/ shes rab kyi snang ba'o// de snang ba thob pas dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos rnams rab tu shes te/ de srog gi phyir yang mi dge ba'i
285b6(dkon brtsegs): chos la mi gnas te/ mi dge ba'i chos rnams spang ba'i phyir/ ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams rtogs pas na/ dge ba thub pa zhi ba zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs
285b7(dkon brtsegs): su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// ji ltar mun pas khyab bsgribs pa// khyim du zhugs par gyur na ni// yod par gyur pa'i gzugs rnams kyang // mig gis mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// de'in
286a1(dkon brtsegs): du ni 'di la yang // la la'i mi dag skyes gyur kyang // dge ba dang ni sdig pa'i chos// ma thos par ni shes mi nus// thos nas chos rnams rnam par shes// thos nas tri/
286a2(dkon brtsegs): pa bsten mi bya// thos nas gnod pa spong bar byed// thos nas mya ngan 'das pa 'thong // thos par 'dod pas thos pa 'phel// thos pas shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur// shes rab kyis ni don rnams
286a3(dkon brtsegs): sbyor/ don 'thob nas ni bde 'thob 'gyur// don thob de ni yid rdo ste// tshe 'di la ni mya ngan 'das// chos la sbyor zhing gtsang la mkhas// shin tu bde ba thob par 'gyur// byang chub sems
286a4(dkon brtsegs): dba'i sde snod ni// thos nas chos nyid gnas par 'gyur// 'jig rten la ni snang gyur nas// byang chub kyi ni spyad pa spyod// shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol
286a5(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa la spyod do// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod 'dzin pa'i gang zag la dge ba'i bshes
286a6(dkon brtsegs): gnyen du 'du shes bskyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid la shin tu byang bar byed/ rnam par dag par byed de/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde sdod 'di'i don gyi phyir
286a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dun pa skyed/ 'bad par byed/ brtson 'grus rtsom par byed/ sems la rab tu 'dzin par byed/ yang dag par rab tu 'jog par byed de/ de yang dag par spong ba bzhi la rab tu zhugs pas/
286b1(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa 'thob bo// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// chos smra ba ni gang yin pa// de la dge ba'i bshes su/
286b2(dkon brtsegs): sems// rtag par nan tan ga nas gyur nas// chos la nan tan byas te nyan// rtag par 'dun pa 'bri mi byed// rtag par brtson 'grus shin tu 'phags// rtag par shes rab rnam par
286b3(dkon brtsegs): sbyong // ye shes la ni rtag tu gnas// de ni bdag nyid chos shes te// dad pa'i phyir ni 'gro mi byed// sangs rgyas kyis ni gang bshad pa// mi g.yo ba yi chos shes so// mkhas pa de dag tshig
286b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams 'byed la mkhas// bslabs pa don la khong du chud par byed// de dag dkar po'i phyogs ni rtag par sbyor// nag po'i phyogs ni rtag tu spong bar byed// de yi sems la nams kyang nyams pa/
286b5(dkon brtsegs): med/ de ni chos rnams gang la'ang zhum pa med// lus kyang de bzhin sems dang brtson 'grus dang // 'dun po yang ba'ang myur du 'thob par 'gyur// chos thos nas ni shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur// /
286b6(dkon brtsegs): shes rnam par rtogs nas rbam mi nyams// dran dang ye shes la ni rtags gnas nas// dge dang mi dge'i chos ni rab tu shes// bla na med pa'i chos rnams bslabs nas ni// rtogs dang dran pa
286b7(dkon brtsegs): rab stobs mchog thob// ji ltar bdag nyid yun ri ba slabs pa bzhin// des ni sems can rnams kyi bsam pa shes// chos bslabs nas ni khyad par 'thob 'gyur te// khyad par thob cing ye
287a1(dkon brtsegs): shes dag gyur nas// de ni sems can rnams kyi bsam pa shes// de phyir bsam pa bzhin du chos ston to// shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol
287a2(dkon brtsegs): tu phyin pa la spyod do// // bam po bcu bdun pa// / shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ltar blo
287a3(dkon brtsegs): sbyangs pa dang / de ltar chos snang ba'i sgo shin tu yongs su dag pas 'di ltar slob ste/ 'phags pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba 'byung ba ni rgyu gnyis dang / rkyen gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ gzhan
287a4(dkon brtsegs): gyi sgra dang / bdag nyid tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'o// de 'di snyam du sems te/ gzhan gyi sgra de gang / bdag nyid tshul bzhin yid la byed pa de gang zhe na/ de de ltar tshul bzhin yid la byed
287a5(dkon brtsegs): pa na 'di snyam du sems par 'gyur te/ rnal 'byor spyod pa gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mthos/ 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba
287a6(dkon brtsegs): ma thos par/ ting nge 'dzin tsam gyis dga' ba rnyed na/ nga rgyal gyi dbang gis che ba'i nga rgyal du lhung ba de dag ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal
287a7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi thar/ sdug bsngal gyi phung po las yongs su mi thar te/ de dag la de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs nas 'di skad gsungs so// pha rol la rjes su
287b1(dkon brtsegs): mthun pa thos pa ni rga ba dang 'chi ba las rnam par grol ba'o// yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ chos rnams thos nas rnam par shes/ thos nas sdig pa mi byed de// thos nas gnod pa spong bar
287b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// thos nas mya ngan 'das pa 'thob// thos 'dod thos pa 'phel bar 'gyur// zos pas shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur// shes rab kyis ni don rnams skyong // don rnyed nas ni bde thob 'gyur/
287b3(dkon brtsegs): don rang nga ni yid rje ste// tshe 'di la ni mya ngan 'das// chos gtsang mkhas pa gtsang ba dang // mchog tu bde ba thob par 'gyur/ shA ri'i bu re lhor byang chub sems dpas byang chub
287b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba shin tu mnyam par bya/ blang bar bya/ gzung bar bya/ bklag par bya/ kun chub par bya/ gzhan la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab
287b5(dkon brtsegs): tu bstan par bya'o// shA ri'i bu gang byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mi nyan pa dang / tshul bzhin du sbyor ba mi byed pa de dag ni 'phags pa'i lam la yongs su nyams par 'gyur
287b6(dkon brtsegs): te/ de la dgongs nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'di skad du/ bdag nyid tshul bzhin yid la byed pa ni rga ba dang 'chi ba las grol po'o zhes gsung ngo // de 'di ltar slob ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bzhin
287b7(dkon brtsegs): sbyor ba ni gang ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin sbyor ba yin snyam nas/ de 'di ltar slob ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos gang la'ang sbyor bar mo byed/ rab tu sbyor bar mi
288a1(dkon brtsegs): byed do// tshul bzhin du sbyor ba zhes bya ba de ni mi sbyor ba'i tshig bla dgas so// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du sbyor ba ni sgra 'byin par mi byed/ zlos pa 'byin
288a2(dkon brtsegs): par mi byed/ gang nas sgra byung bda'ang mi dmigs/ sgra de nyid gang nas byung / gang du 'gags shes sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' la rtog par byed de/ gang smras pa dang / gang smra ba dang / gang smras
288a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang / gang gis smras pa dang / gang gi smra ba dang / gang gi smra bar 'gyur ba dang / gang spong ba'i phyir smras pa dang / gang spong ba'i phyir smra ba dang / gang spong ba'i phyir smra bar 'gyur ba dang / gang khong
288a4(dkon brtsegs): du chud par bya ba'i phyir smras pa dang / gang khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir smra ba dang / gang khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir smra bar 'gyur ba de thams cad yongs su btsal na 'das pa'i rnam pa dang / ma 'ong
288a5(dkon brtsegs): ngang rnam pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i rnam par mi dmigs pa de ni/ de'i tshul bzhin sbyor ba'o zhes de de ltar slob bo// byang chub sems dpa' de ltar tshul bzhin du sbyor bas ji ltar na tshul bzhin du
288a6(dkon brtsegs): mthong zhe na/ de 'di ltar slob ste/ gang gi tshe na byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis bgags par mthong ba de'i tshe tshul bzhin mthong ngo // gang gi tshe chos thams cad rang ba zhinagyis
288a7(dkon brtsegs): nye bar zhi bar mthong ba de'i tshe tshul bzhin mthong ngo // gang gi tshe chos thams cad rnam par zhi bar mthong ba de'i tshe tshul bzhin mthong ngo // gang gi tshe chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis snyom par mazhugs
288b1(dkon brtsegs): par mthong ba ra'itsha tshul bzhin mthong ngo // gang gi tshe chos thams cad ma skyes par mthong ba de'i tsha tshul banin mthong ngo // gang gi tsho chos thams cang ma byung bar mthong ba'i tshe rgyal bzhin mthong
288b2(dkon brtsegs): gang gi tsho chos thams cad shin tu yang dag par ma byung bar mthong ba de'i tshe tshul bzhin mthong ngo // gang gi tshe chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das par mthong ba de'i tshe tshul bzhin mthong ngo // de gang gis mthong bar la
288b3(dkon brtsegs): tog ste/ ci nas kyang mi mthong ba dang mi rtog pa de ltar mthong ste/ de ltar mthong ste tshul bzhin mthong ba zhes bya'o// yang 'di ltar slob ste/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du sbyor ba ni/ chos gang la'ang
288b4(dkon brtsegs): the tsom dang rmongs pa med do// tshul bzhin du sbyor ba ni chos gang la'ang sgrib pa med ro// tshul bzhin du sbyor ba ni chos gang la'ang gang thar pa'i sgor mi 'gyur ba med do// tshul bzhin du sbyor ba ni chos gang
288b5(dkon brtsegs): yang spang bar bya ba'i phyir 'bad pa med do// gang tshul bzhin du sbyor ba ni chos gang la'ang rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 'bad pa med do// gang chos thams cad yang dag par mthong ba dang / ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba
288b6(dkon brtsegs): mi yang dag par lta ba'o// chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ma mthong ba'o// ma mthong ba zhes bya ba de ni ma skyes pa'i tshig bla dgas te// ma skyes pa zhes bya ba de ni yang dag par ma byung
288b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshogs bla dgas so// yang dag par ma byung ba zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ de ni mi snang ba'i tshig bla dgas so// de bzhin gshes pas de la dgongs nas 'du byed tham cang mi skye bar mthong na yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la 'jug ste/
289a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la 'jug pa de ni yang dag par lta ba'o zhes de skad gsung ngo // de 'di snyam du sems te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yang dag pa nyid du nges
289a2(dkon brtsegs): pa la 'jug pa zhes bya zhes de 'di ltar slob ste/ chos thams cad gang dang mnyam pa sangs rgyas kyi chos de dang mnyam ste/ de bas na yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la 'jug pa'o// de lta bas na yang dag pa
289a3(dkon brtsegs): nyid du nges pa la 'jug par 'dod pa rnams kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid shin tu mnyan par bya/ blang bar bya/ gzung bar bya/ bklag par bya/ kun chub par bya'o//
289a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid la'ang tshul bzhin du sbyor bar bya ste/ shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// shA raH
289a5(dkon brtsegs): bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ltar blo shin tu yongs su sbyangs pa dang / de ltar chos snang ba'i sgo shin tu yongs su dag pas tshul bzhin du 'jug pa la brtson na/
289a6(dkon brtsegs): tshul bzhin gyi tshig mthong ngo // de la tshul bzhin du 'jug pa gang / tshul bzhin gyi tshig gang zhe na/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bzhon du 'jug pa no// 'di lta ste/ zhi gnas kyi gnas la 'jug pa dang /
289a7(dkon brtsegs): lhag mthong rnam par rtog pa la 'jug pa ni tshul bzhin du 'jug pa'o// lus dben par 'jug pa dang / sems yid du 'ong bar 'jug pa dang / chad pa ma yin par 'jug pa dang / rtag pa ma yin par 'jug pa dang /
289b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyu dang rkyen la 'jug pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa dang / sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gang zag med pa la 'jug pa dang / ma 'ongs ma phyin mi gnas pa la 'jug pa dang
289b2(dkon brtsegs): mi 'pho ba dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu chud mi za ba dang / rgyu stong pa nyid du rnam par 'byed pa la 'jug pa dang / mtshan ma med pa 'dris par bya ba la 'jug pa dang / smon pa med pa rab tu shes pa 'jug kyang stong
289b3(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid dang / smor ba med pa len par 'jug pa ma yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa len pa la 'jug kyang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang gis skye ba la mi 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes
289b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i ye shes len pa la 'jug kyang / zag pa zad pa la mi 'jug pa dang / mi skye bar rtog pa la 'jug kyang nges par gyur par 'gro ba la mi 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad bdag med par
289b5(dkon brtsegs): rtog par 'jug kyang / snying rje chen po gtong ba la mi 'jug pa dang / skye ba thams cad 'jig par mthong ba la 'jug pa dang / srid pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa len pa la 'jug pa dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba/
289b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa la 'jug kyang / chos mngon du bya ba la mi 'jug pa dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi dga' ba btang snyoms pa la 'jug kyang / chos kyi dga' ba 'dor ba la mi 'jug pa dang / rtog pas spros pa thams cad
289b7(dkon brtsegs): gtong ba la 'jug kyang / thabs mkhas pa gtong ba la mi 'jug pa ste/ shA ri'i bu de ni tshul bzhin du 'jug pa zhes bya'o// shA ri'i bu de la tshul bzhin gyi tshig ces bya ba gang zhe na/ rigs pa'i tshig de ni tshul bzhin/
290a1(dkon brtsegs): mtho/ masan dang rgyal bas na na rgyal rdzog ni na ga go/ dam pa cog so nu nga btunas pa byung bar ga
290a2(dkon brtsegs): dA ni mi 'gal ba'i chen tsha rtsor pa'i tshig go// da ni btung snyoms kyi tshig go// mi len pa'i tshig dang / mi basbyor ba'i tshig dang / ma dzes pa dang mi bstan pa'i tshig dang / sa
290a3(dkon brtsegs): tshig dang / mi skye ba'i tshig dang / rtsod pa'i gzhi med pa'i tshig dang / mi ldog pa'i tshe dang / gnyen po med pa'i tshig dang / de kho na tshig dang / de bzhin 'on tshig dang / mU log par bzhin
290a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshig dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi tshig dang / de bzhin nyid kyi tshig dang / ji lta ba bzhin gyi tshig dang / dus gsum mnyam pa'i tshig dang / yongs su chad pa'i tshig dang / gzugs rnam
290a5(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa'i gnas med pa'i tshig dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa gnas med pa'i tshig go// de ni mig dang / gzugs dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams
290a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas med pa'i tshig go// de ni rna ba dang / swa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gnas med pa'i tshig go// de ni snga dang / ji dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gnas med pa'i tshig go// de'i
290a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / ro dang / sde'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gnas med pa'i tshig go// de ni lus dang / reg dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams gnas med pa'i tshig go// de ni yid dang / chos dang / yid kyi rnam
290b1(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa'i khams gnas med pa'i tshig go// de na don la rton pa'i tshig go// den chos la rton pa'i tshig go// don ye shes la rngon pa'i tshig go// de ni nges pa'i don gyi mdo rje la rton pa'i tshig sde na
290b2(dkon brtsegs): dra ni tshul bzhin gyi tshig go / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du 'jug pa la brtson pa tshul bzhin gyi tshig mthong ba ni gang gis mthong ba de nyid mi mthong ste/ ji ltar mi mthong / rnam par mi mthor
290b3(dkon brtsegs): bde ltar mthong ngo // de ltar mthong na nul bzhin mthong ba zhes bya'o// shA ri'i bu yang byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du sbyor ba ni chos gang la'ang rmongs par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' tshul
290b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du sbyor ba ni chos gang yang gang thar pa'i sgor mi 'gyur ba med do// tshul bzhin du sbyor ba ni chos gang yang spong ba'i phyir 'bad pa med do// tshul bzhin du sbyor ba ni chos gang yang rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 5
290b5(dkon brtsegs): pa med de/ gang chos thams cad yang dag par mthong ba dang / ji lta ba bzhin mthong ba de ni yang dag par lta ba'o// chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi mthong ba'o// mi ma
290b6(dkon brtsegs): ba gang zhe na/ de ni ma skyes pa'i tshig bla dgas so// ma skyes pa zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ de ni mi snang ba'i bar gyi tshig bla rags te/ rgya cher ji ltar sngar 'das pa de ltar de bzhin du bzlas par bya ste/ de ltar/
290b7(dkon brtsegs): na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'di ltar slob ste/ chos thams cad na
291a1(dkon brtsegs): bdag bzhin du tshul bzhin te/ ji ltar bdag la bdag med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad bdag med par mthong ngo // ji ltar sems can bdag med pa bzhin du/ chos thams cad
291a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag med par mthong ste/ de ltar mthong na tshul bzhin du mthong ngo // gang tshul bzhin 'khor ba'i khams mthong ba de tshul bzhin mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams dang ldan par mthong ba ste/ de ni tshul bzhin
291a3(dkon brtsegs): du sbyor ba zhes bya'o// de ni chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin la nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin du bye brag med pa dang ldan par mthong ngo // rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma yin par yang mi snyems so// tshul
291a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin sbyor bas tshul bzhin mthong ste/ tshul bzhin gyi sbyor ba ji snyed pa sems can gyi gnas thams cad kyang ji snyed de/ sems can gyi gnas kyang mi mthong / chos kyi gnas kyang 'khrug par mi byed/
291a5(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bzhin sbyor ba ste/ shA ri'i bu de ltar na rnam pa 'di dang thos pa 'di dang / tshul bzhin du 'jug pa 'di dang / tshul bzhin mthong ba 'di dang / ji lta ba bzhin
291a6(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba'i rgyu mthun pa 'di dang 'di dag ni shes rab nas bya ste/ shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// shA ri'i bum nan yang byang chub/
291a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spong ba/ 'dus byas la spyod pa'i chos thams cad la shes rab kyis mi gnas pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ 'du byed rnam dang lhan
291b1(dkon brtsegs): cig tu mi gnas pa nas rgyas par byas te/ ga'i bar dang ldan cig tu mi gnas/ bdag tu lta ba dang lhan cig tu ma gnas pa nas/ bdug tu lta ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i rtsa bar gyur pA rdzan na rtsa
291b2(dkon brtsegs): dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ mtho bar sems pa dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ dma' bar sems pa dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad rnams dang lhan cig tu mi gnas// brgyam
291b3(dkon brtsegs): dang che ba'i nga rgyal dang / log pa'i nga rgyal nas/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa nyi shu'i bar dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ chen po dang / 'bring po dang / phra mo nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi bar rab
291b4(dkon brtsegs): cig tu mi gnas/ gti mug gi mun pa rab rib kyi ling thog sgrib pa dang / chod par byed pa kun tu dkris te 'dug pa nas/ dma' ba'i chos thams cad kyi bar dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ rtsod pa'i rnyog pa dang /
291b5(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa dang / phung po dang / lha'i bu dang / 'chi bdag gi bdud nas/ bdud thams cad kyi las kyi bar dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang
291b6(dkon brtsegs): gang zag dang / shed bu dang / shed las skyes pa nas/ bdag tu lta ba thams cad kyi bar dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ las kyi sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / lta ba'i
291b7(dkon brtsegs): sgrib pa dang / rnam par smin pa'i sgrib pa dang / mi shes pa'i slob pa nas/ bag chags kyi tshams sbyor ba thams cad kyi bar dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ kun tu rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang /
292a1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma dang / dmigs pa dang / mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / dran pa dang / rnam par rig pa dang / mdung ba'i sgo 'dogs pa thams cad dang lhan cig tu mig mas/ ser/
292a2(dkon brtsegs): sna dang gtong ba dang / tshul khrims dang / 'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / gnod sems dang / brtson 'grus dang / le lo dang / bsam gtan dang / g.yeng ba rang
292a3(dkon brtsegs): shes rab dang / 'chal pa'i shes rab nas/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang / shes pa dang / mi shes pa'i bar thams cad dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ nges pa dang //
292a4(dkon brtsegs): ma nges pa dang / log par nges pa dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / kha na ma tho ba dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa nas/ chos thams cad kyi nyen po'i bar
292a5(dkon brtsegs): dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ zhing sna tshogs dang / sangs rgyas sna tshogs dang / sems can sna tshogs dang / chos sna tshogs dang / sna tshogs thams cad kyi bar dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ mi shes
292a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa dang / kun rdzob dang / don dam pa nas/ sems can thams cad kyi mtshan ma yeng la byed pa dag dang lhan cig tu miganas/ shes rab mi rgyu ba dang / lus med
292a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / mtshan nyid med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / 'dus ma byas pa nas/ yid la byed pa thams cad dang / sems dang rnam par shes pa'i gnas dag gi bar rang lhan cig tu miganas
292b1(dkon brtsegs): de dag dang gzhan yang 'dus byas la spyod pa'i chos dpag tu med pa dag dang lhan cig tu mi gnas so// da ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i gang shas zur na
292b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dus byas kyi spyod pa thams cad dang lhan cig tu mi gnas te/ shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// / shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
292b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la gnas pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'byer mkhas pa yin te/ chos thams cad la mkhas pa
292b4(dkon brtsegs): rjes su thob bo// de la shes rab rnam par 'byed pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phung po la mkhas pa dang / khams la mkhas pa dang / skye mched la mkhas pa dang / bden pa la mkhas pa dang /
292b5(dkon brtsegs): so so yang dag par rig pa la mkhas pa dang / rton pa la mkhas pa dang / rnam par shes pa dang ye shes la mkhas pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa dang / lam la mkhas pa dang /
292b6(dkon brtsegs): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang bcu ste/ mkhas pa rnam pa bcu po 'di dag gi rnam par 'byed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya'o// de la ru
292b7(dkon brtsegs): po la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ gang 'di phung po rnams kyi dper bya ba bstan pa 'di lta ste/ dbu ba rdos pa lta bur bstan pa dang / smig rgyu lta bur bstan pa dang / chu bur lta bur bstan pa dang / chu shing lta bur bstan pa
293a1(dkon brtsegs): dang sgyu ma lta bur bstan pa dang / rmi lam lta bur bstan pa dang / brag cha lta bur bstan pa dang / mig sor lta bur bstan pa dang / gzugs brtan lta bur bstan pa'o//
293a2(dkon brtsegs): gzugs ni chu'i dbu ba lta bu ste/ dbu ba la'ang bdag med/ sems can med/ srog med/ gang zag med/ skyes bu med/ shed bu med/ shed las skyes med/ dbu ba'i rang bzhin gang yin
293a3(dkon brtsegs): pa gzugs kyang de'i rang bzhin te/ gang de la mkhas pa de ni phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// tshor ba ni chu'i chu bur lta bu ste/ chu bur la'ang bdag med/ sems can med/ srog med/ gang zag
293a4(dkon brtsegs): med shed bu medapa shes las skyes med/ skye ba po med/ skyes bu med de/ chu bur gyi rang bzhin gang yin pa tshor ba'ang de'i rang bzhin yin te/ gang de la mkhas pa de ni phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya/
293a5(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes ni smig rgyu lta bu ste/ smig rgyu la'ang bdag med/ sems can med pa nas/ skyes bu med pa'i bar du ste/ smig rgyu'i rang bzhin gang yin pa 'du shes kyang de'i rang bzhin yin te/ gang de la mkhas
293a6(dkon brtsegs): pa da ni phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// 'du byed rnams ni chu shing lta bu ste/ chu shing la'ang bdag med/ sems can med/ srog med pa nas/ skyes bu'i bar du med pa ste/ chu shing gi rang
293a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gang yin pa 'du byed dag kyang de'i rang bzhin yin te/ gang de la mkhas pa de ni phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/ sgyu ma la'ang bdag med/ sems can med//
293b1(dkon brtsegs): srog med/ gang zag med/ shed bu med/ shed bu las skyes med/ skyes bu med/ byed pa po med/ tshor ba po med pa ste/ sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gang yin pa rnam par shes pa'i rang rnas yang
293b2(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ gang de la mkhas pa de ni phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang phung po rnams zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten yin te/ 'jig rten yang 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid do// 'jig rten rnams kyi rang bzhin
293b3(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa phung po rnams kyi rang bzhin yang de yin no// yang 'jig rten gyi rang bzhin gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi rtag pa'i rang bzhin dang / sdug bsngal gyi rang bzhin te/ phung po'ang nga'i rang bzhin no// gang de la
293b4(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa de ni phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' phung po la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor ro// / de la khams la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos kyi
293b5(dkon brtsegs): ni sa'i khams mod kyi/ chos kyi khams sra ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// chos kyi khams ni chu'i khams mod kyi/ chos kyi khams rlan pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// chos kyi khams ni me'i khams mod kyi/ chos
293b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi khams tsha ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// chos kyi khams ni rlung gi khams mod kyi/ chos kyi khams g.yo ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// chos kyi khams ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams mod kyi/ chos kyi
293b7(dkon brtsegs): khams mthong ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// chos kyi khams ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams mong kyon chos kyi khams spa rtogs pa'i mtshan nyer ma yin mo/ chos kyi khams ni sna'i rnam par shes pa'i lam
294a1(dkon brtsegs): mod kyi/ chos kyi khams ji snom pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// chos kyi khams ni lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams mod kyi/ chos kyi khams ro myong ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin no//
294a2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi khams ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams mod kyi/ chos kyi khams reg pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// chos kyi khams ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams mod kyi/ chos kyi khams rnam par
294a3(dkon brtsegs): sgom pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// chos kyi khams dang bdag gi khams de ni mtshungs so// 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams ni mtshungs so// 'khor ba'i kham/
294a4(dkon brtsegs): dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams de mtshungs so// de ltar chos thams cad kyi khams dang nam mkha'i khams de mtshungs te/ stong pa nyid dang mtshungs pas mtshungs par mi 'gyur ba dang mtshungs pas mtshungs te/
294a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dus byas kyi khams su 'jug pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams su 'jug pa'i phyir/ de la bshad pa dpag tu med de/ gang khams la 'jug pa des rab tu 'byed pa de ni mkhas pa zhes bya'o// de ltar na khams la
294a6(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// / de la byang chub sems dpa' skye mched la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ 'di la mig bdag dang bdag sde
294a7(dkon brtsegs): stong pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' mig gi rang bzhin 'di lta bu'o zhes yang gang ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye mched la mkhas pa'o// gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ de bzhin du rna ba dang /
294b1(dkon brtsegs): sgra dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid bdag dang bdag gis stong ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' yid kyi rang bzhin ni 'di lta bu'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ dge ba sogs pa'i
294b2(dkon brtsegs): phyir gang skye mched la kun sogs pa dang / sna tshogs sogs pa de dag sogs par mi byed cing / dge pa dang mi dag pa'i chos rnams la 'du shes gnyis su mi 'jig ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye
294b3(dkon brtsegs): mched la mkhas pa'o// 'di ni mig gi skye mched do// 'di ni gzugs kyi skye mched do zhes de ltar mig dang gzugs rnams la 'dod chags med par mthong yang / 'dod chags med pa mngon du mi
294b4(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye mched la mkhas pa'o// rna ba dang sgra/ sna dang dri/ lce dang ro// lus dang reg/ yid dang chos/ gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i yid dang /
294b5(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi bar du 'dod chags med par mthong mod kyi/ 'dod chags med pa mngon du mi byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye mched la mkhas pa'o// skye mched ces bya ba de'ang 'phags pa'i skye mched dang /
294b6(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa ma yin pa'i skye mched de/ de la 'phags pa'i skye mched ni gang lam sdud par byed pa'o// 'phags pa ma yin pa'i skye mched ni gang lam gtong bar byed pa 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems
294b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' la ma la gnas pa ni sems can lam la brtson pa bor zhing gnas pa la snying rje chen po thob cing / lam gyi skye mched kyang mi gtong ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye mched la mkhas pa'o//
295a1(dkon brtsegs): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' skye mched la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// / de la byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la mkhas pa gang
295a2(dkon brtsegs): zhe na byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la 'jug pa mkhas pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste/ 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang / lam shes pa'o// de lasdu/
295a3(dkon brtsegs): bsngal shes pa gang zhe na/ gang phung po rnams la mi skye bar shes pa de ni sdug bsngal shes pa zhes bya'o// de la kun 'byung ba shes pa gang zhe na/ gang sred pa 'joms pa zhes bya ba de ni kun 'byung ba shes pa
295a4(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o// de la 'gog pa shes pa gang zhe na/ gang mi 'byung mi 'jig par shes pa de ni 'gog pa shes pa zhes bya'o// de la lam shes pa gang zhe na/ gang mnyam pa nyid thob pa'i chos rnams la sgro mi 'dogs
295a5(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni lam shes pa zhes bya'o// gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas bden pa 'di bzhi de ltar shes rab kyis shes kyang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir mngon du mi byed pa de ni bden pa la mkhas pa zhes
295a6(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// gzhan yang bden pa la mkhas pa rnam pa gsum ste/ 'di lta ste/ kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang / don dam pa'i bden pa dang / mtshan nyid kyi bden pa'o// de la kun rdzob kyi bden pa ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad
295a7(dkon brtsegs): ji snyed pa dang / yi ge dang / sgra dang / brdar bstan pa ste/ de ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa zhes bya'o// de la don dam pa'i bden pa gang zhe na/ gang la sems kyi rgyu ba'ang med na yi ge lta ci smos te/ de ni
295b1(dkon brtsegs): don dam pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// de la mtshan nyid kyi bden pa gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ mtshan nyid thams cad mtshan nyid gcig la/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ni mtshan nyid med pa'o// ngal byang chu
295b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' kun rdzob kyi bder pa 'chad pas mi skyo/ don dam pa'i bden pa mngon du byed bar mi lhung / mtshan nyid kyi bden pa mtshan nyid med pas rtogs par byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la
295b3(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa zhes bya'o// gnan yang bden pa ni gcig pu/ gnyis ma yin pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ 'gog pa'i bden pa'o// de la bden pa gcig pu la gang sgro mi 'dogs pa dang / sems can sgro 'dogs par ltung ba rnam
295b4(dkon brtsegs): la bden pa sbyor bar byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang phung po lnga rnams ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ gang phung po lnga rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid de ni sdug
295b5(dkon brtsegs): bsngal zhes bya'o// sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid rtogs pa de ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// gang phung po lnga rnams kyi bag la nyal rgyu sred pa las byung
295b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i lta ba de ni kun 'byung ba'i bden pa'o// gang sred pa'i rgyu lta ba de la'ang sgro mi 'dogs mi len mi snyems pa de ni kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// gang phung po lnga rnams shin tu zad pa'i phyir/
295b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gog pa sngon gyi mthang ma byung ba/ phyi ma'i mthar mi 'pho ba/ da ltar byung bar mi gnas pa de ni 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// gang lam la brten nas sdug bsngal shes pa dang / kun 'byung shes/
296a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa la'ang reg par byed la/ rjes las rtogs pa'i shes pa'ang thob par byed pa de ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes
296a2(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// gang bden pa shes pa de la rnam par rtog pa dang / sems can yongs su brtag pa la rtog par byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang tshor ba thams
296a3(dkon brtsegs): cad sdug bsngal ba ste/ de la tshor bar bya ba rnam par 'byed pa dang / blos rig pa nyid de/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// rgyu gang gis kun 'byung bar shes pa'i rgyu de ji lta ba yang dag par/
296a4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu shes pa de ni kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// gang tshor ba gtor zhing ma mtshor ba tshor bar byed pa dang / 'gog pa la'ang so sor rtog la/ tshor ba 'gog pa'ang mngon du mi byed pa de ni/
296a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// tshor ba gang gis gzings dang 'dra ba'i lam de sdud par byed la/ tshor ba dgog pa'ang ma yin pa de ni byang chub sems
296a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// de ltar rtogs nas bden pa de bzhi la mnyam par mthong zhing / mthong ba shin tu dag pa'ang ma yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i
296a7(dkon brtsegs): bden pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang skye ba sdug bsngal ba ste/ gang mi skye ba la so sor rtog pa shes pa de ni sdug bsngal shes pa zhes bya'o// srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba ste/ gang srong ba 'jig par shes
296b1(dkon brtsegs): bde ni kun 'byung ba shes pa zhes bya'o// skye ba thams cad gang gis mi skye bar shes la/ de la 'gog pa gang yang med cing / gang mi 'gog par shes pa de ni zad pa 'gog pa shes pa zhes bya'o// gang
296b2(dkon brtsegs): de ltar tshor ba dang / 'jal ba dang / yongs su tshol ba dang / rnam par rtogs pa dang / 'jug pa'i shes pa de ni lam shes pa zhes bya ste/ gang bden pa'i shes pa de la gzhog par byed kyang / ngan pa'i shes
296b3(dkon brtsegs): pa de la mi gnas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la mkhas pa ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// / de la byang chub sems
296b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i so so yang dag par rig pa la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i so so yang dag par rig pa ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
296b5(dkon brtsegs): chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang / nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'o// de la don so so yang dag par rig pa gang zhe na/ gang
296b6(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams la don dam pa'i tshig tu shes pa dang / gnyis su med pa'i rgyu shes pa dang / rkyen shes pa dang / 'dus pa shes dang / mtha' med pa'i rjes su 'gro ba shes pa dang / rten pa la 'jug pa
296b7(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pashes pa dang / de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su 'jug pa shes pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' mi gnas pa shes pa dang / stong pa nyid rjes su rtogs pa shes pa dang / mtshan ma med pa rtog pa shes
297a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / smon pa med pa la smon pa med par shes pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa la mngon par 'du mi byed par shes pa dang / tshul gcig tu 'jug pa shes pa dang / sem
297a2(dkon brtsegs): can med par 'jug pa shes pa dang / bdag med par 'jug pa shes pa dang / srog med par byed pa shes pa dang / gang zag med par don dam par shes pa dang / 'das pa'i dus la ma chags par shes pa
297a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la mtha' med par shes pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i rus la thams cad du shes pa dang / phung po rnams la sgyu mar shes pa dang / khams rnams la sbrul gdug pa lta bur shes pa dang /
297a4(dkon brtsegs): skye mched rnams la stong pa nyid du nges par rtog pa shes pa dang / nang zhi ba shes pa dang / phyi rol tu mi rgyu ba shes pa dang / yul la yul med par shes pa dang / dran pa la gnas su shes pa dang / rtogs
297a5(dkon brtsegs): pa la khong du chud par shes pa dang / blo gros la mngon sum du shes pa dang / bden pa la rab tu rtogs par shes pa dang / sdug bsngal la mi 'byung bar shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba la mngon par 'du mi
297a6(dkon brtsegs): byed par shes pa dang / 'gog pa la mtshan nyid med par shes pa dang / lam la sgrol bar shes pa dang / chos 'tshig rab tu tha dad par shes pa dang / dbang po rnams la 'jig par shes pa dang
297a7(dkon brtsegs): stobs rnams la mi brdzi ba shes pa dang / zhi gnas la gnas su shes pa dang / rtsig mthong la snang bar shes pa dang / zlum la bsgrub par shes pa dang / sdig rgyal 'khrug par shes pa dang /
297b1(dkon brtsegs): rmi lam la mi bden pa mthong bar shes pa dang / brag chal rkyen la 'jug par shes pa dang / mig yor la 'pho bar shes pa dang / mtshan nyid sna tshogs la mtshan nyid gcig tu shes pa dang / 'du bal 'brur
297b2(dkon brtsegs): bar shes pa dang / rab tu sbyangs pa la phyir mtshams sbyor ba med par shes pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa la sgra'i rjes su 'gro bar 'jug pa shes pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la rten pa la 'jug pa shes
297b3(dkon brtsegs): shing dben pa la mchog tu shes pa dang / theg pa chen po la'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs bsags pa thams cad shes pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i don so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o// gzhan
297b4(dkon brtsegs): yang ron so so yang dag par rig pa ni gang don la rton pa ste/ chos thams cad kyi chos nyid kun gyi don la rton pa nyid kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ma lus par stong pa ste/
297b5(dkon brtsegs): stong pa'i don gang yin pa de ni don no// chos thams cad ma lus par mtshan ma med pa ste/ mtshan ma med pa'i don gang yin pa de ni don no// chos thams cad ma lus par smon pa med pa ste/ smom pa med/
297b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i don gang yin pa de ni don no// chos thams cad ma lus par rnam par phye ba ste/ rnam par phye ba'i don gang yin pa de ni don no// chos thams cad ma lus par sems can med/ srog med/ gang zag med pa ste/ gang
297b7(dkon brtsegs): zag med pa'i don gang yin pa de ni don no// gang de yu'i don rnams rtog pa de mngon so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya ste/ gang dor ston pa de ni gnas med pa ston pa'o// nga ni mi zad pa ston pa'o// so so yang dag
298a1(dkon brtsegs): par rig pa ni rtogs pa'i don ston pa yin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gnang ba/ rjes su yi rang ba/ yang dag pa/ de kho na gzhan ma yin pa/
298a2(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyis shin tu rtogs pa/ thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i don so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o// de la chos so so yang dag par rig pa gang zhe na/ gang
298a3(dkon brtsegs): dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang
298a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i cha dang mthun pa dang / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das par nye bar 'gro ba'i chos rnams la 'jug pa shes pa dang //
298a5(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid shes pa dang / byang chub mnyam pa nyid shes pa dang / khams mnyam pa nyid she ba ste/ de ni chos so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang chos so so yang dag par
298a6(dkon brtsegs): rig pa ni/ gang 'dod tshugs spyod pa rnams la sems 'jug pa shes pa dang / cos pa'i 'dod chags spyod pa rnams dang / 'dod chags brtan pa spyod pa rnams dang / 'dod chags chung ngu myo 'am/
298a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / rnam par mi ldang ba'i 'dod chags spyod pa rnams dang / mtha' ma rtag tu med pa'i 'dod chags spyod pa rnams dang / da ltar byung ba la rkyen gyis 'dod chags spyong pa rnams la 'jug pa ste/ sems
298b1(dkon brtsegs): can gang rag rang du 'dod rgyags la/ phyi rol tu 'dod chags med pa dang / phyi rol tu 'dod chags la/ nang du 'dod chags med pa dang / nang du dang 'dod chags med/ phyi rol tu'ang 'dod chags med
298b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / nang dang phyi rol tu 'dod chags pa dang / nang dang phyi rol tu 'dod chags med pa dang / gzugs la 'dod chags la/ sgra la 'dod chags med pa dang / sgra la 'dod chags la gzug
298b3(dkon brtsegs): la 'dod chags med pa dang / gzugs dang sgra la 'dod chags med pa dang / dril ba dod chags med pa dang / brel 'dod chags la/ rag la 'dod chags med pa dang / reg la 'dod chags la/
298b4(dkon brtsegs): rol 'dod canas zed pa dang / ral 'dod chags pa/ gzugs la 'dod chags med pa dang / tshal 'dod chags med pa ni 'dod chags spyong pa rnams kyi 'jug pa ste/ 'jug pa
298b5(dkon brtsegs): gos 'dod nanas spong ba rnams la nyi khri tshig stong zhe sdang spong ba rnams la nyi khri tshig stong / gti mug myong ba rnams la ci khri tshag stong / cha mnyam par sbyong ba rnams la nyi khri cis slong ste
298b6(dkon brtsegs): gang ra dag gi myong ba brgyad khrib zhi stong gi sems 'jug pa shes pa dang / ji ltar rigs par bsnun pa shes pa dang / mi mang mi nyung bar bstan pa shes pa dang / 'dod pa las yang dag par 'das
298b7(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / rjod kyi rgyad padags pa dang / 'bras su song bar bstan pa shes pa ran rdzas ma ma yang dag par rin panas kyil 'dzes pa'i tshemam sa yangag pa
299a1(dkon brtsegs): gang zhen/ bang sa thams cad la smad med par 'jug pags pa dang / lha gang dang / klu'i gang dang / gnad sbyi gyi gang dang / rba ba'i skad du/
299a2(dkon brtsegs): skad dang / lto 'phye chen po'i skad dang / mi rang mi ma yin pa'i skad dang / 'gro ba lngar skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi skad dang / sgra rang dbyangs rnams las skad das de dag la chos 'chang ba ste/
299a3(dkon brtsegs): de ni nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o// de ltar chos de dag brtag par bya'o// de ltar chos de dag bsdu bar bya'o// de ltar chos de dag rjes su rgyun chags par bya'o// de ltar
299a4(dkon brtsegs): chos de dag yi ge rnams kyis sbrel bar bya'o// de tshig gcig gi bla dgas shes/ tshig gnyis pa'i bla dgas shes/ tshig mang po'i bla dgas shes/ bud med kyi tshig shes/ skyes pa'i
299a5(dkon brtsegs): chog shes/ ma ning gi tshig shes/ bsdus pa'i tshig shes/ rgyas pa'i tshig shes/ smad pa'i tshig shes/ bstong pa'i tshig shes/ 'das pa'i tshig shes/ ma 'ongs pa'i tshig
299a6(dkon brtsegs): shes da ltar byung ba'i tshig shes yi ge gcig gis sgro btags pa shes/ yi ge mang pos sgro btags pa shes te/ de ni nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o// yang de'i nges
299a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa ni 'khrul pa ma yin zlos pa ma yin/ btags pa ma yin/ don gsal ba'i ye shes yongs su byang ba ste/ ci nas kyang 'khor yang dag par dga' ba snga
299b1(dkon brtsegs): tshogs pa zab pa/ zab par snang ba/ kun rdzob dang don dam pas brgyan pa/ bdag gis sems mthong ba'i shes pa la rag lus pa/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba/ sems can tham kyang dga' ra
299b2(dkon brtsegs): byed pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'i spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa gang zhe na/ gang tshig bza dang /
299b3(dkon brtsegs): mi gnas par lung bstan pa ston pa/ rgyun mi 'chad pa/ spobs pa myur ba/ spobs pa mgyogs shing myur ba/ spobs pa ma rmongs pa spobs pa ji ltar dris pa bzhin pa/ spo bas pa
299b4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su ma nyams pa/ spobs pa mi 'gal ba spobs brtsod pa med pa/ spobs pa chos la rab tu dga' ba/ spobs pa bzod pa la gnas pa/ spobs pa zang ba spobs pa sna tshogs/
299b5(dkon brtsegs): kun rdzob dang don dam pa la spobs pa/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab thams cad la gnas pa'i spobs pa
299b6(dkon brtsegs): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / la sa rang zhi gnas dang lhag
299b7(dkon brtsegs): mtha 'a tshangs pa/ bsam gzha dang / rnam par 'ar ba dang ting nge 'dzin dang / sgoms par 'jug pa dang / 'dzin pa la 'jug pa thams pa gas pa mangs pa/ reg pa mas
300a1(dkon brtsegs): cad sa stsongs pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems dang byung ba la songs pa/ tshig skrag pa'i tshams pa/ ga ma nu pa ma pa/ chags ma
300a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyab ma ma tsham pa'i thabs pa/ tshig mche pa thongs gsa' ga/ tshig mtshugs pa/ pan du/ ga zil du/ ga natshig pa #
300a3(dkon brtsegs): chag sen pa/ tshig 'jam pa tshig ma snang ba/ tshig 'phags pa thams cad kyis bskyod pa ste/ zhing mnga' yas pa'i rnam parags pa rjes su song ba'itshangs pa'i sgra ga
300a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbyangs dang 'dra ba/ rtogs par byed pa'i sgra gcig pa sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i spobs pas sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan dag la chos ston to// de'i chos bstan pa de'ang
300a5(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar byed pa/ de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o// de ni byang chub sems dpa'/
300a6(dkon brtsegs): groces pa la mkhas pa ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de la byang chub sems dpa'i rton pa la mkhas pa
300a7(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rton pa 'di bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don la rton gyi/ chog 'bru la ma yin pa dang / ye shes la rton gyirnam par shes pa la
300b1(dkon brtsegs): mayin pa dang / ngas raza kyi mar pa rnams la nyan na/ dang ba nga rnams lam yim pa dang / chos nyid la can ci/ gang zag la sa yin pa/ dal don dngani
300b2(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni gang 'jig rten gyi chos kyi bya ba la 'jug pa'o// don ces bya ba ni gang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rtogs pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni sbyin pa dang
300b3(dkon brtsegs): dul ba dang / sdom pa dang / nges pa bstan pa'o// don ces bya ba ni dul ba dang / zhi gnas dang / gsar pa ma yin pa dang rnying ba ma yin par shes pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni 'khor ba
300b4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bshad pa sgrogs pa'o// don ces bya ba ni mi dmigs pa la rton pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan yongs su sgrogs pa'o// don ces bya ba ni chos rang /
300b5(dkon brtsegs): gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni theg pa ji ltar rnam par gzhag pa bzhin du 'chad pa'o// don ces bya ba ni chos tshul gcig pa rtogs par shes
300b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad mi gtong bar bstan pa'o// don ces bya ba ni 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni lus dang / ngag dang / yid sdom zhing bslab pa
300b7(dkon brtsegs): dang sbyangs pa'i yon tan thams cad yang dag par len par bstan pa'o// don ces bya ba ni lus dang / ngag dang / yid mi dmigs shing mngon par 'du mi byed pa yongs su dag pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes/
301a1(dkon brtsegs): bya ba ni gnod sems kyi zab dang / khro ba dang / ngargyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa 'jom zhing bzod pa dang nges pa bstan pa'o// don ces bya ba ni mi skye ba'i
301a2(dkon brtsegs): la bzod pa 'thob pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni dge ba'i rtsa ba la brtson 'grus rtsoms pa thams cad bstan pa'o// don ces bya ba ni mi len mi gtong ba la gnas pa'i brtson 'grus so// tshig 'bru
301a3(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa bstan pa'o// don ces bya ba ni 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug pa shes pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba
301a4(dkon brtsegs): ni thos pa thams cad 'dzin pa shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// don ces bya ba ni brjod du med pa'i don to// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi chos rnams rab tu bstan pa'o//
301a5(dkon brtsegs): don ces bya ba ni gang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi chos rnams nan tan du byed pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byed pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang /
301a6(dkon brtsegs): lam rab tu bstan pa'o// don ces bya ba ni 'gog pa mngon du byed pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni ma rig pa la sogs te/ rga shi'i bar du bstan pa'o// don ces bya ba ni ma rig pa 'gog pa nas
301a7(dkon brtsegs): rga sho'i bar du 'gog pa'o// tshig 'bru nas bya ba ni ni gnas dang lhag mthong gi tshogs bstan pa'o// don ces bya ba ni rig pa dang rnam par grol ba shes pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni gang 'dod chags
301b1(dkon brtsegs): sa rgyu mas sa canan sgyu
301b2(dkon brtsegs): mams ca ldan pa// das rgya rlo pa meng pan pags rnam par ga/ na gagasas byu gas nga
301b3(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa'o// don ces bya ba ni gang chos 'dod chags med pa dang / 'dus ma byas pa'i dge 'dun gyi yon tan bsgrub pa'o// tshig 'bruzhes bya 'ani gang byang chub sems dpa'i thathamasas
301b4(dkon brtsegs): nas byang chub tu meng byo dur du bslab pa dang don rnam pa bstan pa'o// nga ces bya na sems kyi sa ga pacig dang ldan pas/ thams cad mkhyen par ye shes mang ba rdzogs pa
301b5(dkon brtsegs): chub pa'o// mdar na chos kyi bur ba brgyad khri ba ni slong gi bar du bstan pa na rlo 'bru zhes bya'o// sgra dang / phab dang / hU~M ba bru thams cad 'arjod du med par ma dan/ 'a ma
301b6(dkon brtsegs): don gyi mdo sde gang zhe na/ gang tshig 'bru bshad pa ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du rgya cher khong du chud par bya ste/ 'di dag ni drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde dag go// nges pa'i rin gyi mdo sde gang 'am don gang bshad pa ji ltar gyung /
301b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du rgya che bong du chung bar bya ste/ de dag ni nges pa'i dor gyi mdo sde dag go// da ji ltar na chos la ton gyi/ gang zag la ma yin nan/ gang drang ba'i don de ni gang zag gi don yin pas la mi na gyigs
302a1(dkon brtsegs): nges pa'i don de ni chos nyid ji lta ba bzhin pas de la rton pa ste/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i rton pa bzhi pa'o// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rten/
302a2(dkon brtsegs): pa la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// / bam po bco brgyad pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshig 'bru la mkhas pa
302a3(dkon brtsegs): zhe na 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chos gnyis la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// chos gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rnam par shes pa la mkhas pa dang / ye shes la mkhas
302a4(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no// de la rnam par shes pa gang / ye shes gang zhe na/ rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ rnam par shes pa'i gnas pa bzhi'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ gzugs la zhugs pa'i rnam/
302a5(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa yongs su gnas shing gnas pa dang / tshor ba la zhugs pa dang / 'du shes la zhugs pa dang / 'du byed la zhugs pa'i rnam par shes pa yongs su gnas shing gnas pa ste/ de ni rnam par shes pa zhes/
302a6(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// de la ye shes gang zhe na/ gang len pa'i phung po lnga rnams la gnas pa/ rnam par shes pa'i phung po yongs su shes pa de ni ye shes zhes bya'o// gang sa'i khams rnam par shes pa dang / chu'i
302a7(dkon brtsegs): khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams rnam par shes pa de ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// gang yang ye shes khams bzhi la mi gnas pa/ chos kyi dbyings tha mi dad pa shes pa de ni ye shes
302b1(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o// gzhan yang rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni gang mig gi rnam par shes pas shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnams shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pas shes par bya ba'i sgra rnams dang / sna'i
302b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pas shes par bya ba'i dri rnams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pas shes par bya ba'i ro rnams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes par bya ba'i reg rnams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pas shes
302b3(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i chos rnams shes pa de ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// gang yang nang gi skye mched rnams la nye bar ni zhing / phyi rol rgya skye mched rnams la rgyu ba med pa ye shes la rton pas/ chos
302b4(dkon brtsegs): gang yang gzhog par mi byed pa de ni ye shes zhes bya'o// gzhan yang rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa las rnam par shes pa skye ba dang / yongs su rtog pa las rnam par shes bskyed ste/ de ni rnam
302b5(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa zhes bya'o// gang yang mi 'dzin pa/ mi snyems pa/ mi dmigs pa/ rnam par mi rig pa/ mi 'khrugs pa de ni ye shes zhes bya'o// gzhan yang 'dus byas la spyod pa'i chos rnam la rnam
302b6(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa gnas kyi/ 'dus ma byas pa la rnam par shes pa rgyu ba med de/ gang yang 'dus ma byas shes pa de ni ye shes zhes bya'o// gzhan yang skye ba dang 'jig pa la gnas pa de ni rnam par shes pa'o
302b7(dkon brtsegs): gang mi skye mi 'gag mi gnas pa de ni ye shes zhes bya'o// de la nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde gang / drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde gang zhe na/ mdo sde gang dag la ma la 'jug par byed pa de dag ni drang ba'i dor ces bya'o//
303a1(dkon brtsegs): mdo sde gang dag 'bras bu la 'jug par byed pa de dag ni nges pa'i don ces bya'o// mdo sde gang dag kun rdzob sgrub par byed pa de dag ni drang ba'i don ces bya'o// mdo sde gang dag do
303a2(dkon brtsegs): dam pa bstan pa de dag ni nges pa'i don ces bya'o// gzhan yang mdo sde gang dag las kyi bya ba la 'jug pa de dag ni drang ba'i don ces bya'o// mdo sde gang bdag las dang nyon mongs pa zad par bstan pa de dag ni nges
303a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i don ces bya'o// gzhan yang mdo sde gang dag kun nas nyon mongs pa yongs su bshad pa'i phyir bstan pa de dag ni drang ba'i don to// mdo sde gang dag rnam par byang ba rnam par dag pa'i phyir bstan pa de dag ni nges
303a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i don to// mdo sde gang dag khong ngas skyo bar byed pa de dag ni drang ba'i don to// mdo sde gang dag 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa gnyis su mi 'jug pa de dag ni nges pa'i don to// mdo sde gang dag yi ge dang tshig sna tshogs su
303a5(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa de dag ni drang ba'i don to// mdo sde gang dag zab pa/ lha dka' ba/ rtogs par dka' ba de dag ni nges pa'i don to// mdo sde gang dag tshig 'bru mang ba sems can rnams kyi sems rangs par byed pa de dag ni drang /
303a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i don to// mdo sde gang dag tshig dang tshig 'bru nyung langs par rtog par byang ba de dag ni nges pa'i don to// gzhan yang mdo sde gang dag bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed bu dang /
303a7(dkon brtsegs): shes las skyes dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po'i sgra sna tshogs bdag po med pa bdag po yod pa bzhin du bstan pa de dag ni drang ba'i don to// mdo sde gang dag stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
303b1(dkon brtsegs): mi 'byung ba dang / ma klas pa dang / yang dag par mi 'byung ba dang / sems can med pa dang / gang zag med pa dang / dus bsus las rnam par thar pa'i go bstan par dganings par da ces rnam
303b2(dkon brtsegs): gong sa na/ 'du bab cu sa pa la gnas te/ ches 'acig la rtsom pade ni gang zag ces bya'o// bang zag tu sgru ba rtsom pa de'i gang chos gnas pa chos kyi dbyings dan chos nas spyod
303b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang gang zag ni so so'i smra ba'i gang zag dang / so so'i skye bo dge pa'i gang zag dang / dang pa'i rdzas su 'aza ba'i 'angs dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i gang zag dang brkyad pa'i ba
303b4(dkon brtsegs): zag dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i gang zag dang / lam cig phyir 'ong ba'i gang zag dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i gang zag dang / dgra bcom pa'i gang zag dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi gang zag dang / byang chubs
303b5(dkon brtsegs): rapa'i gang zag dang / skyeb mang po la phan pa dang / skye mang po la le sa'ajig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / lha dang mi'i skye bo phal po che'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir gang zag gcig 'jig rten du skye
303b6(dkon brtsegs): zhib 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te gang zag gi sgra de thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas kun rdzob kyi gnas kyis sems
303b7(dkon brtsegs): can rnams gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa'o// de la gang mngon par chags pa de dag ni rton pa ma yin pa zhes bya'o// de dag rton pa la dgod pa'i phyir chos nyid la rton par bya'o// gang zag la ma yin no zhes bcom
304a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis gsungs te/ de la chos nyid gang zhen/ 'ad / mi 'gyur ba/ sgom btags pa/ mi bye sa/ rnam bya mi byed gA mi gnas phrag gnas
304a2(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba med pa/ thams cad du mnyam pa/ mnyam pa la mnyan pa/ mi mnyam pa la mnyam pa/ mnyam pa dang mimacan pa la mnyam pa/ rnam par mi rtog pa/ mi tsam pa/ nges par gyur
304a3(dkon brtsegs): thob pa/ chos thams can shin tu ngo bo nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid re ni chos nyid ces bya ste/ gang dag chos nyid la rton par byed pa de dag ni khams gang la'ang ston par mi byed de/ de ngas na chos kyi
304a4(dkon brtsegs): tshul gyi sgo la 'jug pa 'dis chos thams cad la rton pa'i phyir chos thams cad de lta bu'i chos nyid yin no// de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rton pa bzhi zhes bya ste/ de ni byang chub sems
304a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i rton pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rton pa la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// // de la byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la/
304a6(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshogs ni 'di gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsod nams kyi tshogs dang / ye shes kyi tshogs so/
304a7(dkon brtsegs): de la bsod nams kyi tsho gas gar zhe na/ sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / sgom pa
304b1(dkon brtsegs): las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / byams pa'i sems la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / snying rje'i sbyor ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la brtson pa dang / bdag dang pa la
304b2(dkon brtsegs): gyi sdig pa 'chags pa dang / dus gsum du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad dang / slob pa thams cad dang / mi slob pa thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / sems
304b3(dkon brtsegs): dang po bskyed pa rnams dang / spyod pa la zhugs pa thams cad dang / phyir mi ldog pa rnams dang / skye ba gcig gis thog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa la rjes su yi
304b4(dkon brtsegs): rang ba dang / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldam du rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang /
304b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'phags pa thams cad la chos gsol ba 'debs pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / dge ba thams cad byang chub tu bsngo ba dang ldan pa'i sonas
304b6(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i dngos po dang / sems can byang chub tu sem ma bskyed pa rnams byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rnams la pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam ston pa dang / dbul
304b7(dkon brtsegs): bo rnams la longs spyod kyis sdud pa dang / nang pa rnamaso la sman sbyin pa dang / gus par bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / mthu chung ba rnams la bzod cing dang du len pa dang / ltung ba rnams mi
305a1(dkon brtsegs): 'chab pa dang / sdig pa 'chags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa dang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnams la bsnyen bkur dang ri mo tham cad kyad
305a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / slob dpon dang mkhan po rnams la ston pa bzhin du ri mo byed pa dang / chos la rin po che rin thang med pa bzhin du yongs su tshol ba'i brtson 'grus dang / chos smra ba la dga' zhing dpag tshad gyur/
305a3(dkon brtsegs): yang song ste/ chos nyan pas chog mi shes pa dang / zang zing med par chos 'chad pa dang / pha dang ma la rim gro byed pa dang / byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa shes pa dang / 'gyog pa med pa dang / bsod nams
305a4(dkon brtsegs): bsags pas chog mi shes pa dang / lus bsdams shing tshul 'chos pa med pa dang / ngag bsdams pa'i ngag la tshul 'chos pa med pa dang / yid bsdams pa'i yid la tshul 'chos pa med
305a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten btsugs pa'i phyir tshangs pa'i bsod nams yongs su 'dzin pa dang / mchod sbyin gtan pa med pa bsags pas mtshan yongs su rdzogs pa dang / de/
305a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs sna tshogs bsags pas dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs pa dang / nga rgyal med pas lus brgyan pa dang / ngag gi nyes pa thams cad spangs pas ngag brgyan pa dang / blo thogs
305a7(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa'i sems brgyan pa dang / mngon par shes pa sprul pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan dang / ye shes yongs su dag pas chos kyi mtshan nyid kyi rgyan dang / phra ma dang / zhe gcor pa dang
305b1(dkon brtsegs): dbye ba'i tshig yongs su spangs pas 'khor mang po'i rgyan dang / chos 'dzin pas 'dod chags med pa'i chos kyi rgyan dang / rangab tu dga' nas lags so bya ba byin pas chos kyig ma 'i 'a sa/
305b2(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa dang / sgrub pa dang chod pa rnam par spangs shing gus par chos nyan pas 'bras bu yod par chos// 'chad pa dang / sangs rgyas rnams la dku' thub kyi nags tshal phul bas byang chub kyi shing gi
305b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyan dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sngon du 'gro zhing byang chub kyi sems mi gtong bas byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan dang / las dang nyon mongs pa mi dmigs pas tshe dang shi bo yongs su dag pa dang / rin
305b4(dkon brtsegs): po che 'bangs pa'i dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong bas lag na rin po che dang / mi thar pa'i smon lam thob pas longs spyod mi zad pa dang / khro gnyer med pas mthong ma thag tu sems can rnam dad cing
305b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin 'dzum pas gsong por smra ba dang / sems can thams cad la 'od zer snyoms pas mnyam pa nyid kyi rgyan thob pa dang / ma lobs pa la mi brnyas pas 'od mang po gtong ba dang / tshul khrims
305b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi bsod nams bsags pas skye ba yongs su dag pa dang / lhung ba la mi rtsod pas mngal yongs su dag pa dang / dge ba bcu'i las yongs su dag pas lha dang mir skye ba dang / rjes su bstan pa thams
305b7(dkon brtsegs): cad la rab tu rtogs pas gdon mi za bar gnon pa dang / chos la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyung med pas chos kyi dbang phyug dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pas 'jig rten thams cad la
306a1(dkon brtsegs): mngon sum pa dang / nyi tshe ba'i spyod pa'i mi 'dod pas rgya chen po'i chos la rang ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems mi 'do rabs bsod nams thams cad yongs su
306a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa dang / dad pa sngon du 'gro bas nor bdun yongs su rdzogs pa dang / sngon dam bcas pa nyams su len par byed pas 'jig rten thams cad mi slu ba dang / dge ba'i chos yongs su rdzogs
306a3(dkon brtsegs): pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi/
306a4(dkon brtsegs): tshogs la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ rgya gang gis ye shes skye ba ste/ de ltar rgyu dang rkyen gang dang gzhi ye shes rtogs pa'o// de la rgyu gang / rkyen gang zhe na/ chos tshol ba la rab tu 'dun pa dang / ye shes kyi rjes su song /
306a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la rton gyi/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mi rton pa dang / de dag la nga rgyal mi byed pa dang / bla ma la dga' ba dang / sngon
306a6(dkon brtsegs): pa la dga' ba dang / de'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag gis 'di ni bsam pa dang ldan par shes nas ye shes kyi gtam gang yang mi ston pa med pa dang / snod du shes nas bar chad med par sem/
306a7(dkon brtsegs): rtse gcig tu chos ston pa dang / ngas chos de thos nas chos kyi tshogs la brtson par byed de/ gang chos kyi tshogs la brtson par byed pa de nyid de'i ye shes kyi tshogs la brtson pa yin no//
306b1(dkon brtsegs): de la chos kyi tshogs la ston pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don nyung ba dang / bya ba zung ba dang / sma nyung ba dang / srong dang tho rangs la mi zhal zhing rnal 'byor la brtson pa dang 'jal
306b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i don la yongs su rtog pa dang / phyir zhing yongs su tshol ba dang / sems la rnyog pa med pa dang sgrib pa gnon pa dang / ltung ba las 'byung bar shes pa dang / 'gyod pa med padang
306b3(dkon brtsegs): kun nas ldang ba med pa dang / nan tan snying por byed pa dang / chos la gzhol ba dang / chos la 'bab pa dang / chos la bab pa dang / chos la btul ba dang / rtag par mgo rang gos
306b4(dkon brtsegs): la med bar ba lta bu dang / ye shes tshol ba nyid la gnas pa dang / mi lhod pa dang / brtson 'grus mi gtong ba dang / khyad par du 'gro ba dang 'du 'dzin dben pa dang / gcig pu dga' ba
306b5(dkon brtsegs): dang dgon pa'i bde ba yid la byed pa dang / 'phags pa'i rigs la dga' ba dang / sbyangs pa las mi 'gyur ba dang / chos kyi kun dga' la dga' zhing mos pa dang / 'jig rten rgyang 'phan pa'i gas
306b6(dkon brtsegs): tshig la ri mo mi byed pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos tshol ba la dran pa mi nyams pa dang / rtogs pa la don rtogs pa'i rjes su 'gro ba dang / blo gros la lam gyi rje su mthun par byed pa dang /
306b7(dkon brtsegs): mos pa la sdom pa dang / rkyen la ye shes kyi rjes su rig pa dang / khrel yod pa dang ngo tsha shes pa'i rgyan dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'gros kyi rjes su 'gro ba dang / mi shes pa sel ba dang
307a1(dkon brtsegs): ma rig pa dang gti mug gi ling rtog sel ba dang / shes rab kyi mig rnam par dag pa dang / rab tu rnam par dag pa dang / blo rgya che ba dang / rlom zhum pa dang / rdzor tu tha dad pa
307a2(dkon brtsegs): dang mngon sum du shes pa dang / gzhan la rag ma lus pa'i yon tan dang / rang gi yon tan gyis mi snyems pa dang / pha rol gyi yon tan la rtog pa dang / legs par bya ba'i las byed pa dang
307a3(dkon brtsegs): las kyi rnam par smin pa la mi 'gal bar byed pa dang / las yongs su dag par byed pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes kyi tshogs zhes bya'o// gzhan yang ye shes bya
307a4(dkon brtsegs): tshogs ni sbyin pa bzhi ste/ chos smra ba la gro ba dang / spyi gu dang / gnag btsa' dang / glegs bam sbyin pa dang / chos smra ba la chos kyi stan sna tshogs sbyin pa dang / chos smra ba la rnyed pa dang / bkur
307a5(dkon brtsegs): spyi dang / tshogs su bcad pa thams cad sbyin pa dang / chos smra ba la chos kun bsdu ba'i phyir g.yo med par legs so zhes bya ba sbyin pa ste/ sbyin pa bzhi po de dag ni ye shes kyi tshogs sogs par 'gyur
307a6(dkon brtsegs): ro kun srung ba bzhi rnams ye shes kyi tshogs sogs par 'gyur ba ste/ 'ani gang zhe na/ chos smrab rnams kyi lus yongs su srung ba dang / dge ba srung ba dang / yul dang ljongs
307a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa la yongs su srung ba dang / phan pa'i dngos po yongs su srung ba ste/ kun srung ba ni bzhi po de dag go/ ma bar rngon pa bzhi ye shes kyi tshogs su 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na
307b1(dkon brtsegs): chos su pa rnams kyi rgyamatha par dran pa dang / mthom pa par cad pa dang / rang da par rngon pa dang / byang rnabaca par ston pa'o// stobs lnga lams tha tshogs su 'gyu hA/ sa gang zhen//
307b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ mos pa'i phyir dang pa'i stobs dang / thos pa tshol ba'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i phyir dran pa'i stobs dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi chos la nges
307b3(dkon brtsegs): par rtogs pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang / thos pa'i stobs kyi phyir shes rab kyi stobs te/ stobs lnga po de dag ye shes kyi tshogs su 'gyur ro// tshul khrims bzhi ye shes kyi
307b4(dkon brtsegs): tshogs sogs par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos la nges pa'i tshul khrims dang / chos 'chol ba'i tshul khrims dang / chos nges par rtogs pa'i tshul khrims dang / byang chub tu
307b5(dkon brtsegs): bsngo ba'i tshul khrims te/ tshul khrims bzhi po de dag ye shes kyi tshogs sogs par 'gyur ro// bzod pa bzhi ye shes kyi tshogs sogs par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos tsho
