337a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du gyur par che ba dang / dge bar chags pa'i sgra/
337b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / tshigs su bcad pa mngon par byung nas/ rgyal po ma thul gyis rgyal po mar me bdag gi dus ma bslabs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa/
337b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas nas/ de nyid kyi nub mo rgya cher sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur pa'i bar du che ba dang / dge bar grags pa'i sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa thos so// shAri'i bu de nas rgyal po
337b3(dkon brtsegs): dgra sbrul gyis/ rgyal po mar me bdag la khyod kyi sras rab tu byung nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bdag gis zlos te/ ba ga na
337b4(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi sras mar me mdzad mthong bar 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag gi drung du gshegs su gsol/ de ste mi gshegs na bdag
337b5(dkon brtsegs): nyid dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang bcas te mchi'o zhes pho nya btang ba dang / de nas shA ri'i bu rgyal po mar me bdag gis rtsis pa dang / blon po dang / sgo ba dang / 'khor rnam
337b6(dkon brtsegs): ba sogs te/ de ltar gyur pa bdag bzlas pa dang / de dag gis lha de ltar na bcom ldan 'das de nyid la gsol na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni thugs rje che bas thugs rjer dgongs
337b7(dkon brtsegs): te nga rgyal po dag thul gyi drung du gshegs par 'gyur te/ rgyal po dgra thul kyang 'dir mi mchi bar 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang / shA ri'i bu de nas rgyal po mar me bdag blon po dag dang 'grogs te/
338a1(dkon brtsegs): / bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ de ltar gyur pa de dag gsol to// sa
338a2(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis/ rgyal po mar me'i bdag po la de bas na rgyal po chen po thugs brje ba'i phyir/ rgyal po dag thul gyi
338a3(dkon brtsegs): du gshegs so zhes bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad lha rdzas mchog gi rgyal po'i pho brang du ji srid dgyes par bzhugs nas/ dgra sam
338a4(dkon brtsegs): pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang thabs cig tu yul rgyu zhing gshegs so// rgyal po mar me'i bdag po'ang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang
338a5(dkon brtsegs): bcas te zham ring theg thag tu 'brang zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad 'khor dang bcas pa la na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang
338a6(dkon brtsegs): yo byad rnams kyis bkur sti byed cing / bdag gi yul gyi bar du zham ring byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum bskor
338a7(dkon brtsegs): mchi ma grags nas sar log pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dam bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sang+yas mar me mdzad dgra bcom pa bya ba zag brgyad cu dang thabs cig tu
338b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po'i pho brang bad+ma can du gshegs par rgyal po dgra thul gyis zos so// de nas rgyal po dag thul gyis rgyal po'i bo zang pad+ma can brgyan te/ sa gzhi dang / lam gyi
338b2(dkon brtsegs): mdo dang / sum mdo dag la gseg ma dang gyo mo dag sel du btsud de bsal nas/ phyag bdar dang chag chag 'debs su btsud do// spos chu'i chag chag 'debs su btsud do// me tog bkram pas
338b3(dkon brtsegs): pus mo nub pa tsam du byin par byed du btsung ngo // gdug pa'i sdong nas kyang bdug pa byas so// gos rin po che sna bdun gyi tha re bres/ sil snyan sna tshogs kyang dkrol du btsud do// de nas rgyal
338b4(dkon brtsegs): bo dag bral gyis rgyal po'i pho zang pad+ma can brgyan nas/ gang rgyal po'i pho brang pad+ma can kun na me tog dang / dri dang / byug pa yod pa rnams sus kyang ma spyad cig/ ma bcongad zhig/ de thams ca
338b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad la dbul zhing mchod pa'i las su gyis shig/ la la zhig spyod dam 'tshong na de ni chad pa chen pos bcang ngo zhes sba bsgrags so// de nas rgyal po dag thul gyis/ bcom ldan
338b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad la blta ba dang phyag bya ba'i phyir dpung gyi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang bcas te/ me tog dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / na bza' dang /
338b7(dkon brtsegs): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams dang sil snyan sna tshogs dkrol ba dang / rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang / rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen pos rgyal po'i pho zang pa d+ma can nas phyir byung ngo //
339a1(dkon brtsegs): pad+ma can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyang / bcom ldan 'das de ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad do'i nabs/
339a2(dkon brtsegs): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / dri dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod
339a3(dkon brtsegs): pa byas/ blon po dang / 'khor dang / bram zes dang / khyim bdag de dag gis kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te zham ring du
339a4(dkon brtsegs): 'brang ba dang / rgyal po dag thul sems dga'/ sems mgu/ sems la sgrib pa med/ sems rangs par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zham ring du 'brang ngo // yang de'i tshe na gangs kyi ri'i ngos la
339a5(dkon brtsegs): bram ze rin po che zhes bya ba g.yog bram ze gnon nu lnga brgya yod pa klog tu 'dzud pa'i mkhan po sngags 'chang ba/ rig byed gsum po sba nges par sbyor ba dang bcas pa dang shes gsal
339a6(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pa dang / yi ge rab tu phye ba dang bcas pa dang / sngon byung ba lnga pa rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ tshig re zhing lung ston pa dang / 'jig rten rgyang baphan pa dang /
339a7(dkon brtsegs): mchod sbyin gyi rgyu dang skyes bu chen po'i mtshan rjes su rtogs pa/ rang gi tshig rabs la gsum rig pa dang / slob dpon du gyur par yongs su shes pa zhig gnas te/ shA ri'i bu yang zam
339b1(dkon brtsegs): rin po che de la zam ze gnon nu sprin ces bya ba nye gnas byed pa/ klog tu 'jug pa/ sngags 'chang ba/ rig byed gsum po sba nges par sbyor ba dang bcas pa dang // shes gas pa nga cas
339b2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / yig rang khya ba dang bcas pa dang / sngon byung ba lnga pa rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ tshig re zhing lung ston pa dang / 'jig rten rgyang 'aldan pa dang / mchod byin gyi rgyu dang skyes bu chen po'i mtshan rjes/
339b3(dkon brtsegs): su rtogs pa/ kha na ma tho ba med pa/ rang gi tshig rabasA la gsum rig pa dang / slob dpon du gyur par yongs su shes pa zhig yod do// shA ri'i bu de nas bram ze gzhon nu sbyin ces bya ba rig
339b4(dkon brtsegs): byed lobs nas mkhan po la kye mkhan po bdag gis rig byed lobs te bdag ni yul du mchi na bdag gi bgyi ba ci mchis zhes de skad smras pa dang / kye bu gzhon nu sprin slob dpon
339b5(dkon brtsegs): la nor 'gron bu lnga brgya byin cig ces des de skad smras so// de nas bram ze gzhon du sprin gyis mkhan po'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor nas/ mkhan po'i drung nas song ste/
339b6(dkon brtsegs): de grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / rgyal po'i pho brang dag na rgyu zhing slob dpon la dbul ba'i slob dpon gyi nor btsal te/ de slob dpon gyi nor bsdus nas/ mthar gyis rgyal tshom
339b7(dkon brtsegs): pho brang pad+ma can du byin te/ bram ze gzhon nu sprin gyis rgyal po'i pho zar pad+ma can kun brgyan pa mthong ngo // mthong nas mi zhig bos te/ kye skyes bu rgyal po'i pho zang pad+ma can 'dir ci'i dag 'aston/
340a1(dkon brtsegs): cigag yos par gyur ces smras pa dang / des gzhor du khyod kyis tshigs sam/ roring bcom ldan 'das rabazhin ga shegs pa gra bcom pa nga smras chogs sus
340a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas mar me mdzad dgra bcom pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu dang byang chub sems dpa' sdong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang thabs cag tu rgyal po'i bo zang ba can du gshegs te/ de'i phyir rgyal po'i bo zang
340a3(dkon brtsegs): can 'di kun brgyan to// de la mi dag sbyin pa'ang sbyin par byed/ bsod nams ngag kyang byed do zhes de skad smras pa dang / de nas kyang bram ze sbyin gzhon nus sangs rgyas kyi sgra thos nas dga'
340a4(dkon brtsegs): kha dang / dang ba dang / mgub cher skyes nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung ba dkon te/ shin tu dkon/ u dum wa ri'i me tog 'dra/ mchod sbyin gyi shing gcig pu'i tshul lha
340a5(dkon brtsegs): bu yin pas/ gang bdag gis kar sha pa Na lnga brgya po 'dis me tog nyos te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ma ra me mdzad la me tog gtor la/ slob dpon gyi nor gud nas btsal lo
340a6(dkon brtsegs): snyam mo// yang de'i tshe na bu mo zhig me tog ut+pa la bdun khyer te lam gyi srang nas song ba dang / de nas bram ze gzhon nu sprin gyis bu mo da la/ kye bu mo chu nas byung ba'i me tog gang nas rnyed
340a7(dkon brtsegs): par gyur ces de skad smras pa dang / des phyogs che ge mo zhig na 'phreng ba byed pa'i khang pa gnas bdag gis kar sha pa Na lnga brgyas nyos so zhes smras so// de nas bram ze gzhon nu sprin gyis bu mo de la
340b1(dkon brtsegs): me tog d+ha nas skyes pang dag dzatsam kyim nyes pa pa mi dung lachongs sa desams smras na/ des sngar ba rung gas smras nas/ ras byon gshes khyod lanogs ral gangag bya
340b2(dkon brtsegs): brgyas tor byin cig ce sbas nas/ des 'didag gis ci bya zhes smras pa dang / des bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad la gtor bar bya'o zhes smras so// des gal te khyod sreng ba'i 'gro ba 'chi 'pho thams
340b3(dkon brtsegs): cad du bdag gi khyim thang tu 'gyur bar dam bca' na sbyin no// des bu mo thang khyod de skad ma rer cig/ cing phyir zhen khyod ni g.yeng zhing rgod pa'o// bu mo bla na med pa'i yeshes sangs rgyas kyi chos
340b4(dkon brtsegs): grangs med pa ni bskal pa grangs med pas sgrub dgos te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ 'gron bu dang / nor bu rang mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / b+hu ru chen po dang /
340b5(dkon brtsegs): gser dang / dngul dang ldan pa dang rta dang / glang po che dang / bong bu dang / ba glang dang / lug dang / rgyal srid kyang yongs su gtang ba dang / shing rta yongs su btang ba dang / sras
340b6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su gtang ba dang / bu pho dang bu mo yongs su gtang ba dang / lag pa yongs su gtang ba dang / rus pa dang / rkang dang / gtsug phud yongs su gtang ba dang / rna ba dang / sna dang
340b7(dkon brtsegs): mig dang yan lag mchog yongs su gtang ba'i sbyin pa sbyin par byas te/ mdor na bu mo nang ngam/ phyi'i dngos po gang yang bdag gis yongs su mi gtang bar bya ba med de/ bu mo gang bdag gis
341a1(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyang yongs su gtang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ba'i dus dang tshong du 'gyur na/ khyod ni g.yeng zhing rgod kyis/
341a2(dkon brtsegs): khyod nga'i sbyin pa'i bar chad ma byed cig ces de skad smras pa dang / des gal te khyod lus las sha yungs kar gyi 'brum bu tsam du gcad deng la byin du zin kyang / ngas khyod kyi sbyin pa'i bar chad mi bya'o zhes
341a3(dkon brtsegs): smras nas/ des de la de ltar gyur cig/ chu las skyes pa'i me tog dag nga la byin cig ces smras pa dang / des kyang byin no// de nas bram ze gzhon nu smin gyis me tog u
341a4(dkon brtsegs): la de dag blangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad ga la ba der song ste/ bram ze gzhon nu sprin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad srog chags bye ba khrag khrig
341a5(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong du mas bskor cing mdun du bdar ba mthong ste/ spyod lam mdzes pa'i bar du rgyas par bya'o// de bcom ldan 'das la sems dang bar gyur to// de sems dang bar gyur nas shin tu dag
341a6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / dang pa dang / bkur ste bskyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad ga la ba der song ste/ bram ze gzhon nu sbyin gyis mi mang po dag gis gos bzang po bzung ba dag/ bcom ldan
341a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa ma mdzas kyi ma sa pa mthongs/ des ban lags me tsas/ gang ga shes dgas kyi mags pa 'a ga sams/ das dgas kyi phags pa
341b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / dum ma ga 'a 'dra ba'i sems cad kon chag brgyung du ras byamams pa tshang ngam nas 'gyumang bting ba'ang thas pa ca / 'dus pa sa kyi phyogs ma
341b2(dkon brtsegs): gal ba der song ste byin nas/ ri dgas kyi pags pa patid ste dgongs shig/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad lan nas su na ri rigs kyi pags pa 'phel zhabs gzhag par
341b3(dkon brtsegs): mdzod cig ces sems bsred pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de ba'i na gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis dgongs nas tha ma ze gzhon nu sprin gyi ri dgas kyi pags pa la zhabs gnag go/ de ras tham
341b4(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu sprin dga' mgu rangs rab tu dga' zhing yid bde ba skyes nas de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad la me tog mU t+pal lnga gtor ba dang / lha'i bu brgya phrag du mas lha'i me tog man
341b5(dkon brtsegs): da rab dang / lha'i me tog u t+pal dang pad+ma dang / lho'i tsan ngan gyi phye ma rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad la mngon par gtor/ lha'i si la spyan
341b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams dkrol lha'i glu dbyangs blangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad la bsti stang bya ba'i phyir me tog ut+pa la de dag ut+pal stong phrag du mar byas te/
341b7(dkon brtsegs): me tog gi bla re 'dab ma thur ru lha sdong bu gyen du lta bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad la mngon par/
342a1(dkon brtsegs): gtor to// 'di lta ste/ bram ze gzhon nu sprin sems dang nas/ bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad kyi spyan sngar lo bcu gnyis su ral ba gser gyi kha dog lta bu bti gas/
342a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag dbugs dbyangs par/
342a3(dkon brtsegs): mdzod cig/ bdag la phyag gis drang bar gsol zhes yi dam brtan par byas so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad bdag gi ral pa gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i steng du zhabs
342a4(dkon brtsegs): mi 'jog cing / bdag la dbugs phyin par mi mdzad cing / bdag la byang chub tu lung yang mi ston na/ de'i phyir bdag 'di nyid du lus bskams par bgyi'o zhes yi dam yang btsas so//
342a5(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar med mdzad kun nas spyan kun nas mkhyen pa/ dus ga su ma
342a6(dkon brtsegs): gang yang mi mkhyen pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' ba des/ bram ze'i khye'u sprin gyi bsam pa mkhyen nas/ bram ze'i khye'u sprin gyi ska ral pa gser gyi kha dog lta bu la zhabs bzhag ste/ g.yas byos
342a7(dkon brtsegs): nas glang po'i gzigs pas gzigs te/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun de la/ dge slong dag ral pa rnams la rkang pa ma bzhag cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag bram ze'i khye'u sprin 'di ni
342b1(dkon brtsegs): bskal ba zangs med pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu ltar mam tha'i bye
342b2(dkon brtsegs): sprin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad las lung bstan pa thos nas/ dga' zhing mgu nas steng gi bar snang gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag
342b3(dkon brtsegs): khrig brgya stong phrag brjod du med pa mngon sum du byed do// de la mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi stobs kyis/ shar phyogs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma las 'das pa dag gis/
342b4(dkon brtsegs): bram ze'i khye'u khyor ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung ston pa dang / de bzhin
342b5(dkon brtsegs): du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang de bzhin du shar dang lho'i mtshams nas/ steng dang 'og gi bar dang / phyogs bcu kun nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bas lhag
342b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis/ bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus bskal pa bgrangs med pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar
342b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro zhes lung ston pa mthong ngo // shA ri'i bu de ltar bram ze'i khye'u spen lung bstan pa thos nas dbugs byin par gyur te nam mkha'i dkyil de nas babs nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
343a1(dkon brtsegs): bltar mes dang sa rgyu pas rgyas sa kyis byung pa bya chu sa smra sa sa sug
343a2(dkon brtsegs): sprin ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du de ltar rigs shing the tsam pa na de ltar mi bza'o// n+ya'-i'i phyi ban/ dad ci dus na zlum pa'i che'u stems bya bar gyur ba na
343a3(dkon brtsegs): ngas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad de la me tog ut+pa la lnga gtor te ral pa 'a bting ngo // shA ri'i bu de ltar nabyang chub sems dpa' phreng bstan pargyar du thong par 'dod
343a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnams grangs shin tu mnyan par bya/ blang bar bya/ gzung bar bya/ gzhan dag la'ang brjod par bya/ rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par
343a5(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// gang 'di mtshan ma med pa'i spyod pa'i nan tan gyis bsgrub par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu ngas mngon par shes te/ 'das pa'i dus na mar me mdzad kyi pha rol na ngas dkar po'i
343a6(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi spyod pa gang la ma spyad pa de gang yang med de/ 'on kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis lung sastan to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta rang mtshan ma dang bcas pas spyod par
343a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur to// gang gi tshe gang 'di byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs mtshan ma med par spyod pa/ dmigs pa med par spyod pa/ ji ltar thos pa bzhin du bsrungs pas
343b1(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa/ de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis/ bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub
343b2(dkon brtsegs): ba zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes nga lung bstan to// shA ri'i bu de lta ngas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad mthong ste de bzhin gshegs pa
343b3(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad mthong ma thag tu spyod pa thams cad las 'das te/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mthong ba khong du chud ngo // mthong
343b4(dkon brtsegs): ma thag tu chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis ma skyes par shes so// de'i 'og tu bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad des/ bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med
343b5(dkon brtsegs): ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to// lung bstan ma thag tu mi skye ba'i chos bzod pa rab tu thob bo//
343b6(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa rab tu thob pa ji lta bu zhe na/ gang 'di gzugs rab tu mi rnyed par bzod pa rab tu thob pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rab tu ma
343b7(dkon brtsegs): mi rnyed par bzod pa rab tu thob pa dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams kyi chos thams cad rab tu mi rnyed par bzod pa rab tu thob bo// yang bzod pa rab tu thob pa zhes
344a1(dkon brtsegs): bya ba 'dzin bshong pa med pa chos rab tuthob pa'i tshig pa rags so// tsa phyi na/ bzod parab tu thob pa'i chos dalan 'jig tan gyi chos rnams pan cu
344a2(dkon brtsegs): so ma skye ba chos rnams ma yin/ slob pa'i chos rnam snyam yin/ mi slob pa'i chos rnams ma yin/ byang chub sems dnga'i chos rnams ma rin d+ha/ sangs rgyas
344a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyang mi 'byung ngo // chos thams cad mi 'byung bas nga'i phyir bzod pa rab tu thob pa zhes bya'o// chos thams cad thob pa med cing mi dmigs pas de'i phyir bzod pa rab tu thob pa
344a4(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o// bzod pa de'ang mtshan ma thams cad dang / dmigs pa thams cad kyis skad cig pa yin te/ de'i phyir bzod pa rab tu thob pa zhes bya ste/ de la ni mig med
344a5(dkon brtsegs): ro// mig la smras pa med do// gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ rna ba med/ sna med/ lce med/ lus med/ yid la smras pa med re mi zad pa'i yul de ni bzod pa
344a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba med pa'i yul de ni bzod pa ste/ de'i phyir bzod pa rab tu thob pa zhes bya'o// shA ri'i bu de bas na byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa myur du thob par 'dod pa bdag gis
344a7(dkon brtsegs): gang 'di byang chub sems dpa' sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs mtshan ma med par spyod pa/ lhun gyis grub par spyod pa/ dmigs pa med par spyod pa/ shin tu mnyan par bya/ blang bar bya//
344b1(dkon brtsegs): gzung bar bya/ kun chub par bya/ gzhan la'ang brjod par bya/ rtsa cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya/ nan tan gyis bsgrub par bya'o// yang de'i tshe 'khor
344b2(dkon brtsegs): de nyid du tshong dpon gyi bu mis bya ni zhes bya ba 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/ bcom ldan 'das las byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon
344b3(dkon brtsegs): tan dang byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rnams thos nas/ stan las langs te bla gos zag pa gcig du gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha bas la btsugs te bcom ldan
344b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das gal ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung de// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gnas brtan ma 'gags pas bdag la/ khyim bdag ngas som/
344b5(dkon brtsegs): pa 'thob ste/ 'di ni rga shi'i tha ma'o zhes de ltar 'jug par bgyis/ de skad rjes su bstan mod kyi bdag bcom ldan 'das las byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs
344b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rnams thos nasa'adi snyam du gang 'di ldan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub theg pa chen po nga
344b7(dkon brtsegs): mchog bo dam pa mchog ra kyi rtsom pa bla na med pa'o sam bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das las kyang bdag gis rab tu rnam par bye ba'i chos rnams kyi mchog gang yinas
345a1(dkon brtsegs): de bskyed par bya'o zhes mngon snyam du thos mngon sam du bcu nas/ bdag 'dis ma durab tu rnam par bya ba'i chos bzung ba mamachis pa/ nga bam mtshas pa
345a2(dkon brtsegs): sku bzung ba ma mchis pa rnams kyis chos gang yang mchog/ gtso bo/ mchog rab mnom pa/ blan med pa'i chos de yang dag par baspyad ste 'jug go snyam gyi dang // bcom ldan 'das sa
345a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di snyam du theg pa thams cad kyi nang na ni sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bla na med par gnas pa lags te/ ra bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa ni theg pa gang ji nyid pa de dag gi mchog tu brjod pa nas/ blan myed
345a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bar du brjod pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don
345a5(dkon brtsegs): dang phan pa dang / ba de'i slad du da slan chad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa bcas pa la'ang bslab par
345a6(dkon brtsegs): bgyi'o snyam bgyid do// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong dpon gyi bu mis byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// mis byin bla na med pa yang dag
345a7(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni yid ches par dka' ba bsgrub dka' ba'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yid ches par dka' zhing sgrub par
345b1(dkon brtsegs): dka' lags kyang bcom ldan 'das de dang mthun par brtson 'grus brtsams te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsgrub par bgyi'o// tsa nas kyang bla na med pa yang
345b2(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te sems bskyed pa gad+hA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
345b3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar nus par gyur la/ sems bskyed pa re re'ang bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma skyed du gyur la/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa lan re zhing yang mgo gad+hA'i klung gi bye ma med
345b4(dkon brtsegs): chad par gyur kyang de ltar bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su mi gtang ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni rnam grangs 'dis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
345b5(dkon brtsegs): 'tshang rgya bar spron gang bde ba'i yo byad kyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar lha mos kyang ci 'tshal de ci'i slad du zhen pa bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang das
345b6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i drung chub na dzasar bskal ba bye ba brgya stong du tshig nas kyang long du rgyub paras pa ma lags te/ daltar rgya che ba'o// sangs nas su rgyas 'di dag kyang dasar
345b7(dkon brtsegs): dag bas mchos ma khyal gi/ de sar mtshungs pa ma mchis so// des rabs tu ma mtshas so// dmar bangs ma mchis so// las rgyas
346a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan ngas rnams tsas chus yang dun rgyags pas mas ga mams ma cas ga sa nga 'dus
346a2(dkon brtsegs): ba bye ba stong rnams smra/ bdag ni byang chub sems bskyed cing / sdug bsngal kun gyis gces gyur du/ sems can rnams ni mi gtong ngo // sems bskyed
346a3(dkon brtsegs): lan zhing // mgo yo phung po rab kyi/ 'phang tsam mthon por gyur pa da/ thams cad gtsang bar spro bar bgyi// srog chags kun la phan pa byor/ byang chub
346a4(dkon brtsegs): la bdag 'dug go// de bzhin gshegs pa khyod ci 'jar/ de 'dra kho nar gyur par shog/ theg pa chung ngu theg pa dman// nyan thos theg pa spangs nas ni// de bzhin gshegs pa
346a5(dkon brtsegs): khyod ci 'drar// de'ang kho nar gyur par shog/ theg pa 'di ni theg pa che// sangs rgyas rnams kyis mchog ces bsngags// gzung bar 'os pa gzhan ma mthong
346a6(dkon brtsegs): bas bdag ni byang chub mos/ gnod par gyur pa rnams la skyob/ ngan 'gro gsum las thar bar bgyi// de yi d+hir ni sangs rgyas dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'byung ngo //
346a7(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mis byin 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po 'di lta bu dag shes la gang bu dang chung ma dag chos 'di
346b1(dkon brtsegs): ngag yang dag par 'dzin du ma bcug na/ 'di ri bdag gi mi cha'o snyam nas/ de bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/
346b2(dkon brtsegs): rings shing myur ba'i gzugs kyis rang gi khyim ga la ba der song ste/ chung ma bdun dang / khye'u bdun dang / bu mo bdun dang / zan po bdun dang / zan mo bdun dang lhan
346b3(dkon brtsegs): cig tu ras bcos bu zung stong thogs te/ rol mo mkhan lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig bcom ldan 'das la lta bar 'dod pas rings shing myur ba'i gzugs kyis rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen
346b4(dkon brtsegs): po nas byung ba dang rgyal po'i khab kyi mi dang mi ma yin pa rab tu mang po dag gis tshong dpon gyi bu mas byin g.yo ba dang bcas te rings shing myur ba'i gzugs kyis rgyal po'i khab kyi
346b5(dkon brtsegs): zong khyer chen po nas byung ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces mis byin byung g.yog dang bcas tu rangs shi byur ba'i gzigs kyis gar cha shes 'dzur ba dang
346b6(dkon brtsegs): smras pa skyes bu khyeng cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dam bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bya rgod kyi phung po'i rol 'khor brgya stod zas dums bskor te mdun du sa
346b7(dkon brtsegs): nas/ rnam grangs du mas sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po dag yang dag par rab tu ston te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po dag gi don dang sangs rgyas kyi shes
347a1(dkon brtsegs): bsas kyis mi ca btsang mtshungs pa med pa longs su sgrub pa'i phyir bdag g.yog dang bcas te/ de badzin gshegs da ngag bcom pa yang ga par rdzogs
347a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas ga la ba der song ste/ tha na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dge ba'i rtsa bskyed par byed pa mi shes pan+d+ha/ gal te khyed sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po da
347a3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su sgrub par 'dod na chur sheg/ 'ding ngo // bcom ldan 'das de'i gnang ring ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rgyan da ga gi don gyi phyir dge nga rtsa bskyed par bya'o// da wAr rgyal po
347a4(dkon brtsegs): kyai mi rnams mes byin gyi tshig de thos nas/ srog chags khri phye bzhin du 'azang bar gyur to// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mos byin chung ma bdun dang / khye'u bdun dang bu mo bdun dang /
347a5(dkon brtsegs): bran po bdun dang / bran mo bdun dang lhan cig tu ras gtses bu zung thog nas srog chags stong phrag bcu po de dag dang / rol mo mkhan lnga brgya tsam po de dag dang
347a6(dkon brtsegs): lhan cig tu me tog dang spos dang 'greng ba dang byug pa dang bye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan+na dang /
347a7(dkon brtsegs): rnga dang rol mo sil snyan dkrol te bcom ldan 'das la mchor ba byas nas ras bcos bu zung stong po de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gsol nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su
347b1(dkon brtsegs): bcang pa'adi dag smras so// sems nan dam pa mi mchog gang lags pa/ byang chub mchog tu rnam par dag par spyod // mtha' yas bzigs pa rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog/ de lang
347b2(dkon brtsegs): ring bdag ni mchod par bgyi// gang zhig sngon gyi bskal pa mang por sbyar// srog chags rnams la phan phyir byang chub btsal/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyis dbang mchog banas
347b3(dkon brtsegs): de la de ring bdag gis mchod par bgyi/ bu dang zan bcas nye du'i tshogs dang banas/ srog chags rnams la phan phyir byang chub tshol/ srog chags stong po 'di dang lhan cig tu/
347b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas dang ni chos la skyabs su mchi// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mis byin gyis// bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod nas// bcom ldan 'das
347b5(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can ji snyed pa de bdag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi gan du mchis pa de dag thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
347b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag lags na bcom ldan 'das kyis rtsi nas kyang sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir rdzog
347b7(dkon brtsegs): bar mi 'gyur ba dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa gang lags pa dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis dag blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byathug
348a1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de ltar de dag la chos bstan du gsol/ 'di lta ste/ da ltar bcom ldan 'das bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang chos 'di dag
348a2(dkon brtsegs): thos par gyur cig ces/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mis byin dang / skye dgu'i bdag mo bdun po de dag dang / khye'u bdun dang / bu mo bdun dang / zan po bdun dang / zan mo bdun dang /
348a3(dkon brtsegs): srog chags khri bo de dag dang / rol mo mkhan lnga brgya po de dag gisabacom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag sangs rgyas dang chos
348a4(dkon brtsegs): dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag dge snyen du gzung du gsol dang nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spong ngo //
348a5(dkon brtsegs): su mchis so// mngon par dngango // bcom ldan 'das bdag cag deng nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o// 'di sa
348a6(dkon brtsegs): ltar yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas khyod bzhin du bdag cag kyang blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas rnas sems can rnams la
348a7(dkon brtsegs): chos bstan par bci'o// 'ang tsa / thar bcom ldan pas tshogs lag dmas ngag mdzad par bachen du tshogs la ga mas par bcig bcom ldan 'das 'dzis
348b1(dkon brtsegs): nga lhar bcom ldan 'das sems can sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa rnams thar par mdzad pa de bzhin du bdag cag kyang sems can sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa rnams thar par bgyi'o// de nas
348b2(dkon brtsegs): mkhan lnga brgya po de dag gis sil snyar sgra chen pos bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byed do// srog chags khri bo de dag dang / tshong dpon gyi bu maMs byin chung ma bdun dang khye'u
348b3(dkon brtsegs): bdun dang bu mo bdun dang zan po bdun dang / zan mo bdun dang g.yog thams cad dang / rol mo mkhan lnga brgya po de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum
348b4(dkon brtsegs): skor ba byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du steng gi bar snang la skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so// de nas rol mo mkhan lnga brgya
348b5(dkon brtsegs): bo de dag gis bcom ldan 'das stong gi bar snang la skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang dad pa bskyed nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus rol mo'i cha byad de de dag
348b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dor ba dang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de dag ma gzung bar steng gi bar snang la gnas shing sgra 'byin te/ sgyu 'byin bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa bar snang la bzhugs pa la
348b7(dkon brtsegs): lan gsum skor bar byed do// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu maMs byin g.yog dang bcas pa dang / rol mo mkhan lnga brgya tsam po de dag dang srog chags khri po de dag gis
349a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul 'di mthong nas dga' mgu 'i rangs te/ dga' ba dang yang bad ba skyes nas thams cad pal mo sbyarata/ bcom ldan
349a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das la phyag 'tshal lo// steng gi bar snang dpag tshad gcig khor yug tu'ang sil snyan stong phrag du ma yongs su ma gzung ba dag gis khyab par gyur te/ dper na sbrang rtsa'i sbrang ma'i tshang bzhin
349a3(dkon brtsegs): du steng gi bar snang la rnga dang rol mo'i sel snyan gyi sgra 'byung ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mis byin g.yog dang bcas pa dang / rol mo mkhan lnga brgya tsam po de dag dang srog chags
349a4(dkon brtsegs): khri bo de dag dang chos nyan du sngar lhags pa las srog chags drug stong tsam zhig dang / dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu po de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus steng gi bar snang la
349a5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'phags pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus steng gi bar snang la khang pa brtsegs pa lnga lnga byung ngo // rol mo mkhan gyi khang pa rtsegs pa bzhis bdun gyis bltas pa'i rol mo mkhan
349a6(dkon brtsegs): gyi khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad na chos ston to// bar snang la gnas pa'i lha stong phrag bye ba du ma dag gis lha'i me tog mnar rab dag gtor to// me tog de dag kyang sangs rgyas
349a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi mthus steng gi bar snang la khang pa brtsegs pa brgyad cur gyur to// de nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po steng gi bar snang la gnas pas rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu chen po de mthong nas bcom
349b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la dga' ba dang / dang pa dang / gus pa dang rjes cher byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo'i tshogs chen po ba'i drang ba mkhyen tshong po kyi
349b2(dkon brtsegs): bu mis byin dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen po de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// dbu'i tsug tu mi snang bar gyur ces bya ba'i bar du rgyas par sbyar ro//
349b3(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa mthong nas chos gas zag pa gcig tu gzar te/ bcom ldan 'das gal bA da logs su
349b4(dkon brtsegs): thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag ni rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na 'dzum
349b5(dkon brtsegs): pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags rkyen gang lags de skad ces gsol ba dang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
349b6(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo tshong dpon gyi thams byin 'dis chung ma bdun dang khye'u bdun dang / bu mo bdun dang / bran po bdun dang / zan mo bdun gyis ngal mchod pa rnas
349b7(dkon brtsegs): deskal ba bye ba phrag sdong du log par ltung bar mi 'gro ste lha dang mau rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bskal ma bye ba stong zag brgya 'das nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa/
350a1(dkon brtsegs): sa banom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang pom nas rgyab mashes pa zung bar 'gyu mo// mnyas par byas nas paste srung bzed
350a2(dkon brtsegs): rdzamar byed par 'gyur ri mor byed par gyur mchong par byed par 'gyur/ ra'i 'og tu bsal gyil bur lag par spyad pa pa mi 'gyur// ban ga'
350a3(dkon brtsegs): dpon gyi bu mos byin gyi rgyud ma bdun dang / bu bo bdun dang bu mo bdun dang / zan po bdun dang / zan mo bdun gang yin pa dag ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas bud med kyi lus las
350a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur te/ skyes pa'i lus thob nas byang chub sems dpa' mis rkyen dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par 'gyur ro// de dag bskal la gcig la bla na
350a5(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur te/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mis byin ni de bzhin gshegs
350a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sems snyoms zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' mis byin gyi nam ring ba gang yin pa de thams cad ni de bzhin
350a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa ming tha dad par 'gyur ro// rol mo mkhan lnga brgya po gang yin pa de dag ni bskal pa grangs med par log par ltung bar mi 'gro ste 'khor los sgyur ba
350b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po bye ba phrag stong byed par bzang bas swa ste/ bar skabs der sangs rgyas stong phrag bcu mnyes par byas nas bsti spang byed par 'gyur/ tha mar byed par 'gyur/ ri mor/
350b2(dkon brtsegs): khyad par 'gyur/ mchod par byed par 'gyur ro// thams cad kyang bskal pa gcig la tha na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyurate/
350b3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbyangs 'jam zhes bya bar thams cad kyang ming mthun par 'gyur ro// srog chags khri po de las so gachas
350b4(dkon brtsegs): ba ni brgya ni de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa mnyes par byas nas de'i tshe yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ro// lhag ma rnams ni bskal pa gang+gA'i bye ma sbed du los par
350b5(dkon brtsegs): bar mi 'gro ste/ tshul 'dis sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong mnyes par byas nas bsti stang byed par 'gyur/ bla mar byed par 'gyur/ ri mor byed par 'gyur/ mchod par byed par
350b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// thams cad kyang bsal ba gcig la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par chags par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin mashegs pa da
350b7(dkon brtsegs): ma pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngo mtshar ces bya bar thams cad kyang ming mthur par 'gyur ro/ chog chags drug slong po de dag las chog chags stong ni dbyang na las ngas
351a1(dkon brtsegs): te dam pa'i chos nub nas mtshon gyi bskal pa bar ma ni 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa ni ma byung ba'i dus der/ sems can rnams kyi tshe 'phel bar 'gyur
351a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dus de na rang sangs rgyas brgyad khri 'byung bar 'gyur te/ srog chags stong po de dag gis rang sangs rgyas de dag thams cad mnyes par byas nas bsti stang du byed par 'gyur/ tha mar
351a3(dkon brtsegs): byed par 'gyur/ ri mor byed par 'gyur/ mchod par byed par 'gyur ro// gang zag gi mchog byams pa de'ang mnyes par byas nas bsti stang du byed par 'gyur/ bla mar byed par
351a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ ri mor byed par 'gyur/ mchod par byed par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag nyi shur log par lhung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas lus kyi tha ma bdag gi lus kyi tha ma
351a5(dkon brtsegs): thob nas dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis bskul te/ dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas rang byang chub mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro// srog chags khri po las srog chags mthob
351a6(dkon brtsegs): ba skyes pa stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// lha'i grwa zag khrig phrag drug cu ni chos rnams la chos kyi mog rdul dang thal zhing rjem med pa skyes
351a7(dkon brtsegs): so// kun dga' bo byis pa rnams ma gtogs par/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la su zhig dga' ba dang / ngad pa dang / gus pa dang / rjes skyed par mi byed
351b1(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngus 'di lta bu'i che ba nyid thob cing mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang reg go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so//
351b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas la ni gus byas nas/ 'di 'dra ba yi dpal thob ste/ daphyir gang la byin pa ni/ 'azas bu che ba'i ston la mchod/ gang yang bzhugs la mchod pa dang / gang yang
351b3(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan 'das pa yi/ ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam mchod pa/ de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur bar mthong / gang yang bzhugs la mchod pa dang / gang yang mya ngan 'das pa yi//
351b4(dkon brtsegs): ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam mchod pa/ sems kyang mnyam la 'bras bu mnyam// mnyam pa'i sems su byas nas ni// gang zag mchog la mchod byed pa/ de yi rnam par smin
351b5(dkon brtsegs): ba mnyam/ mtshungs par byang chub 'tshang yang rgya/ bde bar gshegs pa'i lam brdung ste/ ngan par 'gro ba'i lam yang bcad / mya ngan 'das par 'gro ba'i lam
351b6(dkon brtsegs): de yang de la mi dkon no// sangs rgyas tshul khrims dam pa dang / sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin mchog gis/ de phyir mchog la dang byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa mchog
351b7(dkon brtsegs): tu 'gyur/ mchod pa dam pa byas nas ni/ myur du mchog tu 'gyur ba yin// chos kyi dam pa ston mdzad pa/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchog tu 'gyurami gang
352a1(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa sangs rgyas kyi// chos la rten par 'dod pa de// 'dun pa drag po bskyed par bya// mang du thos nas tshul bzhin no// 'khor los sgyur ba
352a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po dang / tshangs pa dbang byed gyur nas ni/ yon tan mang po'i 'byung gnas dang / mya ngan 'das par nges par 'gyur/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis
352a3(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa shA ri'i bu de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
352a4(dkon brtsegs): chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dong ba dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la 'dun pa drag po bsgreng de shin tu mnyan par bya/ blang bar bya/
352a5(dkon brtsegs): gzung bar bya/ bklag par tha ku na chub par bya/ gzhan dag la rjod par bya/ gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhen
352a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i sde sdod ci chos rnam grangs shin tu mnyan tam/ blangs sam/ darlung ngam/ kun chub par byas sam/ gzhan dag la brjod dam/ gzhan ngag la rgya
352a7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rab tu bstan ni/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyan mi 'chang bar bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin no// tshad med pa bzhi dang mi 'bral ba yin no// pha rol tu phyin brgya/
352b1(dkon brtsegs): la brtson pa yin no// bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can rnams srung par brtson pa yin no// shA ri'i bu gang 'di byang chub sems dpape sde snod kyi chos kyi rnams grangs 'dzin
352b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi lam yin no// ra ci'i phyir zhe na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs dang 'brel to// shA ri'i bu byu
352b3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nor ni byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi nang du bcug go/ shA ri'i bungs byang chu sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bslabs
352b4(dkon brtsegs): nas yang dag par chad pa rjes su thob bo// pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi pha rol tu son pa'o//
352b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad la nges par byas pa de bzhin gshegs pa mdzad pa rgyun ma bcad pa rnam pa thams cad kyi tshad med pa'i sa rjes su thob pa
352b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas dpag tu med pa rjes su thob pa pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad rjes su thob pa pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad la shin tu gnas pa'o//
352b7(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// lus kyi las dang rnam smin gyis/ rnam par smin pa shes par bya/ las
353a1(dkon brtsegs): tsan nam sngon ma yin kyang / de bde ba ni mya ngan 'das/ gang la shes pa med pa yi// 'dus byas thams cad sdug sngal te/ de tsar
353a2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa bskyed nas ni// 'dus byas kun las rnam par grol bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bri dang / dge slong du dag
353a3(dkon brtsegs): lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon
353a4(dkon brtsegs): mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so//
353a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di la sh+lo ka stong phrag drug bam po nyi shu yod do// rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo d+hi dang / shI len dra bo d+hi dang lo tsa ba chen po zhang d+harma tA
353a6(dkon brtsegs): shI la sa bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// / bod skad du 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs
353a7(dkon brtsegs): stong phrag brgya pa las dga' bo mngal du 'jug pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// / bam po gcig pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
353b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis zos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin ni kun dga' rab
353b2(dkon brtsegs): na bzhugs te/ de nas de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo phyi dri'i dus kyi tshe nang du yang dag 'jog pa las langs te/ dge slong lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong
353b3(dkon brtsegs): ste thal mo sbyar nas gus pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan
353b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dga' bo dang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa nga la chos kyi rnam grangs thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ gcig tu
353b5(dkon brtsegs): ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs pa yongs su dag pa yongs su dkar ba tshangs par spyod pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ mngal du 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyis rnams
353b6(dkon brtsegs): blangs yod kyis legs par nyon la yid la zung zhig dang / ngas khyod la rnam par phye ste bstan par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos gsol pa/
353b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bzhin du thos par 'tshal lo zhes gsol pa dang / nganas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dga' bo sems
354a1(dkon brtsegs): nan rnams ni mngal du 'jug par 'dod pa'i rgya dang rkyen ldan sum tshogs par gyur nam bras len par 'gyu gal ha bran sumatshogs par gyur na/
354a2(dkon brtsegs): lus len par mi 'gyur ro// de la rkyen dang mi ldan pa zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pa dang ma gnyis ka'ang chags pa'i sems byung bar gyur/ bar mdo'i phung po'ang mngon
354a3(dkon brtsegs): du gyur cing skye ba'i gnas yongs su tshol bar byed kyang pa ma de dag gi 'du 'grong snga phyir gyur cing / dus gcig tu byung bar ma gyur tam/ so so'i lus la nad rnams ldan par
354a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur na'ang mngal du 'jug par mi 'gyur ro// gal te ma'i mngal rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bar kan dang / khrag gis nye bar non par gyur tam/ mtshams shas gang ba 'am
354a5(dkon brtsegs): sman gyis gang ba 'am/ dpung nas 'dra ba 'am grog ma'i rked pa 'dra ba 'am/ rnga mo'i kha 'dra ba 'amashing rti'i tshigs pa bzhin sogs kar 'dug pa 'am shing rta'i srog shing
354a6(dkon brtsegs): lta bur 'dug pa 'am shing rta'i lte ba'i kha lta bur 'dug pa 'am/ shing lo lta bur gyur pa 'am spa lta bur gya gyur 'khyil bar gyur tam/ mngal gyi nang nas kyi gram skyes pa lta bur
354a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur tam khu chu dang khrag mang du 'dzag cing skad cig tsam du'ang 'dug tu mi btub par gyur tam/ thur du 'dzag par gyur tamamangal gyi'i ma rtsub par gyur tam/ steng du yangs
354b1(dkon brtsegs): tu mangs pa rnab pas na sa rnams pa sa
354b2(dkon brtsegs): tshogs dang bcas par gyur na dang mangs du 'jug par mi 'gyur ro// gal te pa mtsho rigs btsun zhing bsod nams chen po dang ldan par gyur la bar mdo'i phung po bsod nams chung ba
354b3(dkon brtsegs): bar mdo'i sring pa tshe rigs btsun zhing bsod nams chen po dang ldan par gyur la pha ma bsod nams chung bar gyur tam gnyis ka bsod nams dang ldan yang ngan tshun drang bar gyur
354b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i las bsags par ma gyur na'ang mngal du 'jug par mi 'gyur ro// 'di ltar bar ma do'i phung po de mngal du 'jug par 'gyur ba na thog ma kho nar phyin ci log gi sems rnam pa
354b5(dkon brtsegs): gnyis 'byung bar 'gyur te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pha ma gnyis phrad par gyur pa'i tshe/ gal te por 'gyur ba zhig yin na ni ma la chags pa skye bar
354b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur la/ pa la ni zhe sdang skye bar 'gyur te/ pha'i khru ba byung ba na 'di ni bdag gi yin no snyam du sems so// gal te mor 'gyur ba zhig yin na ni ba la chags pa skye bar 'gyur
354b7(dkon brtsegs): la ma la ni zhe sdang skye bar 'gyuraro te/ ma'i khu ba byung ba na 'di ni bdag gi yin no snyam du sems pas gal te 'di lta bu'i zhe sdang dang chags pa'i sems skyes par ma gyur na mngal du 'jug
355a1(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur ro// gzhan yang dgu' bo ji ltar ma'i mngal du 'jug par 'gyur zhe na/ 'di wA ste/ bama'ang chags pa'i sems skyes par gyur
355a2(dkon brtsegs): rus kyi zla mtshan yang rjes su mthun par gyur bar mdo'i phung po'ang mngon du gyur la gong ma lta bu'i skyor mang po'ang med cing las kyi rkyen dang ldan par gyur na ma'i mngal du 'jug
355a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar bar ma do'i phung po de mngal du 'jug par 'dod pa na de'ang rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ bsod nams dang mi ldan pa dang / bsod nams chen po
355a4(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa gang yin pa'o// bsod nams dang mi ldan pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par rtog pa'i sems byung nas yul mthong bar gyur pa na/ 'di snyam du sems te/ der bdag ni rlung dang grang
355a5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / ga nam rmus pa dang / char 'bab pa dang / skye bo mang po'i ci co dang / mang po'i mthu stobs kyis gnod par byed pa dang phrad par gyur to zhes 'jigs shing skrag pa skyes nas
355a6(dkon brtsegs): deng bdag rtswa'i khyim dang lo ma'i khyim dang / rtsig pa'i drung dben par 'jug par bya'o// yang na ri dang nags stug po dang / zag phug dag tu 'jug par bya'o snyam du
355a7(dkon brtsegs): sems te/ gzhan yang 'du shes rnam pa sna tshogs bskyed nas ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du ma'i mngal du 'jug par byed do// gang bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa de'ang 'di
355b1(dkon brtsegs): rlu du/ zang padang na rna pa nga/ cha pag dang / rgyams kyis gtsu ca pad na pa
355b2(dkon brtsegs): zhes 'jigs shing skrag pa skyes nas/ khang pa brtsegs ma'i steng du 'dzegs pa 'am/ gzhal med khang gi nang du 'jug pa 'am/ khri la 'dug par bya'o snyam du sems te/ gzhan
355b3(dkon brtsegs): yang 'du shes rnam pa sna tshogs pa skyed nas ji ltar mthong bzhin du ma'i mngal du 'jug par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo 'di ltar bar mdo'i phung
355b4(dkon brtsegs): po de thog ma kho nar mngal du zhugs pa gang yin pa de ni mer mer po zhes bya ste/ pha ma'o mi gtsang ba dang 'das pa'i las la brten nas lus len par byed kyang / 'di ltar las de dang pha ma'i rkyen
355b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis so so nas rang skyed par mi byed kyi 'dus pa'i mthu stobs kyis lus len par byed pas 'di lta ste/ dper na snod kyi nang du zhes bkang nas skye bu'i tshol ba dang / thag pa la
355b6(dkon brtsegs): sogs pa la brten te/ mar 'byung ba'ang rkyen rnams las dmigs par mi 'gyur mod kyi/ 'on kyang 'dus pa'i mthu las mar 'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ mer mer po'i lus
355b7(dkon brtsegs): kyang de bzhin te/ 'di ltar rgyu dang rkyen gyis mthus mngal du lus mngon par grub par 'gyur ro// dga' bo 'di lta ste/ dper na rtswa sngon po dang / ba glang gi lci ba dang / rgya shug
356a1(dkon brtsegs): dang zhol banan nas so so nas srin bu skye bar 'gyur ba'i ri re'i nang du srin bu mi dmyigs kyang cu dang rkyen gyi ljongs kyis sim cu skye bar 'gyurad+ha/ srin du de dan
356a2(dkon brtsegs): spre ngan so so nas rten ji lta ba bzhin du kha dog sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar por 'gyur ro// de bzhin du nga ma'i mi gtsang ba las lus 'di skye bar yang rkyen rnams
356a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi nang du gtsal na dmigs par mi 'gyur mod kyi/ 'on kyang rkyen 'dus pa'i mthu dang ma bral bar yang lus yang dag par len par 'gyur ro// lus 'di skyes na pa ma'i 'byung ba chen po
356a4(dkon brtsegs): dang ngo bo nyid tha mi dad par 'gyur te/ 'di la ste sa'i khams kyis mi sra ba'i bya ba byed do// chu'i khams kyis ni gsher ba'i bya ba byed do// me'i khams kyis ni rba
356a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bya ba byed do// rlung gi khams kyis ni yang zhing g.yo ba'i bya ba byed do// mer mer po'i lus de gal te sa'i khams 'ba' zhig dang ldan la chu'i khams med par
356a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur na ni 'di lnga ste dper na bye dang thal ba skam po bcangs pa gnan 'dun mi 'dzub par 'gyur ro// gal ta tshwa'i khams 'ba' zhig dang ldan la
356a7(dkon brtsegs): khams med par gyur na ni 'di lta ste dper na 'bru mar ram chu'i rang bzhin snum zhing gsher ba 'am sra ba med pa bzhin du bo zhing gyes par 'gyur ro// gal te
356b1(dkon brtsegs): tshwa'i khams 'ba' zhig dang ldan pa la me'i khams med par gyu ra na nI 'di lta ste dper na dbyar tsha ba'i dus su sha'i gong bu grib ma la banag pa nyi ma'i 'od kyis ma phog pa bzhin du rul
356b2(dkon brtsegs): zhing rgyags par 'gyur ro// gal te sa dang chu dang me'i khams dang ldan la rlung gi khams med par gyur na ni 'phel bar mi 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste dper na 'khrur
356b3(dkon brtsegs): ba mkhan nam de'i slob ma mkhas pas 'khur ba btsas nas dbugs kyis dus te ci dang ci bya ba rnams mngon par 'dus byas nas de dag nang khong stong du byed pa gal te rlung gi sbyong
356b4(dkon brtsegs): med par gyur na mngon par grub par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du 'byung ba chen po bzhi po dag kyang phan tshun gcig la gcig rten cing yongs su bzung bas rnam par gzhag pa yin pas de'i
356b5(dkon brtsegs): phyir mer mer po'i lus pa ma'i 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang las kyi rlung gi rgyu sa skye bar 'gyur ba'ang de bzhin du rkyen mang po rnams kyi nang na dmigs par mi 'gyur yang
356b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dus pa'i stobs kyis lus yang dag par len par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// gzhan yang dga' bo 'di lta ste/ dper na sa bon bsar pa yongs su gtsang la legs par smras pa
356b7(dkon brtsegs): srin dus ma zos pa mthul cing ma tshig pa dang mags pa dang / bug med pa cig gang la la zhig gis zhing bzang zhing gshin pa btsal te sa bon btang na/ tse nyi ma nas
357a1(dkon brtsegs): gis myu gu dang sdong bu dang yal ga dang lo ma grib ma dang bcas pa dang me tog dang 'bras bu rgyas shing phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ram bcom ldan
357a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das de ni de ltar mi 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dga' bo mer mer po'i lus kyang de bzhin du rgyu dang rkyen las rim gyis skye bar 'gyur gyi rus gcig tu dbang po
357a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams phun sum tshogs par mi 'gyur te de lta bas na pa ma las byung bar gyur pa'i lus 'di rtsen rnams kyi nang nas btsal na'ang dmigs par mi 'gyur mod kyi 'on kyang 'tshogs pa'i stobs kyis
357a4(dkon brtsegs): skye ba len par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// gzhan yang dga' bo 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu mig dang ldan pas me shel gyi nor bu blangs nas nyi ma la gzhag ste lci ba skam po nor bu dang mi
357a5(dkon brtsegs): ring bar bsten pa las me byung bar 'gyur ba'i lci ba dang / nyi ma'i 'od so so nas mo 'byin par mi nus kyang phan tshun mi 'bral bas rgyu dang rkyen gyi stobs kyis me 'byung bar byed do//
357a6(dkon brtsegs): pha ma las byung ba'i lus kyang de bzhin te/ 'di ltar mer mer po'i lus gang yin pa de ni gzugs zhes bya'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa gang
357a7(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de ni ming zhes bya ste ming dang gzugs kyi phung ngos lnga pos skad cig ma gcig la lus blangs nas sdug bsngal myong bar byed pa la'ang ngas bsngags pa rjod par mi byed na/ yun
357b1(dkon brtsegs): ring por srid pa rnams su 'khor bar gyur pa lnga spos kyang ci dgos 'di lta ste dper na mo gtsang ba ni nyung na'ang mamam na mang po lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de skabs na mer mer po lus /
357b2(dkon brtsegs): bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag la su zhig srid cing chags par byed/ gnan yang ma sa la bras de ma'i mngal na gnas pa'ang zhag bdun phra gsum cu rtsa brgyad lon nas gdod 'byung bar
357b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ zhag bdun phrag dang po la ma'i mngal na gnas pa gang yin pa de ni mer mer po zhes bya ste lus kyi mtshan ma dang por snang ba yin pas 'di lta ste/ dper na zho ma chags pa
357b4(dkon brtsegs): dang 'dra bas zhag bdun gyi bar du nang du btsos rab tu btsos nas 'byung ba chen po bzhi mthar gyis mngon par grub par byed do// zhag bdun phrag gnyis pa la ma'i mngal du gnas pa'i
357b5(dkon brtsegs): tshe las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni kun sdud ces bya ste/ rlung shin tu phra mo des ma'i rtsib lcogs g.yon pa dang g.yas pa bus te/ mer mer po lus kyi mtshan ma rims
357b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis snang bar byed pas de'i dbyibs zho ska ba 'am/ mar 'khyags pa 'dra ste/ nang du tsos rab tu tsos pas nur nur po'i lus su gyur nas 'di ltar 'byung ba chen po bzhi po dag
357b7(dkon brtsegs): mthar gyis mngon par byung bar byed do// zhag bdun zag gsum pa la ma'i mngal ru gan pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni mdzod ka zhes bya ste/
358a1(dkon brtsegs): rlung de'i stobs kyis nur nur po gang yin pa de mthar gyis 'khyags shing ltar ltar por byed pas/ de'i dbyibs ni sman rdung ba'i gtun bu 'dral thung zhing chung ste
358a2(dkon brtsegs): mngal gyi nang du btsos rab tu btsos pas 'di ltar 'byung ba chen po bzhi po 'di dag mthar gyis 'phel bar byed do// zhag bdun phrag bzhi pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ yang
358a3(dkon brtsegs): las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni nang rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis ltar ltar ngo gang yin pa de ni mkhrang bar byed pas de'i dbyibs ni mchig
358a4(dkon brtsegs): gu 'dra ba ste nang du btsos rab tu btsos pas 'byung ba chen po bzhi po dag mthar gyis 'phel bar byed do// zhag 'dun phrag lnga pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang
358a5(dkon brtsegs): las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni yang dag par sdud pa zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis mkhrang 'gyur gang yin pa de rkang lag rgyus pa bsgyur bar byed pas gor gor
358a6(dkon brtsegs): bo gar yon pa don rnam par phye nas brla gnyis dang dpung pa gnyis dang mgo bo'i mtshan ma mngon du byung bar byed do// 'di lta sre/ dper na dbyar gyi dus su char pa 'a
358a7(dkon brtsegs): nga'i tshe ljon shing rnams yal ga dnga'adab ma skyed par byed pa de bzhin du las kyi rlung gi stobs kyis kyang lus kyi mtshan ma rnams snang bar byed do// zhag bdun zag drug
358b1(dkon brtsegs): ba la ma'i mngal du gnas pa'i tshayang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin par ni las zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis mtshan ma bzhi 'byung bar byed ngo // bzhi
358b2(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ 'di lta ste pus mo gnyis dang dpung pa gnyis gang yin pa de ni mtshan ma rnam pa bzhi zhes bya'o// zhag bdun phrag bdun pa la ma'i mngal du gnas pa'i tsheyang
358b3(dkon brtsegs): las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni 'khyil bar byed pa zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis mtshan ma rnam pa bzhi 'byung bar byed de/ 'di lta ste lag mthil gnyis
358b4(dkon brtsegs): rang rkang mthal gnyis de'i mtshan ma ni shin tu mnyen pas dbu ba 'dus pa 'dra'o// zhag bdun phrag brgyad pa la mo'i mngal du gnas pa'ilas kyi rlung mngon par
358b5(dkon brtsegs): grub pa gang yin pa de ni bzlog cing bsgyur bar byed pa zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis mtshan ma nyi shu 'byung bar byer re 'di lta ste lag pa dang rkang pa'i sor so'i mtshan
358b6(dkon brtsegs): ma nyi shu 'byung bar byed pa gang yin pa'o// de ni 'di lta ste dper na dbyar char 'dab pa'i tshe/ ljon shing rnams kyi yal ga dang 'arab ma mthar gyis skyes shing 'phel ba
358b7(dkon brtsegs): byed pa de bzhin du las kyi rlung gi stobs kyis kyang mtshan ma rnams mngon du snang bar byed do// zhag bdun phrag dgu pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung
359a1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par grub pa gang yin pa roni rnam par 'byung ba zhes bya ste rlu nga ra'i stobs kyis mtshan ma rnam pa dgra 'byung bar byed / dbu gang zhe na
359a2(dkon brtsegs): lnga ste mig gnyis dang rna ba gnyis dang snga gnyis dang 'dang bshang ba dang gtso ba'i gnas gang yin par dag ni mtshan mi rnam pa dgu zhes
359a3(dkon brtsegs): bya'o/ zhag bdun phrag bcu pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni sra bar byed pa zhes bya rlung de'i stobs kyis sra
359a4(dkon brtsegs): brtan par byed do// gzhan yang de'i tshe kun nas sgo zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ res ma ral na gnas pa'i lus bus pas lus kun tu rgyas shing gang bar byed de/ 'di lta ste/
359a5(dkon brtsegs): dper na rgyal ba gang ba ji lta ba bzhin no// zhag bdun phrag bcu gcig pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni rdo rje zhes bya ste
359a6(dkon brtsegs): rlung de'i stobs kyis mngal na gnas pa'i tshe de steng dang 'og gi phyogs su 'gro zhing lus kyi bug rnams 'byin par byed do// gzhan yang rlung de'i stobs kyis ma re res
359a7(dkon brtsegs): 'ga' dga' ba dang mi dga' ba'ang byed 'gro ba dang 'greng ba dang / 'jug pa dang nyal na'ang de'i rang bzhin 'gyur zhing rkang lag skyed par yang byed pas/ mapa gnas
359b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyag rnams mthar gyis skye zhing 'phel bar yang byed la de'i kha nas khrag nag po'ang 'byung bar 'gyur sna nas kyakung chu mi gtsang ba 'byung bar 'gyur teb rlung des dbang po rnams
359b2(dkon brtsegs): bzlog nas de nas zhi bar 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag bcu gnyis pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni yon po'i sgo zhes bya ste/ rlung
359b3(dkon brtsegs): ro'i stobs kyis rtsib logs g.yas g.yon gyi nang zol gyi rgyu mche chung rnams skyed par byed de de ni 'di lta ste dper na pad+ma'i rtsa bshar shang po 'am skud pa thams pa sa la shag
359b4(dkon brtsegs): pa lta bur lan bco brgyad 'khor bar lus la brten te gnas so// de'i tshe gzhan yang spu brgyus pa'o zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung de'i dbang gis tshigs kyi yan lag sum brgya nyi
359b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / gnad brgya rtsa gcig lus la gnas par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag bcu gsum pa la ma'i mngal naganas pa'i cha yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni bkres
359b6(dkon brtsegs): shing sgom par byed pa zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis mngal gyi lus de nyam chung zhing bkres pa dang skom pa'i 'du shes skyed par byed pas do'ims zos shing 'thung ba'i ro jo snyed pa
359b7(dkon brtsegs): ngag lus kyi gnang rang lte ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs su 'dzin cing lan 'dogs par byed do// danas ro'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa
360a1(dkon brtsegs): bu ni mamapa' gnas pa na/ mngal gnas de la lan ba dogs pa/ des na lus sro garab gnas shing rim gyis skye dang 'phel bar byed// mas ni zos
360a2(dkon brtsegs): shing 'thungs pa dag/ mngal gam de la phan 'dogs pas/ rim gyis skye dang 'phel bar byed/ zhag bdun phrag bcu bzhi pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung mngon
360a3(dkon brtsegs): par grub pa gang yin pa de ni srur ba'i sgro zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis rtsa rgyus dgu brgya bskyed nas lus kyi mdun dang rgyab dang g.yas g.yon snol mar g.yog par byed/
360a4(dkon brtsegs): ro// zhag bdun phrag bco lnga pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par bsgrub pa gang yin pa de ni pad+ma zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis rtsa rgyu ba nyi shu bskyed nas
360a5(dkon brtsegs): bza' ba dang btung ba'i ro gang yin pa rtsa 'dir zhugs nas lus la phan 'dogs par byed do// nyi shu gang zhe na/ lus kyi mdun dang / rgya ba dang g.yas g.yon re re la'ang rtsa lnga lnga
360a6(dkon brtsegs): yod de rtsa 'di dag re re la'ang rtsa phra mo'i yan lag bzhi bcu bzhi bcu yod do// rtsa de dag re re la'ang yan lag brgya brgya yod do// lus kyi mdun na yod pa'i khri ni sa ka zhes bya'o//
360a7(dkon brtsegs): lus kyi rgyab na yod pa nyi khri ni stobs zhes bya'o// lus kyi g.yon phyogs na yod pa nyi khri ni brtan pa zhes bya'o// lus kyi g.yas phyogs na yod pa nyi khri ni mthu dang ldan pa nas bya ste/
360b1(dkon brtsegs): de ltar na rtsa'i yan lag che phra brgyad khri lus de la skye bar 'gyur ro// rtsa de dag kyang kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan te/ 'di lta ste sngon po dang / ser po dang dmar po dang
360b2(dkon brtsegs): dkar po dang / mar dang / zho dang / 'bru mar gyi kha dog go// rtsa brgyad khri bo de dag re re la'ang rtsa ba re re yod de rtsa ba re re la'ang bug sna tshogs yod de dug gcig
360b3(dkon brtsegs): dang bu ga gnyis nas bu ga bdun gyi bar dang ldan te/ re re'ang spu'i bug dang phan tshun 'brel te/ de ni dper na pad+ma'i rtsa ba la dug mang po yod pa ji lta ba bzhin no// zhag sa
360b4(dkon brtsegs): phrag bcu drug pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni bdud rtsi zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis de'i mig dang / rna ba dang
360b5(dkon brtsegs): sna dang / kha'i sgo dang mid pa dang / snying gi snying po khor khor yug gi bu ga dgu po dag rnam par phye nas dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba steng rang 'og tu rgyu zhing
360b6(dkon brtsegs): thogs pa med pa dang / bza' ba dang btung ba zos shing 'thungs pa gang yin pa de dag kyang lus la phan 'dogs shing bsags pa'i gnas yod pa dang legs par zhugs nas
360b7(dkon brtsegs): 'og gi phyogs su 'byung bar byed de/ 'di lta ste dper na rdza mkhan nam de'i slob ma mkhas pa 'jim pa legs par sbyar te/ 'khor lo'i steng du gzhag nas
361a1(dkon brtsegs): 'og dang steng du bsgyur zhing snod rnam pa mngon par 'dus byas nas mngon par grub pa de bzhin du 'di'ang rlung gi stobs dang dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las kyis
361a2(dkon brtsegs): mig dang rna ba la sogs pa rims kyis yongs su rdzogs par byed do// zhag bdun phrag bcu bdun pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni 'bri
361a3(dkon brtsegs): gdong zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis de'i mig gnyis kun tu dang ba dang / rna ba dang sna'i dbang po la sogs pa'ang rims kyis yongs su smin par byed de/ 'di lta ste
361a4(dkon brtsegs): dper na me long gi dkyil 'khor rdul gyis g.yogs pa sa'i phye ma dang 'bru mar dang / thal ba blangs te byi dor byas na yongs su gsal bar 'gyur ba ji bzhin ru/ las kyi
361a5(dkon brtsegs): rlung gi stobs kyis mig la sogs pa bus nas mig la sogs pa kun tu dang bar byed pa'ang de bzhin du rig par bya'o// zhag bdun phrag bco brgyad pa la mi'i mngal na gnas pa'i
361a6(dkon brtsegs): yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni brtan par 'gyur ba zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis de'i dbang po rnams mthar gyis yongs su smin cing gsal ba dang yongs su
361a7(dkon brtsegs): dag par byed de 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor sprin dang khug rna rnams kyis bsgribs shing khebs par gyur pa glo bur du rlung drag po langs te bus nas
361b1(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bzhir gtor bar gyur na/ nyi ma dang rma ba'i dkyil 'khor shin tu gsal bar gyur pa de bzhin du/ 'di ltar las kyi rlung gi dbang gis dbang po rnams bus pas ches shin cu
361b2(dkon brtsegs): gas pa dang yongs su dag par byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o// lag bdun zug bcu dgu pa lam bu dngal na gnas pa'i tshe snga ma'i drung gi spobs kyis meg dang / rna ba dang
361b3(dkon brtsegs): lce'i dbang po bzhi po dag yongs su smin par byed do// dang po mngal du 'jug pa'i cha ni dbang po gsum dang ldan te/ lus kyi dbang po dang srog gi nga /
361b4(dkon brtsegs): sna dang
361b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi/ na dbang po na mas yongs su rdzogs pa zung // zhag 'dun drug kyi tshum la ma mngal na gnas
361b6(dkon brtsegs): rlung mdod par thub pa gang yin par ma mnas banas na ste/ nga nga'i skabs kyis ra'i lham las nus pa ste tshugs skyed par byed du rkang ba gaman pa la
361b7(dkon brtsegs): rkang pa g.yas pa la brten te rus pa nyi shu bskyed do// gzhan yang rkang pa'i rting pa'i rus pa bzhi dang rje dar gyi rus pa gnyis dang
361b8(dkon brtsegs): te rus pa nyi shu bskyed do//
361b9(dkon brtsegs): badz+ra'i rus pa gnyis dang rkang pa dang dpyi'i rus pa gsum gsum dang skal tshogs kyi rus pa bco brgyad dang rtsib
361b10(dkon brtsegs): lha nga'i rus pa gnyis dang
362a1(dkon brtsegs): ma'i rus pa nyi shu bzhi dang brang gi rus pa sum cu dang lag pa g.yas g.yon re re la rus pa nyi shu nyi shu dang / lag dar gyi rus pa bzhi dang / dpung
362a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rus pa gnyis dang 'gram pa'i rus pa gnyis dang mgo'i rus pa bzhi dang / so'i rtsa ba'i rus pa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang skyed par byed do// 'di lta ste/ dper na gzug
362a3(dkon brtsegs): mkhan nam gzugs mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pas sngar shing sra ba blangs te/ phyis srang bus bcings nas gzungs rnams byis pa 'jim pa ma bskus mod kyi/ 'on kyang raH/
362a4(dkon brtsegs): tshe rus pa'i mtshan nyid ces brjod de bzhin du las kyi rlung gi stobs kyis rus pa rnams bskyed pa'i dus kyi tshe'ang de bzhin te/ de lta bas na zhag bdun po de dag tu rus pa phra mo ma gtos
362a5(dkon brtsegs): par rus pa chen po bskyed pa'i grangs ni nyis brgya yod par rig par bya'o// zhag bdun phrag nyi shu gcig pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshig yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin
362a6(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni yang rab skyed po zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis mngal na gnas pa de'i lus kyi sha skyed par byed de/ 'di lta ste/ dper na zhal zhal mkhan nam/ zhal zhal gyi slob/
362a7(dkon brtsegs): mas 'jim pa logs par sbyangs na sa rtsig pa rnams la zhal zhal byed pa de bzhin du las kyi rlung gi dbang gis de'i lus kyi ba skyed pa'ang de bzhin du rig par bya'o// zhag bdun zag
362b1(dkon brtsegs): nyi shu gnyis pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni kun tu rgyal ba zhes bya ste/ rlung ra'i stobs kyis de'i lus kyi khrag skyed par byed do/ zhag
362b2(dkon brtsegs): bdun zag nyi shu gsum pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni yongs su dag par 'dzin pa zhes bya ste/ rlung ngo'i stobs kyis lus kyi pags pa
362b3(dkon brtsegs): skyed par byed do// zhag bdun phrag nyi shu bzhi pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni sprin 'dzin ces bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis de'i
362b4(dkon brtsegs): lus kyi lag pa rkyong zhing mdog dang ldan par byed do// zhag bdun phrag nyi shu lnga pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni grong khyer 'dzin ces
362b5(dkon brtsegs): bya ste rlung de'i stobs kyis mngal na gnas pa de lus la sha dang khrag 'phel zhing rims kyis rab tu dang bar byed do// zhag bdun phrag nyi shu drug pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/
362b6(dkon brtsegs): yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni skye ba mngon par grub ces bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis de'i sgra dang / spu dang / sen mo rnams skyed nas thams
362b7(dkon brtsegs): cang rtsa rgyas rnams dang 'brel bar byed do// zhag bdun phrag nyi shu bdu pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni sman som chen po zhes
363a1(dkon brtsegs): byas rlung de'i stobs kyis de'i lus kyi mtshan ma rnams mthar gyis mngon par grub pa nas rgya sa gang tshe rabs snga ma la sdig pa mi dag da las rnams
363a2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'du byas shingayo byed rnams la ser snas 'phangs shing sbyin pa gtong ba'i mi byed pa dang / ba ma dang mkhan po dang / bla ma'i gnas rnams kyi rjes su
363a3(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa nyan par mi byed pa zhig yin na ni las de'i dbang gis yid du mi 'ong ba'i lus rnam pa sna tshogs 'thob par 'gyur bas/ gal ta lus ring zhing sbom pa dang / tshonang
363a4(dkon brtsegs): dkar ba dang mnyen pa gang yin pa des mdzes par gyur na ni lus thung zhing zab dang / rid cing gnag pa dang rtsub pa dag mthong bar byed do// gal te lus thung
363a5(dkon brtsegs): zhing phra ba dang ring cing gnag pa dang rtsub pa gang yin pa des mdzes par gyur na ni lus ring zhing sbom pa dang / tsho zhing dkar ba dang / shin tu mnyen pa dag
363a6(dkon brtsegs): thod par byed do// gal te lus kyi yan lag mtho ba dang dma' ba dang mang ba dang nyung ba dang / thags bzang ba dang thags ngan pas mdzes pas gyur nan/
363a7(dkon brtsegs): mtho ba dang dma' ba dang thags bzang ba dang thags ngan pa dang mi ldan pa'i lus yang dag par len par byed do// gzhan yang 'on pa dang / long ba dang zhugs/
363b1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang rkang lag 'bru zhing 'gro ba dang / dbang po rnams mtshang ba dang / tshib smras pa gzhan gyis mnyan par mi 'dod pa dang / lus mi sdug cing mi dgas dang 'dra ba'ang yang dab par
363b2(dkon brtsegs): len par 'gyur te sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi dbang gis yid du mi 'ong ba'i lus rnam pa sna tshogs len par 'gyur bas pha ma dang nye ba shes rnams kyis kyang mthong bar 'dod na
363b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan lta spos kyang ci dgos gal te tshe rabs snga ma la dge ba bcu'i las mngon par 'dus byas shing sbyin pa legs par btang ba rang ser sna dang g.yo spu'i bsam pa med
363b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang pha ma dang mkhan po dang tha ma'i gnas rnams kyis rjes su bstan pa dag la mngon par yid ches shing yang dag par blangs pa zhig yin ma ni/ rgyu dang rkyen
363b5(dkon brtsegs): ras gal te mi'i lus thob par gyur na'ang gong du bstan pa lta bu sdig pa mi dge ba'i las mngon par grub pa'i lus len par mi 'gyur zhing gya nom pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan
363b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lus thob par 'gyur bas byad bzhin mdzes pa dang / mtshar rnams dang lda ra zhing tshig smras pa rnam pa mang po kun gyis mnyan par 'dod pa'i 'os su 'gyur te/
363b7(dkon brtsegs): de lta bas na dge ba'i las kyi dbang gis khyad par du 'phags pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa de lta bu thob par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// dpa' bo de lta bu'i lus de'ang gal te po
364a1(dkon brtsegs): yin na na mib mngalan ga yas sogs su chog sur 'phrul/ lag pa gnyis kyis gdang ga yogs nas ma'i gal rgyags logs sa pa na sa 'drags
364a2(dkon brtsegs): yon nani tshwa ba logs g.yon phyogs na cog sur 'dun go// la ba pa gnyis kyis gdo ga yogs te ma'i slang la kha banas nas ma zhu ba'i gnas gyon 'og/ rlung gnas kyin ste nang dusas
364a3(dkon brtsegs): chu bcos shing gnas lnga kun tu cings pas 'dis ste/ dper na rtswa'i rgyal ba'i nang na drug pa dang 'dra'o// gal te de'i mas shin tu mang du zos shing shin tu chung ngu zas sam 2
364a4(dkon brtsegs): zas shin tu dang ra ba 'am shin tu rtsub pa 'am shin tu bska ba 'am/ shin tu snum pa 'am/ shin tu lan tshwa zo 'am shin tu kha ba 'am/ shin tu sgyur ba 'am/ shin tu
364a5(dkon brtsegs): grang ba 'am shin tu tsha ba dag zos par gyu ra ta ma gzhan yang 'dod chags spyod par gyur tam drag tu song ba 'am mchongs pa byas sam yun ring du nyel lam/
364a6(dkon brtsegs): yun rings 'dug par gyur na'ang mngal na gnas pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur te/ de lta na mi'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe sdug bsngal mang po de lta bu dag gis rab tu gzir bar rig par bya'o//
364a7(dkon brtsegs): ngas mir 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal mdo tsam du bstan pa'ang de 'dra na sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi sdug bsngal dpe byar dka' ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ mkhas pa su zhig 'khor ba'i rgya sa
364b1(dkon brtsegs): zas 'di lta bu la rab tu mos par byed zag bdun zag nyi shu brtang pa lama'i mngal na gnas pa'i chu byin rtsa log gi 'dugs rnam pa brkyang 'byung bar 'gyur ta bcu gang na/
364b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'du shes rang khang bu brtsegs pa'i 'du shes dang zi stan gyi 'du shes dang chu mig gi 'du shes dang rdzing gi 'du shes dang / chu robo 'du shes dang / kun dga'ar
364b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i 'du shes dang skyed mos tshal gyi 'du shes te 'di ni 'du shes rnam pa brgyad ces bya ste/ zhag bdun phrag nyi shu dgu pa la ma'i mngalar gnas pa'i tshi ga yang las kyi rlung mngon
364b4(dkon brtsegs): bar grub pa gang yin pa de ni me tog 'greng ba zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis mngal na gnas pa de'i lus kyi pags pa'i mdog kun tu bzang zhing mtshan ma rnams rab tu gsal bar byed de/
364b5(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang 'das pa'i rus su las rnams mngon par 'dus byas pa'i bye brag mi mtshungs pas rnam pa ji lta ba bzhin du kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan par 'gyur bas/ kha cig ni kha dog dkar por
364b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur kha cig ni kha dog nas por 'gyur/ kha tsag ni kha dog dkar ba'ang ma ldan gnas pa'ang ma yin par 'gyur/ kha cig me la dge sngon par 'gyur/ ma tshan rnaM ma
364b7(dkon brtsegs): cing rnam par 'byung kha cig rme kha dag sdum par 'gyur te/ 'di lta bu'i kha dog gi mtshan nyid dang ldan par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag sum cu pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i cha/ yang las
365a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni lcags kyi sgo zhes bya ste/ rlung nga'i stobs kyis de'i sgra dang spu dang / sen mo rnams rab tu skyed pa dang / kha dog
365a2(dkon brtsegs): gnag rnams rab tu gsal bar byed de/ las kyi rkyen gyis mtshan ma 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// zhag bdun drag sum cu gcig pa nas/ zhag bdun phrag sum cu lnga pa'i bar du ra
365a3(dkon brtsegs): mngal na gnas pa'i tshe na lus kyi mtshan ma rnams cher skye bar 'gyur bas/ mthar gyis lus kyi yan lag phun sum tshogs shing yangs par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun drug sum cu drug
365a4(dkon brtsegs): la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe ni de 'byung ba'i bsam pa skye bas mngon par mi dga' bar 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag sum cu bdun pa la mi'i mngal na gnas pa'o tshe ni phyin ci log tu ma gyur
365a5(dkon brtsegs): nga'i 'du shes rnam pa lnga 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lnga gang zhe na/ mi gtsang ba'i 'du shes dang dri mi zhim pa'i 'du shes dang brtson ri'i 'du shes dang / mun nag gi 'du shes dang / yongs su
365a6(dkon brtsegs): skyo nas phyir 'byung ba'i 'du shes skye ba gang yin pa ste/ mngal na gnas pa de yongs su skyo ba'i bsam pa de lta bu dag skye bar 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag sum cu brgyad pa la ma'i mngal na gnas
365a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni thogs ma'i rkyen ces bya ste/ rlung ngo'i stobs kyis de rab tu bsgyur bar byed do// gzhan yang la thur du lta ba zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/
365b1(dkon brtsegs): ro'i mgo thur du lha zhing lag pa gnyis brgyang ste/ mthar gyis 'byung 'dod par 'gyur ro// mngal na gnas pa de dag ga la te tshe rabs sna ma'i mngal du 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i las bsags badzin/
365b2(dkon brtsegs): yin na ni/ nga'i lag pa dang rkang bsnol mar gyur nas bsgyur mi nus pas sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi rkyen gyis ma'i mngal nyid du 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te/ de'i
365b3(dkon brtsegs): ma'ang de'i tshe sdug bsngal chen po myong ba 'am/ yang na 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro// gal te tshe rabs snga ma la dge ba'i las rnams mngon par 'dus byas shing tshe ring por 'gyur/
365b4(dkon brtsegs): nga'i rgyu bsags pa zhig yin na ni btsas su nye ba'i tshe ma dang bu gnyis ka rab tu zing zhing sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi sdug bsngal gong ma lta bu med do// zhag bdun phrag su mo nArtswa brgyad las
365b5(dkon brtsegs): nas mngal nas 'byung bar 'dod pa'i tshe/ sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong nas gdong 'byung bar 'gyur bas/ ra'i phyir lus 'di lta bu len pa 'di ni yang dag par sdug bsngal chen po yin par rig
365b6(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o// dang po mngal nas 'byung ba'i cha/ khye'u 'am bu mo'ang rung ste/ sa la lhung ma thag tu lag pas bzung ngam/ gos kyis blangs sam/ khro la gzhag gam
365b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i nang du bzhag 'am sal banag gam/ bla gab med par bzhag gam/ nyi ma la banag gam dgun nam/ dbyar kyi dus su mang ba dang ma ba'i rlung gis btsas ma
366a1(dkon brtsegs): thag pa'i lus la reg par gyur na'ang sdug bsngal chen po myong bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dper nab glang gson por ba shus partsig pa la reg gam/ za ga ba med
366a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i thang la lhung bar gyur na/ srog chags dag gis za bar 'gyur ram/ gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ dper na mi zhig la sbrang bu mchu rings rnams kyis za ba la/ yang lcag gis gnus
366a3(dkon brtsegs): pa de bzhin du dang po mngal nas 'byung ba'i tshe/ chu dron mo dag gis lus bkrus pas reg pa'i sdug bsngal myong ba'ang de dang 'dra'o// btsas nas mthar gyis cher 'gyur ba dang / ma
366a4(dkon brtsegs): lus las khrag dang 'dres pa'i nu zho byung nas gso bar byed de/ ngas sngar mdo sde gzhan las rgya cher bstan pa yin no// de lta bas na lus 'di ni mi gtsang ba dang sdug bsngal mang
366a5(dkon brtsegs): po las mngon par grub pa yin pas mkhas pa su zhig 'khor ba na 'di 'dra ba'i lus rjes su chags par byed/ gzhan yang dga' bo dang po mngal nas byung nas zhag bdun
366a6(dkon brtsegs): lon pa dang / srog chags srin bu rigs stong phrag brgyad cu lus las skyes nas de la za bar byed do// de skal za ba zhes bya ba'i srin bu'i rigs gnyis yod de/ ska la gnas nas skra
366a7(dkon brtsegs): la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs gnyis ni mig la gnas nas mig la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs pa ha na dang / dkan ldan dang / nad srong dang / yongs su rdzogs pa zhes
366b1(dkon brtsegs): bya ba ba ni yod de/ klang pa la gnas nas klang pa la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs sa wa nag po'i lo ma zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ rnab la gnas ras rna ba la ba bar byed do// na tshu
366b2(dkon brtsegs): rigs mdzod sgo zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ sna la gnas nas sna la za bar byed do// srin du'i rigs 'phen pa dang kun tu 'phen pa zhes bya ba gnyis yod do// mchu la gnas nas mchul zabar byed/
366b3(dkon brtsegs): srin bu'i rigs khab mchu zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ lce la gnas nas lce la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs kha rno zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ lce'i drung na gnas nas lha'i drung la za bar byed do// srin du'i
