366b4(dkon brtsegs): rigs lab rdzogs zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ rkan laganas nas rkan la za bar byed do// srin du'i rigs lag pa dra ba can dang byed sbyar zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ lag mthil la gnas nas lag
366b5(dkon brtsegs): mjal la ba bar byed do// sbyin du rigs dpung pa dang nya 'i dbyung ba zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ dpung pa la gnas nas dpung ba la rdo bar byung de// sngon bu bas lcags can dang ste da'i lugs
366b6(dkon brtsegs): nan zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ med pa la gnas nas med pa la ba bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs rdo rje dang rdo rjechen po zhes bya ba mnyas yod de/ snong la gnas nas snying la 'a bar byed do// na du
366b7(dkon brtsegs): rigs dmar pa dang dngan nga'i kha zhes bya ba gnyis yod pa/ shal gnas nas shal ba bar byed pa/ sri bu'i rogs kha dog ldan dang thags ldan zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ khrag la gnas nas cham
367a1(dkon brtsegs): 'thung bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs dpa' bo dang ni gtong nas bya ba gnyis yod de/ chu ba la gnas nas chung la ba bar byed do// sbyin dus rigs mi mthong dbapas su
367a2(dkon brtsegs): ces byang gnyis yod de rgyab kyi skal tshigs la gnas nas rgyad kyi sgal tshogs la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs tshal gyi kha dog ces bya ba gcig yod de/ tshil la gnas nas tshil la za bar bye/
367a3(dkon brtsegs): srin du'i rigs mazos pa'i kha dog ces bya ba gcig yod do// mkhris pa la gnas nas mkhris pa la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs pu tig ces bya ba gcig yod de/ mchin pa la gnas nas na
367a4(dkon brtsegs): pa la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs 'dam bu zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ mcher ba la gnas nas mcher ba la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs lnga brgya yod de/ rigs brgya ni zla ba zhes bya'o// /
367a5(dkon brtsegs): rigs brgya ni zla ba'i kha zhes bya'o// rigs brgya ni bsil byed ces bya'o// rigs brgya ni bsil byed gtong zhes bya'o// rigs brgya ni yangs pa zhes bya ste/ rtsib logs g.yon pa la gnas
367a6(dkon brtsegs): nas rtsib logs g.yon pa la za bar byed do// gzhan yang srin bu'i rigs lnga brgya yod pa'ang ming gong ma dang mthun te/ rtsib logs g.yas pa la gnas nas rtsib logs g.yas pa la za bar
367a7(dkon brtsegs): byed do// srin bu'i rigs cung zad 'bigs pa dang / cher 'bigs pa dang / rus pa 'bigs pa dang / rus pa'i gdong zhes bya bzhi yod de/ rus pa la gnas nas rus pa la za bar byed do// srin
367b1(dkon brtsegs): rabs cung zang 'jigs pa dang / cher 'bigs pa dang / rus pa 'jigs pa dang / rus pa'i bdong zhes bya ba ba'i yod de/ rus pa la gnas nas nus par bya bar byed do//
367b2(dkon brtsegs): rigs cher dkar ba dang / cung zad dkar ba dang / snom pa'i stobs dang / stag lam zhes bya ba bzhi yod de/ rtsa rgyus la gnas nas rtsa rgyus la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs mos pa
367b3(dkon brtsegs): yid dang seng ge'i stobs dang / ri bong lho dang 'dod pa la mngon par zhen pa zhes bya ba ba ni yod de/ ma zhu ba'i gnas la nas ma zhu ba'i gnas la za bar byed do// srim bu'i rigs dpa' bo dang dpa'
367b4(dkon brtsegs): bo bdag po zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ zhu ba'i gnas la gnas nas zhu ba'i gnas la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs mu kha dang / dra ba kha dang / phung po'i kha dang / be'u kha zhes bya ni yod
367b5(dkon brtsegs): de bci ba'i lam la gnas nas gci ba'i lam la rnga bar byed do// srin du'i rigs byed pa dang / byed pa chen po dang / bye ma dang / bo ta ra ka zhes bya ba bzhi yod do// bshang ba'i lam
367b6(dkon brtsegs): la gnas nas bshang ba'i lam la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs gdong nag dang 'jigs su rung ba'i gdong zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ brlal gnas nas brlal za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs
367b7(dkon brtsegs): mdze can dang mdze can chu ngum zhes bya ba gnyis yod do// pus mos laganas nas pus mo la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs myos pa'i rtsa ba zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ byin pa la gnas nas
368a1(dkon brtsegs): byin pa la ba bar byed do// srim du'i rigs mgo gnas ces bya ba gcig yod du/ rkang pa la gnas nas rkang bral ba bar byed do// dga' bongs dang khyod la
368a2(dkon brtsegs): bu'i rigs stong phrag brgyad cu lus 'di la gnas nas nyin mtshan du za bar byed pas/ nyam stobs chung zhing mdog ngan par byed pa dang / nad kyi sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs lus 'di la 'dus nas/
368a3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang de'i sems gdung ba dang / rab tu gdung ba dang / yongs su gdung bar byed pas/ sman pa mkhas pa yod kyang de la rmongs pas sman gang gis nang 'di dag gso bar nus pa shes par
368a4(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur ba mdor bstan pa yin te/ mkhas pa su zhig 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'di 'dra ba'i lus la rjes su chags par byed/ gzhan yang dga' bo dang po btsas nas cher skye bar 'gyur/
368a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bar du gos dang zas kyis gsos nas lus 'di mngon par grub par gyur kyang / de'i tshe'i tshad lo brgya thub pa'ang yod de/ de bas thung ba'ang yod do// lo brgya po ra'ang dus gsum phyar
368a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ dpyir dang / dbyar dang dgun gyi dus gang yin pa'o// de la dpyid kyi rus gang yin pa de ni tsha ba'i dus so// dbyar gang yin pa de ni char 'bab pa'i dus
368a7(dkon brtsegs): so/ dgun gang yin pa de ni grang ba'i dus so// dus gsum po de dag re re la'ang zla ba bzhi bzhi yod pas/ lo gcig la ni zla ba bcu gnyis yod par 'gyur la lo brgya la ni zla ba stong
368b1(dkon brtsegs): nyis brgya long bar 'gyur bas rdza ba yarang po dkar po dang zla ba mar gyi ngo nag pos bye nas nyis stong bzhi brgyar 'gyur te/ de la nyin mtshan ni stong zag sum cu rtsa drug yod do// gnyen
368b2(dkon brtsegs): gcig la lan gnyis su za bas ni lan sgong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis pa bar 'gyur te/ res 'ga' mi za'ang grangs der 'dus so// de ni 'di lta ste/ nab dang / ra ro ba dang / ched dungs
368b3(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa dang / gnyid log pa dang / rtsed mo rtses pa dang las gzhan gyis zel ba dang / ma'i mu no 'thungs pa'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis ma dzes pa gang yin pa 'di ni ma zos pa zhes bya'o//
368b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta bu'i lus 'di ni lo brgya thub par gyur kyang mthar 'jig par gyur pas mkhas pa su zhig 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i de la rjes su chags par byed gzhan yang dga' bo lus
368b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di yang dag par blangs pa la sdug bsngal rnam pa gnyis yod de/ gnyis gang zhe na/ nang mang po rnams lus la 'dus pa gang yin pa de ni nang gi sdug bsngal lo zhes bya'o// mi dang
368b6(dkon brtsegs): mi ma yin pas rnam par 'tshe ba gang yin pa de ni phyi rol gyi sdug bsngal zhes bya'o// de la nang mang po lus la 'dus pa zhes bya ba je lta bu zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mig dang
368b7(dkon brtsegs): rna ba dang sna dang / lce dang / lkog ma dang so dang zang dang / lto ba dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa rnams na par gyur pa dang / gzhan yang rlung dang / mchil
369a1(dkon brtsegs): sngabs dang / smyos pa dang / khong rje dang dbugs mi bde ba dang smon pa dang / gci ba'i lam rtsub mo dang / gzhan pa dang / mdzu dang 'bras dang /
369a2(dkon brtsegs): thor bu dang / shu ba dang / 'brum bu dang / rkang bam dang gzhan yang nang rnam pa sna tshogs lus la 'dus pa gang yin pa'o// gzhan yang mkhris pa'i nang brgya rtsa gcig dang / rlung nang brgya
369a3(dkon brtsegs): rtsa gcig dang bad kan gyi nad brgya rtsa gcig dang / rlung dang / mkhris pa dang bad kan 'dus pa las byung ba'i nang bcu rtsa gcig ste/ de ltar nang bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi dag gis lus nyon mongs
369a4(dkon brtsegs): pa gang yin pa de ni nang gi sdug bsngal zhes bya'o// gzhan yang phyi rol gyi sdug bsngal gyis lus 'di la gnod par byed pa 'di lta ste/ btson ra dam por bcug pa dang / lcag gis
369a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhus pa dang / btson rar bcug pa dang / bcings pa'i sdug bsngal gang yin pa dang / gzhan yang rna ba bcad pa dang / sna bcad pa dang / lag pa dang rkang pa gtub pa dang mgo bcad
369a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / lha rnams kyi sa ma bsrungs pas mi ma yin pa'i gdon ma rungs pa rnams dang / gnod sbyin dang srin po rnams kyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa dang gzhan yang sbrang bu
369a7(dkon brtsegs): mchu rings dang / sha sbrang la sogs pa srin bu gdug pa rnams kyis zos pa dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba dang / bkres pa dang / skom pa dang / rlung dang / char pa nye bar gnas par
369b1(dkon brtsegs): gyur ba'i sdug bsngal rnam pa ma tshogs kyis lus can mongs par byed / mer gyur ba rnams kyi sdug bsgral yang 'anan nga ma rnams kyi byub bsdur snamos na gas/ 'a /
369b2(dkon brtsegs): brjod par dka' 'o// de lta bas na 'di dag thams cad kyang 'das pa'i dus su sdig pa mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'dus byas pa'i dbang gis 'di lta bu'i rnam par smin pa myong bar rig par bya'o//
369b3(dkon brtsegs): gang gis mtshon cha dag gis gnod pa byas pa yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir grong khyer brtsigs te/ 'obs kyis bskor nas lus 'di yongs su bsrungs kyang rlung dang / char pa dang / sbrang bu mchu
369b4(dkon brtsegs): rings dang / sha sbrang la sogs pa khang khyim dag tu 'ongs nas gnod pa byed par 'gyur na/ nang bzhi brgya rtsa bzhis kyang nang dang phyi rol nyon mongs par byed do// bza' ba dang / btung ba dang /
369b5(dkon brtsegs): mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos spyan dang / zhing dang / kun dga' ra ba dang khang khyim dang / gser dang / dngul la sogs pa rin po che sna bdun dang / zan po dang zan
369b6(dkon brtsegs): mo dang / shing rta dang / bzhon pa dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad rnams yongs su tshol ba na gal te yid dang mthun par ma gyur na'ang sdug bsngal skyed par byed la/ gal te longs spyod thob par
369b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur na'ang ser snas 'phangadra shing rtag tu bsrung ba dang / gal te stor cing chud zos par gyur na'ang sdug bsngal chen po skyed par byed do// dga' bo mdor na nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i lus 'di
370a1(dkon brtsegs): ni 'gro ba dang sdong pa dang 'dug pa dang / nyal ba'i spyod lam thams cad sdug bsngal ma yin pa gang yin pa gang yang med pas gal te yun ring du 'gro zhing ska
370a2(dkon brtsegs): cig tsam du'ang ngal bsor med par gyur na'ang sdug bsngal bar 'gyur la/ sdod pa dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba de dag so so nas yun ring du gyur na'ang thams cad sdug bsngal bar 'gyur bas/ gal
370a3(dkon brtsegs): yun ring du so song ba las skad cig tsam du 'dug tu yod par gyur na/ bde ba'i 'du shes skyed par byed kyang de yang dag par bde bar byed pa ma yin no// gal te yun ring du 'greng ba las skad
370a4(dkon brtsegs): cig tsam du 'dug pa dang / gal te yun ring du 'dug pa las skad cig tsam du nyal bar gyur pa la yang dag pa ma yin pas bde ba'i 'du shes skyed par byed kyang de yang dag par bde ba ma yin pas/
370a5(dkon brtsegs): de'i phyir nye bar len pa'i phub lnga'i lus 'di ni thams cad kyang sdug bsngal yin par rig par bya'o// gang la la zhig gis bdag gi don dang / gnan gyi don dang / bdag dang gzhan gyi don gyi
370a6(dkon brtsegs): phyir de lta bu'i sdug bsngal rnams la yongs su skyo ba skyes nas/ khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ yang dag par slob par byed na/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i rnam par grol ba'i
370a7(dkon brtsegs): chos las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba gang la la zhig gos dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis nga la rim gro byed pa de dag kyang rnam par smin pa chen po
370b1(dkon brtsegs): susastsa/
370b2(dkon brtsegs): / sa/ na sa sa / yu gnas rgyu gsas
370b3(dkon brtsegs): gam te ma rtag pa mas dbyug bsngal ba'ig yin rnamadon te sgrus bsngal mang bzhi gzhin dga' bas gsalapa/ gzugs gang 'gas pa don sdug
370b4(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang mai tag tsang sug bsngal bar ni rnam par 'jig pa tshus can 'anan na bags pa'i ban thos ma du thos pa
370b5(dkon brtsegs): lta bu'i bstan pa thos par gyur na'ang / lus 'di ni 'di lta bu'i gzugs can no zhes 'dzin cing de la bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin par byed ngam bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ gzugs
370b6(dkon brtsegs): la bdag ces bgyi ba'ang ma mchis labadag gi zhes bgyi ba'ang ma mchis pas so// gzhan yang dga' bo 'di ji snyam du semasatshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
370b7(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de dag ci rtag pa zhig yin nam 'on te mi rtag pa zhig yin bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos gsol ba bcom
371a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de dag thams cad ni mi rtag pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te mi rtag pa yin na/ ni sdug bsngal bzhig yin nan//
371a2(dkon brtsegs): 'on te sdug bsngal med pa zhig yin/ dga' bos gsol pa/ 'di ltar phung po bzhi po de dag ni sdug bsngal ba zhes bgyi ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ gang rmi
371a3(dkon brtsegs): rtag cing sdug bsngal ba de ni rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin na 'phags pa'i nyan thos mang du thos pa dang ldan pa gang de lta bu'i bstan pa thos par gyur na'ang / lus 'di'i phung po bzhi po
371a4(dkon brtsegs): ngag la bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin par byed dam/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ phung po bzhi po dag la yang dag par bdag ces bgyi ba'ang ma mchis la/ bdag gi zhes dgyi ba'ang
371a5(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pas so// gzhan yang dga' bo 'di ltar bdag ces bya ba de ni 'das pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / nang dang / phyi rol na'ang yod pa ma yin la/
371a6(dkon brtsegs): rags pa dang / phra ba dang / bzang po dang / ngan pa dang / nye ba dang ring ba ma yin pas chos de dag thams cad ni bdag dang bdag gi ba ma yin no// de lta bas na dga'
371a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar yang dag par shes pas chos rnams la bdag med par so sor brtag par rig par bya'o// 'phags pa'i nyan thos mang du thos pa dang ldan pa gang de ltar so sor brtags nas yongs su skyo ba
371b1(dkon brtsegs): skyed par byed na/ rnam par grol zhing mthar yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur te/ de ltar yang dag par bslabs nas chos 'di mngon du gyur pa'i cha/ skye ba'i cha ni zad cing
371b2(dkon brtsegs): tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par spyad pas/ bya ba byas nas/ yang srid pa byim len par mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal ba na/
371b3(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo ni rdul spongs shing dri ma dang bral bas chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa thob par gyur to// dge slong lnga brgya po de dag ni chos rnams la len pa med par zag pa zad nas sems rnam
371b4(dkon brtsegs): par grol bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'khor mang po rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog
371b5(dkon brtsegs): brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo mngal du 'jug par bstan pa'i 'dus pa ste/ 'dus pa bcu gsum pa rdzogs
371b6(dkon brtsegs): so// lo tsa ba 'gos chos grub kyis rgyu nag gi dpe las bsgyur cing nus te gtan la phab pa/ sh+lo ka sum brgya ste bam po gcig go/
371b7(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i mdo stong phrag brgya pa las gcung mo'u dga' bo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//
372a1(dkon brtsegs): bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i rus gcig na/ bcom ldan sa/
372a2(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer ser skyan shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na dge slong gi dge 'dun tshang med pa rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das kyi gcung mo'u dga' bo zhes bya ba de'i luH
372a3(dkon brtsegs): gser gyi kha dog can mtshan sum cu dang ldan zhing tshad bcom ldan 'das las sor bzhis thung ba zhig yod de/ de'i chung ma sun da ri ka zhes bya ba bzang mo bltan sdug pa/ byad bzhin mdzes
372a4(dkon brtsegs): shing 'jig rten na dkon pa kha dog khyad par du 'phags shing mang po kun gyis lha 'dod pa zhig yod pas dga' bo de la chags shing zhen par gyur pas skad cig tsam dubang mi 'bral zhing
372a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'i sems kyis shin tu chags par gyur te/ srog gis 'jal bar byed pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de gdul ba'i dus mkhyen nas snga dro'i dus kyi tshe na bza' man
372a6(dkon brtsegs): te lhung bzed bsnams nas zham ring ba tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang grong khyer du bsod snyoms la gshegs te/ mthar gyis dga' bo'i khyim gang na ba der gshegs nas de'i
372a7(dkon brtsegs): sgor gshegs te bzhugs so// de nas thugs rje chen po'i mthus 'od zer gser gyi kha dog lta bu btang bas dga' bo'i khyim nang kun tu'ang gser bcom lta bu'i kha dog tu gyur pa dang
372b1(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe dga' bo 'di snyam du 'od zer kun tu snang bar gyur pas/ gdon mi za bar 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yin no snyam du bsams nas mi zhig mngags te/ kye song la su yin pa ltos shig ces
372b2(dkon brtsegs): bsgo ba dang / des kyang bcom ldan 'das mthong nas myur zhing rings pas slar log nas dga' bo la bcom ldan 'das sgo na bzhugs so zhes smras so// des de skad ces smras pa thos nas
372b3(dkon brtsegs): myur du phyir byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das bsus te phyag bya bar byas pa las/ de'i tshe sun da ri ka 'di snyam du bdag gis gal te 'di btang bar gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gdon mi za
372b4(dkon brtsegs): bar rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam du bsams nas gos kyi mtha' ma nas bzung ste ma gtang ba dang / dga' bos smras pa/ deng re zhig thong zhig dang / bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas
372b5(dkon brtsegs): nas bdag slar 'ong ngo // sun da ri kas smras pa bdag cag dam bcas nas gdong de bzhin btang ngo // zhes de'i dpral ba la thig le gsher ba'i mtshan ma btags nas/ 'di skad
372b6(dkon brtsegs): thig le 'di ma bskams par slar gshegs su gso la/ gal te thogs par gyur gser gyi kar sha pa Na lnga brgyas chad pas gcad do zhes smras pa dang / dga' bos kyang de bzhin du bya'o zhes
372b7(dkon brtsegs): sgor byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i lhung bzed blangs nas slar khyim du zhugs te bza' ba dang bca' ba bsod pa dag lhung
373a1(dkon brtsegs): bzed bkang nas slar sgor byung ba dang bcom ldan 'das slar gshegs pas tshe dang ldan pa kun dag sol byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed ma len
373a2(dkon brtsegs): cig par mtshan ma bstan to// de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa chen po ni shin tu gzi byin che bas bzhes su gsol zhes gsol ba'i thugs kyang mthub nas/ yang kun dga' bo la byin pa
373a3(dkon brtsegs): dang kun dga' bos smras pa khyod kyis lhung bzed 'di su lus blangs smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das las blangs so// kun dga' bos smras pa/ 'o na bcom ldan 'das
373a4(dkon brtsegs): la phul cig/ des smras pa bdag ston pa chen po la gsol ba'i thugs mi thub bo zhes cang mi smra bar zham ring du song ngo // bcom ldan 'das slar gtsug lag khang dug shes nas phyag
373a5(dkon brtsegs): bcabs zhabs bsil te ga dan la bzhugs pa dang dga' bos lhung bzed thogs pa de bcom ldan 'das la phul lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis zas kyi bya ba mdzad nas/ dga' bo
373a6(dkon brtsegs): la bka' stsal pa khyod nga'i lhung bzed kyi lhag ma za'am bdag 'tshal lo zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de la byin no// dga' bos zos zin pa dang / bcom
373a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ci khyod rab tu 'byung ngam/ des kyang rab tu 'byung ngo zhes gsol te/ de'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad ba spyor ban
373b1(dkon brtsegs): yab yum dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / bla ma'i gnas gzhan rnams kyis rjes su bstan pa dag dang rnam yang 'gal ba ma mdzad pa'i phyir// da ltar gang yang bka' las
373b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gal bar mi byed pa brnyes par gyur pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ kun dga' bo la bka' stsal ba/ khyod kyis dga' bo'i skra dang kha spu bregs shig ces bka'
373b3(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du 'tshal lo zhes 'dreg mkhan btsal nas/ de'i skra breg par brtsams pa dang / dga' bos 'dreg mkhan do la bsgo ba/ kA le khyod mi shes sam/
373b4(dkon brtsegs): nga ni ring por mi thogs par stobs kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po byed par 'gyur bas/ khyod kyis gal te nga'i skra bregs par gyur na/ khyod kyi lag pa gnyis 'khrig ma man chad gcad
373b5(dkon brtsegs): zhes bsdigs pas de shin tu skrag par gyur nas spu gri bsdus te phyir 'gro bar brtsams pa dang / de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la gsol to// bcom
373b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das nyid dga' bo ga la ba der gshegs te/ dga' bo la ci khyod rab tu mi 'byung ngam/ des kyang rab tu 'byung ngo zhes gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis ril
373b7(dkon brtsegs): ba snams te/ de'i mgo bo la chu blugs nas 'dreg mkhan gyis skra dang kha spu bregs pa dang / de 'di snyam du dang bdag re zhig bcom ldan 'das la sri zhu byas te rab tu byung mod kyi/
374a1(dkon brtsegs): 'on kyang dgongs kar slar khyim du 'gro'o snyam mo// res dgongs kar lam du zhugs te song ba dang de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i 'gro ba'i lam du g.yangs
374a2(dkon brtsegs): chen po zhig sprul pa des mthong nas 'di snyam du sun da ri ka dang dus byas pa ni thag ring du gyur pas 'gro ba'i rkyen dang ldan par ma gyur te ba deng bdag gis de bsams pa nyid kyis gal
374a3(dkon brtsegs): te 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur yang srid na gal te shi bar ma gyur na nam nangs te 'gro'o zhes su ma da ri ka dran pa'i mya ngan dang sdug bsngal gyis mtshan mo 'das par gyur to re
374a4(dkon brtsegs): ras bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod song la dga' bo de la khang skyong byos shig par sgo zhig
374a5(dkon brtsegs): des kyang de bzhin du de'i thad du song nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khang skyong byos shig par bka' stsal to zhes bsgo ba dang / des kyang khang skyong zhes bya ba ji lta bu/ des bya ba ni ci zhig/
374a6(dkon brtsegs): byed ces dris so// des smras pa/ gtsug lag khang du dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag zhal ta bya dgos so// smras pa/ tshul ji lta bur bya ba'i rigs/ smras pa/ khang skyong zhes bya ba ni gal
374a7(dkon brtsegs): te dge slong rnams bsod snyoms la dong na gtsug las khang gi nang gis rnams phyags nas chag chag gdab par bya'o// ba glang gi lci ba gsar pa blangs nas go rims bzhin du 'jam por
374b1(dkon brtsegs): bslu bar bya'o// legs par yid la byas te bsrung zhing sbyor rlag med par bya'o// zos bya ba yong na dge 'dun la gsol bar bya'o// dri dang me tog yod na dge 'dun la thim par bya'o//
374b2(dkon brtsegs): mtshan mo sgo gcod cing nas nangs na dbye bar bya'o// snam phyis dang chab khungasas rtag tu bkru zhing byi dor bya dgos so// gal te gtsug lag khang zhig cing ral pa yod na bcos legs bya'o//
374b3(dkon brtsegs): zhes de skad bstan pa thos pa dang / btsun pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bka' stsal pa bzhin du thams cad bdag gis de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes khas blangs so//
374b4(dkon brtsegs): de nas dge slong rnams snga dro'i dus kyi tshe chos gos dang lhung bzed thogs te/ grong khyer ser skya'i gnas su bsor snyoms la bzhud pa dang / dga' bo gtsug lag khang na su'ang med par
374b5(dkon brtsegs): mthong nas bdag gis phyag bdar byas zin pa dang / slar khyim du 'gro'o zhes phyag bdar byed pa la zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de gzigs shing mkhyen nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs
374b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis phyags zin pa'i sa gtsang ma rnams slar phyag dar gyis gang bar byin gyis brlabs pa dang / des kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis phyag bdar bor te/ slar khyim du 'gro'o snyam du bsam nas phyag
374b7(dkon brtsegs): ma slar bsdus nas phyag dar zad par ma gyur pas/ gnas khang gi sgo gcang de 'gro snyam du bsams pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo gcig gcang zin pa nas sgo gzhan gcad tsam na
375a1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang bye bar byin gyis bslabs pas de nyon mongs pa skyes nas/ gzhan yang 'di snyam du gal te rkun pos gtsug lag khang 'di nyams par byas kyang 'di la gnod pa
375a2(dkon brtsegs): ci yod de bdag rgyal por gyur pa na 'di bas lhag pa'i gtsug lag khang bzang po brgya stong brtsig par zang bas/ bdag ni slar khyim du 'gro ba'i rigs so zhes gal te lam po cher zhugs te 'gro
375a3(dkon brtsegs): na ni bcom ldan 'das dang phrad du dogs pas gseb lam du zhugs te 'gro snyam du bsams so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas gseb lam de nyid du
375a4(dkon brtsegs): zhugs te gshegs so// des rgyang nas bcom ldan 'das mthong nas mi phrad par bya ba'i phyir/ lam gyi 'gram na ljon shing yal ga dang grib mar ldan pa thur du 'jol ba zhig gi drung du ga
375a5(dkon brtsegs): ste 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ljon shing de'i lalag gyen du brdzes nas de'i lus mngon du snang bar byin gyis brlabs nasabacom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la khyod gar nas
375a6(dkon brtsegs): 'ongs nga'i phyi bzhin shog cig ces bka' stsal ba dang / dbang srungs te ngo che ba'i sems kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zham ring du 'brangs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di
375a7(dkon brtsegs): snyam du dgongs te/ 'di chung ma la shin tu chags shing rgan par gyur pas de dang dpral zhing ban ga dgas pa'i phyir grong khyer ser s+ya nas byung ste/ grong khyer mnyan yong du gshegs so btam du
375b1(dkon brtsegs): dgongs nas der byon pa dang / ri dgas dgra' mas ga'i kun dga' rab na bcugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di sam du dga' bo chun po 'di ni rtag tu chung ma la chags
375b2(dkon brtsegs): shing zhen nas gtong bar mi byed pas 'di la thabs shig sbyar te sems nye bar zhi bar bya'o snyam du dgongs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la bka' stsal ba/ khyod kyis sngon chad dri ldan nas
375b3(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i ri mthong ngam/ gsol ba/ ma mthong lags so// gal te de lta na nga'i chos gos kyi grwa nas zung zhig/ des kyang na bza'i gnas bzung ba dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das dang pa'i
375b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po bzhin du nam mkha' la ldings te ri ni ldan du gshegs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang thabs cig tu g.yas g.yon du gzigs pa las shing drung zhig na spra mo mig ya gcig zhar ba gcig
375b5(dkon brtsegs): gdor bteg nas mig mi yo bar rtse gcig tu bcom ldan 'das la bltas pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis spra mo zhar ma 'di mthong ngam gsol pa/
375b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod ji snyam du sems spra mo zhar ma na su dag dang bskrun na gar bzang zhing khyad par du 'phags
375b7(dkon brtsegs): gsol ba sun da ri ka de ni shAkya'i rigs lags te lha'i bu mo dang 'dra bar byang bzhin mchogs gyur cing 'jig rten no bla ma mchis pa lags pas spra mo nar
376a1(dkon brtsegs): ma 'di dang bskrun par gyur na brgya'i char yang nye bar mi man+ta stong gi cha dang / khri'i cha dang 'bum gyi mdang / mangs dang / cha dang bgrang ba dang /
376a2(dkon brtsegs): dbye dang rgyur yang mi bzod lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis lha'i gzhal med khang mthong ngam/ gsol ba/ ma mthong lags
376a3(dkon brtsegs): so// 'on yang chos gos kyi grwa nas zungab zhig/ des kyang na bza' la bzung ba dang ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas sum nu ma gsum gyi lha'i gnas su gshegs te/
376a4(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la khyod song la/ lha'i gzhal med khang khyad par du 'phags pa'i gnas rnams la ltos shig ces bka' stsal pa dang tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos kyang dga'
376a5(dkon brtsegs): tshal dang shing rta sna tshogs kyi tshal dang rtsub 'gyur gyi tshal dang / 'dres pa'i tshal dang / kun tu 'dus pa'i tshal dang chos bzang khang la sogs pa lha rnams kyi
376a6(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' rab dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang rdzing dang rdzing bu dang / rtsed mo rtse zhing dga' mgu ba'i gnas rnams su song ste/ kun tu khyab par bltas nas mthar
376a7(dkon brtsegs): gyis zong khyer rab snang du zhugs pa las gzhan yang rnga dang pi wang dang / rgyud rnam pa sna tshogs las sgra snyan pa la sogs pa 'byin pa dang gnas de dang de dag tu lha'i
376b1(dkon brtsegs): mo dang bu po shin tu mdzes pa dag lhan cig rtse zhing 'khod pa dag mthong ngo // dga' bos kun tu brtags pa las gnas gzham cig gi gzhal med khang na lha'i bu mo baba' zhig yod kyi/ wA/
376b2(dkon brtsegs): bu po med par mthong / lha'i bu mo de dag la ci'i rgyas gnas gzhan na ni lha'i bu mo dang / lha'i bu po 'dres par gnas nas bde ba rnams myong bar byed na/ khyer ni gang gi phyir lha'i bu
376b3(dkon brtsegs): 'ba' zhig lhan cig gnas shing lha'i bu mi snang bar gyur ces dris pa dang / lha'i bu mo de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi gcung dga' bo zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das las rab tu byung nas rtse gcig
376b4(dkon brtsegs): tu tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par spyod pa zhig yod de/ de rus de las 'das pa'i 'og tu 'dir skye bar 'gyur bas/ bdag cag ni 'dir de la sdod pa yin no zhes smras so// dga'
376b5(dkon brtsegs): ngos de skad thos nas dga' mgu rangs pas myur zhing rings par bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis lha rnams kyi khyad
376b6(dkon brtsegs): par du 'phags pa'i dngos po dag mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod kyis dngos po ci zhig mthong zhes bka' stsal pa dang / des kyang rdza/
376b7(dkon brtsegs): ltar mthong ba rnams rgyas par bcom ldan 'das la gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo khyod kyis lha'i bu mo rnams mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ mthong lags so//
377a1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu mo de dag sun du ri ka dang bskrun na/ gang gzugs bzang zhing khyang par du 'phags gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sun dA ri ka lha'i bu mo de dag nga
377a2(dkon brtsegs): spun naji lta ra ri dri ldan gyi spra mo zhar ma sun da ri ka dang bskrun pa bzhin du brgya'i char yang nye bar mi mchi ste/ stong gi cha dang / khri'i cha dang / 'bum gyi cha nas/ rgyu'i bar du'ang mi bzod lags
377a3(dkon brtsegs): so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par spyad na de lta bu'i phan yon khyad par du 'phags pa dang ldan par 'gyur bas/ deng khyod kyis tshangs
377a4(dkon brtsegs): par spyod pa brtan par spyod cig dang / lhar skyes nas de lta bu'i bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro// des kyang de skad du thos nas dga' mgu rangs te nang mi zer bar 'dug go/ de nas
377a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang thabs cig tu lha'i gnas nas mi snang bar gyur te/ mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra bar gshegs so//
377a6(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo'ang lha'i gzhal med khang la bsam bzhin du tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par spyad par gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas
377a7(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod song la dge slong rnams la 'di skad du/ khyed su'ang dga' bo dang lhan cig stan gcig la ma 'dug cig/ 'chag sa gcig
377b1(dkon brtsegs): tu ma 'chagacig/ gdang bu gcig la chos gos lhan cig ma gzhag cig/ gnas gcig tu lhung bzed dang ril ba lhan cig ma gzhag cig/ gnas gcig tu mdo sde klog par ma byed cig
377b2(dkon brtsegs): ton 'don par ma byed cig ces sgo zhig/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa de bzhin du dge slong rnams la bsgo ba dang / dge slong rnams kyis kyang 'phags
377b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bka' bzhin du 'tshal lo zhes smras so// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo'ang mang po rnams kyis spangs par yang mthong bas shin tu ngo tsha zhing gnong par gyur to// de nas dus gzhan zhig
377b4(dkon brtsegs): na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dge slong mngo bo rnams dang lhan cig tu bkang sa na chos gos 'dzub pa'i las byed pa de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos mthong nas 'di snyam du dge slong mang po 'di dag
377b5(dkon brtsegs): ni bdag yongs su spangs pas lhan cig tu mi gnas na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di ni bdag gi nu bo yin pas cis kyang smad par mi byed do snyam du bsams nas/ de'i thad du song ste lha na/
377b6(dkon brtsegs): cig 'dug pa dang / de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'ang myur du langs te song ngo // des smras pa/ kun dga' bo dge slong gzhan rnams ni bdag spong ba'i rigs na khyod kho bo'i
377b7(dkon brtsegs): nu bo yin na ci'i phyir bdag spong bar byed/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/ yang dag par de lta bu'i don dang ldan mod kyi/ 'on kyang khyod ni lam gzhan du 'gro la bdag kyang lam de shi ba'i
378a1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan du 'gro bas de'i phyir phan tshun byol ba yin no// smras pa gang ni kho bo'i lam yin gang ni khyod kyi lam yin smras pa khyod ni lhar skye bar mos
378a2(dkon brtsegs): nas tshangs par spyad pa spyod do// bdag ni mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su gnyer ba'i phyira'adod pa kun nas nyon mongs pa rab tu bsal ba yin no zhes de skad smras pa thos pa dang / shin
378a3(dkon brtsegs): tu mi dga' zhing mya ngan gyis non par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i sems kyi bsam pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/
378a4(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis sngon chad sems can dmyal ba mthong ngam gsol pa ma mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa khyod kyis nga'i chos gos kyi grwa nas zung zhig
378a5(dkon brtsegs): des kyang na bza' la bzung ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de khrid nas sems can dmyal ba'i gnas su gshegs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyogs gcig tu bzhugs nas
378a6(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la bka' stsal pa khyod song la sems can dmyal ba rnams ltos shig/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos kyang de bzhin song ba las sngar ni chu bo bI ta ra ni mthong
378a7(dkon brtsegs): de nas mthar gyis ral gri'i lo ma'i nags dang / bshang gci'i 'dam dang / me ma mur gyi gnas su phyin nas/ de dag tu zhugs te rnam par bltas pa las sems can
378b1(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong ba dag mthong ste/ kha cig ni skam pas lce dang so dang / mig byung ba dang / kha cig ni sog les lus 'dra ba dang / kha cig ni sta res rkang lagagatung bdang /
378b2(dkon brtsegs): kha cig ni mtshon cha shag ti dang dgra sta so gnyis pa dang / benas bstan pa dang / kha cig ni lcags kyi tho bas 'tshog par byas pa dang / kha cig ni lcags kyi thu lum khar bcug pa dang /
378b3(dkon brtsegs): kha cig ni ral gri lom can dang ljon shing ral gri lo ma can la 'jog po dang / gtun gyis brdung ba dang / rang zag gis 'thug pa dang / zad kyi ka ba la 'ju ba dang / lcags kyi
378b4(dkon brtsegs): la 'dug nas sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rnams myong bar mthong ngo // kha cig ni lcags zangs me lce rab tu 'bar zhing khol ba rab tu tsha ba'i 'od byung ba dag tu sems can 'tshong pas/ de lta bu'i sdug
378b5(dkon brtsegs): bsngal gyi dngos po myong ba dag mthong ngo // gzhan yang lcags zangs stong pa khol zhing me lce rab tu 'bar zhing tsha ba sems can med pa gcig mthong ba dang / shin tu skrag nas dmyal ba'i srungs
378b6(dkon brtsegs): ma la kye rgyu dang rkyen gang gi phyir lcags zangs gzhan rnams ni sems can 'tshong par byed pa la/ lcags zangs 'di 'ba' zhig ni stong par khol zhes dris pa dang / des smras pa/ bcom ldan
378b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyi gcung dga' bo zhes bya ba lhar skye bar smon nas sems rtse gcig tu tshangs par spyad pa la yang dag par spyod pas/ lha'i 'jig rten du skyes nas re zhig bde ba myong bar 'gyur yang de shi ba'i
379a1(dkon brtsegs): 'og tu lcags zangs 'dir 'jug par gyur pas de'i phyir deng bdag cag lcags zangs me sbar nas bsdud pa yin no zhes smras pa dga' bos thos nas shin tu
379a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs skrag pa skyes nas ba spu langs te lus las rdul byung nas 'di snyam du 'dis gal te bdag dga' bo yin par shes par gyur na ni gson po kho nar zangs kyi nang du bor bar 'gyur ro snyam
379a3(dkon brtsegs): du bsams nas myur zhing rings par bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su bros te song ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa khyod kyis sems can
379a4(dkon brtsegs): dmyal ba rnams mthong ngam/ des kyang snying rje ba'i tshul du mchi ma blags te ngus nas lce zhugs pa bzhin du skad bra mo phyung nas mthong lags so zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis
379a5(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa khyod kyis dngos po ci zhig mthong / des kyang ji ltar mthong ba rnams rgyas par bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo mir skye ra
379a6(dkon brtsegs): smon pa dang lha'i 'jig rten yongs su tshol bar 'dod pas tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par spyad pa la nyes dmigs de lta bu yod pas/ de lta bas na deng khyod kyis mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su
379a7(dkon brtsegs): gnyer ba'i bsam pas tshangs par spyad par bya'i/ lhar skye ba la mngon par dga' ngas rab tu brtson par mi bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos da skad ces bka' stsal pa thos nas ngo tsha ba'i sems
379b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis cang mi zer bar 'dug pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas sems can dmyal ba'i khams nas mi snang bar gyur te/ slar rgyal byed kyi tshal du gshegs
379b2(dkon brtsegs): nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang / dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ nang gi dri ma rnam pa gsum yod de/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang gti mug gang yin pa ste/
379b3(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni spang bar bya yin pas yongs su spang ba la rab tu brtson zhing bslab par bya'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du nugs nas ring por ma lon par rgyan rjes
379b4(dkon brtsegs): ba bzhin du sems can gdul ba'i phyir dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu yul tsam par gshegs nas garga'i rdzing bu'i 'gram na bzhugs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dge slong lnga
379b5(dkon brtsegs): brgya dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams phyogs gcig tu
379b6(dkon brtsegs): 'khod par mkhyen nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ nga la chos kyi rnam grangs thog mar dge ba ba ra du dge ba mtha' mar dge ba don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang
379b7(dkon brtsegs): po ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs pa yongs su dag pa yongs su dkar ba tshangs par spyod pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ mngal du 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yod kyis/
380a1(dkon brtsegs): shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung zhig dang / ngas deng khyod la bshad par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du thos par 'tshal lo zhes gsol/
380a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo ma'i mngal dang ldan par gyur kyang mngal du 'jug par 'gyur ba'ang yod/ 'jug par mi 'gyur ba'ang yod do// ji ltar
380a3(dkon brtsegs): skye ba len cing ma'i mngal du 'jug par 'gyur zhe na/ gal te pha ma gnyis 'dod pa'i sems kyis lhan cig 'khrig pa'ang spyod par gyur/ ma'i mngal na'ang yongs su gtsang bar gyur/ dus kyi tha
380a4(dkon brtsegs): mtshan dang yang ldan par gyur la/ bar mdo'i phung po'ang mngon sum du snang bar gyur na/ de'i tshe ma'i mngal du 'jug par rig par bya'o// de la bar ma do'i phung po'i dbyibs dbang gnyis su 'gyur/
380a5(dkon brtsegs): kha dog sdug cing mdzes pa dang / kha dog mi sdug cing mi mdzes pa'o// sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi bar ma do'i srid pa'i kha dog ni mi sdug pa yin te 'di lta ste/ dper na
380a6(dkon brtsegs): sdong du me tshig pa dang 'dra'o// dud 'gro rnams kyi bar ma do'i srid pa'i kha dog ni 'di lta ste/ dper na dud pa dang 'dra'o// yi dgas rnams kyi bar ma do'i srid pa'i kha dog ni 'di
380a7(dkon brtsegs): lte ste/ dper na chu dang 'dra'o// lha dang mi rnams kyi bar ma do'i srid pa'i kha dog ni 'di lta ste/ dper na gser gyi kha dog dang 'dra'o// gzugs kyi khams kyi bar mdo'i srid pa'i
380b1(dkon brtsegs): kha rog ni dkar por 'dug go// gzugs med pa'i khams kyi lha rnams la ni bar ma do'i srid pa med de/ 'di ltar de ni gzugs med pa'i phyir to/ bar ma do'i phung po'i sems can bci rnaM
380b2(dkon brtsegs): lag gnyis dang rkang pa gnyis dang ldan no// kha cig ni rkang pa bani dang rkang pa mang po dang ldan no// kha cig ni rkang pa med de sngon gyi las ji lta ba bzhin du gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang dbyibs 'ang
380b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bar ma do'i srid pa mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro// lha'i bar ma da'i srong pa gang yin pa de ni mgo byin du k+ta'o// mi dang dud 'gro dang / yi dgas rnams kyi ni thad kAr lha 'ang cwog
380b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi bar ma do'i srid pa ni mgo thur du lta'o// bar mdo'i srid pa thams cad kyang rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pas/ nam mkha' la 'gro zhing lha'i mig bzhin skye ba'i gnas thag ring /
380b5(dkon brtsegs): po'ang mthong bar nus so// de la dus kyi zla mtshan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ zla mtshan gyi dus la bab pa gang yin pa'o// dga' bo bud med kha cig ni zhag gsum dang zhag rdza
380b6(dkon brtsegs): dang zla ba phyed dang / zla ba gcig lon nas zla mtshan dang ldan pa'ang yod do// kha cig ni rkyen la bltos pas yun ring zhig lon nas/ gdod zla mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba'ang yod do//
380b7(dkon brtsegs): bud med gang lus kyi mthu stobs med pa dang / sdug bsngal mang po myong ba dang / byang bzhin mi sdug pa dang / bza' ba dang btung ba mi bsod pa dag zos shing 'thungs pa de dag ni zla mtshan
381a1(dkon brtsegs): 'ongs su zin kyang myur du chad par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dper nas skam po'i phyogs su chus chag chag gtab pa'i tshe myur du skam par 'gyur ba bzhin no// bud ma
381a2(dkon brtsegs): gang lus kyi mthu stobs dang ldan pa dang rtag tu bde ba myong ba dang / byang bzhin sdug pa dang / bza' ba dang 'atung ba bsod bdag zos shing 'thungs pa de dag gi zla mtshan ni myur du 'chad par
381a3(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste dper nas gsher ba'i phyogs su rgyas chag chag btab pa'i tshe myur du skam par mi 'gyur ba bzhin no// ji ltar ma'i mngal du 'jug par mi 'gyur
381a4(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ gal te pha'i khu ba byung la ma'i khu ba ma byung ba dang mi'i khu ba byung la pha'i khu ba ma byung ba 'am/ gal te gnyis ka byung bar ma gyur na thams cad mngal len par mi 'gyur ro//
381a5(dkon brtsegs): gal te ma yongs su dag par ma gyur la pa yongs su dag par gyur pa 'am/ gal ta pa yongs su dag par ma gyur la/ ma yongs su dag par gyur pa'am/ gal te gnyis ka yongs su dag
381a6(dkon brtsegs): par ma gyur na'ang mngal len par mi 'gyur ro// gal te ma'i mngal gyi gnas rlung nad kyis yongs su zin par gyur tam/ mkhris pa dang bar kan gyis yongs su zin par gyur tam/ khrag gis
381a7(dkon brtsegs): non pas mngal mdud pa can du gyur tam shas gang bar gyur tam sman 'thungs sam/ dpung nas 'dra ba 'am/ grog ma'i rked pa 'dra ba 'am mngal gyi sgo rnga mo'i kha lta bur gyur 'a/
381b1(dkon brtsegs): dpung shing gi rtsa ba mang po can lta bur gyur tam/ gshol mgo lta bur gyur tam/ shing rta'i tshigs bzhon sogs kar 'dug pa 'am/ swa lta bur 'dug pa 'am/ nas kyi tha ma skyes pa lta zur/
381b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur tam/ mngal 'og tu zab pa 'am/ steng du zab pa 'am/ mngal gyi snod du rung ba ma yin pa 'am/ rtag tu khrag zag pa 'am/ chu zag pa 'am/ bya rog gi mchu ltar rtag tu phye zhing 'dzum du mi btub pa
381b3(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ steng dang / 'og dang / tha ma zheng cha chung mi mnyam pa dang / mtho dam na mi snyoms shing 'bar 'bur du gyur pa 'am/ nang srin bus gtses pa 'am/ rus zhing myags nas mi gtsang bar
381b4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa gang yin pa ste/ gal te ma 'di lta bu'i skyon dang ldan par gyur na/ thams cad mngal du 'jug par mi 'gyur ro// gal te ba mtsho ris btsun zhing bar ma do'i srid pa dman par gyur /
381b5(dkon brtsegs): bar ma do'i srid pa cho rigs btsun zhing pha ma dman par gyur na'ang mngal 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// gal te pha ma dang bar ma do'i srid pa gnyis ka cho rigs btsun par gyur kyang / gal te las 'thun
381b6(dkon brtsegs): par ma gyur na'ang mngal 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// gal te bar mdo'i srid pa mdun na snang ba'i yul la po dang mo'i srid pa gnyis med par gyur na'ang skye ba len par mi 'gyur ro// dag
381b7(dkon brtsegs): bo bar ma do'i srid pa ji ltar ma'i mngal du 'jug pa thob par 'gyur zhe na/ gal te ma'i mngal yang yongs su gtsang bar gyur la/ bar ma do'i srid pas 'dod pa'i bya ba spyod pa mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ba san/
382a1(dkon brtsegs): gong du bstan pa lta bu'i skyon mang po'i bar yang med par gyur te/ phya ma dang du'ang phan tshun mngon par phrang ba'i las dang ldan par gyur na gdod ma'i mngal du 'jug par
382a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// gzhan yang bar ma do'i srid pa de ma'i mngal du 'jug pa'i tshe sems phyin ci log tu 'gyur te/ gal lo yin na ni ma la chags pa skye bar 'gyur la/ ba la ni zhe sdang skyed pa gyur ro//
382a3(dkon brtsegs): gal te mo yin na ni pha la chags pa skye bar 'gyur la/ ma la ni zhe sdang skye bar 'gyur te/ sngon 'das pa'i dus su mngon par 'dus byas po'i las kyi dbang gis yang dag pa ma yin pa'i
382a4(dkon brtsegs): shes kyis log par shes pa'i bsam pa skyed par byed de/ grang ba'i 'du shes dong / rlung chen po langs pa dang / char chen po 'bab pa dang / gnam rdzus pa'i 'du shes/ skye bo mang po'i sgra
382a5(dkon brtsegs): thos pa'i 'du shes skyed par byed pas las kyi mthong man ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes rnam pa bcu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na/ deng bdag ni khang pa'i nang du 'jug go/
382a6(dkon brtsegs): snyam pa dang / bdog ni khang pa brtsegs pa'i steng du 'dzeg go snyam pa dang / bdag ni gzhal med khang du 'jug go snyam pa dang / bdag ni khri la 'dzeg go snyam pa dang / bdag ni rtse'i sprul
382a7(dkon brtsegs): bur 'jug go snyam pa dang / bdag ni lo ma'i khyim du 'jug go snyam pa dang / bdag ni rtswa stug por 'jug go snyam pa dang / bdag ni chags kyi nang du 'jug go snyam pa dang / bdag ni rtsig pa'i
382b1(dkon brtsegs): tha 'dzul lo snyam pa dang / bdag ni sog ma'i gseb tu 'jug go snyam du sems pa gang yin pa ste/ dga' bo de'i tshe bar ma do'i srid pa de snyam du bas ma nas ma'i mngal du 'jug pa
382b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// skye ba len pa de ni mer mer po zhes bya bar rig par bya ste/ da ni pa'i khu ba dang ma'i khrag yin te/ dngos po gzhan ma yin yang pa dang ma'i khu ba dang khrag 'dus pa'i rgyu dang / rkyen dang /
382b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa'i rkyen te lhan cig gnas par byed pas 'di ste ste/ dper nardo dang / rdza ma dang / bsrub shing dang / skyes bu'i rtsol ba la brten nas mar 'byung gi/ gzhan las mi 'byung ba
382b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du pha ma'i migatsang ba'i khu ba dang khrag las mngon par grub pa'i lus mer mer po'ang de bzhin du rig par bya'o// gzhan yang dga' bo dpe rnam pa bzhi yod kyis/ khyod 'a
382b5(dkon brtsegs): par nyon cig/ 'di lta ste/ dper na nA sngon po la brten te srin bu skye bar 'gyur ba rtswa sngon po 'ang srin bu ma yin/ rtsa las gud na'ang srin bu med mod kyi/ 'on kyang rtswa la brten pa'i rgyu rang rkyen
382b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dus pa'i dbang gis srin bu skyes nas/ lus kyi kha dog kyang sngon por 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ dga' bo pa'i khu ba dang ma'i khrag gi lus mer mer po'ang 'di ltar rgyu dang rkyen 'dus pa las 'byung ba/
382b7(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i dbang gis skye bar rig par bya'o// 'di lta ste/ dper nab glang gi lci ba la rten nas srin bu skye bar 'gyur ba ba glang gi lci ba'ang srin du ma yin/ ba glang gi lci ba las gud na'ang srin du
383a1(dkon brtsegs): med mod kyi/ 'on kyang ba glang gi lci ba la rten pa'i rgyu rkyen 'dus pa'i dbang gis srin du skyes nas/ lus kyi kha dog kyang ser por 'gyur ba de bzhin du / dga' bo ba'i
383a2(dkon brtsegs): khu ba dang ma'i khrag gis lus mer mer po'ang 'di ltar rgyu dang rkyen 'dus pa las 'byung ba chen po'i dbang po skye bar rig par bya'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya shug la brten nas srin bu skye bar 'gyur brgya
383a3(dkon brtsegs): shug kyang srin bu ma yin/ brgya shug las gud na'ang srin bu med mod kyi/ 'on kyang rgya shug la brten pa'i rgyu rkyen 'dus pa'i dbang gis srin du skyes nas/ lus kyi kha dog kyang dmar por
383a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa de bzhin du/ dga' bo pha'i khu ba dang ma'i khrag gi lus mer mer po'ang 'di ltar rgyu dang rkyen 'dus pa las 'byung ba chen po'i dbang po skye bar rig par bya'o// 'di lta ste dper na
383a5(dkon brtsegs): zho la brten nas srin bu skye bar gyur pa/ lus kyi kha dog kyang dkar por 'gyur ba zhes bya ba nas/ rgyu dang rkyen 'dus pa las 'byung ba chen po'i dbang po skye bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar du 'ang
383a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas par sbyar ro// gzhan yang dga' bo pha ma'i mi gtsang ba la brten pa'i mer mer po'i dbang gis sa'i khams mngon du snang bas ni sra ba'i bya ba byed do// chu'i khams
383a7(dkon brtsegs): mngon du snang bas ni gsher ba'i bya ba byed do// me'i khams mngon du snang bas ni dro ba'i bya ba byed do// rlus shi khams mngon du snang bas ni yang zhing g.yo ba'i bya ba byed do//
383b1(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo gal te pha ma'i mi gtsang ba'i lus mer mer po de sil bams 'ba' zhig dang ldan la/ chu'i khams med par gyur na ni bskams te gyes par gyur pas/ 'di lta ste/ dper na lags pas
383b2(dkon brtsegs): bya dang thal ba skam po la sogs pa bcangs pa bzhin du 'gyur ro// gal te chu'i khams 'ba' zhig dang ldan la/ sa'i khams med par gyur na ni bo bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na 'bru mar
383b3(dkon brtsegs): ram chu lta bur gyur pa zhig na/ chu'i khams kyi dbang gis ni sa'i khams gyes par mi 'gyur la sa'i khams kyi dbang gis ni chu'i khams bo bar mi 'gyur ro// dga' bo gal te mer mer po
383b4(dkon brtsegs): lus dang chu'i khams dang ldan par gyur la me'i khams med par gyur na ni rul zhing myags par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na dbyar gyi dus su she'i gong bu grib ma la gzhag pa bzhin
383b5(dkon brtsegs): du 'gyur ro// dga' bo gal te mer mer po'i lus sa dang / chu dang me'i khams 'ba' zhig dang ldan la/ rlung gi khams med par gyur na ni 'phel zhing rgyas par mi 'gyur te/ 'di dag
383b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni sngon gyi las kyis rgyu byas nas phan tshun gcig gi rkyen gcig gi rgyus byas pa'i dbang gis rnam par shes pa skye bar 'gyur bas sa'i khams kyis ni rten byed do// chu'i khams kyis ni
383b7(dkon brtsegs): sdung bar byed do// me'i khams kyis ni yongs su smin par byed do// rlung gi khams kyis ni 'phel bar byed de/ dga' bo 'di lta ste/ dper na 'khur bamar na nam/ de'i slob mas 'khur ba
384a1(dkon brtsegs): / legs par bcos nas dbugs kyis bus nas rgya cher 'phel zhing nang khong stong du byed pa ji lta ba bzhin no// 'di lta ste/ dper na pad+ma'i rtsa ba ji lta ji lta ba bzhin du nang gi
384a2(dkon brtsegs): lus kyi 'byung ba chen po sa dang chu dang / me dang rlung gi khams las kyi stobs kyis 'phel bar byed pa'ang de bzhin du rig par bya'o// dga' bo pha ma'i mi gtsang ba las mer mer po'i lus
384a3(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba'ang ma yin/ ma'i mngal nas kyang ma yin/ las las kyang ma yin/ rgyu las kyang ma yin/ rkyen las kyang ma yin mod kyisa'on kyang rgyu rkyen mang po 'di dag 'tshogs pa'i dbang gis ma'i mngal
384a4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'grub par byed de/ 'di lta ste/ dper na sa bon gsar pa rlung dang nyi mas nyams par ma byas pa sra zhing snying po dang bcas pa/ bug ma byung ba/ shin tu legs par sbas pa zhing gshin pa la btab nas brlan
384a5(dkon brtsegs): gyi rgyu dang rkyen 'dus par gyur na/ gdor myu gu dang / sdong bu dang / ya la ga dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rims kyis skye zhing 'phel bar 'gyur te/ dga' bo sa bon de'ang rkyen
384a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dus pa dang bral ba las myu gu la sogs pa skyed par byed pa ma yin pa de bzhin du pha ma 'ba' zhig dang / las 'ba' zhig dang / rkyen gzhan 'ba' zhig las mngal du skye ba thob pa ma yin gyi pha ma'i
384a7(dkon brtsegs): khu ba dang / khrag dang / rgyu rkyen 'dus pa'i dbang gis mngal mngon par 'grub par rig par bya'o// dga' bo 'di lta ste/ dper na mig dang ldan pa'i skyes bus me yongs su tshol ba'i phyir nor bu me shel
384b1(dkon brtsegs): khyer nas nyi ma la gzhag ste/ ba glang gi lci ba skam po de'i steng du gzhag nag dong ma 'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ pha ma'i khu ba dang / khrag dang / rgyu dang / rkyen 'dus pa la brten pa'i phyir/
384b2(dkon brtsegs): gdong mngal mngon par 'grub pa'ang de bzhin du rig par bya'o// pha ma'i mi gtsang ba las mer mer po mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs zhes bya'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
384b3(dkon brtsegs): dang rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni ming zhes bya ste/ de ni med dang gzugs zhes bya'o// ming dang gzugs kyi phung po shin tu smad par bya ba'i srid pa rnams su skye ba len par byang ba 'di la ni ngas
384b4(dkon brtsegs): phyogs cung zad tsam mam/ skad cig tsam du'ang bsngags pa brjod par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ srid pa rnams su skye bar 'gyu ba gang yin pa de ni sdug bsngal chen po yin pas so// 'di
384b5(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/ dper na skyugs pa ni ji ltar chung yang mnam par byed pa de bzhin du/ srid pa rnams su skyes pa gang yin pa de ni chung yang sdug bsngal yin par rig par bya'o// nye bar len pa'i phung po
384b6(dkon brtsegs): lnga po gzugs dang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ga ngo yin pa de dag thams cad ni skye ba dang / gnas pa dang / 'phel ba dang / nyams shing
384b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig pa dang ldan te/ skye ba gang yin pa de ni sdug bsngal ba yin no// gnas pa gang yin par ni na ba yin no// 'bol ba dang nyams shing 'jigs pa gang yin pa de ni na she yin te/ de lta
385a1(dkon brtsegs): bas na dga' bo mkhas pa gang zhig srid pa'i rgya mtsho 'dir srid pa'i ro bskyed nas/ ma'i mngal na nyal zhing 'di 'dra ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa yang dag par nyams su
385a2(dkon brtsegs): myong bar byed/ gzhan yang dga' bo 'di ltar ma'i mngal du zhugs pa de'i grangs kyang mdor bsdu na/ zhag bdun phrag sum cu rtsa brgyad yod par rig par bya ste/ zhag bdun phrag
385a3(dkon brtsegs): dang po'i tshe ma'i mngal mi gtsang ba thog ma'i gnas su nyal bas 'di lta ste/ dper na zangs rab tu tsha ba'i nang du btsos shing brdos pa bzhin du lus kyi dbang po dang / rnam par shes pa lhan cig
385a4(dkon brtsegs): tu sdug bsngal mi bzad pa myong ba gang yin pa de ni mer mer po zhes bya'o// de'i dbyibs ni/ 'di lta skye/ dper na 'bras kyi khu ba 'am/ zho'i spris ma dang 'dra bas zhag bdun gyi bar du nang
385a5(dkon brtsegs): du bcos rab tu btsos pas na/ sa'i khams sra ba nyid dang / chu'i khams gsher ba nyid dang / me'i khams dro ba nyid dang / rlung gi khams yang zhing g.yo ba nyid gdod mngon du snang bar
385a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag gnyis pa la ma'i mngal na mi gtsang ba'i gnas su 'di lta ste/ dper na zangs kyi nang du bcos shing brdos pa bzhin du lus kyi dbang po dang rnam par
385a7(dkon brtsegs): shes pa lhan cig tu sdug bsngal mi bzad pa myong ba na/ ma'i mngal nas kun tu reg pa zhes bya ba'i rlung sngon gyi las kyi dbang gis rang byung nas mngal de la reg pa gang yin pa de ni nur nur po zhes bya'o//
385b1(dkon brtsegs): de'i dbyibs ni zho ska ba'am/ mar 'khyags pa 'dra ste/ zhag bdun gyi bar du nang du bcos rab tu btsos pasan 'dras ni po dag mngon du snang bar 'gyur ro// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag gsum pa la'ang
385b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas par snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/ ma'i mngal nas mdzod ka zhes bya ba'i rlung sngon gyi las kyi dbang gis byung nas mngal de la reg pa gang yin pa de ni ltar ltar po zhes bya'o// de'i dbyibs ni
385b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ lcags kyi thur ma 'am/ srin bu grol ma 'dra ste/ zhag bdun gyi bar du btsos rab tu btsos pas na khams bzhi po dag mngon du snang bar 'gyur ro// dga' bo zhag bdun
385b4(dkon brtsegs): phrag bzhi pa la'ang rgyas par snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/ ma'i mngal nas nang rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung sngon gyi las las byung nas mngal na gnas pa'i zug rngu rab tu 'bar ba 'bun par byed pa
385b5(dkon brtsegs): gang bar ni mkhrang 'gyur zhes bya'o// de'i dbyibs ni bong ba 'am/ mchig gu 'dra ste/ zhag bdun gyi bar du zhes bya ba nas/ khams bzhi po dag mngon du snang bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar
385b6(dkon brtsegs): snga ma bzhin no// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag lnga pa la'ang rgyas par snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/ ma'i mngal nas yang dag dag par sdud pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal de la
385b7(dkon brtsegs): reg par gyur pa na/ mtshan ma lnga po 'di lta ste/ dpung pa gnyis dang / brla gnyis dang mgo bo'i mtshan ma mngon du 'byung bar byed de/ 'di lta ste/ dper na dbyar gyi dus su
386a1(dkon brtsegs): char 'bab pa'i tshe/ ljon shing dang nags tshal rnams yal ga dang lo ma rgyas shing 'phel bar byed pa de bzhin du mtshan ma lnga po de dag rab tu snang bar byed do// dga'
386a2(dkon brtsegs): bo zhag bdun phrag drug pa la ni ma'i mngal nas rgya chen po zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des ma'i mngal de la reg par gyur pa na/ mtshan ma bzhi po 'di lta ste/ dpung pa gnyis dang pus mo
386a3(dkon brtsegs): gnyis 'byung bar byed de/ 'di lta ste/ dper na dbyar char pa 'bab po'i tshe/ rtswa shing yal ga skye bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du mtshan ma bzhi po dag rab tu snang bar byed do// dga' bo zhag bdun
386a4(dkon brtsegs): pa la ni ma'i mngal nas 'khyil pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal de la reg par gyur pa na mtshan ma bzhi po 'di lta ste lag pa gnyis dang rkang pa gnyis 'byung bar byed de
386a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ dper na dbu ba 'dus pa 'am nya lcibs bzhin du mtshan ma bzhi po de dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag brgyad pa la ni mi'amangal nas bzlog cing
386a6(dkon brtsegs): bsgyur bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal la reg par gyur pa na/ mtshan ma nyi shu po 'di lta ste/ lag pa dang rkang pa'i sor mes pa thog ma kho nar snang bar byed de/ 'di lta ste/
386a7(dkon brtsegs): dper na dbyar char 'bab pa'iljon shing gi rtsa ba dang por skyes pa ji lta ba bzhin no// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag dgu pa la ni ma'i mngal nas rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/
386b1(dkon brtsegs): rlung nges mngal la reg par gyur pa na/ mtshan ma dgu po 'di lta ste/ mig gnyis dang / rna ba gnyis dang / sna gnyis dang / kha dang bshang ba dang / gci ba'i bu grwa gnyis sdang bar byed
386b2(dkon brtsegs): de dga' bo zhag bdun phrag bcu pa la ni ma'i mngal nas sra bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ des mngal na gnas pa sra zhing brtan par byed do// zhag bdun pa de nyid kyi tshe ma'i
386b3(dkon brtsegs): mngal nas gzhan yang kun nas skye ba zhes bya ba'i rlung byung nas rlung des mngal gyi gnas bus nas rgyas par byed de/ 'di lta ste/ dper na rkyal pa bus pa rgyas par gyur pa ji lta ba bzhin
386b4(dkon brtsegs): no// / bam po gnyis pa// / dga' bo nag bdun phrag gcu gcig pa la ni ma'i mngal nas bu ga snang ba zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal la
386b5(dkon brtsegs): reg par gyur pa na mngal khong stong du byed pas bu ga dgu po dag rab tu snang bar 'gyur te/ gal te ma 'gro ba 'am/ 'greng ba 'am/ 'dug pa 'am/ nyal ba 'am/ las dag byas
386b6(dkon brtsegs): par gyur na/ de'i tshe rlung de 'khyil ba nyid kyis khong stong du gyur nas bu ga rnams mthar gyis tsha bar byed do// gal te rlung de steng gi phyogs su song na ni steng gi bu ga 'byin par byed la
386b7(dkon brtsegs): gal te 'og gi phyogs su song na ni 'og gi bu ga 'byin par byed de/ 'di lta ste/ dper na mgar ba 'am/ de'i slob mas sdud pa bus pa na/ steng dang 'og tu rlung rgyu zhing rlung gi bya ba byas nas
387a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gugs par gyur pa ji lta ba bzhin no// dga' bo nag bdun phrag bcu gnyis pa la ni ma'i mngal nas yon pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal bus pas
387a2(dkon brtsegs): g.yas g.yon gyi nang khrol gyi rgyu ma rnams 'byin par byed de/ 'di lta ste/ dper na pad+ma'i rtsa ba bzhin du lus la brten te bsnol mar gnas so// zhag bdun pa de nyid kyi tshe gzhan yang spu brgyus pa
387a3(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ mngal gyi nang nyid du lhag chad med par tshogs brgya sum cu skyed par byed ro// gzhan yang rlung de'i stobs kyis gnad brgya rtsa gcig 'byung bar byed do// dga' bo zhag bdun
387a4(dkon brtsegs): phrag bcu gsum pa la ni ma'i mngal nas snga ma'i rlung de nyi kyi stobs kyis bkres pa dang skam par shes par byed pas/ mas zos shing 'thungs pa'i ro ji snyed pa dag lte bar zhugs nas/ ro'i lus
387a5(dkon brtsegs): la phan 'dogs par byed do// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag bcu bzhi pa la ni ma'i mngal nas skur pa'i kha zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal nas gnas pa de'i rtsa rgyus stong skyed par byed de/ nyes
387a6(dkon brtsegs): brgya lnga bcu ni lus kyi mdun na gnas so// nyis brgya lnga bcu ni lus kyi rgyab na gnas so// nyis brgya lnga bcu ni lus kyi g.yas phyogs na gnas so// nyis brgya lnga bcu ni lus kyi g.yon phyogs na
387a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas so// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag bco lnga pa la ni ma'i mngal nas/ pad+ma zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ mngal na gnas pa de'i rtsang rgyub rnam pa nyi shu bskyed nas/ ro rnams bzhi par byed de
387b1(dkon brtsegs): de'ang lus kyi mdun na lnga dang lus kyi rgyab na lnga dang / lus kyi g.yas na lnga dang / lus kyi g.yon na lnga yod do// rtsang rgyu b.ra'ang ming sna tshogs dang la dog sna tshogs dang ldan pas/ ming ris ka
387b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang bya/ stobs zhes kyang bya/ brtan pa zhes kyang bya/ mthu dang ldan pa zhes kyang bya'o// kha dog ni sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / sran ma dang / mar dang 'bru mar dang
387b3(dkon brtsegs): no la sogs pa'i kha dog dang ldan pa gang yin pa dang / gzhan yang kha dog mang po phan tshun 'dres pa gang yin pa'o// dga' bo rtsa rgyu ba nyi shu po de dag re re la'ang yan lag bzhi bcu yod pas
387b4(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu bsdus na dbugs bzhi pa'i rtsar rgyu ba brgyad brgya yod par 'gyur te/ lus kyi mdun dang / rgyab dang / g.yas dang / g.yon gyi phyogs re re la'ang nyis brgya nyi brgya yod do// dga'
387b5(dkon brtsegs): bo rtsa chub brgyad brgya po de dag re re la'ang rtsar rgyu ba'i yan lag phan tshun 'brel ba brgya brgya yod pas/ gcig tu bsdus na stong phrag brgyad cu yod par 'gyur te/ stong phrag nyi shu ni lus kyi mdu
387b6(dkon brtsegs): na yod do// stong phrag nyi shu ni lus kyi rgyab na yod do// stong phrag nyi shu ni lus kyi g.yas phyogs na yod do// stong phrag nyi shu ni lus kyi g.yon phyogs na yod do// dga' bo rtsar rgyur stong
387b7(dkon brtsegs): phrag brgyar nu po de dag la'ang bu ga mang po lod pas bu ga gcig dang gnyis dang ldan pa nas/ dug bdun gyi bar dang ldan pa'ang yod ngo do// de dag re re la'ang spu'i khung ngu'i'i dang so sor phan tshun 'brel
388a1(dkon brtsegs): @te/ 'di na ste/ dper na mang+gA'i rtsa ba la drug mang po yod pa dza lta ba bzhin no// dga' bo zhag bdun drug bcu drug pa la ni bdud rtsi 'gro ba shes bya ba'i drung 'byung ste/
388a2(dkon brtsegs): rlung de'i sbyor bas mngal na gnas pa na/ de mig gi skye mched gnyis dang / rna ba'i skye mched gnyis dang / snga'i skye mched gnyis dang / kha'i sgo dang / med pa'i du ge dang / snying gi lor
388a3(dkon brtsegs): khor yug dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bca' ba dang / mya ngar rnams 'jug par gyur pa'i gnas rnam par 'jog cing dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba thogs pa med par byed de/ 'di lta ste/
388a4(dkon brtsegs): dper na rdza mkhan nAm de'i slob mas 'jim pa'i gong bu blangs te/ 'khor lo'i steng du gzhag nas ji ltar mos pa bzhin du snod kyi rnam pa dbyibs tha dad pa spel zhing rnam par 'jog par dngan/
388a5(dkon brtsegs): dulas kyi rlung gi dbang gis kyang de bzhin du mig la sogs pa'i skye mched ji ltar mos pa bzhin du rnam par 'jog cing dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba thogs pa med par byed ro// dga' bo zhag bdun
388a6(dkon brtsegs): phrag bcu bdun pa la ni ma'i mngal nas 'bri gdong zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal na gnas pa de'i mig dang / rna ba dang / sne dang / kha'i sgo dang / med pa dang snying
388a7(dkon brtsegs): gi phyogs dang zas 'jug par 'gyur ba'i gnas rnams kun tu ngang bar byed cing dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba'i gnas thogs pa med par byed de/ 'di lta ste/ dper na khye'u dang bu mo mkhas
388b1(dkon brtsegs): ba zhig gis me long gi dkyil 'khor rdul gyis g.yogs pa blangs nas 'bru mar dang / thal ba dang / sa'i phye ma rnab mo dag gis bya po byas pas gsal bar gyur pa de bzhin du/ las kyi rlung g+sa /
388b2(dkon brtsegs): gis skye mched rnams rnam par 'jog cing thog pa med par byed do// dga' bo nag bdun zag bco brgyad pa la ni ma'i mngal nas dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i drung 'byung ste/ mngal na gnas pa ri'i skye
388b3(dkon brtsegs): mched drug po dag yongs su dag par byed de/ 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor sprin chen pos khebs pa rlung drag po langs nas bus te phyogs bzhir gtor bar gyur na 'od dang ldan
388b4(dkon brtsegs): zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ dgar ngo las kyi rlung de'i stobs kyis mngal na gnas pa de'i dbang po drug yongs su dag par byed pa'ang de bzhin du rig par bya'o// dga' bo nag bdun phrag
388b5(dkon brtsegs): dgu pa la ni ma'i mngal na gnas pa de'i dbang po bzhi po mig dang / rna ba dang sna dang lce'i dbang po bzhi po dag mngon par 'grub par byed do// dang po ma'i mngal du 'jug pa'i cha/ thog ma
388b6(dkon brtsegs): kho nar dbang po gsum thob par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ lus dang / srog dang / yid kyi dbang po gang yin pa'o// dga' bo zhag bdun zag nyi shu pa la ni ma'i mngal nas shin tu brtan
388b7(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal nas gnas pa de'i rkang pa g.yon pa la brten te/ sor mo'i rus pa nyi shu bskyed par byed do// rkang pa g.yas pa la brten te rus pa nyi shu dang
389a1(dkon brtsegs): rkang pa'i rting pa'i rus pa bzhi dang / rje dar gyi rus pa gnyis dang / pus mo'i rus pa gnyis dang / brla'i rus pa gnyis dang / rked pa'i rus pa gsum dang / long bu'i
389a2(dkon brtsegs): rus pa gsum dang / sgal tshogs kyi rus pa bco brgyad dang / rtsib ma'i rus pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi skyed par byed do// gzhan yang lag pa g.yon pa la brten te sor mo'i tshogs kyi rus pa nyi shu
389a3(dkon brtsegs): dang lag pa g.yas pa la brten te sor mo'i tshogs kyi rus pa nyi shu skyed par byed do// gzhan yang lag ngar gyi rus pa bzhi dang / dpung ba'i rus pa gnyis dang / zang gi rus pa bdun dang
389a4(dkon brtsegs): phrag pa'i rus pa bdun dang / gnya' ba'i rus pa bzhi dang / 'gram pa'i rus pa gnyis dang / so'i rus pa sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / mgo'i rus pa ba ni skyed par byed de/ dga' bo 'di lta ste/
389a5(dkon brtsegs): dper na gzugs mkhan nam gzugs mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pas sbur ni shing sra ba las de'i dbyibs byas nas/ de'i 'og tu srad bus bcings te/ byis 'jim pa rnams bskus nas
389a6(dkon brtsegs): gzugs brnyan mngon par 'grub par byed pa de bzhin du las kyi rlung gi stobs des rus pa rnams rnam par 'jog pa'ang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o// de dag rus pa phra mo ma gtogs par rus
389a7(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po'i skye ba'i grangs ni nyis brgya yod par rig par bya'o// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag nyi shugacig pa la ni ma'i mngal nas yang dag skyed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ mngal na gnas pa de'i
389b1(dkon brtsegs): lus la sha skyed par byed pas/ 'di lta ste/ dper mnal zhal mkhan nam/ nal zhal mkhan gyi slob ma 'jim pa legs par sbyar nas rtsig ngos la zhal zhal byed pa de bzhin du las kyi rlung nges
389b2(dkon brtsegs): sha skyed par byed pa'ang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag nyi shu gnyis pa la ni mu'i mngal nas kun tu rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal na gnas pa ro'i khrag skyed
389b3(dkon brtsegs): par byed do// dga' bo sag bdun phrag nyi shu gsulal ni ma'i mngal nas yongs su dag par 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal na gnas pa de'i pags pa skyed par byed do//
389b4(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo gzhag bdun phrag nyi shu bzhi pa la ni ma'i mngal nas kun tu 'phyo ba zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal na gnas pa de'i pags pa rkyong zhing mdog dang ldan par byed do// dga' bo zhag
389b5(dkon brtsegs): bdu phrag nyi shu lnga pa la ni ma'i mngal nas grong khyer 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngol na gnas pa de'i sha dang khrag rab tu dang bar byed do// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag nyi su drag
389b6(dkon brtsegs): pa la ni ma'i mngal nas skye ba mngon par 'grub pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ mer la na gnas pa de'i lus kyi sgra dang / spu dang / sen mo rnams skyed par byed de/ de dag thams cad kyang
389b7(dkon brtsegs): rtsa rgyus rnams dang phan tshun 'brel bar blta bar bya'o// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag nyi shu bdun pa la ni ma'i mngal nas sman yon po zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal
390a1(dkon brtsegs): na gnas pa de'i sgra dang / spu dang / sen mo rnams mngon par 'grub par byed do// dga' bo mngal na gnas pa re gal te tshe rabs snga ma la sdig pa mi dge ba'i las mngon/
390a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'dus byas pas/ ser snas longs spyod bdog pa rnams 'phangs shing shin tu brtan par mngon par zhen nas sbyin pa gtong bar mi byed pa dang / ba ma dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang /
390a3(dkon brtsegs): bla ma'i gnas rnams kyi rjes su bstan pa dag mnyan par mi byed pa dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'dus byas shing nyin mtshan du 'phel bar byed pa zhig yin na//
390a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta bu'i rnam par smin pa myong bar 'gyur te/ gal te mir skyes par gyur na'ang 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yid du mi 'ong ba thob par 'gyur bas/ gal te 'jig rten pa rnams 'di ltar ring pos mdzes
390a5(dkon brtsegs): par gyur na ni de thung bar 'gyur ro// gal te thung ngus mdzes par gyur na ni re ring por 'gyur ro// sbom pos mdzes par gyur na ni de phra bar 'gyur ro// gal te phra mos mdzes par gyur na ni re sbom
390a6(dkon brtsegs): por 'gyur ro// gal te yan lag dang nyi sa phan tshun thag nye bar mdzes par gyur nini de thag ring por 'gyur ro// gal te thag ring pos mdzes par gyur na ni de thag nye bar 'gyur ro// gal te
390a7(dkon brtsegs): mang pos mdzes par gyur na ni de nyung bar 'gyur ro// gal te nyung ngus mdzes par gyur na ni de mang bar 'gyur ro// gal te 'tsho ba 'dod na ni ring par 'gyur ro// ri ba 'dod na ni 'tsho bar
390b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// gnam ning mnyen par 'dod na ni ga shor bar 'gyur ro// gshor bar 'dod ni mkham zhing mnyen par 'gyur ro// dkar ba 'dod na ni gnag par 'gyur ro// gnag pa 'dod ra dkar ba
390b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi dbang gis sdig pa mi dge ba'i rnam par smin pa 'on pa dang / long ba dang / lkugs pa dang / glen pa dang byang bzhin mi sdug
390b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / tshig smras pa rnams gzhan gyis mnyan pa'i 'os su mi 'gyur ba dang / rkang lag 'phye zhing 'gro ba dang / lus mi sdug cing yi dgas dang 'dra bas nye ba shes rnams kyang mthong bar ma
390b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dod na gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos pa dang / lus dang / ngag dang yid kyi las ji snyed btsal ba dag gzhan la smras na'ang gzhan gis yid mi chis shing / yid la mi 'dzin pa dag mngon
390b5(dkon brtsegs): bar 'grub par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des tshe rabs snga ma la sdig pa mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'dus byas pa'i dbang gis de lta bu'i rnam par sbyin pa 'thob par 'gyur ro//
390b6(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo mngal na gnas pa de tshe rabs snga ma la bsod nams kyi las mngon bu sgrub pa dang / ser sna med par legs par sbyin pa gtong zhing 'phongs pa rnams la snying brtse ba dang
390b7(dkon brtsegs): longs spyod rnams la 'phangs shing mngon par zhen pa'i sems med pa dang / dge ba'i las mngon par 'dus byas pa rnams nyin mtshan du 'phel bar byed pa zhig yin na ni/ 'di lta bu rnam par smin
391a1(dkon brtsegs): pa khyad par 'phags pa myong bar 'gyuraH/ maur skyes par gyur nabang 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yid du 'ong ba thob par 'gyur bas// gal te 'jig rten pa rnams ring ngos
391a2(dkon brtsegs): par gyur na'ang de'ang de bzhin du ring por 'gyur ro// gal te thung dus mdzes par gyur na'ang de bzhin du thung bar 'gyur ba dang / phra sbom ran cing yan lag dang nying lag 'tsham pa dang / mang nyung dang / 'tsho ra
391a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / gshor mi gshor yang de bzhin du mdzes shing yid du mi 'ong ba med pa dang / dbang po drug tshang zhing byang bzhin sdug pas gzhan las khyad par du 'phags pa dang / tshig gsal zhing dbyangs snyan pa dang / skyes bya'i
391a4(dkon brtsegs): mtshan phun sum tshogs shing gang gis mthong ba rnams dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las ji snyed btsal ba dag gzhan la bstan na'ang gzhan gyis yid ches shing gus pas yid la
391a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des tshe rabs snga ma la dge ba'i las rnams mngon par 'dus byas pa'i dbang gis de lta bu'i rnam par sminA pa thob par 'gyur bas so//
391a6(dkon brtsegs): bo mngal na gnas pa de gal te khye'u yin na ni mi'i rtsib logs g.yas phyogs su tsog pur 'dug la/ lag pa gnyis kyis gdong g.yogs nas ma'i sgal tshigs logs su bltas te 'dug go// gal te bu mo/
391a7(dkon brtsegs): yin na ni ma'i brtsib logs g.yon phyogs su rtsog pur 'dug la/ lag pa gnyis kyis gdong g.yogs nas ma'i lto logs su kha bltas te/ ma chu ba'i gnas kyi ni 'og/ zhu ba'i gnas kyi ni steng na/ ma
391b1(dkon brtsegs): zhu ba'i dngos pos ni thur du mnan/ nu ba'i dngos pos ni yar 'degs par byed pas/ 'di lta ste/ dper na gnas lnga bcings nas gsal shing rnon po'i khar btsugs pa bzhin du gnas so// gamacangs
391b2(dkon brtsegs): zas mang du thos sam/ nyung du bos na'ang sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro// da bzhin du gal ba shin tu sum pa 'am/ shin tu nub pa 'am/ tsan du brang ba'am/ 'an tsha ba 'am/ lan rgya thob 'am/ ma tho ba 'am/
391b3(dkon brtsegs): kha ba 'am/ sgyur ba 'am/ mngar ba la sogs pa zas 'di lta bu dag zos na'ang thams cad sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro// gal te mas 'dod pa spyod par gyur tam/ drag tu song ngam/ brgyu gas sam/
391b4(dkon brtsegs): 'amang ba'i phyogs su 'dug gam/ yun ring du 'dug par gyur tam/ yun ring du nyal bar gyur tam/ mchongs par gyur na'ang thams cad du sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro// dga' bo ma'i mngal
391b5(dkon brtsegs): ru gnas pa na de lta bu'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs brjod kyis mo lang bas lus la nyon mongs par rig par bya ste mi'i 'gro ba na'ang sdug bsngal de lta bu myong bar 'gyur na/ ngam 'gro sems
391b6(dkon brtsegs): can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dper bya bar dka' ba ltalha smos kyang ci dgos te/ de lta bas na dga' bo mkhas pa gang zhig 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho dpag tu med pa na gnas par mos shing sdug bsngal 'di ltu du
391b7(dkon brtsegs): nyams su myong bar byed/ dga' bo zhag bdun phrag nyi shu brgyad pa la ni ma'i mngal na gnas pa de phyin ci log gi 'du shes rnam pa brgyad skye bar 'gyur ro// brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ khyim gyi
392a1(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes dang / bzhon pa'i 'du shes dang / kun dga' ra ba'i 'du shes dang / khang pa brtsegs pa'i 'du shes dang / skyed mos tshal gyi 'du shes dang / khri la 'dug pa'i 'du/
392a2(dkon brtsegs): shes dang / chu bo'i 'du shes dang / rdzing gi 'du shes dang / yang dag par 'di dag yod pa ma yin yang / yang dag par ma yin pa'i rnam par rtog paskyed par byed do// dga' bo zhag bdun
392a3(dkon brtsegs): phrag nyi shu dgu pa la ni ma'i mngal nas me tog 'greng ba zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung nas mngal na gnas pa de ni pags pa'i mdog kun tu gsal zhing yongs su dkar ba dang yongs su dag cing drang par/
392a4(dkon brtsegs): byed de/ las kyi stobs kyis kha cig ni kha dog nag por 'gyur/ kha cig ni kha dog sngon por 'gyur te/ gzhan yang kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang / kha cig ni rtsub la snum pa med pa dang / khe dog
392a5(dkon brtsegs): gar ba dang / kha dog gnag pa dag kyang ci rigs par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag sum nu pa la ni ma'i mngal nas lcags kyi sgro zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngol na gnas pa de bus
392a6(dkon brtsegs): pas sgra dang / kha spu dang / sen mo rnams skye zhing 'phel bar byed de/ sngon gyi las kyi dbang gis kha rog dkar nag la sogs paci rigs par snang bar 'gyur ba'ang gong ma bzhin du rig par bya'o//
392a7(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo zhag bdun phrag sum cu gcig pa la ni ma'i mngal na gnas pa de mthar gyis cher skye bar byed de/ de bzhin du zhag bdud phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa'i bar du'ang rgya cher skye
392b1(dkon brtsegs): zhing 'phel bar byed do// dga' bo zhag bdun phreg sum cu lnga pa la ni mngal na gnas pa ma'i mngal du ni yan lag dang nyid lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dga' po nag bdun
392b2(dkon brtsegs): zug sum cu drug pa la ni mngal na gnas pa mi'i mngal na 'dug mi 'dod par 'gyur ro// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag sum cu bdun pa la ni mngal na gnas pa de byin ci 'og ma yin pa'i btugs rnam pa gasmra
392b3(dkon brtsegs): po 'di lta ste/ mo gtsang ba'i 'du shes dang / dri mi zhim pa'i 'du shes dang / mun nag gi 'du shes skye bar 'gyur te/ 'di ni phyogs gcig gi dbang du byas te bstan to// dga' bo zhag bdun zag sum cu brgyad pa la ni ma'i
392b4(dkon brtsegs): mngal nas yan lag sdud pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung nges mngal na gnas pa de lus bsgyur nas/ thur du phyogs shing lag pa gnyis brkyang nas/ skye ba'i gnas kyi sgo logs su phyogs par byed do//
392b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang de'i tshe kha thur du lta ba zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ las kyi stobs kyi rlung des mngal na gnas pa de bus pas/ mgo thur ru lta zhing rkang pa gnyis ni gyen du phyogs par byas nas/ skye ba'i gan
392b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi sgo nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dga' bo gal te mngal na gnas pa de tshe rabs snga ma la sdig pa mi dge ba'i las mang po mngon par 'dus byas shing / gzhan gyi mngal ltung bar
392b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i las byas pa zhig yin na ni rgyu dang rkyen des mngal nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i tshe/ rkang lag log cing bsnol mar gyur nas bsgyur mi nus pas/ ma'i mngal nyid du 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te/ de'i tshe shes
393a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ldan pa'i bud med dam/ sman pa mkhas pas mar dang 'bru mar 'jam pa 'am/ shing shal ma li'i shun pa'i khu ba 'am/ gzhan yang dngos po 'jam po dag gis lag pa
393a2(dkon brtsegs): bskus nas/ lag pa'i sor mos gri rnon po blangs te/ snum phyi sa dang 'dra zhing mchog tu dri mi zhim pa/ skyug bro ba'i 'dam khung srin bu'i rigs brgya stong tshad med pa rtag tu gnas pa/ mi gtsang ba'i
393a3(dkon brtsegs): khu ba rtag tu 'dzag pa/ khu ba dang khrag rlang rnams rul zhing myags pa/ mthong na skyo bar 'gyur ba/ pags pa srab mos g.yogs pa/ sdig pa'i las las byung ba'i lus rma dang bcas pa mi
393a4(dkon brtsegs): gtsang ba'i gnas der sor mo bcug ste/ rer bcug nas gri rnon pos mngal na gnas pa de'i lus dum bu dum bu ragatubs nas ma'i mngal nas 'byin par byed pas/ des na yid du mi 'ong ba'i sdug
393a5(dkon brtsegs): bsngal shin tu mi bzad cing tshal rtsub pa dag myong ba'i rgyus ma de'ang 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te/ gal te shi bar ma gyur na'ang shi ba dang bye brag med do// dga' bo gal te mngal na gnas pa de
393a6(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i las mngon par 'grub pa zhig yin na ni/ gal te logs par gyur na'ang ma la gnod pa med par bde bar btsas par 'gyur bas/ sdug bsngal yang myong bar mi 'gyur ro// dga' bo gang
393a7(dkon brtsegs): bgags 'di lta bu dang mi ldan pa de dag ni zhag bdun phrag sumacu rtsa brgyad 'das nas btsas par 'gyur ba'i tshe sdug bsngal chen po srog la bab pa myong nas/ gdong ma'i mngalan
393b1(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar 'gyur bas na/ dga' bo khyod kyis shin tu legs par brtags nas/ nges par 'byung ba yongs su btsal bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ yang de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa/
393b2(dkon brtsegs): dganga' bo la bka' stsal sa/ dga' bo khyod kyis mang la naganas pa'i sdug sbal dang btsas pa'i sdug bsngal shes par byas nas/ so so skya bo mngal nas skye ba len pa gang yin pa de dag ni shin du sdug snga
393b3(dkon brtsegs): ba yid par rig par bya'o// dang po btsas pa'i tshe khye'u 'am bu mo'ang rung ste/ lag pa'i steng ngam/ gos la sogs pa'i steng du lhungs nas/ nyi mo 'am/ thib ma 'am/ khaskul ba'i sher le
393b4(dkon brtsegs): ma/ skar rnam/ pang pa'i steng du bzhag pa na rgyu dang rkyen nges thams cad du sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/ cha ba/ rtsub pa yid du mi 'ong ba myong bar 'gyur te/ dga' bo 'di lta ste/ dper nab klung gson
393b5(dkon brtsegs): bags pa bshus pa rtsig pa dang nye bar gyur na/ rtsig pa la gnas pa'i srog chags kyis za bar 'gyur ba 'am/ gal te shing dang rtswa'i phung po dang nye bar gyur na/ shing dang rtswa la gnas pa'i srog chags
393b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis za bar 'gyur ba 'am/ gal te bla gab med par 'dug par gyur na/ bla gab med par gnas pa'i srog chags kyis bya bar 'gyur zhing thams cad du sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/
393b7(dkon brtsegs): ngong boms pa dad gzhin du blta bar bya'o// dang po'i tsas pa'i la chu dro ranapas bkrus na'ang sdug bsngal chen pa myong bar gyur ma 'dis mo'i ba na skyes su ma khyen pags 'bu /
394a1(dkon brtsegs): myags pa rnag khrag zag pa la'ang lcag gis gnus na sdug bsngal mi bzang ba cha ba dang rtsub pa myong bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ dang po btsas pa'i lus chu dron gyis
394a2(dkon brtsegs): bkrus pa'ang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o// dang po btsas pa'i lus de'ang byis ma'i khrag gi dri ma 'thungs nas cher skye bar 'gyur te/ de khrag gi dri ma zhes bya ba ni 'dags pa'i chos 'dul ba las ru
394a3(dkon brtsegs): no nyid la bya bar bstan pas/ de lta bas na dga' bo 'di ltar shin tu mi bzang ba'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan zhing bde ba cung zad kyang med na/ mkhas pa su zhig sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho 'di la
394a4(dkon brtsegs): rjes su chags pa bskyed nas/ rtag tu 'khor ba'i rgyun phyogs su 'jug cing rgyun 'chad pa med par byed// dang po btsas pa de zhag bdun lon pa dang / lus de nyid la srog chags srin bu'i rig
394a5(dkon brtsegs): stong phrag brgyad cu byung nas lus la za bar byed de/ dga' bo srin bu'i rigs skra la za ba zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ skra'i rtsa ba la gnas nas rtag tu ska la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs khar ba'i mdzod dang /
394a6(dkon brtsegs): mgo sbom zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ mgo la brten te gnas nas rtag tu mgo la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs mig 'khor zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ mig la gnas nas rtag tu mig la za bar byed do//
394a7(dkon brtsegs): srim bu'i rigs ded pa dang 'bros pa dang / khang khyim dang yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba bzhi yod de/ klang pa la gnas nas rtag tu thar pa la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs su
394b1(dkon brtsegs): lu'i lo ma zhes bya ba gcig yod do// rna ba la gnas nas rna ba la za bar byed do// srin du'i rigs mdzod sgo zhes bya ba yod de/ sna la gnas nas snal za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs 'ben pa dang
