394b2(dkon brtsegs): kun tu 'phen pa zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ mchu la gnas nas mchu la za bar byed do// sri bu'i rigs sbrang rtsi'i lo ma zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ so la gnas nas so la za bar byed do// srim bu'i
394b3(dkon brtsegs): rigs shing gdong zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ so'i rtsa ba la gnas nas so'i rtsa ba la za bar byed de/ srin bu'i rigs khab mchu zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ lce la gnas nas lce la za bar byed do//
394b4(dkon brtsegs): sbyin bu'i rigs kha rnon zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ lce'i rtsa ba la gnas nas lce'i rtsa ba la za bar byed de/ srin bu'i rigs lag rdzogs zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ rkan la gnas nas rkan la za bar byed/
394b5(dkon brtsegs): ngo srin bu'i rigs lag pa dra ba can dang khyed skur zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ lag mthil la gnas nas lag gathil la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs 'phyang ba dang rab tu 'phyang ba zhes bya
394b6(dkon brtsegs): ba gnyis yod de/ lag ngar la gnas nas lag dar za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs dpung pa dang nye ba'i dpung pa zhes bya ba gnyis yod do// dpung pa la gnas nas dpung pa la za bar byed do//
394b7(dkon brtsegs): srir bu'i rigs ming pa dang nye ba'i ming pa zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ ming ba la gnas nas mid pa la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs dpa' ba dang dpa' ba chen po zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ brang
395a1(dkon brtsegs): la gnas nas zang la za bar byed do// srin du'i rigs rung dang dung kha zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ ga la gnas nas sha la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs kha dog ldan dang
395a2(dkon brtsegs): stobs ldan zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ khrag la gnas nas khrag la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs dpa' bo dang dri ga dong zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ chu ba la gnas nas chu ba la za bar byed do//
395a3(dkon brtsegs): sbyin bu'i rigs mi mtho ba dang kha sbub ces bya ba gnyis yod de/ rgyab kyi sgal tshigs la gnas nas rgyab kyi skal tshigs la za bar byed do// srin du'i rigs gnyis ka'ang tshal gyi kha dog ces bya ba gnyis yod de
395a4(dkon brtsegs): tshil la gnas nas tshil la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs mkhris pa'i kha dog ces bya ba gcig yod de/ mkhris pa la gnas nas mkhris pa la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs mu tig ces bya ba
395a5(dkon brtsegs): gcig yod de/ mkhal ma la gnas nas mkhal ma za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs mu tig chen po zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ rked pa la gnas nas rked pa la za bar byed do// srin bu'o
395a6(dkon brtsegs): rigs ma 'ongs pa zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ mcher ba la gnas nA ma cher ba la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs chu srog dang / chu srog chen po dang / khab kyi mchu dang mtshon cha mchu zhes
395a7(dkon brtsegs): bya ba bzhi yod de/ rgyu ma la gnas nas rgyu ma la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs zla ba rdzogs dang / zla ba gtong dang / bsil byed dang / bsil byed gtor dang / so sor gnas pa zhes bya ba
395b1(dkon brtsegs): lnga yod de/ rtsibs logs g.yas pa la gnas nas rtsib logs g.yas pa la za bar byed do// gnan yang srin bu'i rigs gong ma dang ming 'thun pa lnga yod de/ rtsib logs g.yon pa laganas
395b2(dkon brtsegs): nas rtsibs logs g.yon pa la za bar byed do// gzhan yang srim bu'i rigs mdun du 'bigs pa dang / rgyab tu 'bigs pa dang / brtan par 'bigs pa dang / 'bigs te gnas pa zhes
395b3(dkon brtsegs): bya ba zhi yod de/ rus pa la gnas nas rus pa la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs cher dkar ba dang / cung zad dkar ba dang / spe brtsegs dang / dri mi zhim pa zhes bya ba bzhi yod
395b4(dkon brtsegs): de rtsa rgyus la gnas nas rtsa rgyus la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs seng ge dang / stobs ldan dang / mgyogs pa'i mnga' dang / pad+ma zhes bya ba bani yod de/ ma zhu ba'i gnas
395b5(dkon brtsegs): la gnas nos ma nu ba'i gnas la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs brtan pa dang nye bar rten pa zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ zhu ba'i gnas la gnas nas zhu ba'i gnas la za bar byed do// srin bu'i
395b6(dkon brtsegs): rigs mu kha dang / phung po'i kha dang / dra ba kha dang / khye'u kha zhes bya ba bzhi yod de/ gcig pa'i lam la gnas nas gci ba'i lam la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs byed pa dang /
395b7(dkon brtsegs): byed pa chen po dang dbyibs chung dang po ta ra ka zhes bya ba bzhi yod de/ ba shar ba'i lam la gnas nas bshang ba'i lam la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs kha nag dang kha nag chen po zhes
396a1(dkon brtsegs): bya ba gnyis yod de/ brla la gnas nas brla la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs mdzen can chung ngu zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ pus mo la gnas nas pus mo la za bar byed do//
396a2(dkon brtsegs): srin bu'i rigs myos pa'i rtsa ba zhes bya ba gcig yod de byin pa la gnas nas byin pa la za bar byed do// sgron bu'i rigs mgo nag ces bya ba gcig yod de rkang pa la gnas nas/
396a3(dkon brtsegs): rkang pa la ba bar byed do// dga' bo yongs su skyo bar bya ba'i lus 'di 'dra ba 'di la ni srin bu'i tshigs 'di lta bu stong zag brgyad cu rtag par nyin mtshan du ba bar byed pa des na lus la
396a4(dkon brtsegs): gdung ba dang / rab tu gdung ba dang / nyam chung zhing rma ba dang / bkres pa dang / sgom par byed cing gnan yang sems kyi sdug bsngal sna tshogs dang ldan zhing gdung ba dang / rab tu
396a5(dkon brtsegs): gdungs pa dang / yongs su gdung ba dang / nad mang po rnams mngon du snang bar byed pas sman pa mkhas pa gang gis kyang gso zhing bsal bar mi nus te/ dga' bo srid pa'i rgya mtsho chen po 'khor ba 'dir
396a6(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal de lta bu dang ldan pa yin na/ ci'i phyir 'di la rjes su chags pa skyed par byed de/ gzhan yang gnod pa mang pos yongs su bzung ba 'di lta ste/ lha'o gdon dang / klu'i
396a7(dkon brtsegs): dang ta su ngan bar gyi gdon rnams kyis yongs su yin pa dang / gzhan yang gcan gzhan gyig dong rnams kyis yongs su zin pa dang / gnan ge ma dang khra ba dang / gza'
396b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyu gar gyi gdon la sogs pa yongs su zin nas/ nad sna tshogs kyis lus dang sems nyon mongs par byed pa yod de/ brjod kyis mo lang po bcom ldan 'das kyis /
396b2(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ dga' bo mkhas pa su nig 'khor ba 'dir ma'i mngal du 'jug par mos shing sdug bsngal mi bzang pa myong bar byed/ de ltar btsas shing de ltar cher gyur nas/ ma'i mu'o khrag dang
396b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dres pa 'thung zhing bza' ba dang 'atung ba rnams zos shing 'thungs pa na'ang yang ngag po ma yin pa'i sems kyis zhim pa'i 'du shes skyed par byed do// mthar gyis cher skyes nas lus bang ning
396b4(dkon brtsegs): nang med pa dang / gos dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang ldan zhing tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur na'ang tshe 'di nyid la gnyid kyis phyed bri bar byed do// dang po byis pa dang / de'i 'og tu gzhon nu nus
396b5(dkon brtsegs): mthar gyis cher skyes pa'i bar du'ang mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang nad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rab tu gzir cing sdug bsngal gyi reg pa brgya stong tshad med pa brjod kyis mi lang ba rnams kyis
396b6(dkon brtsegs): lus nyon mongs por byed pas/ lus kyi sdug bsngal dang du len par mi nus pa'i tshe/ gson par mi smon cing shi bar dga' bas na lus 'di ni sdug bsngal mang la bde ba chung ba yin te/ re zhig
396b7(dkon brtsegs): tsam du gnas par byed kyang mthar 'jig par 'gyur bas/ dpa' bo skye ba rnams ni thams cad kyang 'chi bar 'gyur bas rtag par banas pa gang yang mdzodo// gal te sman dang zas kyis gsos
397a1(dkon brtsegs): nas tshe ring por 'gyur na'ang / mthar 'chi bdag gi rgyal pos gsod cing yul skyong du skye bar 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir skye ba la dga' ba ci'ang med par rig par byas nas/ nam na/
397a2(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus kyis ma 'ongs pa'i tshogs bsags pa la bag yod par bya ba dang / tshangs par spyod pa la brtson zhing le lo mi bya ba dang / don gyi spyod pa dang / chos kyi spyod pa dang / yon tan gyi spyod pa /
397a3(dkon brtsegs): dge ba 'ba' zhig spyod pa la rtag par mos pas bsgom par bya'o// rtag par bdag nyid kyis dge ba dong mi dge ba'i las rnam pa gnyis la so sor brtags nas/ sems la gtad de ma 'ongs pa na 'byor
397a4(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po med par bya'o// rjes su chags par bya ba'i dngos po thams cad ni mthar bral bar 'gyur zhing / dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las ji lta ba bzhin du tshe phyi ma len par 'gyur ro// dga'
397a5(dkon brtsegs): be tshe lo brgya thub pa de'ang gnas skabs bcu dang ldan par 'gyur te/ dang po ni byis pa'i gnas skabs te/ nyam chung zhing gan kyal du nyal bar byed do// gnyis pa ni gzhon nur gyur pa ste/ byis pa'i
397a6(dkon brtsegs): rtsed mo la dga' bar byed do// gsum pa la ni lang tshol bab pa ste/ 'dor ba'i bde ba rnams myong bar byed ro// bzhi pa ni mthu dang ldan par 'gyur ba ste/ dpa' zhing stobs dang ldan pa yon no
397a7(dkon brtsegs): lnga pa ni dar la bab pa ste/ shes rab kyi spobs pa dang ldan par gyur pa yin no// drug pa ni yongs su rdzogs pa ste/ legs par dpyod pa la mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can yin no// bdud pa ni
397b1(dkon brtsegs): mthar gyis nas paste/ chos kyi gzhung lugs rab tu shes pa yin no// brgyad pa ni rgas par 'gyur ba ste/ bya ba mang po rnams la mthu chung bar 'gyur ba yin no// dbu ga tu nas
397b2(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/ ci'ang mi nus pa yin no// bcu pa ni lo brgya pa ste/ 'chi ba'i gnas skabs gang yin pa'o// dga' bo gnas skabs chen po de dag kyang mdor bsdus te bstan na/ 'di ltar zlab
397b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhi zhing dus gcig tu byas nas/ lo brgyal dus sum brgya yod par 'gyur te/ dbying dang / dbyar dang / dgun gyi dus re re la'ang dus brgya brgya yod pas so// lo gcig la zla ba bcu gnyis
397b4(dkon brtsegs): yod pas/ zla ba'ang ngargya phrag bcu gnyis yod par 'gyur lo/ de'ang zla ba byed bgrangs na zla phyed kyang brgya phrag nyi shu rtsa ba ni yod par 'gyur bas/ rus gsum po re rela'ang zlab phyed brgyad brgya
397b5(dkon brtsegs): brgyad brgya yod pas/ mdor bsdus na nyin mtshan stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug tu 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// nyin gcig la lan gnyis su za bas/ mdor bsdu na zas ni lan stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis
397b6(dkon brtsegs): za bar 'gyur te/ rkyen gyis bar chad byas nas me zos pa'i grangs kyang der gtogs so// zas ma zos pa'i rkyen ni/ 'di lta ste/ khros nas ma zos pa dang / sdug bsngal myong nas ma
397b7(dkon brtsegs): zos pa dang / btsal te ma rnyed nas ma zos pa dang / gnyid log ste ma zos pa dang / sdom pa blangs pa dang rtse bas myos te ma zos pa dang / brel te ma zos pa dang / zos pa dang ma zos pa gcig tu/
398a1(dkon brtsegs): bsdus na grangs de snyed yod de/ ma'i mu go 'thungs pa dang grangs med gtogs so// de ltar nangs mi rnams kyi 'tsho ba'i tshe lo brgya pa'i lo dang / zla ba dang / nyin mtshan
398a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / bza' ba dang 'atung ba zos pa dang 'thungs pa'i grangs yongs su rdzogs par bstan pa yin gyis/ khyod kyis 'di la yongs su skyob bskyed par bya'o// dga' bo de ltar
398a3(dkon brtsegs): shing cher skyes pa'i lus la'ang nang mang po 'di lta ste/ klar pan pa dang / migan ba dang / rna ban pa dang sman pa dang / khye no pa dang / son pa dang / lkog man pa dang / skying
398a4(dkon brtsegs): na ba dang / ljon pa dang / lag pa na pa dang / rkang pa na bas gnod pa dang / g.yan pa dang / mdze dang / smyos pa dang / spangs pa dang / lung ba dang / mabris pa dang / ba gan la sog
398a5(dkon brtsegs): pa nang mang po rnams kyis yan lag dang nying lag na zhing sdug bsngal myong bar byed de/ dga' bo mo'i lus la 'di 'dra bo'i nad kyi sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs yod do// gzhan yang rlung nang @
398a6(dkon brtsegs): gcig dang / mchis pa'i nang brgya rtsa gcig dang / bad ga ci brgya rtsa gcig dang / 'dus pa'i nang ducu rtsag/ ga yod pas/ mdor bsdus na nang pa ni brgya rtsa ba ni nang ga lus las skye bar 'gyur bas
398a7(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo lus 'di ni 'bras dang 'dra zhing zug rngu dang 'dra bas nang mang po las mngon par grub pa skad cig tsam du'ang mi gnas shing skad cig mar 'gyur ba/ rang bzhin gyis mi rtag pa dang / sdug
398b1(dkon brtsegs): bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med par gyur pa/ 'chi ba dang nye zhing 'jig par 'gyur ba'i chos can yod brtan du mi rung ba yin no// dga' bo 'di ltar sems can rnams ni/
398b2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang skye ba'i sdug bsngal 'di lta bu myong bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ lag pa gcad pa dang / rkang pa gcad pa dang / mig phyung ba dang / rna ba gcad pa dang / snga gcad pa dang /
398b3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / mgo gcad pa dang / yan lag dang nying lag gcad pa'i sdug bsngal dang / gzhan yang gorar 'jug pa dang / gag shing dang / lcag gis gzhu ba dang / btag pa dang / bcing ba la sa/
398b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sdug bsngal dang / bkres pa dang / skom pa dang / ral ba'i sdug bsngal dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba dang / rlung dang / char pa dang / sbrang bu mchu rings dang / sha sbrang dang / gcan
398b5(dkon brtsegs): gzan dang / sdig sbrul la sogs pa'i reg pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs tshad med dpag tu med pa brjod kyis mi rdzogs pa dag rjes su myong bar 'gyur te/ sems can rnams ni rtag
398b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di 'dra ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa yid du mi 'ong ba la gnas shing rjes su chags pa dang / bying bar gyur pa yin pas 'dod pa rnams ni sdug bsngal gyi rtsa bar gyur pa yin yang / de spang bar bya/
398b7(dkon brtsegs): ba yin par mi shos shing yang yongs su gnye bar byed pas nyin mtshan du lus dang sems yongs su gdung ba dang / nang sreg cing tshig par byed pa la'ang rgyun 'chad pa med de/ de bzhin du skye ba'ang sdug bsngal yin no//
399a1(dkon brtsegs): nabadang sdug la / ba dang rdzum basbrul yin no// nga su la la so// gsu /
399a2(dkon brtsegs): bsngal yin no// gang bdod pa btsal te ma rnyed pa'ang sdug bsngal yinan// nye bar len pa'i phung po lda'ang sdug bsngal yin no// 'thob dang / 'byung ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba'i smon lam bzhi po dag kyang rdzuni
399a3(dkon brtsegs): bsngal yin pas/ gal te rtag tu mo zhing bring ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal bar nga gyu nga sdug bsngal myo nga ba med par gyur// gal ta nag tu zing zhing 'grob dang
399a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / nyal bar gyur tam+b+ha/ gal te rtag tu 'dug la 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang / nyal bar mgyur tam/ gal te rtag tu nyal la 'gro dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug par ma gyur na dang /
399a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad sdug bsngal mi bzad pa myong zhing bde ba thob par mi 'gyur bas/ dga' bo 'di dag thams cad sdug bsngal ma spangs nas/ sdug bsngal yongs su gnyer bar byed pa yin pas sdug
399a6(dkon brtsegs): bsngal khon skyo zhing / sdug bsngal kho na 'gag par gyur pas/ 'du byed rnams kyi rgyu dang rkyen rgyun chang ba med pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'di dag thugs su chung pa'i phyir/
399a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams kyi 'khor ba'i chos 'du byed pa rnam mi rtag cing yang dag pa'i mthar phyin pa ma yin pa/ rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yid brtan du mi rung ba yin pas chos shes pa yongs su btsal nas/
399b1(dkon brtsegs): shin tu skyo ba skyed de/ nan tan brtson 'grus kyis rnam par grol ba yongs su gnyer bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no// dga' bo bde 'gror skyes pa'i sems can skye gnas mig cang bdag sdug
399b2(dkon brtsegs): bsngal mi bzad pa yang dag pa ma yin pa rnam pa sna tshogs myong ba'ang brjod kyis mi rdzogs na/ ngan song gsum po yi dgras dang / dud 'gro dang / semasan dmyal ba'i sems can rnams kyis
399b3(dkon brtsegs): myong bar gyur pa'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/ bzod par dka' ba yongs su rdzogs par brjod pa lta smos kyang ci dgos// / bam po gsum pa ste tha ma'o//
399b4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang dga' bo ma'i mngal du 'jug pa rnam pa bzhi yod de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can kha cig ni yang dag par shes bzhin du 'jug/ yang dag par shes bzhin du
399b5(dkon brtsegs): gnas/ yang dag par shes bzhin du 'byung ba'ang yod/ kha cig ni yang dag par shes bzhin du 'jug/ yang dag par shes bzhin du gnas la/ yang dag par mi shes bzhin du 'byung ba'ang yod/ kha cig na
399b6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par shes bzhin du 'jug la/ yang dag par mi shes bzhin du gnas shing / yang dag par mi shes bzhin du 'byung ba'ang yod/ kha cig ni mi shes bzhin du 'jug yang dag par mi
399b7(dkon brtsegs): shes bzhin du gnas/ yang dag par mi shes bzhin du 'byung babang yod do// su zhig yang dag par shes bzhin du 'jug pa dang / gnas pa dang / 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na/
400a1(dkon brtsegs): ji rnamam mam gyu nasems can ga mas tshal gyis 'azu zhing sa sa yang dug sa
400a2(dkon brtsegs): mtshum la rlos shing bsod rnams rnams mngon pa byed pa dag/ yang ga rdzom pa dang / nga rung po sems sang ga med par snang ba ga/ gas pacan po dang ldan pas
400a3(dkon brtsegs): dus kyi tshe 'gyod pa med par smra ba yang dag par ldan par byed bArgyunA du zhugs pa skye ba'i na bdun pa'am/ rigs nas rigs sa skye ba'am/ lan cis phyir 'ong ba 'am/ bar rma gcig bdag
400a4(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ gang zag de dag gis sngor dge ba spyad pa'i phyir/ 'chi ka'i dus kyi tshe sdug bsngal nye bar 'ongs shing na ba dang tsha ba nyams su myong bar gyur kyang / sems la g.yeng ba med par yang dag
400a5(dkon brtsegs): par dran pa bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byas te/ yang dag par dran pa bzhin du ma'i mngal du zhugs nas chos rnams las kyi dbang gis skye ba dang / thams cad rgyu dang rkyen las skye bar 'gyur bas
400a6(dkon brtsegs): rtag cu bdud kyi gnas byas par gyur to nas rab tu shes so// dga' bo lus 'di ni mi gtsang ba thams cad kyi khyim yin pas rang bzhin rtag par gnas pa ma yin pa dang / mun pa'i dngos po yin pas
400a7(dkon brtsegs): rmongs pa dag la slu bar byed pa yin no snyam du rig par bya'o// lus 'di ni rus pa'i 'khrul 'khor rtsa rgyus rnams pan tshur 'brel ba/ dra gdang gnang rnams dong bar gyur ga sha dang / tshil dang / rus
400b1(dkon brtsegs): padang / rkang phan tshun dkris shing pags pas g.yogs pa yin yang skyon du ma mthong bas/ rab tu gdungs pa'i bug tu mi gtsang bas yongs su gang ba/ skra dang / spu dang / sem mo dang / so gnas
400b2(dkon brtsegs): skabs tha dad pa la bdug dang bad gir bzung ba'i phyir rtag tu rang dbang mod par khrid pa/ rtag tu mchil ma dang / sngabs dang / mi gtsang ba dang / kha chu dang // rdul dang / mkhris pa dang / bdakan
400b3(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ning nag dang tshol rul ni dmyags pa dang / mkhal ma dang / mtshar pa dang / mtshan pa dang / glo ba dang / rgyu mche phra mi gtsang bas gang zhing skyug bro ba/ srid bu'i rigs mang pos rkun
400b4(dkon brtsegs): tu khyab par gang ba/ steng dang 'og gi thug rnams su rtag tu mi gtsang ba 'dzag pa/ zhu ba dang ma zhu ba'i gnas gnyis pags pa srab mos g.yogs pas/ 'di ni snam phyi sa dang 'dra ba yin no snyam du khyod
400b5(dkon brtsegs): kyis so sor brtag par bya'o// ji tsam du bza' ba dang bca' bzos 'chos shing bldag pa na mchil sbubs su gyur nas ming par 'jud cing rkang pa dang glang ba bani tshun 'dres nas lto bar 'bab par 'gyur/
400b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ dper ma byi rus pa skam po bldag pa lta bur gyur pa yin yang dag pa ma yin pa'i sems kyis zhim pa'i 'du shes skyer bar byed pas/ zas rked par phyin nas gyen du smon par byed kyang slar
400b7(dkon brtsegs): meng par byed do// dga' bo lus 'di ni dang po mer mer po dang / nur nur po dang / ltar ltar po dang / mkhrang 'gyur dang / rkang lag 'gyus pa mi gtsang ba'i dngos po cher skyes nas byis pa'i
401a1(dkon brtsegs): tshe 'khor bar gyur pa nas/ rgas pa'i bar du 'khor zhing bcings par gyur pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ dper na mun pa'i g.yangs dang 'dra'o// khron pa mnam po dang 'dra ba
401a2(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu lan tshwa dang / bska ba dang / tsha ba dang / skyur ba la sogs pa'i zas kyi ros yongs su gsos pa/ gzhan yang ma'i mngal gyi mes lus kyi dbang po rab tu btsos pa/ mi gtsang ba'i snod du
401a3(dkon brtsegs): rtag par rab tu gdung ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba/ gal te ma 'greng ngam/ 'dug gam/ nyal bar gyur pa na bcing ba lngas bcings pa 'am/ mes gdungs pa bzhin du shin tu bzod par
401a4(dkon brtsegs): dka' ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur bas/ dper byar yang mi rus so// dga' bo mngal na gnas pa de de ltar mi gtsang ba'i 'dam du gnas shing sdug bsngal mang pos nyon mongs par 'gyur
401a5(dkon brtsegs): mod kyi/ 'on kyang dbang po rno ba'i phyir sems g.yeng bar mi 'gyur ro// gzhan yang sems can bsod nams chung ba kha cig ni me'i mngal la 'breng du nyal ba 'am/ log par 'dug par yang gyur/
401a6(dkon brtsegs): te/ de'ang sngon gyi las kyi rgyu dang rkyen gyi stobs kyi phyir ram/ yang nams kha zas ma snyoms pa shin tu grang ba 'am/ shin tu tsha ba 'am/ shin tu sbyar ba 'am/ shin tu mngal ba 'am/
401a7(dkon brtsegs): tu kha ba zos pa'i phyir ram/ yang mtshad las 'das par skom 'thungs sam/ 'dod chags mang du spyad dam/ nang bu can du gyur tam/ mya ngan mang pos non tam/ brdeg 'chos sam/ brdeg/
401b1(dkon brtsegs): par gyur na'ang / rkyen 'di dag gi dbang gis ma'i lus kyang yongs su gdung bar 'gyur la/ yongs su gdungs par gyur pa'i phyir/ mngal na gnas pa'ang yongs su gdung bar 'gyur ro// yongs
401b2(dkon brtsegs): su gdung bar gyur pa'i phyir ni sdug bsngal mang po myong bar 'gyur ro// sdug bsngal mang po myong bar gyur pa'i phyir ni g.yo bar 'gyur ro// g.yos par gyur pa'i phyir ni lus log par 'breng du nyal
401b3(dkon brtsegs): nor 'byung bar mi nus pa la bud med mkhas pas mar ram 'bru mar gyis lag pa bskus nas ma'i mngal du 'jug ste/ bags kyis bags kyis mngal la myangs nas/ sngar ji ltar gnas pa
401b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du 'jog par byed pas/ lag pas reg par gyur pa na mngal na gnas pa de sdug bsngal chen po mi bzad pa dag myong bar 'gyur te/ dga' bo 'di lta ste/ dper na khye'u 'am/ bu mo shin tu gzhon
401b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lus la la la zhig gis mtshon rnon pos pags pa dang sha gcad nas/ de'i steng du thal bas gtor na de'i rkyen gyis sdug bsngal chen po myong bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du// mngal na gnas pa'i sdug
401b6(dkon brtsegs): bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa'ang de dang 'dra ste/ de lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur kyang dbang po mchog tu rno ba'i phyir yang dag pa'i dran pa dang ldan pas rnam par g.yeng bar mi 'gyur te/ dga' bo
401b7(dkon brtsegs): de ltar na mngal na gnas pa de ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ de lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang btsas su nye ba'i tshe na sdug bsngal dang bcas bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyur te/
402a1(dkon brtsegs): las kyi rlung gi dbang gis de'i lag pa bsnol nas/ yan lag dang nying lag bcu ma ste/ sdug bsngal chen po mi bzad pa myong nas/ ma'i mngal nas byung bar gyur pas/
402a2(dkon brtsegs): lus kyi yan lag thams cad sngon por gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na gsar du spangs pa la reg par mi bzod pa bzhin du bkres skom gyis gdungs pa dang / snying 'byang zhing gdung ba dang bcas
402a3(dkon brtsegs): pa bzhin du las kyi rlung gi rgyu dang rkyen gyis bus nas mngal nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mngal nas byung nas kyang phyi rol gyi rlung gis reg par gyur pa na 'di lta ste/ dper na mtshon gyis gcang nas
402a4(dkon brtsegs): thal bas bskus pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'gyur ro// lag pa dang gos kyis reg par gyur pa'i tshe na'ang thams cad du sdug bsngal mo bzang ba myong bar 'gyur te/ de lta bu'i sdug bsngal ba myong bar gyur kyang /
402a5(dkon brtsegs): dbang po rab tu rno nga'i phyir yang dag pa'i dran pa dang ldan pas rnam par g.yeng bar mi 'gyur te/ ma'i mngal du shes bzhin du 'jug pa dang / gnas pa dang / byung ba thams cad kyang sdug bsngal ba
402a6(dkon brtsegs): yin na/ dga' bo mkhas pa su zhig 'di 'dra ba'o mngal du 'jug pa la mos par byed/ dga' bo su nig mngal du yang dag par shes bzhin du 'jug cing gnas la/ yang dag par/
402a7(dkon brtsegs): gas bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na/ dga' bo ji ltar 'dir so so'i skye bo ba sems can lacig rang bzhin gyis tshul khrims pa srung ba la dga' zhing yang nas yang du ge rar phyogs la/ rang
402b1(dkon brtsegs): bar byung ba dang / chab tu ngas po mchog la mas pa song nams mngon par 'du byed pa dang ra sems rna nang gsang bar byud ba dang sa zungs spangs ngas/
402b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshe 'gyod pa med par gyur pa rgyun du zhugs pa skye ba lan bdun pa 'am/ rigs nas rigs su skye ba 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / bar chad gcig pa dag yin te/ gang zag de dag gyis sngar dge ba
402b3(dkon brtsegs): spyad pas 'chi ka'i dus kyi tshe sdug bsngal nye bar 'ongs shing na ba dang tsha ba nyams su myong bar gyur kyang / sems la g.yeng ba med par yang dag par dran pa bzhin du ma'i mngal du zhugs nas chos
402b4(dkon brtsegs): rloms las kyi dbang gi skye ba dang / thams cad rgyu dang rkyen las skye bar rab tu shes so zhes bya ba nas/ ma'i mngal nas byung nas shes bya ba'i bar du'ang snga ma bzhin du rgyas par sbyar te/ ra lta bu'i sdug
402b5(dkon brtsegs): bsngal mi bzad pa che zhing rtsub pa rnams myong bar gyur kyang dbang po 'bring dang ldan pa'i phyir yang dag par shes bzhin du 'jug cing gnas la/ yang dag par mi shes bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ mkhas
402b6(dkon brtsegs): pa su zhig 'di 'dra ba'i mngal du 'jug pa la mos par byed pa zhes bya ba'i bar du rung snga ma bzhin du rgyas par sbyar ro// dga' bo su zhig yang dag par shes bzhin du ma'i mngal du 'jug la/ yang
402b7(dkon brtsegs): dag par mi shes bzhin gnas shing 'byung bar byed ce na/ dga' bo 'di ltar 'di ni so so'i spyi bo'i sems tsam kha cig ni rang bzhin gyis tshul khrims bsrung ba la dga' zhing yang nas yang du ge ba'i phyogs
403a1(dkon brtsegs): la goms par byed pa dang / rtag tu dngos po mchog la mos shing bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa zhes bya ba nas/ 'chi ka'i dus kyi tshe 'gyod pa med par gyur pa/
403a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyun du zhugs pa skye ba lan bdun pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bar du'ang snga ma bzhin du rgyas par sbyar ro// 'chi ka'i dus kyi tshe sdug bsngal nye bar 'ongs shing na ba dang tsha ba nyams su myong bar gyur kyang /
403a3(dkon brtsegs): sems la g.yeng ba med par yang dag par dran pa bzhin du ma'i mngal du 'jug par byed de/ dbang po rnon po ma yin pa'i phyir shes bzhin du 'jug par byed kyang mi shes bzhin du gnas shing 'byung
403a4(dkon brtsegs): bar byed do// mkhas pa su zhig 'di 'dra ba'i mngal du 'jug pa la mos par byed ces bya ba la sogs pa'ang snga ma bzhin du rgyas par sbyar ro// dga' bo su zhig yang dag par mi shes bzhin
403a5(dkon brtsegs): du 'jug pa dang / gnas pa dang / 'byung bar byed ce na/ ji ltar 'din so so'i skye bo'i sems can kha cig tshul khrims yongs su dag pa 'dra ba la dga' zhing // dge ba'i phyogs sgrub par mi byed pa rtag tu dngos po ngan pa la mos shing
403a6(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa rnams spyod pa/ sems kyi rang bzhin mi drang zhing bag med pa mang po/ shes rab dang mi ldan pa dag longs spyod la mngon par zhen cing ser sna byas pa dang / rtag tu lag pa bskums nas gzhan dag la rkyo
403a7(dkon brtsegs): ning gtong bar mi byed pa dang / rtag tu re ba dang bcas shing sems rab tu dul bar ma gyur pa dang / lta ba dang spyod pa phyin ci log tu gyur pas/ 'chi ka'i dus kyi tshe 'gyod pa dang bcas shing sdig pa mau
403b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i las rnams mngon du gyur pas/ 'chi ka'i dus kyi cha sdug bsngal mi bzad pa dang / tsha ba dang / nub pa dang / ying du 'ong ba dag gis rab tu gzir cing / den sams rnam par dag meng par byedangs
403b2(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal gyi dbang gis bdig ni su zhig/ gang nas 'dir 'ongs/ dgang du 'gro bar 'gyur nas rab tu mi shes pas/ dga' bo 'di ni dus gsum du ltung dag pa shes bzhin med pa zhes byab ste/
403b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas par gong ma bzhin du sbyar ro// dga' bo sems can de dag mir skyes nas de lta bu'i sdug bsngal tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur mod kyi/ 'on kyang de dag ni gnas mchog tu gyur pa yin
403b4(dkon brtsegs): pas bskal pa bye ba brgya stong tshad med pa snyed du'ang mi lus shin tu rnyeng bar dka' ba yin no// gal te mtho ris su skyes par gyur na rtag tu lhung bas 'jigs pas sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal dang
403b5(dkon brtsegs): Sh+TAn te/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe lha gzhan rnams kyis 'di skad du khyod bde 'gro'i 'jig rten du skye bar gyur cig/ bde 'gro'i 'jig rten gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de ni mi'i 'gro ba gang yin pa'o zhes zer bas
403b6(dkon brtsegs): mi'i 'gro ba ni shin tu rnyeng par dka' ba yin la/ khom pa dang ldan pa ni de bas kyang ches shin tu rnyed par dka' ba'o// ngan gro gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ngan song gsum po dag gang yin pa'o// sems can
403b7(dkon brtsegs): dmyal ba'i 'gro ba ni rtag tu sdug bsngal mi bzad pa shin tu yid du mi 'ong ba rab tu tsha zhing rtsub pa dag myong bar 'gyur bas dpe byar yang mi nus so// yi rigs kyi 'gro ba ni rang bzhin gyis zhe sdang mangs/
404a1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu mnyen zhing phul ba'i sems med pa/ g.yo sgyu dang bcas pa/ bsod cing gnod par byed pa/ lag pa khrag gis bskus pa byams pa dang snying rje med pa/ byad
404a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin mi sdug pa/ mthong na 'jigs su rung ba/ gal te mi dang nye bar gyur na'ang / bkres pa dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar byed pas/ rtag par sgrib pa dang bcas shing thogs pa dang bcas
404a3(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no// dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi 'gro ba ri tshad med dpag tu med de/ don gyi spyod pa dang mi ldan pa/ bsod nams kyi spyod pa dang mi ldan pa/ chos kyi spyod pa dang mi ldan pa/ dge
404a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i spyod pa dang mi ldan pa/ drang po'i spyod pa dang mi ldan pa/ phan tshun gcig la gcig za ba dang / mthu dang ldan pa rnams mthu chung ba dag la za bar byed pa dag yin no// dud 'gro skye gnas kha cig na
404a5(dkon brtsegs): mun par skyes/ mun par rgas/ mun par 'chi ba'i rus byed cing / mi gtsang ba'i gnas gcin rkyag gi nang du gnas nas res 'ga' snang ba dang bcas pa'ang yod de/ 'di lta ste/ bye ma leb
404a6(dkon brtsegs): dang rngasbrang ma dang / sro shig dang / tre la ta lta bu rnams so// gzhan yang rtag par mun pa'i nang du skyes/ mun pa'i nang du rgas par gyur pa tshad med pag tu med pa dag yod de/ de ni che/
404a7(dkon brtsegs): rabs snga ma la mir gyur pa na glen zhing gti mug pas chos yang dag par ma mnyan pa/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid thal rangs su gtong zhing 'dod pa lnga la mngon par zhen par gyur pa/ sdig pa mi
404b1(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i las mang po mngon par 'dus byas pas/ de'i rigs su skyes nas glen ning rmongs pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba dag yin no// dga' bo gzhan yang dung 'gro'i skye gnas pa'i sems can
404b2(dkon brtsegs): chu'i ring du skyes nas chu'i nang du rgas/ chu'i nang du dus byed mar 'gyur ba tshad med dpag tu med pa dag yod de/ 'di sa ste/ 2dang / rus sbal dang / sbal ba dang / sbal ba dkar po dang / b.lug
404b3(dkon brtsegs): lta bu rnams te/ thams cad kyang tshe rabs snga ma la lus dang / ngag dang // yid kyi las mi dge ba'i dbang gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa'ang gong ma bzhin du rgyas par sbyar ro// dga' bo gnan
404b4(dkon brtsegs): yang dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa'i sems can bshang ba dang gci ba'i dri tshor na myur du der song nas bza' ba dang btung bar byed pa tshad dpag tu med pa snyed yod de/ 'di lta ste/ pag dang lug dang /
404b5(dkon brtsegs): khyim bya dang / khyi dang / wa dang / bya rgo dang / bya rog dang / sbrang bu dang / sbyar ba dang / gcan gzan rnams te/ thams cad kyang tshe rabs snga ma'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi
404b6(dkon brtsegs): dbang gis de lta bu'i rnam par smin pa myong bar 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa rtag tu rtswa dang / shing dang / mi gtsang ba'i dngos po rnams za zhing 'thung bar byed pa tshad
404b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa dpag tu med pa snyed yod de/ 'di lta ste/ glang po che dang / rta dang / rnga mo dang / ba glang dang / bong bu dang / dre'u la sogs pa lta bu rnams te/ thams cad kyang tshe rabs/
405a1(dkon brtsegs): snga ma'i las mi dge ba'i dbang gis ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du de lta bu'i rnam par smin pa myong bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang dga' bo kyim kyi cung srid par 'thor/
405a2(dkon brtsegs): kha'i rgya mtsho 'di ni 'bar ba/ rab tu 'bar ba/ mchog tu 'bar gA/ shin tu mchog tu 'angar ba yin pas/ sems can 'ga' tsam yang nges ma bsregs shing ma bcos pa medang/ dengang /
405a3(dkon brtsegs): mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang lce dang / lus dang yid kyi me rab tu 'bar ba'i 'dod pas mngon du snang ba'i yul gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri rang ro dang / reg bya dang /
405a4(dkon brtsegs): chos yongs su gnyer ba'i dbang gis de ltar gyur pa yin no// dga' bo 'bar rab tu bar bar byed pa'i me gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi me dang /
405a5(dkon brtsegs): skye dang / rga ba dang / na ra dang / 'chi ba'i me dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'jug pa'i me dag gis rtag tu bsreg
405a6(dkon brtsegs): gong 'bar bar byed pas 'ga' tsam yang de las thar pa med do// dga' bo le lo la rab tu gnas pa dag ni sdug bsngal mang po myong ning nyon mongs pas kun tu dkris nas sdig pa mi dgeb
405a7(dkon brtsegs): chos mngon par 'dus byas pas/ 'khor bar 'khor ba'ang nye bar zhi zhing rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus brtsams pa gang yin pa de dag ni bde ba mang du myong zhing brtul ba'i sems skyed
405b1(dkon brtsegs): par byed pas nyon mongs pa yongs su bsal nas/ dge ba'i chos bsgom pa'i bar du brtson pa mi gtong ba la rgyun 'chang pa med do// de lta bas na reng khyod kyi lus 'di'i rigs pa dang / sha dang //
405b2(dkon brtsegs): chu ba dang / rus pa dang / khrag dang / rtsa rgyus dang / rkang rnams ni ring por mi thogs par gyes shing 'jig par 'gyur ro snyam du so sor brtags nas/ rtag par sems rtse gcig tu le lo mi
405b3(dkon brtsegs): byed par mngon sum du ma byas pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir nan tan brtson 'grus kyi de ltar bslab par bya'o// dga' bo nga ni 'jig rten pa rnams dang rtsod par mi byed na/ 'on kyang 'jig rten pa rnams ni nan tan
405b4(dkon brtsegs): gyis nga dang rtsod par byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang chos shes pa rnams ni gzhan dang rtsod par mi byed de// bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa dang / bral ba yin na su dang lhan cig rtsod par byad/ 'on kyang mthong
405b5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang shes pa med pa dag yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 'dzin pa skyed par byed pa'i phyir ngas yang dag par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'di skad du nga ni chos rnams gang yang mi shes pa med do zhes
405b6(dkon brtsegs): smras pa yin te/ dga' bo ras de skad smras pa de la tha dad du gyur pa yod dam/ dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis te/ de bzhin gshegs pas de skad gsungs pa la gzhan
405b7(dkon brtsegs): su 'gyur ba ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legs so legs so// dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung la gdon mi za bar tha dad du 'gyur ba med pas de bzhin gshegs pa
406a1(dkon brtsegs): ni yang dag par gsungag bden par gsung ba/ bzhin nyid du bsung ga pa mi rang bar gsungag/ bslu med pa gas pa/ 'jig rten pa rnams la yun ring
406a2(dkon brtsegs): phan pa dang / bde ba dang / phan pa chen po thob par mdzad pa/ lag mkhyen pa/ lam rig pa/ lam ston pa/ lam byed pa/ lam 'dren pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
406a3(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa'i skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston
406a4(dkon brtsegs): pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur pa yin no// 'jig rten pa rnams ni shes pa med pa/ mngon par yid ches pa med pa/ rtag par dbang po rnams kyi dran pa med pa/ lag mthil na mad
406a5(dkon brtsegs): kho na mtho zhing don chen po la mi lta ba/ sla ba'i dngos po mi sgrub par gang bya dkar ba rgyur du byed pa yin no// dga' bo shes rab dang ldan pa'i spyod yul 'di ltar re zhig zhog la/ deng khyod kyis
406a6(dkon brtsegs): sha'i mig gis lta bas shes pa dang mthong ba ji snyed pa dag yang dag pa ma yin par so sor brtags na/ de nyid rnam par thar pa zhes bya bas/ dga' bo khyod nga la dad pa'i phyir ma 'gro zhig/ nga la 'dun
406a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir 'brang bar ma byed cig/ nga'i tshig la rton par ma byed cig nga'i mtshan la rtog par ma byed cig dge sbyong gi lta ba dang shes pa'i rjes su ma 'brang zhig/ dge sbyong la gus pa ma skyed
406b1(dkon brtsegs): cig 'di skad du dge sbyong go ta ma ni bdag ni sngon pa chen po yin no nas ma zer bar/ ngas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i chos gang yin pa gcig bu dben par song la ying lams sa
406b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jal bar gyis shig/ so sor rtogs shig/ rtag par mang du sgom shig/ sems rtse gcig tu chos rnams so sor brtags te/ chos de dag las bsgom pa'i 'du shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/
406b3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i dran pa la gnas nas bdag nyid kyi gling byos shig/ bdag nyid kyi gnas dang skyabs byos shig/ chos kyi gling byos shig/ chos kyi gnas dang skyabs byos shig dang / de la sa gzhan pa'i gling
406b4(dkon brtsegs): rang / gnas dang / skyabs med do// dga' bo ji ltar na dge slong bdag nyid gling du gyur pa dang / bdag nyid gnas dang skyabs su gyur pa dang / chos gling du gyur pa dang / chos gnas
406b5(dkon brtsegs): dang skyabs su gyur cing / de las gzhan pa'i gling dang / de las gzhan pa'i gnas dang skyabs med par gyur pa yin zhe na/ dga' bo 'od ltar dge slong gang la la zhig bdag nyid kyi nang gi lus la lus
406b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi rjes su lta ba la rab tu gnas nas brtson 'grus kyi dran pa rtse gcig tu byas pas/ yang dag pa'i shes pa thob nas/ 'jig rten pa'i khong khro ba ji snyed pa dag rtag tu yid la sems shing /
406b7(dkon brtsegs): dul bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nang gi lus la sdug bsngal yin par rjes su lta ba zhes bya ste/ gang gis phyi rol gyi lus dang / nang dang phyi rol gnyis ka'i lus la rjes su lta ba'ang
407a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin no// dga' bo de'i 'og tu kun tu 'gyur ba'i chos la lus su bltas nas rab tu gnas pa dang / 'gog pa'i chos su bkas nas ra tu gnas par yang rgyang la/
407a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa'i chos gnyis la lus su lta zhing rjes su gnas par byed pa nyid kyi lus 'di la yang dag pa dran par byed pas/ ras 'ga' nigs pa kho na dang ldan par jug
407a3(dkon brtsegs): res 'ga' ni mthong ba kho na dang ldan par 'gyur/ res 'ga' ni dran pa kho na dang ldan par 'gyur zhing rten pa med par gnas par 'gyur bas 'jig rten 'di la blang bar bya ba ci'ang med par
407a4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu shes par 'gyur te/ de ltar na dga' bo 'di ni dge slong bdag nyid kyis nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba la gnas pa zhes bya ste/ phyi rol gyi lus dang phyi nang gnyis ka'i lus
407a5(dkon brtsegs): la lta ba de bzhin no// de'i 'og tu nang gi tshor ba dang / phyi rol gyi tshor ba dang / nang dang phyi rol gnyis ka'i tshor bar lta ba la rab tu gnas pa dang / nang gi sems dang / phyi rol gyi sems
407a6(dkon brtsegs): dang nang dang phyi rol gnyis ka'i sems su lta ba la gnas pa dang / nang gi chos dang / phyi rol gyi chos dang / nang dang phyi rol gnyis ka'i chos su lta ba la rab tu gnas nas brtson
407a7(dkon brtsegs): 'grus kyis dran pa rtse gcig tu byas pas yang dag pa'i shes pa thob nas/ 'jig rten pa'i khor khro ba ji snyed bdag rtag tu yid la mi sems shing rab tu dul bar gyur nas/ kun 'byung
407b1(dkon brtsegs): kha'i chos su bltas nas rab tu gnas pa dang / 'gog pa'i chos su bltas nas rab tu gnas par yang byed la/ gzhan yang kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa'i chos gnyis la chos su bzlas
407b2(dkon brtsegs): nas rab tu gnas par byed pa nyid kyis lus 'di nyid la yang dag par dran par byed pas/ res 'ga' ni shes pa kho na dang ldan par 'gyur/ res 'ga' ni mthong ba kho na dang ldan par 'gyur ba res
407b3(dkon brtsegs): 'ga' ni dran pa kho na dang ldan par 'gyur bas/ 'jig rten 'di la blang bar bya ba ci'ang med par rab tu shes par 'gyur te/ de ltar na dga' bo 'di ni dge slong bdag nyid gling du gyur pa dang / bdag
407b4(dkon brtsegs): nyid gnas dang skyabs su gyur pa dang / chos gling du gyur pa dang / chos gnas dang skyabs su gyur cing / de las gzhan pa'i gling med pa dang / de las gzhan pa'i gnas dang skyabs med pa
407b5(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o// dga' bo skyes dri rang bzhin drang zhing g.yo sgyu spangs pa gang la la zhig snga dro'i dus kyi tsha nga'i thang du 'angs pa la/ ngas dbang po ji lta ba bzhin du dge pa'i chos de la rjes su bstan
407b6(dkon brtsegs): nas/ de byi dro'i dus kyo che bdag nyid thob pa dang ldan par smras par gyur la/ phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe chos rjes su bstan pa'ang bdag nyid thob pa dang ldan par smra bar byed pas na/ dga' bo ras
407b7(dkon brtsegs): legs par bstan pa'i chos ni mthong ba'i chos la mngon sum du rdzogs pa/ rab tu gdung ba sel bar byed pa/ dus dang / dbang po dang / rab tu 'tsham par 'gyur ga thabs dang ldan pa 'as
408a1(dkon brtsegs): gis rig pa'i chos legs par skyob par byed pa yin pas/ gang gis pa'i mngon sum du chos bstan pa thos par gyur na/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i rjes su 'thun par 'gyur ning /
408a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub la gzhol bar byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni nga'i mkhyen pa yin te/ de lta bas na der khyod kyis bdag gi don dang / gzhan gyi don dang / gnyis ka'i don de lta bu mthong nas chos 'di la rtag par yang
408a3(dkon brtsegs): dag par bslabs te/ rab tu 'byung ba'i chos bag yod par bsgrubs nas chung migazan cing 'bras bu khyad par du 'phags pa 'dus ma byas kyi bde ba thob par byas nas/ gzhan gyis byin pa'i chos gos dang / bsod/
408a4(dkon brtsegs): snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman la sogs pablang bar bya zhing / sbyin bdag rnams bsod nams kyi phan yon chen po thob pa dang / 'bras bu rnam par smin pa khyad par du 'phags pa yangs
408a5(dkon brtsegs): shing rgya che ba dag thob par 'gyur bar de ltar dga' bo khyod kyis bslab par bya'o// gzhan yang dga' bo gzugs 'ga' tsal yang rjes su chags par bya 'am/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rnam par 'gyur
408a6(dkon brtsegs): zhing 'jig par mi 'gyur ba gang yang med de/ de ni gnas med do// gang yang mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / nyon mongs pa mi skyed pa gang yang med de/ de'i gnas med do//
408a7(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo ji snyam du sems gzugs de rtag pa zhig yin nam/ 'on te mi rtag pa zhig yin/ btsun pa de ni rang bzhin gyis mi rtag pa lags so// dga' bo gal te rang bzhin gyis mi
408b1(dkon brtsegs): rtag pa yin na/ ci ste bde ba zhig yin nam/ 'on te sdug bsngal ba zhig yin na/ btsun pa de ni sdug bsngal ba lags so// gang mi rtag cing sdug bsngal ba de ni rnam par 'gyur zhing 'jig pa
408b2(dkon brtsegs): chos can yin na/ nga'i nyan thos 'phags pa mang du thos pa dang ldan pa dag ci gzugs 'di ni bdag yin no// bdag ni gzugs rnams dang ldan no// gzugs ni bdag gi ba yin no// bdag ni gzug
408b3(dkon brtsegs): la gnas so nas khas len par byed dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// 'di ji snyam du sems/ ce tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam pa shes pa de dag tu/
408b4(dkon brtsegs): pa zhig yin nam/ 'on te mi rtag pa zhig yin/ btsun pa thams cad rang bzhin gyis mi rtag pa lags so// dga' bo gal te rang bzhin gyis mi rtag pa yin na/ ci bde ba zhig yin nam/
408b5(dkon brtsegs): 'on te sdug bsngal ba yin btsun pa sdug bsngal ba lags so// gang mi rtag cing sdug bsngal ba de ni rnam par 'gyur zhing 'jig pa'i chos can yin na/ nga'i 'phags
408b6(dkon brtsegs): pa nyan thos mang du thos pa dang ldan pa dag ci tshor ba la sogs pa 'di dag ni bdag yin no// bdag ni tshor ba la sogs pa dang ldan no// tshor ba la sogs pa ni bdag gi ba yin no// bdag ni tshor ba la sogs
408b7(dkon brtsegs): pa la gnas so zhes khas len par byed dam/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// de lta bas na ji tsam du gzugs su gyur pa 'das pa 'am/ ma 'ongs pa 'am/ da ltar byung ba 'am/ nang gi 'am
409a1(dkon brtsegs): phyi rol gyi 'am/ rags pa 'amaphra ba'am/ bzang po 'amangan pa 'am/ thag ring ba'am/ thag nye ba'ang rung ste/ ji tsam ru gzugs su
409a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa thams cad kyang bdag ma yin la/ bdag kyang gzugs dang ldan pa ma yin pa dang / gzugs kyang bdag ma yin la/ bdag kyang gzugs la gnas pa ma yin par rig par bya'o// /
409a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji tsam du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes par gyur pa 'das pa'am/ ma 'ongs pa
409a4(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ da ltar byung ba dang / nang gi 'am/ phyi rol gyi 'am/ rags pa 'am/ phra ba 'am/ bzang po 'am/ ngan pa 'am/ thag ring ba 'am/ thag nye ba'ang rung ste/ de dag
409a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang bdag ma yin la/ bdag kyang de dag dang ldan pa ma yin pa dang / de dag kyang bdag gi ba ma yin la/ bdag kyang de dag la gnas pa ma yin par legs par so sor brtag par bya'o//
409a6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis nga'i nyan thos 'phags pa mang du thos pa dang ldan pa dag ni 'di ltar gzugs la so sor brtags nas yongs su skyo ba skye ba dang
409a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la so sor btags nas yongs su skyo ba skye bar 'gyur ro// gal te skyo bar gyur na mngon par zhen par mi byeng //
409b1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par zhen pa med pas rnam par grol ba thob par 'gyur ro// rnam par grol nas bdag rnam par grol lo snyam du shes pas 'di skad du bdag gi skye ba ni zar rodo// tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par
409b2(dkon brtsegs): spyad do// bya ba byas pa'ang srid pa phyi ma len par mi 'gyur ro zhes sgrog par 'gyur ro snyam du so sor brtag par bya'o// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa na/ tshe dang
409b3(dkon brtsegs): ljon pa dga' bo rdul spungs shing dri ma dang bral nas chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa thob par gyur to// dge slong lnga brgya po rnams ni zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol ba thob par gyur to//
409b4(dkon brtsegs): de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis/ yang tshogs su bcad de dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ gang la mnyam gzhag sems med pas/ rnam dag ye shes med pas na zag pa rnams ni spong mi
409b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// de bas khyod kyis nan tan sgrubs// khyod kyis rnal 'byor rtag sgoms la/ phung po skye 'gag shes par gyis// rnam dag gal te rdzogs gyur na// lha rnams kun gyis dga' bar 'gyur//
409b6(dkon brtsegs): mdza' bshes lhan cig 'brel dga' zhing / phan tshun 'drul zhing chags pa dang // thob dang grags pa mngon zhen pas// dga' bo khyod kyis kun spongs shig/ khyim pa dang ni rab byung la// brten
409b7(dkon brtsegs): cing bshes ni mi byed par// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'das soms la/ sdug bsngal mthar ni phyin par byos// dang po mer mer po las ni/ sha ya chu bur skye bar 'gyur// chu bur las ni ltar ltar skye/
410a1(dkon brtsegs): rdzu/ 'bo lus ma da byu gyur// na pa nam pan+d+ha nas da pa sa rdzub sa su gas sa m+b+ha rgyug
410a2(dkon brtsegs): su da// 'dun pa sa paganyis sprul// sa seM ba spyam 'phen sa sa s+ho/ yor srungs 'a ma sa pa dang // da sgyu
410a3(dkon brtsegs): ya / 'dus bcan pa / khrug pa kyi rgyas kyis 'di/ ltag pa sa songs / bzlas dus u rgya / mas nas
410a4(dkon brtsegs): dgatsun las rgya yod pas// de la kris ni chi banyis myur/ Ni loms pa las du ngas pa ni// ga tshu thal pa bcu gsum sog/ rgya le gas pason brel rgya ba y-i// rdzas pa san-i zhugs ma la/
410a5(dkon brtsegs): wA bu rgyud 'dis// gsumugasus dag ni pam tshu ma dz+wal// gnyis gnyis ga ga sanAn te// rgyag ma gzhanan rnas med// g.yas g.yon pargyad nyis sol// khang+yasan rus pa su so pa/ rdzas /
410a6(dkon brtsegs): 'al ba rus pa ni// bcoms na sum rgyan gyu yod// rgyas tshogs pan chus thal na ni// semasan drasan chus yinanas// yang dgas ngas rgyas mdun pa pos// yang tshag tu gsus pa lam/ nang kyi
410a7(dkon brtsegs): mgo la par/ tsha sa rjes shing mi brtan te/ dag ldan gcig lus bsgrungs pa// ma thu dam bu'i khyim dang 'dra// sa papa'a'atshig gzeng bu med// zag kun tu bsrus pas ni/ shing ma'i 'phrul ba 'or sa tsham
410b1(dkon brtsegs): sgyu mas sprul pa'i gzugs brnyan 'dra// lus 'di rtsa rgyus dkris nas ni// pags pa gsher bas g.yogs pas na// gnas dgu rma li sgo yod pas// de lta bur ni blta bar bya// kun nas gcin rgyag mi gtsang bas/
410b2(dkon brtsegs): rnyog tu gang zhing 'dzag pas na// dper na bang ba dor rnams su// 'bru rnams sna tshogs bkang ba ltar// lus 'di yang ni de bzhin te// mi gtsang sna tshogs rab tu gang // rus pa'i 'khrul 'khor g.yo bas na// nyam chung
410b3(dkon brtsegs): snying po ci yang med// byis pa skye bo rtag tu chags// mkhas pa dag ni zhen mi byed/ mchil snabs rdul ni rtag tu 'bab// rnag khrag dag ni rgyun du gang // zhag ser 'o ma lhan ci 'dres// klang rgyas dag ni klang ba gang // snying
410b4(dkon brtsegs): khar bad kan rgyun du 'byung // nang gzhu dang macu'i gnas// klang rgyas dang ni pags pa dang // snying dang nang khrol glo mchin dang // 'di la sogs pa'i rul myags dang // mi gtsang rnams dang lhan cig gnas// sdig pa'i lus ni 'jigs
410b5(dkon brtsegs): rung bas// 'di nyid bdag gi dgra yin na// shes med 'dod la zhen pa yi// blun po rtag tu 'phangs par byed// 'di 'dra'i migatsang lus 'di ni// grong khyer skying pa 'dra bas na// nyin mtshan nyon mongs rab gzir cing /
410b6(dkon brtsegs): skad cig mi gnas kun tu 'khyam// rus pas grong khyer rtsig par byed// sha dang khrag gis zhal zhal bskus// 'dod sdang gti mug tshon bkye nas// ci rigs par ni brgyan par byed// rus pa'i grong khyer rgyug
410b7(dkon brtsegs): bro ba khrag 'brel cing 'dus pas na// rtag tu sdug pa'i grogs po yis// phyi nang sdug bsngal gdung bar byed// dga' bo khyod kyis shes par byos// ngas ni ji skad bstan pa yin// nyin mtshan nag tu dran byis/
411a1(dkon brtsegs): la// 'dod pa'i yul la sems ma byed// gal te 'dod pa song 'dod na// rtag tu de bzhin rab sgoms la// rnam grol yongs su tshol bar gyis// myur du 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'da'// bcom ldan 'das kyis
411a2(dkon brtsegs): mngal du 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa na// tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang / dge slong lnga brgya po de dag rab tu dga' bar gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par stongango // / de'i tshe tshe dang
411a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa dga' bo 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'brog dgon pa las yang dag par 'das te/ mthar thug pa'i bde ba mya ngan las 'das pa'i gnas su phyin nas/ dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pas/ bdag nyid shin tu dga' bar gyur nas/
411a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ gus sems khrus ni bstab pa dang / chu gtsang byug spos phul ba dang // bsod nams rnams ni bsgrubs pa na/ rnam smin mchog 'di thob pa yin// de nas 'khor ma
411a5(dkon brtsegs): po rnam de skad ces bka' stsal pa thos pas tham cad the tsom du gyur nas/ the tsom gcod pa'i phyir ston pa chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo 'dis spos su ga las ci bgyis na/ de'i rnam par smin pa
411a6(dkon brtsegs): lus kyi mdog gser gi kha dog lta bur gyur la/ mtshan sum cu dang ldan pas bdag nyid brgyan cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi sbubs sor ba nis thung bar gyur/ ci'i slad du 'dod pa'i yul la shin tu mngon par zhen pa las ston pa chen pos thugs
411a7(dkon brtsegs): brtse bar dgongs nas/ mthus 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgral te/ thabs kyis shin tu mthar thug pa'i mya ngan las 'das pal rnam par gzhag pa bkas bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
411b1(dkon brtsegs): dge slong dag dge slong dga' bo sngon las mngon par 'dus byas pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yongs su smin pas na/ thams cad mngod du gyur ba yin no zhes gzhan nas bstan pa bzhin du rgyacha bka' stsal nug tshogs
411b2(dkon brtsegs): su bcad dga' stsal pa/ gal te bskal pa brgya lon kyang // las byas chung zar mi 'gyur te// rgyu dang rkyen ni tshogs pa na/ lus can nyid la 'bras bur smin/ dge slong dag khyod nyon cig/ sngon byung
411b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi sngon rol na/ skye dgu rnams tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig
411b4(dkon brtsegs): rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ dge slong gi dge 'dun stong zag drug rgya rtsa gnyis dang
411b5(dkon brtsegs): thabs cig tu ljongs rgyu zhing grong khyer mnyen ldan gyi rgyal po'i pho zang 'khor du gshegs nas/ mnyen ldan gyi tshal na bzhugs so// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de'i g.yas khyim gyi bcung zhig yod pa de 'dod pa'i yul la shin tu mngon pa
411b6(dkon brtsegs): zhen cing chags pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs des 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las yongs su 'da' ba'i phyir rab tu 'byung bar bskul nas/ thabs kyis mthar
411b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rnam par gzhag go/ de'i tshe na yul de'i bdag po mnyen ldan zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/ 'di ltar chos kyis mi rnams 'dul ba/ mi dang skye bo mang po rgyas pa/ lo leg shing
412a1(dkon brtsegs): / bde ba/ g.yo sgyu dang chom rkun med cing nang dang bral ba/ baglang dang / ra lug dang / sA lu dang / buram shing kun tu gang zhing rgyas par gyur te/ rgyal po de'i galas khyim gri nu bo dgi yod pa'ang shin tu
412a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa la mngon par zhen cing chags par gyur to// rgyal po des bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas te/ mnyan ldan gyi tshal na gzhugs par thos pas/ btsun mo dang / gzhon nu dang / blon po dang / skye bo mang po'i tshogs dang lhan cig tu
412a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das des rgyal po'i 'khor dang bcas pa la shin tu kye nom pa'i chos kyi gtam kun tu
412a4(dkon brtsegs): bstan cing gzengs bstod pas/ khyad par du 'phags pa'i shes pa thob par gyur to// de'i nu bo 'dod pa la zhen cing khyim nas 'byung du ma btub pa dang / de'i tshe de la blon po'i bu dang gzhan yang snga nas lhan cig rtse rtsa ba'i grogs
412a5(dkon brtsegs): bo dag gis kye grogs po shes par gyis shig/ 'di ltar rgyal po'i gnon nu dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang / blon po dang / skye bo mang po dang bcas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs ga la ba der dong ste/ lus pas dam
412a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos mnyan pas khyad par du 'phags pa'i shes pa thob par gyur te/ 'di ltar byed kyang mi lus shin tu thob pa dka' ba las deng thob par gyur na/ ci'i phyir 'dod pa la mngon par zhen cing chags nus sgor yang 'byung
412a7(dkon brtsegs): du mi 'atub ces smras pa dang / des kyang de skad du spro ba zos pas shin tu rotsha bar gyur nas de dag gi rjes su zang ste lhan cig dong ngo // de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de'i bcung dge slong des mang po dadag/
412b1(dkon brtsegs): lhan ni 'grogs te dong bar mthong nas/ kye khyed cu'i phyir mi 'di gcin bu khring nas lhan cig 'grogs te 'gro'o dris pa dang / de dag gis kyang ji ltar gyur pa zhig tu smras so// dge slong des smras pa/ bdag ni ma ldan
412b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyi gcung yin te/ sdom khyim na gnas pa'i tshe 'dod pa'i yul rnam la shin tu mngon par zhen cing chags pa las/ ston pa chen pos thugs rjer dgengs nas mthus 'khor ba las 'das te/ mthar thug pa'i mya ngan las
412b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa la bzhag pa yin no// gzhan yang skyes bu glen pa dag dang 'dra ba 'di lta bu yod pa las khyed kyis snying brtse nas lhan cig khrid de 'ongs pa shin tu legs so// deng bla na med pa'i ston pa chen po bcom ldan 'das ga
412b4(dkon brtsegs): la ba der khrid cig dang / gdon mi za bar shin tu dang ba'i dad pa skye bar 'gyur ro zhes smras pas/ de dag kyang lhan cig 'grogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba rer dong ba dang / bcom ldan 'das des kyang de dag la gzig
412b5(dkon brtsegs): nas/ dbang po dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par bstan pas/ de dag gis thos par gyur nas/ shin tu dang ba skyes pas 'dug pa'i stan las langs nas/ bla gros phrag pa gcig tu gzar te thal mo sbyar nas
412b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ston pa chen po 'phags pa'i dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang gi gdugs la bdag gi sdum par bsro khang du khrus la gshegs pa ci gnang zhes
412b7(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyang mi gsung bar gshegs par zhal gyis bzhes so// res kyang zhal gyis bzhes par rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag byas te song ngo //
413a1(dkon brtsegs): de nas rgyal po ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / rgyal po la lus gus pas phyag byas nas/ 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po bdag bcom ldan 'das gal ba der mchis nas chos zos
413a2(dkon brtsegs): pas 'byin tu dang ba skyes nas 'dod pa'i yul rnams la yongs su skyo ba'i sems skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas par sang gi gdugs la bdag gi sdum par bslobang du khrus la gshegs
413a3(dkon brtsegs): bar gsol ba las/ de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa chen pos kyang thugs brje bar dgongs nas gshegs par zhal gyis bzhes te/ bcom ldan 'das de ni lha dang mi rnams kyis mchod par bgyi 'obos su gyur pa 'gas na/
413a4(dkon brtsegs): lhas kyang grong khyer gyi shul dang srang rnams phyag bdar byas nas chag chag gtab ste/ mdzes par bgyi ba'i rigs so nas smras pa dang / rgyal pos 'di snyam du bcom ldan 'das zong khyer du gshegs na bdag gis grong khyer
413a5(dkon brtsegs): mdzes par bya mod kyi/ 'on kyang bdag gi nu bo 'dod pa la mngon par zhen nas bzlog par dka' ba las/ deng bcom ldan 'das kyis thul bar gyur pa ni yang dag par ngo mtshar che'o snyam du bsams nas/ nu bo shin tu
413a6(dkon brtsegs): legs kyis/ khyod song la khrus kyi yo byad ci dgos pa sbyor cig dang / ngas kyang ci nus kyis grong khyer brgyan par bya'o zhes smras pas/ rgyal po'i nu bo'ang shin tu dga' bar gyur te/ rgyal po la phyag byas te
413a7(dkon brtsegs): sa las langs te song ngo // de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ kye khyed cag reng la grong khyer du dril chen po bsgrags te/ phyogs su 'di skad du sang bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs/
413b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis zong khyer na gnas pa dang / phul so so ras lhag pa'i skye bo rnams so so nas ci nus kyis grong khyer mdzes par gyis la/ lam dang srang rnams phrag dang byas te chag chag btab nas me tog dang / spos dang
413b2(dkon brtsegs): dri rnams thogs te/ ston pa chen po gshegs pa bsus shig ces sgos shig/ rnon po rnams kyis kyang lha de bzhin 'tshal lo zhes rgyal po'i bka' khyer nas phyogs su gobar bsgo zhing dril chen gyi sgra bsgrags pas/
413b3(dkon brtsegs): skye bo rnams grong khyer de'i rdo ba dang / gyo mo dang / bong ba rnams bsal te/ spos kyi chus kun tu khyab par chag chag btab nas/ bdug pa dam pa rnams kyang bsregs/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan
413b4(dkon brtsegs): mang po'ang btsugs te/ me tog rnams mngon par gtor bas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi skyed mos tshal dga' ba bzhin du byas so// de'i phyir rgyal po'i nu bos kyang spos chu dang / spos mar la sogs pa sbyar te/ bsro ba
413b5(dkon brtsegs): mdzes par byas nas khri bshams nas gdan yang bting ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs mthar gyis grong khyer du gshegs su nye ba dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po dang / btsun mo
413b6(dkon brtsegs): dang sras dang / skye bo mang po rnams grong nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsus nas/ rgyang nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te zhabs 'bring byas nas grong khyer du gshegs pa dang / de'i tshe rgyal po'i nu bo des
413b7(dkon brtsegs): kyang bcom ldan 'das bsro khang bar du gshegs par spyan drangs te/ spos chu la sogs pa phul nas skubasil bar gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spu gser gyi kha dog can mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po/
414a1(dkon brtsegs): brgyad cus yongs su brgyan pa mthong ba dang / rab tu dga' nas shin tu dang ba'i dad pa skyes par gyur to// sku bsil nas na bza' mnabs pa dang / des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis
414a2(dkon brtsegs): la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ 'di skad du reng bdug gis bsod nams kyi nong mchog dmapa la mchod pa cung zad bgyis pa 'di'i dge ba'i rtsa bas/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bcom ldan 'das 'di dang tha dad pa med pa'i gsor
414a3(dkon brtsegs): kha dog can gyi lus thob par gyur cig/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das 'di'i ga cung 'dod pa'i yul la mngon par zhen cing chags pa las mthus yongs su bzlas te/ shin tu mthar thug pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la gzhol bar
414a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gcung du gyur nas/ gser gyi kha dog can gyi lus thob par gyur te/ 'di ltar bdag 'dod pa'i yul la mngon par zhan cing chags par gyur pa na'ang mthus srid pa'i chu
414a5(dkon brtsegs): po zab mo las yongs su bzlas te/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba la gzhol bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo// dge slong dag khyed kyis de'i che de'i dus na/ rgyal po gnyen ldan gyi nu bo 'dod pa la mngon par
414a6(dkon brtsegs): zhen par gyur pa gzhan yon snyam du sems na de ltar mi blta ste/ de ni dge slong dga' bo 'di nyid yin no// das sngon 'das pa'i dus su de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs sro khang du gshegs par gsol nas/ spos tshul sogs
414a7(dkon brtsegs): bas sku bsil te/ shin tu dang ba'i dad pas smon lam btab pa de'i dge pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyus deng de bzhin gshegs pa'i bcung du gyur nas/ lus gser gyi kha dog lta bur gyur pa dang / 'dod pa'i yul la mngon par zhen cing chags
414b1(dkon brtsegs): pa las ngas mthus phyung ste/ khyim nas khyim med pa rab tu byung nas/ mthar thug pa'i mya ngan las 'das ba shin tu bde ba'i gnas su phyin par gyur pa yon mo de nas 'khor mang po rnams the tshoman rmung
414b2(dkon brtsegs): nas/ yang bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos sngon las ci gyis na skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu mngon par 'grub pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'dis las mngon
414b3(dkon brtsegs): par 'dus byas pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher snga ma bzhin te/ sngon 'das pa'i dus su ri brag gi grong gzhan zhig na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang ba/ yo byad kyis brel ba med pa zhig gnas pa de la skyed mos tshal me tog dang
414b4(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu rgyas shing / chu mig dang / 'bab chu dang / ljon shing dang ldan pa rab tu 'byung ba'i dben gnas su 'os pa zhig yod de/ de'i tshe rang sangs rgyas sems can la snying rtse ba'i phyir 'jig rten dubyung nas dben pa na gnas pa
414b5(dkon brtsegs): yod pas/ nam 'jig rtan du sangs rgyas mi 'byung ba'i tshe/ 'di 'ab 'a zhig pa sod nam kyi zhing du gyur te/ ma lasangs rgyas gzhan nig ljongs rgyu ning ri brag gi grong dar byir nas/ ngan tshun kun tu brtags kyi gnas btsal ba las ngas
414b6(dkon brtsegs): skyed mos tshal du phyin pa dang / skyed mos tshal de srung ba'i mis ngalags par mthong nas/ bde bar gshegs sam/ mnyal bso ba'i slad du 'phags pa 'dir bzhugs su gsol zhes smras so// des nam gyi gung thun la me'i 'am
414b7(dkon brtsegs): la snyoms pabazhugs pa dang / skyed mos chal srung ba'i mis mthong nas/ 'di snyam du btsun pa chen po 'di ni 'di lta bu'i spyod pa mchog grub po snyam du bsams nas nga nas nub mo langs te khyim bdag pa la ba der song nas
415a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad du khyim bdag chen po der dga' ba chen po skyed cig/ skyed mos tshal na 'phags pa zhig bdag gi thang du gshegs nas mtshan mo gnas pa las/ de ni spyod pa gya nom pa dang ldan ning rdzu 'phrul chen/
415a2(dkon brtsegs): kho phun sum tshogs pa zhig pas/ 'od zer chen po bdakye nas skyed mos tshal gyi nang kun tu gsal bar byas so zhes smras pa khyim bdag gis thos nas myur zhing rings par skyer mos tshal du song ste/ rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas nas/
415a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad du 'phags pa ni bsod snyoms bzhed pa lags la/ bdag ni bsod nams 'tshal ba lags na/ thugs brtse bar dgongs te skyed mos tshal 'dir bzhugs su gsol/ bdag gis rtag par bsod snyoms sbyar ro zhes smras
415a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang des kyang des gus par gsol ba btab par mthong nas khas blangs te/ skyed mos tshal de'i nang du gnas nas/ bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa mchog la snyoms par zhugs te/ bde ba rjes su myong bar gyur to// dus
415a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan zhig na de 'di snyam du bdag gi lus rul pa 'di ni 'khor bar 'khor ba las bdag gis gang bya ba de ni thob par gyur pas mya ngan las 'das pa zhi ba'i dbyings su zhugs nas/ gtan du mi skye ba mngon sum du bya ba'i
415a6(dkon brtsegs): rigs so snyam nas/ nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdzu 'phrul rnams mngon par bstan te/ 'od zer chen po kye nas/ steng du 'bar bdang / cha ba dang / 'og tu chu 'bab pa
415a7(dkon brtsegs): la sogs pa bstan te/ lus 'di spangs nas rnam par shes pa skye bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de nas khyim bdag des de'i rus bu mangs nas
415b1(dkon brtsegs): dri'i shing thams cad kyis bsregs te/ 'o mas me bsad nas rus pa lhag ma ma lus pa bsdus te/ bram pa gsar pa'i nang du bcug nas/ mchod rten brtsigs te/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan rnams dzug+sa
415b2(dkon brtsegs): nas/ shin tu dang ba'i dad pas dri'i chu ba nom pa sum nu gtor te/ mtshan bzang po rnams grub par shog cig ces smon lam chen po btab po// dge slong dag legs pa nyon la/ de'i tshe de'i dus na
415b3(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag tu gyur pa de gzhan yin pa snyam du sems na de ltar mi blta ste/ de ni dga' bo 'di nyid yin no// 'dis mchod pa mchog byas pa dang / gus pa dang / shin tu dang ba skyed pa'i las kyi dbang gis der 'dir mtshan
415b4(dkon brtsegs): mchog khyad par du 'phags pa sum cu mngon par grub pa'i rnam par smin pa myong bar gyur pa yin no// de nas 'khor mang po rnams yang the tsom skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
415b5(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos las ci bgyis na/ gal te 'di rab tu ma byung zhing khyim na gnas par gyur na/ gdon mi za bar stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'dis bgyis par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan
415b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dga' bos tshe rabs snga ma la las mngon par 'dus byas pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin par yongs su smin par gyur pa'i tshe/ gdon mi za bar bdag nyid kyis myong bar 'gyur ro zhes
415b7(dkon brtsegs): bya ba la sogs pa'ang rgyas par gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu rnams tshe lo stong phrag nyi shu thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
416a1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas 'od srungs nas sa thun gnyis dang ldan pa 'ag/ ra byu / nA d+has dang zong rlu gas 'gas na /
416a2(dkon brtsegs): de'i chen zong khyer den rgyal po mo kri zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/ 'di ltar chos kyis 'jog rten 'dul bar byed pas/ chos bzhin du rgyal po byeng ngo zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i yang rgyas par gong ma bzhin du gyur ro//
416a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po de la bu gsum yod de/ 'di lta ste/ rab dang / 'bring po dang / tha chungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mthar
416a4(dkon brtsegs): byin nas shing zad pa'i me bzhin du lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang / rgyal po des gus pa'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung blangs te/ dri'i shing
416a5(dkon brtsegs): tsan dan dang / gor shir sha dang / lha'i spos kyi shing la sogs pas bsregs te/ 'o mas me bsad nas ring bsrel bsdus te/ rin po che'i bum pa'i nang du bcug nas/ mchod rten chen po rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa/
416a6(dkon brtsegs): khor khor lug tu dpag tshad gcig/ yang du dpag tshad byed yod pa brtsigs nas/ 'khor lo 'dzugs pa'i tshe/ rgyal po'i bu 'bring po ngas bdag nyid steng du 'dzags nas 'khor lo bar ma btsugs so// dge slong
416a7(dkon brtsegs): ngag de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po'i bu 'bring por gyur pa de gzhan yin pa snyam du sems na de ltar mi blta ste/ dga' bo 'di nyid yin no// 'dis sngon 'das pa'i rus su gus pa'i sems kyis mchor ba byas pa dang / 'khor lo
416b1(dkon brtsegs): bar ma btsugs pa'i dge ba'i las des tshe rabs nyis stong lnga brgya'i bang du rtag par gling gcig la dbang ba'i stobs kyis 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po byas so// tshe 'di la gal te rab tu 'byung bar ma gyur na/ de bzhin du stobs
416b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dbang byug chen po la dbang sgyur ba byed par 'gyur ro// de nas 'khor mang po rnams the tsom du gyur nas/ yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bdun
416b3(dkon brtsegs): pa tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos sngon las tsob gyis na/ nyan thos kyi nang na dbang po'i sgo rab tu sdom pa'i mchog tu bka' stsal lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni smon lam gyi stobs las gyur pa yi/
416b4(dkon brtsegs): te/ dge slong dag dga' bo 'di sngon de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi bstan pa las/ khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba las/ de'i mkhan po bcom ldan 'das
416b5(dkon brtsegs): de'i bstan pa las dbang po'i sgo rab tu sdom pa'i mchog tu bsngags pa brjod par gyur to// des ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du tshangs par spyad kyang / tshe de nyid las mngon par rtogs pa ci'ang thob par ma gyur pas/
416b6(dkon brtsegs): 'chi ba'i rus kyi tshe/ 'di skad du bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa las/ ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du tshangs par spyad kyang / tshe 'di nyid la mngon par rtogs pa ci'ang med pas/ bdag gis 'dir tshangs par sbyor ba'i
416b7(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyis ma 'ongs pa'i rus na/ bram ze'i khye'u bla ma zhes bya ba 'di yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ mtshan yang shAkya thub pa/
417a1(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pas/ bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa las/ khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ nyon mongs pa rnams
417a2(dkon brtsegs): spangs nas dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur te/ ji ltar bdag gi mkhan po 'di bcom ldan 'das 'di'i bstan pa las dbang po'i sgo rab tu sdom pa'i mchog tu gyur pa de bzhin du
417a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa las dbang po'i sgo sdom pa'i mchog tu gyur cig ces smon lam btab pas na/ smon lam de'i stobs kyis deng 'dir nga'i bstan pa las nyan thos
417a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi nang na dbang po'i sgo rab tu sdom pa'i mchog tu gyur pa yin no// 'di ltar dge slong dag gang gcig tu gnag pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa'ang gcig tu gnag go/ gang gcig
417a5(dkon brtsegs): tu dkar ba'i las kyi rnam par sbyin pa'ang gcig tu dkar ro// las 'dren ma gang yin pa de ni rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren ma myong bar 'gyur te/ de lta bas na khyed kyis gcig
417a6(dkon brtsegs): tu gnag pa dang 'dren pa'i las spongs la gcig tu dkar ba'i las bsgrub par bya'o// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i mdo stong phrag rgya ba
417a7(dkon brtsegs): lasamangal na gnas par bstan pa'i 'dus pa ste/ 'dus pa bcu bzhi pa rdzogs so//
